atk-s0301a0:4_0: Buddhopi buddhabhāvaṃ, bhāvetvā ceva sacchikatvā ca;
atk-s0301a0:5_0: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:13_0: Pañcahi yā saṅgītā, anusaṅgītā ca pacchāpi.
atk-s0301a0:23_0: Saṅgītīnaṃ dvinnaṃ, yā me atthaṃ vadantena.
atk-s0301a0:24_0: Vitthāravasena sudaṃ, vatthūni ca yāni tattha vuttāni;
atk-s0301a0:25_0: Tesampi na idha bhiyyo, vitthārakathaṃ karissāmi.
atk-s0301a0:26_0: Suttānaṃ pana atthā, na vinā vatthūhi ye pakāsanti;
atk-s0301a0:34_0: Iti pana sabbaṃ yasmā, visuddhimagge mayā suparisuddhaṃ;
atk-s0301a0:35_0: Vuttaṃ tasmā bhiyyo, na taṃ idha vicārayissāmi.
atk-s0301a0:38_0: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
atk-s0301a0:45_3: Tassāpi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādi.
atk-s0301a0:45_4: Sā panesā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya ādimhi vitthāritā,
atk-s0301a0:46_5: haratīti ākhyātapadanti iminā tāva nayena padavibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:47_6: kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ bahu”nti evamādīsu upamāyaṃ āgato.
atk-s0301a0:47_11: “Evamevaṃ panāyaṃ vasalī yasmiṃ vā tasmiṃ vā tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsatī”tiādīsu garahaṇe. “Evaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:47_12: bhanteti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosu”ntiādīsu vacanasampaṭiggahe.
atk-s0301a0:47_17: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ puccha –
atk-s0301a0:47_18: ‘subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhavantaṃ ānandaṃ appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāraṃ pucchatī’ti.
atk-s0301a0:47_20: ‘sādhu kira bhavaṃ ānando yena subhassa māṇavassa todeyyaputtassa nivesanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:47_23: ime dhammā kusalā vā akusalā vāti? Akusalā, bhante.
atk-s0301a0:47_24: Sāvajjā vā anavajjā vāti? Sāvajjā, bhante.
atk-s0301a0:47_27: Samattā samādinnā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti vā no vā,
atk-s0301a0:47_28: kathaṃ vo ettha hotīti? Samattā, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:48_1: nānānayanipuṇaṃ anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ atthabyañjanasampannaṃ vividhapāṭihāriyaṃ dhammatthadesanā paṭivedhagambhīraṃ
atk-s0301a0:48_2: sabbasattānaṃ sakasakabhāsānurūpato sotapathamāgacchantaṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātuṃ?
atk-s0301a0:48_3: Sabbathāmena pana sotukāmataṃ janetvāpi evaṃ me sutaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:49_2: na mayā idaṃ sacchikata”nti attānaṃ parimocento –
atk-s0301a0:49_4: mayāpi evaṃ suta”nti idāni vattabbaṃ sakalasuttaṃ nidasseti.
atk-s0301a0:50_3: mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bahussutānaṃ yadidaṃ ānando,
atk-s0301a0:50_8: “āyasmā ānando atthakusalo dhammakusalo byañjanakusalo niruttikusalo pubbāparakusalo”ti evaṃ dhammasenāpatinā
atk-s0301a0:50_9: ca pasatthabhāvānurūpaṃ attano dhāraṇabalaṃ dassento sattānaṃ sotukāmataṃ janeti –
atk-s0301a0:50_11: tañca kho atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnamanadhikaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:51_4: bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū ” tiādīsu mayhanti attho.
atk-s0301a0:51_8: Idha pana “mayā suta”nti ca “mama suta”nti ca atthadvaye yujjati.
atk-s0301a0:52_0: Sutanti ayaṃ sutasaddo saupasaggo anupasaggo ca gamana- vissuta-
atk-s0301a0:52_12: Idha panassa sotadvārānusārena upadhāritanti vā upadhāraṇanti vā attho. Me-
atk-s0301a0:53_3: Tathā evanti tassa sotadvārānusārena pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattibhāvappakāsanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:53_7: “nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattāya viññāṇavīthiyā mayā na aññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0301a0:55_0: Tathā evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanagahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:55_5: Ettāvatā nānākārappavattena cittasantānena taṃsamaṅgino kattuvisaye gahaṇasanniṭṭhānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:57_0: Tattha evanti ca meti ca saccikaṭṭhaparamatthavasena avijjamānapaññatti.
atk-s0301a0:57_2: yaṃ evanti vā meti vā niddesaṃ labhetha.
atk-s0301a0:57_6: Tathā evanti ca meti ca taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbato upādāpaññatti.
atk-s0301a0:58_0: Ettha ca evanti vacanena asammohaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:58_4: na so kālantarena mayā sutanti paṭijānāti.
atk-s0301a0:59_3: Sutanti vacanena avikkhepaṃ dīpeti vikkhittacittassa savanābhāvato.
atk-s0301a0:59_4: Tathā hi vikkhittacitto puggalo sabbasampattiyā vuccamānopi “na mayā sutaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:59_6: Yoniso manasikārena cettha attasammāpaṇidhiṃ pubbe ca katapuññataṃ sādheti,
atk-s0301a0:59_7: sammā appaṇihitattassa pubbe akatapuññassa vā tadabhāvato.
atk-s0301a0:59_10: na ca sappurise anupanissayamānassa savanaṃ atthīti.
atk-s0301a0:60_1: yasmā “evanti yassa cittasantānassa nānākārappavattiyā nānatthabyañjanaggahaṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:60_3: so ca evaṃ bhaddako ākāro na sammā appaṇihitattano pubbe akatapuññassa vā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:60_4: tasmā evanti iminā bhaddakena ākārena pacchimacakkadvayasampattimattano dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:60_6: Na hi appatirūpadese vasato sappurisūpanissayavirahitassa vā savanaṃ atthi.
atk-s0301a0:60_11: Iti payogāsayasuddhassa āgamādhigamasampannassa vacanaṃ aruṇuggaṃ viya sūriyassa udayato,
atk-s0301a0:60_13: arahati bhagavato vacanassa pubbaṅgamaṃ bhavitunti ṭhāne nidānaṃ ṭhapento evaṃ me sutantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:61_1: evanti iminā nānappakārapaṭivedhadīpakena vacanena attano atthapaṭibhānapaṭisambhidāsampattisabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:61_3: Evanti ca idaṃ yoniso manasikāradīpakavacanaṃ bhāsamāno –
atk-s0301a0:61_4: “ete mayā dhammā manasānupekkhitā diṭṭhiyā suppaṭividdhā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:61_6: “bahū mayā dhammā sutā dhātā vacasā paricitā”ti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:61_7: Tadubhayenapi atthabyañjanapāripūriṃ dīpento savane ādaraṃ janeti.
atk-s0301a0:61_8: Atthabyañjanaparipuṇṇañhi dhammaṃ ādarena assuṇanto mahatā hitā paribāhiro hotīti ādaraṃ janetvā sakkaccaṃ dhammo sotabboti.
atk-s0301a0:62_0: Evaṃ me sutanti iminā pana sakalena vacanena āyasmā ānando tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammaṃ attano adahanto asappurisabhūmiṃ atikkamati,
atk-s0301a0:62_5: tasseva pana bhagavato vacana”nti dīpento attānaṃ parimoceti,
atk-s0301a0:63_0: Apica “evaṃ me suta”nti attanā uppāditabhāvaṃ appaṭijānanto purimavacanaṃ vivaranto –
atk-s0301a0:63_1: “sammukhā paṭiggahitamidaṃ mayā tassa bhagavato catuvesārajjavisāradassa dasabaladharassa āsabhaṭṭhānaṭṭhāyino
atk-s0301a0:63_2: sīhanādanādino sabbasattuttamassa dhammissarassa dhammarājassa dhammādhipatino dhammadīpassa dhammasaraṇassa
atk-s0301a0:63_4: na ettha atthe vā dhamme vā pade vā byañjane vā kaṅkhā vā vimati vā kattabbā”ti sabbadevamanussānaṃ imasmiṃ dhamme assaddhiyaṃ vināseti,
atk-s0301a0:68_0: Paṭilābhe pahāne ca, paṭivedhe ca dissati”.
atk-s0301a0:69_0: Tathā hissa “appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyā”ti evamādīsu samavāyo attho.
atk-s0301a0:69_3: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu khaṇo.
atk-s0301a0:69_14: “Tena kho pana samayena uggāhamāno paribbājako samaṇamuṇḍikāputto samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme paṭivasatī”tiādīsu diṭṭhi.
atk-s0301a0:70_0: “Diṭṭhe dhamme ca yo attho, yo cattho samparāyiko;
atk-s0301a0:72_2: “Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho saṅkhataṭṭho santāpaṭṭho vipariṇāmaṭṭho abhisamayaṭṭho”tiādīsu paṭivedho.
atk-s0301a0:72_8: muhuttādīsu kālappabhedabhūtesu samayesu ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:73_0: Tattha kiñcāpi etesu saṃvaccharādīsu samayesu yaṃ yaṃ suttaṃ yasmiṃ yasmiṃ saṃvacchare utumhi māse pakkhe rattibhāge divasabhāge vā vuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:73_1: sabbaṃ taṃ therassa suviditaṃ suvavatthāpitaṃ paññāya.
atk-s0301a0:73_2: Yasmā pana “evaṃ me sutaṃ asukasaṃvacchare asukautumhi asukamāse asukapakkhe asukarattibhāge asukadivasabhāge
atk-s0301a0:73_3: vā”ti evaṃ vutte na sakkā sukhena dhāretuṃ vā uddisituṃ vā uddisāpetuṃ vā,
atk-s0301a0:73_5: tasmā ekeneva padena tamatthaṃ samodhānetvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0301a0:74_0: Ye vā ime gabbhokkantisamayo jātisamayo saṃvegasamayo abhinikkhamanasamayo dukkarakārikasamayo māravijayasamayo
atk-s0301a0:74_1: abhisambodhisamayo diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasamayo desanāsamayo parinibbānasamayoti evamādayo bhagavato
atk-s0301a0:74_2: devamanussesu ativiya suppakāsā anekakālappabhedā eva samayā.
atk-s0301a0:74_3: Tesu samayesu desanāsamayasaṅkhātaṃ ekaṃ samayanti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:74_8: tesupi samayesu aññataraṃ sandhāya “ekaṃ samaya”nti āha.
atk-s0301a0:75_0: Kasmā panettha yathā abhidhamme “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacara”nti ca ito aññesu suttapadesu “yasmiṃ samaye,
atk-s0301a0:75_2: bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”ti ca bhummavacanena niddeso kato,
atk-s0301a0:75_3: vinaye ca “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”ti karaṇavacanena,
atk-s0301a0:75_4: tathā akatvā “ekaṃ samaya”nti upayogavacanena niddeso katoti.
atk-s0301a0:75_7: Tattha hi abhidhamme ito aññesu suttapadesu ca adhikaraṇattho bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-s0301a0:75_9: tattha vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena tesaṃ bhāvo lakkhīyati.
atk-s0301a0:76_0: Vinaye ca hetuattho karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
atk-s0301a0:76_1: Yo hi so sikkhāpadapaññattisamayo sāriputtādīhipi dubbiññeyyo,
atk-s0301a0:76_2: tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtena ca sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsi.
atk-s0301a0:76_3: Tasmā tadatthajotanatthaṃ tattha karaṇavacanena niddeso kato.
atk-s0301a0:77_0: Idha pana aññasmiṃ ca evaṃjātike accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati.
atk-s0301a0:77_1: Yañhi samayaṃ bhagavā imaṃ aññaṃ vā suttantaṃ desesi,
atk-s0301a0:80_0: Aññatra samayo vutto, upayogena so idhā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:81_1: “tasmiṃ samaye”ti vā “tena samayenā”ti vā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vā abhilāpamattabhedo esa,
atk-s0301a0:81_3: Tasmā “ekaṃ samaya”nti vuttepi “ekasmiṃ samaye”ti attho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:84_0: Garu gāravayutto so, bhagavā tena vuccatī”ti. ;
atk-s0301a0:88_0: Imissā gāthāya vasenassa padassa vitthārato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:89_0: Ettāvatā cettha evaṃ me sutanti vacanena yathāsutaṃ dhammaṃ dassento bhagavato dhammasarīraṃ paccakkhaṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a0:89_2: ayaṃ vo satthā”ti satthu adassanena ukkaṇṭhitaṃ janaṃ samassāseti.
atk-s0301a0:89_3: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavāti vacanena tasmiṃ samaye bhagavato avijjamānabhāvaṃ dassento rūpakāyaparinibbānaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0301a0:89_4: Tena “evaṃvidhassa nāma ariyadhammassa desako dasabaladharo vajirasaṅghātasamānakāyo sopi bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0301a0:89_5: kena aññena jīvite āsā janetabbā”ti jīvitamadamattaṃ janaṃ saṃvejeti,
atk-s0301a0:90_4: tena ṭhitopi gacchantopi nisinnopi sayānopi bhagavā viharaticceva veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:90_5: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanaṃ aññena iriyāpathena vicchinditvā aparipatantaṃ attabhāvaṃ harati pavatteti,
atk-s0301a0:91_1: Tañhi tena ropitaṃ saṃvaḍḍhitaṃ paripālitaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:91_4: Anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmeti anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā catupaññāsahiraññakoṭipariccāgena buddhappamukhassa
atk-s0301a0:91_5: bhikkhusaṅghassa niyyātitattā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo”ti saṅkhaṃ gate ārāme.
atk-s0301a0:91_7: vitthāro pana papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāya sabbāsavasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto.
atk-s0301a0:92_5: Na hi sakkā ubhayattha ekaṃ samayaṃ viharitunti.
atk-s0301a0:93_1: Tasmā yathā gaṅgāyamunādīnaṃ samīpe goyūthāni carantāni “gaṅgāyaṃ caranti,
atk-s0301a0:94_0: Aññatarā devatāti nāmagottavasena apākaṭā ekā devatāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:94_2: bhagavā ahu ñātaññatarassa mahesakkhassa yakkhassa saṃkhittena taṇhāsaṅkhayavimuttiṃ bhāsitā”ti ettha
atk-s0301a0:94_6: so ca kho rūpāvacarānaṃ devānaṃ aññataro.
atk-s0301a0:95_5: bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkha”nti evamādīsu khaye dissati.
atk-s0301a0:95_6: “Ayaṃ imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ abhikkantataro ca paṇītataro cā”ti evamādīsu sundare.
atk-s0301a0:96_0: “Ko me vandati pādāni, iddhiyā yasasā jalaṃ;
atk-s0301a0:98_7: Niyāmo hi kiresa devatānaṃ yadidaṃ buddhānaṃ vā buddhasāvakānaṃ vā upaṭṭhānaṃ āgacchantā majjhimayāmasamanantareyeva āgacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:99_20: Devatā hi manussalokaṃ āgacchamānā pakativaṇṇaṃ pakatiiddhiṃ jahitvā oḷārikaṃ attabhāvaṃ katvā atirekavaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0301a0:99_21: atirekaiddhiṃ māpetvā naṭasamajjādīni gacchantā manussā viya abhisaṅkhatena kāyena āgacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:100_3: Tathā hissa “kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariya”nti evamādīsu anavasesatthamattho.
atk-s0301a0:100_4: “Kevalakappā ca aṅgamagadhā pahūtaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ ādāya upasaṅkamissantī”ti evamādīsu yebhuyyatā.
atk-s0301a0:100_8: anuruddhassa bāhiyo nāma saddhivihāriko kevalakappaṃ saṅghabhedāya ṭhito”ti evamādīsu daḷhatthatā.
atk-s0301a0:100_9: “Kevalī vusitavā uttamapurisoti vuccatī”ti evamādīsu visaṃyogo attho.
atk-s0301a0:101_1: saddo panāyaṃ abhisaddahana- vohāra- kāla- paññatti- chedana- vikappa-
atk-s0301a0:101_4: yathā taṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti evamādīsu abhisaddahanamattho.
atk-s0301a0:101_7: pañcahi samaṇakappehi phalaṃ paribhuñjitu”nti evamādīsu vohāro.
atk-s0301a0:101_15: Tasmā kevalakappaṃ jetavananti ettha “anavasesaṃ samantato jetavana”nti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a0:102_1: candimā viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekapajjotaṃ karitvāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:103_3: Yena vā kāraṇena bhagavā devamanussehi upasaṅkamitabbo,
atk-s0301a0:103_4: tena kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a0:103_10: Atha vā evaṃ gatā tato āsannataraṃ ṭhānaṃ bhagavato samīpasaṅkhātaṃ gantvātipi vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:104_0: Idāni yenatthena loke aggapuggalassa upaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā,
atk-s0301a0:104_1: taṃ pucchitukāmā dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalaṃ añjuliṃ sirasi patiṭṭhapetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:104_4: Tasmā yathā ṭhitā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:104_8: Paṇḍitā hi devamanussā garuṭṭhāniyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā āsanakusalatāya ekamantaṃ tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0301a0:105_0: Kathaṃ ṭhito pana ekamantaṃ ṭhito hotīti?
atk-s0301a0:105_8: Atidūre ṭhito hi sace kathetukāmo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:105_17: Tasmā ayampi ete cha ṭhānadose vajjetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:106_5: tena sā taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchamānā evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:107_4: atha naṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi ‘vassasahassaṃ me niraye paccamānassā”’ti idaṃ virujjhati.
atk-s0301a0:107_5: Na hi nerayikasatto niddukkho nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:107_8: Pubbe kira paṭhamakappikānaṃ niddukkhānaṃ sukhasamappitānaṃ esa vohāro,
atk-s0301a0:107_9: aparabhāge dukkhaṃ hotu vā mā vā,
atk-s0301a0:107_10: ruḷhīsaddena ayaṃ vohāro vuccateva nippadumāpi nirudakāpi vā pokkharaṇī pokkharaṇī viya.
atk-s0301a0:108_2: Tattha pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo kāmogho nāma.
atk-s0301a0:108_3: Rūpārūpabhavesu chandarāgo jhānanikanti ca bhavogho nāma.
atk-s0301a0:108_6: Tattha kāmogho aṭṭhasu lobhasahagatesu cittuppādesu uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:109_0: Sabbopi cesa avahananaṭṭhena rāsaṭṭhena ca oghoti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:109_2: Ayañhi attano vasaṃ gate satte adho gameti,
atk-s0301a0:109_4: uparibhāvaṃ vā nibbānaṃ gantuṃ adento adho tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu ca gametītipi attho.
atk-s0301a0:109_6: Mahā heso kilesarāsi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggā patthaṭo,
atk-s0301a0:109_10: Atarīti imaṃ catubbidhampi oghaṃ kena nu tvaṃ, mārisa,
atk-s0301a0:110_0: Athassā bhagavā pañhaṃ vissajjento appatiṭṭhaṃ khvāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:110_4: Iti bhagavā gūḷhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ katvā pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:110_5: Devatāpi naṃ sutvā “bāhirakaṃ tāva oghaṃ tarantā nāma ṭhātabbaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhantā taritabbaṭṭhāne āyūhantā taranti,
atk-s0301a0:110_6: ayaṃ pana avīcito yāva bhavaggā patthaṭaṃ kilesoghaṃ kilesarāsiṃ appatiṭṭhahanto anāyūhanto atarinti āha.
atk-s0301a0:110_9: Vimatiṃ pakkhantā pañhassa atthaṃ na aññāsi.
atk-s0301a0:111_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā yathā sattā na jānanti,
atk-s0301a0:111_1: evaṃ kathanatthāya pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutā paṭividdhāti?
atk-s0301a0:111_3: Dve pana bhagavato desanā niggahamukhena ca anuggahamukhena ca.
atk-s0301a0:111_4: Tattha ye paṇḍitamānino honti aññātepi ñātasaññino pañcasatā brāhmaṇapabbajitā viya,
atk-s0301a0:111_9: pavayha pavayha, ānanda, vakkhāmi, yo sāro,
atk-s0301a0:111_12: tesaṃ suviññeyyaṃ katvā ākaṅkheyyasuttādisadisaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0301a0:111_14: ahamovādena ahamanuggahena ahamanusāsaniyā”ti ca ne samassāseti.
atk-s0301a0:112_4: “iminā pana kāraṇena tiṇṇo”ti ettakamattaṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0301a0:112_10: Atha satthā “ayaṃ kiliṭṭhavatthaṃ viya raṅgajātaṃ abhabbo imaṃ mānaṃ appahāya desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ,
atk-s0301a0:112_11: mānaniggahaṃ tāvassa katvā puna nīcacittena pucchantassa pakāsessāmī”ti paṭicchannaṃ katvā pañhaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:113_1: Tattha yadā svāhanti yasmiṃ kāle ahaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:113_5: Saṃsīdāmīti paṭicchannaṃ katvā ataranto tattheva osīdāmi.
atk-s0301a0:113_7: Iti ṭhāne ca vāyāme ca dosaṃ disvā atiṭṭhanto avāyamanto oghamatarinti evaṃ bhagavatā pañho kathito.
atk-s0301a0:113_14: avasesakilesānañceva abhisaṅkhārānañca vasena āyūhanto nibbuyhati nāma.
atk-s0301a0:114_0: Imaṃ pañhavissajjanaṃ sutvāva devatā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya tuṭṭhā pasannā attano tuṭṭhiñca pasādañca pakāsayantī cirassaṃ vatāti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:114_1: Tattha cirassanti cirassa kālassa accayenāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:114_2: Ayaṃ kira devatā kassapasammāsambuddhaṃ disvā tassa parinibbānato paṭṭhāya antarā aññaṃ buddhaṃ na diṭṭhapubbā,
atk-s0301a0:114_4: Kiṃ panimāya devatāya ito pubbe satthā na diṭṭhapubboti.
atk-s0301a0:114_10: Visattikanti rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu āsattavisattatādīhi kāraṇehi visattikā vuccati taṇhā,
atk-s0301a0:114_11: taṃ visattikaṃ appatiṭṭhamānaṃ anāyūhamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ nittiṇṇaṃ uttiṇṇaṃ cirassaṃ vata khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇaṃ passāmīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:115_0: Samanuñño satthā ahosīti tassā devatāya vacanaṃ citteneva samanumodi,
atk-s0301a0:115_2: Antaradhāyīti abhisaṅkhatakāyaṃ jahitvā attano pakatiupādiṇṇakakāyasmiṃyeva ṭhatvā laddhāsā laddhapatiṭṭhā
atk-s0301a0:115_3: hutvā dasabalaṃ gandhehi ca mālehi ca pūjetvā attano bhavanaṃyeva agamāsīti.
atk-s0301a0:118_1: Idāni dutiyasuttato paṭṭhāya paṭhamamāgatañca uttānatthañca pahāya yaṃ yaṃ anuttānaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:118_12: Nibbānañhi patvā sattā sabbadukkhato nimuccanti pamuccanti viviccanti,
atk-s0301a0:118_17: Sattānaṃ nimokkhādijānanatthameva hi mayā samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭividdhanti sīhanādaṃ nadati.
atk-s0301a0:119_2: Tattha hi purimanaye nandībhavena tividhakammābhisaṅkhāravasena saṅkhārakkhandho gahito,
atk-s0301a0:119_4: Tehi pana tīhi khandhehi sampayuttā vedanā tesaṃ gahaṇena gahitāvāti anupādiṇṇakānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:119_6: Vedanānaṃ nirodhā upasamāti upādiṇṇakavedanānaṃ nirodhena ca upasamena ca.
atk-s0301a0:119_7: Tattha vedanāgahaṇena taṃsampayuttā tayo khandhā gahitāva honti,
atk-s0301a0:119_9: Evaṃ imesaṃ upādiṇṇakānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appavattivasena anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:119_13: Evaṃ imesaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ appavattivasena nibbānaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:122_8: Tassa dvīhākārehi parittatā veditabbā sarasaparittatāya ca khaṇaparittatāya ca.
atk-s0301a0:122_12: so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo”ti vacanato parittaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:122_14: Paramatthato hi atiparitto sattānaṃ jīvitakkhaṇo ekacittappavattimattoyeva.
atk-s0301a0:122_15: Yathā nāma rathacakkaṃ pavattamānampi ekeneva nemippadesena pavattati,
atk-s0301a0:122_18: tasmiṃ citte niruddhamatte satto niruddhoti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0301a0:122_19: atīte cittakkhaṇe jīvittha na jīvati na jīvissati,
atk-s0301a0:122_20: anāgate cittakkhaṇe jīvissati na jīvati na jīvittha,
atk-s0301a0:122_21: paccuppanne cittakkhaṇe jīvati na jīvittha na jīvissati.
atk-s0301a0:129_2: Na santi tāṇāti tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ saraṇaṃ bhavituṃ samatthā nāma keci natthi.
atk-s0301a0:129_5: jarūpanītassa tāṇābhāvoti tividhaṃ bhayaṃ bhayavatthu bhayakāraṇanti attho.
atk-s0301a0:129_6: Puññāni kayirātha sukhāvahānīti viññū puriso sukhāvahāni sukhadāyakāni puññāni kareyya.
atk-s0301a0:129_7: Iti devatā rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ sandhāya pubbacetanaṃ aparacetanaṃ muñcacetanañca gahetvā bahuvacanavasena “puññānī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:129_9: Tassā kira devatāya sayaṃ dīghāyukaṭṭhāne brahmaloke nibbattattā heṭṭhā kāmāvacaradevesu parittāyukaṭṭhāne
atk-s0301a0:129_10: cavamāne upapajjamāne ca thullaphusitake vuṭṭhipātasadise satte disvā etadahosi “ahovatime sattā jhānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:129_11: bhāvetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke ekakappa- dvekappa-
atk-s0301a0:130_1: “ayaṃ devatā aniyyānikaṃ vaṭṭakathaṃ kathetī”ti vivaṭṭamassā dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:130_2: Tattha lokāmisanti dve lokāmisā pariyāyena ca nippariyāyena ca.
atk-s0301a0:130_7: Santipekkhoti nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ accantasantiṃ pekkhanto icchanto patthayantoti.
atk-s0301a0:133_3: Tarayanti rattiyoti rattiyo atikkamamānā puggalaṃ maraṇūpagamanāya tarayanti sīghaṃ sīghaṃ gamayanti.
atk-s0301a0:133_8: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha hi paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0301a0:136_1: Pañcame kati chindeti chindanto kati chindeyya.
atk-s0301a0:136_4: Gāthābandhassa pana maṭṭhabhāvatthaṃ ayaṃ devatā saddapunaruttiṃ vajjayantī evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:136_9: Pañca chindeti chindanto pañca orambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni chindeyya.
atk-s0301a0:136_13: Atha vā pādesu baddhapāsasakuṇo viya pañcorambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni heṭṭhā ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti,
atk-s0301a0:136_15: Hatthehi gahitarukkhasākhā viya pañcuddhambhāgiyasaṃyojanāni upari ākaḍḍhamānākārāni honti,
atk-s0301a0:136_17: Pañca cuttari bhāvayeti etesaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ chindanatthāya ceva pahānatthāya ca uttari atirekaṃ visesaṃ
atk-s0301a0:136_19: Pañca saṅgātigoti rāgasaṅgo dosasaṅgo mohasaṅgo mānasaṅgo diṭṭhisaṅgoti ime pañca saṅge atikkanto.
atk-s0301a0:136_21: Imāya pana gāthāya pañcindriyāni lokiyalokuttarāni kathitānīti.
atk-s0301a0:139_2: Pañca jāgaratanti vissajjanagāthāyaṃ pana saddhādīsu pañcasu indriyesu jāgarantesu pañca nīvaraṇā suttā nāma. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a0:139_3: Yasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo yattha katthaci nisinno vā ṭhito vā aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapentopi pamādatāya akusalasamaṅgitāya sutto nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:139_4: Evaṃ suttesu pañcasu nīvaraṇesu pañcindriyāni jāgarāni nāma. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a0:139_5: Yasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo yattha katthaci nipajjitvā niddāyantopi appamādatāya kusalasamaṅgitāya jāgaro nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:139_6: Pañcahi pana nīvaraṇeheva kilesarajaṃ ādiyati gaṇhāti parāmasati.
atk-s0301a0:139_7: Purimā hi kāmacchandādayo pacchimānaṃ paccayā hontīti pañcahi indriyehi parisujjhatīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:142_4: Te hi ito paresaṃ titthiyānaṃ vādattā paravādā nāma.
atk-s0301a0:142_7: Tattha sayameva sassatādīni gaṇhantā gacchanti nāma,
atk-s0301a0:142_8: parassa vacanena tāni gaṇhantā nīyanti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:142_9: Kālo tesaṃ pabujjhitunti tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pabujjhituṃ ayaṃ kālo.
atk-s0301a0:142_14: ime ca pana mahājanā vaṭṭe suttā nappabujjhantīti devatā āha.
atk-s0301a0:142_21: Tattha samatiṃsapāramiyo pūretvā sammāsambodhiṃ patto sabbaññubuddho nāma.
atk-s0301a0:142_22: Kappasatasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūretvā sayambhutaṃ patto paccekabuddho nāma.
atk-s0301a0:142_27: Caranti visame samanti visame vā lokasannivāse visame vā sattanikāye visame vā kilesajāte samaṃ carantīti.
atk-s0301a0:145_4: bahudhaññaṃ adhigatassa avāpitakhettato aladdhaṃ sandhāya “bahuṃ me dhaññaṃ naṭṭha”nti vadanto aladdhameva “naṭṭha”nti vadati,
atk-s0301a0:148_2: Damoti evarūpassa puggalassa samādhipakkhiko damo natthīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:148_4: vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti vutto.
atk-s0301a0:148_10: iminā damūpasamena samannāgato sunāparantasmiṃ janapade viharitu”nti ettha adhivāsanakhanti.
atk-s0301a0:148_11: Imasmiṃ pana sutte damoti samādhipakkhikadhammānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:148_22: eko araññe viharanto pamatto puggalo maccudheyyassa pāraṃ na tareyya na paṭivijjheyya na pāpuṇeyyāti.
atk-s0301a0:149_5: Sabbadhi vippamuttoti sabbesu khandhāyatanādīsu vippamutto hutvā.
atk-s0301a0:149_6: Tareyyāti ettha tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ samatikkamanto nibbānaṃ paṭivijjhanto taratīti paṭivedhataraṇaṃ nāma vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:149_7: Iti imāya gāthāya tisso sikkhā kathitā honti. Kathaṃ –
atk-s0301a0:149_9: tasmā “mānaṃ pahāyā”ti iminā adhisīlasikkhā kathitā hoti.
atk-s0301a0:149_16: Tasmā sīlaṃ nāma pañcapi dasapi sīlāni,
atk-s0301a0:149_22: Anuppannepi hi buddhuppāde pavattatīti pañcasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ sīlameva,
atk-s0301a0:149_25: Apica nibbānaṃ patthayantena samādinnaṃ pañcasīlampi dasasīlampi adhisīlameva.
atk-s0301a0:149_30: Iti imāya gāthāya samodhānetvā tisso sikkhā sakalasāsanaṃ kathitaṃ hotīti.
atk-s0301a0:152_4: dūre santo pakāsantī”tiādīsu hi paṇḍitāpi santoti vuttā.
atk-s0301a0:152_6: Kena vaṇṇo pasīdatīti kena kāraṇena chavivaṇṇo pasīdatīti pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:152_8: Esā kira vanasaṇḍavāsikā bhummadevatā āraññake bhikkhū pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkante araññaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0301a0:152_16: vaṇṭā pamuttatālaphalassa viya mukhassa vaṇṇo hoti.
atk-s0301a0:152_18: “sarīravaṇṇo nāmāyaṃ paṇītāni rasasampannāni bhojanāni sukhasamphassāni nivāsanapāpuraṇasayanāni utusukhe
atk-s0301a0:152_19: tebhūmikādibhede ca pāsāde mālāgandhavilepanādīni ca labhantānaṃ pasīdati,
atk-s0301a0:152_20: ime pana bhikkhū piṇḍāya caritvā missakabhattaṃ bhuñjanti,
atk-s0301a0:152_21: viraḷamañcake vā phalake vā silāya vā sayanāni kappenti,
atk-s0301a0:152_23: kena nu kho kāraṇena etesaṃ vaṇṇo pasīdatī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:153_0: Athassā bhagavā kāraṇaṃ kathento dutiyaṃ gāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0301a0:153_1: Tattha atītanti atīte asuko nāma rājā dhammiko ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:153_5: cīvarāni pārupimhāti evaṃ ekacce paccayabāhullikā viya ime bhikkhū atītaṃ nānusocanti.
atk-s0301a0:153_6: Nappajappanti nāgatanti anāgate dhammiko rājā bhavissati,
atk-s0301a0:153_11: cīvarāni pārupissāmāti evaṃ anāgataṃ na patthenti.
atk-s0301a0:153_12: Paccuppannenāti yena kenaci taṅkhaṇe laddhena yāpenti.
atk-s0301a0:154_0: Evaṃ vaṇṇasampattiṃ dassetvā idāni tasseva vaṇṇassa vināsaṃ dassento anantaraṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:154_3: Naḷova harito lutoti yathā harito naḷo lāyitvā uṇhapāsāṇe pakkhitto sussati,
atk-s0301a0:158_6: Te bhikkhūti ye tattha sammukhībhūtā dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū.
atk-s0301a0:158_12: Maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ macalagāme kālaṃ katvā tattha uppanne tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya kira tassa devalokassa ayaṃ paṇṇatti jātāti vadanti.
atk-s0301a0:158_13: Yasmā pana sesacakkavāḷesupi cha kāmāvacaradevalokā atthi.
atk-s0301a0:159_0: Nandane vaneti ettha taṃ vanaṃ paviṭṭhe paviṭṭhe nandayati tosetīti nandanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:159_1: Pañcasu hi maraṇanimittesu uppannesu “sampattiṃ pahāya cavissāmā”ti paridevamānā devatā sakko devānamindo “mā paridevittha,
atk-s0301a0:159_2: abhijjanadhammā nāma saṅkhārā natthī”ti ovaditvā tattha pavesāpeti.
atk-s0301a0:159_3: Tāsaṃ aññāhi devatāhi bāhāsu gahetvā pavesitānampi tassa sampattiṃ disvāva maraṇasoko vūpasammati,
atk-s0301a0:159_5: Atha tasmiṃ kīḷamānā eva uṇhasantatto himapiṇḍo viya vilīyanti,
atk-s0301a0:159_6: vātāpahatadīpasikhā viya vijjhāyantīti evaṃ yaṃkiñci anto paviṭṭhaṃ nandayati tosetiyevāti nandanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:160_1: Pañcahi kāmaguṇehīti manāpiyarūpasaddagandharasaphoṭṭhabbasaṅkhātehi pañcahi kāmabandhanehi kāmakoṭṭhāsehi vā.
atk-s0301a0:160_5: tesu tesu vā rūpādīsu indriyāni sañcārayamānā.
atk-s0301a0:160_7: So panassa devaputtassa adhunā abhinibbattakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:160_8: Tassa hi paṭisandhikkhaṇeyeva rattasuvaṇṇakkhandho viya virocayamāno tigāvutappamāṇo attabhāvo nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:160_9: So dibbavatthanivattho dibbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍito dibbamālāvilepanadharo dibbehi candanacuṇṇehi samaṃ vikiriyamāno
atk-s0301a0:160_10: dibbehi pañcahi kāmaguṇehi ovuto nivuto pariyonaddho lobhābhibhūto hutvā lobhanissaraṇaṃ nibbānaṃ apassanto
atk-s0301a0:160_11: āsabhiṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto viya mahāsaddena “na te sukhaṃ pajānantī”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ gāyamāno nandanavane vicari.
atk-s0301a0:161_0: Ye na passanti nandananti ye tatra pañcakāmaguṇānubhavanavasena nandanavanaṃ na passanti.
atk-s0301a0:162_1: Paccabhāsīti “ayaṃ bāladevatā imaṃ sampattiṃ niccaṃ acalaṃ maññati,
atk-s0301a0:162_2: nāssā chedanabhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammataṃ jānātī”ti adhippāyaṃ vivaṭṭetvā dassentī “na tvaṃ bāle”ti imāya gāthāya patiabhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:162_3: Yathā arahataṃ vacoti yathā arahantānaṃ vacanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:162_5: Evaṃ tassā adhippāyaṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni arahantānaṃ vacanaṃ dassentī aniccātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:162_6: Tattha aniccā vata saṅkhārāti sabbe tebhūmakasaṅkhārā hutvā abhāvatthena aniccā.
atk-s0301a0:162_11: Uppādavayaggahaṇena cettha tadanantarā vemajjhaṭṭhānaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:162_12: Tesaṃ vūpasamo sukhoti tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānameva sukhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:165_3: Tassa hi ekacce puttā kasikammaṃ katvā dhaññassa koṭṭhe pūrenti,
atk-s0301a0:165_6: Atha tesaṃ ānubhāvasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ anubhavamānā mātā vā pitā vā nandati.
atk-s0301a0:165_7: Chaṇadivasādīsu vā maṇḍitapasādhite putte sampattiṃ anubhavamāne disvā nandatīti,
atk-s0301a0:165_10: tathā gosāmikopi sampannaṃ gomaṇḍalaṃ disvā gāvo nissāya gorasasampattiṃ anubhavamāno gohi nandati.
atk-s0301a0:165_17: Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:165_18: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato “upadhiyati ettha sukha”nti iminā vacanatthena upadhīti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:165_26: nāṭakaparivārādivasena paccupaṭṭhitā pītisomanassaṃ upasaṃharamānā naraṃ nandayanti.
atk-s0301a0:165_27: Tasmā yathā puttā ca gāvo ca,
atk-s0301a0:165_28: evaṃ imepi upadhī hi narassa nandanāti veditabbā.
atk-s0301a0:165_29: Na hi so nandati yo nirūpadhīti yo kāmaguṇasampattirahito daliddo dullabhaghāsacchādano,
atk-s0301a0:165_31: Evarūpo manussapeto ca manussanerayiko ca kiṃ nandissati bhagavāti āha.
atk-s0301a0:166_2: sokavatthubhāvamassā dīpessāmī”ti phalena phalaṃ pātento viya tāyeva upamāya tassā vādaṃ bhindanto tameva gāthaṃ parivattetvā socatīti āha.
atk-s0301a0:166_3: Tattha socati puttehīti videsagamanādivasena puttesu naṭṭhesupi nassantesupi idāni nassissantīti nāsasaṅkīpi socati,
atk-s0301a0:166_4: tathā matesupi marantesupi corehi rājapurisehi gahitesu vā paccatthikānaṃ hatthaṃ upagatesu vā maraṇasaṅkīpi hutvā socati.
atk-s0301a0:166_5: Rukkhapabbatādīhi patitvā hatthapādādīnaṃ bhedavasena bhinnesupi bhijjantesupi bhedasaṅkīpi hutvā socati.
atk-s0301a0:166_8: Upadhī hi narassa socanāti yathā ca puttagāvo,
atk-s0301a0:169_3: yo nirūpadhīti yassa pana catubbidhāpete upadhiyo natthi,
atk-s0301a0:172_1: Tatiye natthi puttasamaṃ pemanti virūpepi hi attano puttake suvaṇṇabimbakaṃ viya maññanti,
atk-s0301a0:172_2: mālāguḷe viya sīsādīsu katvā pariharamānā tehi ohaditāpi omuttikāpi gandhavilepanapatitā viya somanassaṃ āpajjanti. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a0:172_4: Puttapemasamaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:172_5: Gosamitaṃ dhananti gohi samaṃ godhanasamaṃ godhanasadisaṃ aññaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi bhagavāti āha.
atk-s0301a0:172_6: Sūriyasamā ābhāti sūriyābhāya samā aññā ābhā nāma natthīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:172_7: Samuddaparamāti ye keci aññe sarā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:173_0: Yasmā pana attapemena samaṃ pemaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:173_1: Mātāpitādayo hi chaḍḍetvāpi puttadhītādayo ca aposetvāpi sattā attānameva posenti.
atk-s0301a0:173_2: Dhaññena ca samaṃ dhanaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:173_4: tathārūpe hi kāle hiraññasuvaṇṇādīni gomahiṃsādīnipi dhaññaggahaṇatthaṃ dhaññasāmikānameva santikaṃ gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:173_5: Paññāya ca samā ābhā nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:173_8: Paññā pana dasasahassimpi lokadhātuṃ ekappajjotaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:173_10: Meghavuṭṭhiyā ca samo saro nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:173_13: Meghavuṭṭhiyā hi pacchinnāya mahāsamuddo aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na hoti,
atk-s0301a0:173_14: vuṭṭhiyā pana pavattamānāya yāva ābhassarabhavanāpi ekodakaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:173_15: Tasmā bhagavā devatāya paṭigāthaṃ vadanto natthi attasamaṃ pemantiādimāhāti.
atk-s0301a0:176_1: Catutthe khattiyo dvipadanti dvipadānaṃ rājā seṭṭho.
atk-s0301a0:176_4: Pubbajoti paṭhamaṃ jāto kāṇo vāpi hotu kuṇiādīnaṃ vā aññataro,
atk-s0301a0:176_6: ayameva putto imissā devatāya vāde seṭṭho nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:176_9: Tattha kiñcāpi bhagavā sabbesaṃyeva apadādibhedānaṃ sattānaṃ seṭṭho,
atk-s0301a0:176_12: Dvipadesu uppannassa cassa sabbasattaseṭṭhabhāvo appaṭihatova hoti.
atk-s0301a0:176_13: Ājānīyoti hatthī vā hotu assādīsu aññataro vā,
atk-s0301a0:176_17: Rājā kira pācīnadvārena nikkhamitvā cetiyapabbataṃ gamissāmīti kalambanadītīraṃ sampatto,
atk-s0301a0:176_18: asso tīre ṭhatvā udakaṃ otarituṃ na icchati,
atk-s0301a0:176_20: “aho vata tayā asso sikkhāpito udakaṃ otarituṃ na icchatī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:176_25: vāle tinte rañño aṅge udakaṃ pāteyyā’ti,
atk-s0301a0:176_26: evaṃ tumhākaṃ sarīre udakapātanabhayena na otarati,
atk-s0301a0:176_31: Kumārikāle vā gahitā hotu pacchā vā,
atk-s0301a0:176_36: Jeṭṭho vā hi hotu kaniṭṭho vā,
atk-s0301a0:176_41: aññehi sandhicchedakādicorehi puttehi ko attho devateti.
atk-s0301a0:179_2: Sannisīvesūti yathā phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ upagantvā sannisinnesu vissamamānesu.
atk-s0301a0:179_5: Saṇatevāti saṇati viya mahāviravaṃ viya muccati.
atk-s0301a0:179_8: Nidāghasamayasmiñhi ṭhitamajjhanhikakāle catuppadagaṇesu ceva pakkhīgaṇesu ca sannisinnesu vātapūritānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:179_9: susirarukkhānañceva chiddaveṇupabbānañca khandhena khandhaṃ sākhāya sākhaṃ saṅghaṭṭayantānaṃ pādapānañca
atk-s0301a0:179_12: Taṃ bhayaṃ paṭibhāti manti taṃ evarūpe kāle mahāaraññassa saṇamānaṃ mayhaṃ bhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0301a0:179_13: Dandhapaññā kiresā devatā tasmiṃ khaṇe attano nisajjaphāsukaṃ kathāphāsukaṃ dutiyakaṃ alabhantī evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:179_14: Yasmā pana tādise kāle piṇḍapātapaṭikkantassa vivitte araññāyatane kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnassa bhikkhuno anappakaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:181_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti. ca,
atk-s0301a0:182_0: “Purato pacchato vāpi, aparo ce na vijjati;
atk-s0301a0:183_0: Atīva phāsu bhavati, ekassa vasato vane”ti. ca;
atk-s0301a0:184_1: Tattha sā rati paṭibhāti manti yā evarūpe kāle ekakassa nisajjā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:187_4: gimhānaṃ pacchime māse niddaṃ okkamitā”ti evarūpāya abyākataniddāya pubbabhāgāparabhāgesu sekhaputhujjanānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:187_9: Yā tandī tandiyanā tandimanatā ālasyaṃ ālasyāyanā ālasyāyitattaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:187_16: Yā kāyassa jambhanā vijambhanā”tiādinā nayena abhidhamme āgatova.
atk-s0301a0:187_17: Etenāti etena niddādinā upakkilesena upakkiliṭṭho nivāritapātubhāvo.
atk-s0301a0:187_26: Iti maggeneva upakkilese nīharitvā maggassa visuddhi vuttāti.
atk-s0301a0:190_5: yaṃ paṇḍitā kulaputtā dasapi vassāni vīsatipi saṭṭhipi vassāni dante abhidantamādhāya jivhāya tāluṃ āhaccapi
atk-s0301a0:190_6: cetasā cittaṃ abhiniggaṇhitvāpi ekāsanaṃ ekabhattaṃ paṭisevamānā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carantā sāmaññaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a0:190_7: Taṃ bhagavā bālo abyatto kātuṃ na sakkotīti.
atk-s0301a0:190_8: Bahū hi tattha sambādhāti tasmiṃ sāmaññasaṅkhāte ariyamagge bahū sambādhā maggādhigamāya paṭipannassa pubbabhāge bahū parissayāti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:191_0: Cittañce na nivārayeti yadi ayoniso uppannaṃ cittaṃ na nivāreyya,
atk-s0301a0:191_3: Cittavasiko hi samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:191_6: Yasmiṃ yasmiṃ hi ārammaṇe kileso uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:191_9: Gamanādīsu hi yattha yattha kileso uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:192_6: yathā kummo soṇḍipañcamāni aṅgāni sake kapāle samodahanto siṅgālassa otāraṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:192_8: evamevaṃ bhikkhu manamhi uppannavitakke sake ārammaṇakapāle samodahaṃ mārassa otāraṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:192_13: Nūpavadeyya kañcīti yaṃkiñci puggalaṃ ācāravipattiādīsu yāya kāyaci maṅkuṃ kātukāmo hutvā na vadeyya,
atk-s0301a0:192_14: “kālena vakkhāmi no akālenā”tiādayo pana pañca dhamme ajjhattaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena kāruññataṃ paṭicca vadeyyāti.
atk-s0301a0:195_1: Aṭṭhame hirīnisedhoti hiriyā akusale dhamme nisedhetīti hirīnisedho.
atk-s0301a0:195_2: Koci lokasmiṃ vijjatīti koci evarūpo vijjatīti pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:195_3: Yo nindaṃ apabodhatīti yo garahaṃ apaharanto bujjhati.
atk-s0301a0:195_4: Asso bhadro kasāmivāti yathā bhadro assājānīyo kasaṃ apaharanto bujjhati,
atk-s0301a0:195_5: patodacchāyaṃ disvā saṃvijjhanto viya kasāya attani nipātaṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:195_6: evameva yo bhikkhu bhūtassa dasaakkosavatthuno attani nipātaṃ adadanto nindaṃ apabodhati apaharanto bujjhati,
atk-s0301a0:195_10: hiriyā akusale dhamme nisedhetvā carantā khīṇāsavā nāma appakāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:195_12: Antaṃ dukkhassa pappuyyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa koṭiṃ antabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ pāpuṇitvā.
atk-s0301a0:198_1: Navame kacci te kuṭikāti ayaṃ devatā dasa māse antovasanaṭṭhānaṭṭhena mātaraṃ kuṭikaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:198_2: yathā sakuṇā divasaṃ gocarapasutā rattiṃ kulāvakaṃ allīyanti,
atk-s0301a0:198_3: evamevaṃ sattā tattha tattha gantvāpi mātugāmassa santikaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:198_7: gāthābandhanena ime pañhe samodhānetvā bhagavantaṃ pucchi,
atk-s0301a0:198_10: Natthīti pahāya pabbajitattā vaṭṭasmiṃ vā puna mātukucchivāsassa dārabharaṇassa puttanibbattiyā vā abhāvato natthi.
atk-s0301a0:199_0: Devatā “mayā sannāhaṃ bandhitvā guḷhā pañhā pucchitā,
atk-s0301a0:199_2: jānaṃ nu kho me ajjhāsayaṃ kathesi,
atk-s0301a0:199_3: udāhu ajānaṃ yaṃ vā taṃ vā mukhāruḷhaṃ kathesī”ti cintetvā puna kintāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:199_6: Sāhu teti gāthāya anumoditvā sampahaṃsitvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā attano devaṭṭhānameva gatāti.
atk-s0301a0:202_1: Dasame tapodārāmeti tapodassa tattodakassa rahadassa vasena evaṃ laddhanāme ārāme.
atk-s0301a0:202_2: Vebhārapabbatassa kira heṭṭhā bhummaṭṭhakanāgānaṃ pañcayojanasatikaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ devalokasadisaṃ maṇimayena talena ārāmuyyānehi ca samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0301a0:202_4: tato tapodā nāma nadī sandati kuthitā uṇhodakā.
atk-s0301a0:202_7: tattha dvinnaṃ mahālohakumbhinirayānaṃ antarena ayaṃ tapodā āgacchati,
atk-s0301a0:203_3: so daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setodako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo,
atk-s0301a0:204_0: Imassa pana ārāmassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne tato mahāudakarahado jāto,
atk-s0301a0:205_0: Samiddhīti tassa kira therassa attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko,
atk-s0301a0:205_3: balavapaccūse uṭṭhāyāsanā sarīraṃ utuṃ gāhāpetvā bahi saṭṭhihatthamatte mahācaṅkame aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā
atk-s0301a0:205_4: “sedagahitehi gattehi paribhuñjamānaṃ senāsanaṃ kilissatī”ti maññamāno gattāni parisiñcanatthaṃ sarīradhovanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a0:205_6: Ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsīti nivāsanaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ hatthena gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:206_0: Gattāni pubbāpayamānoti gattāni pubbasadisāni vodakāni kurumāno.
atk-s0301a0:206_1: Allasarīre pārutaṃ hi cīvaraṃ kilissati duggandhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:206_4: tasmā vatte ṭhitova nhāyitvā paccuttaritvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:206_6: udakatitthaṃ gantvā yattha katthaci cīvarāni nikkhipitvā vegena ṭhitakeneva na otaritabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:206_7: sabbadisā pana oloketvā vivittabhāvaṃ ñatvā khāṇugumbalatādīni vavatthapetvā tikkhattuṃ ukkāsitvā avakujja
atk-s0301a0:206_11: udakante ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ mocetvā sace sinnaṭṭhānaṃ atthi,
atk-s0301a0:206_15: Udakaṃ otarantena saṇikaṃ nābhippamāṇamattaṃ otaritvā vīciṃ anuṭṭhāpentena saddaṃ akarontena nivattitvā āgatadisābhimukhena nimujjitabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:206_17: Ummujjantenapi saddaṃ akarontena saṇikaṃ ummujjitvā nhānapariyosāne udakante ukkuṭikena nisīditvā nivāsanaṃ
atk-s0301a0:206_18: parikkhipitvā uṭṭhāya suparimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ apārupitvāva ṭhātabbanti.
atk-s0301a0:207_0: Theropi tathā nhāyitvā paccuttaritvā vigacchamānaudakaṃ kāyaṃ olokayamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:207_1: Tassa pakatiyāpi pāsādikassa paccūsasamaye sammā pariṇatāhārassa uṇhodakena nhātassa ativiya mukhavaṇṇo viroci,
atk-s0301a0:207_2: bandhanā pavuttatālaphalaṃ viya pabhāsampanno puṇṇacando viya taṅkhaṇavikasitapadumaṃ viya mukhaṃ sassirikaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:207_4: Tasmiṃ samaye vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā bhummadevatā pāsādikaṃ bhikkhuṃ olokayamānā samanaṃ niggahetuṃ asakkontī kāmapariḷāhābhibhūtā hutvā,
atk-s0301a0:207_5: “theraṃ palobhessāmī”ti attabhāvaṃ uḷārena alaṅkārena alaṅkaritvā sahassavaṭṭipadīpaṃ pajjalamānā viya
atk-s0301a0:207_6: candaṃ uṭṭhāpayamānā viya sakalārāmaṃ ekobhāsaṃ katvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā avanditvāva vehāse ṭhitā gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:208_2: Mā taṃ kālo upaccagāti ettha kālo nāma pañcakāmaguṇapaṭisevanakkhamo daharayobbanakālo.
atk-s0301a0:208_3: Jarājiṇṇena hi obhaggena daṇḍaparāyaṇena pavedhamānena kāsasāsābhibhūtena na sakkā kāme paribhuñjituṃ.
atk-s0301a0:208_4: Iti imaṃ kālaṃ sandhāya devatā “mā taṃ kālo upaccagā”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:209_0: Kālaṃ vohaṃ na jānāmīti ettha voti nipātamattaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:209_1: Kālaṃ na jānāmīti maraṇakālaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0301a0:212_2: Kalalakālepi hi sattā maranti, abbuda- pesi- ghana-
atk-s0301a0:212_7: tato paraṃ vassasatassa antopi bahipi marantiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:212_10: Cakkhurogenapi hi sattā maranti sotarogādīnaṃ aññatarenapi. Kālopi,
atk-s0301a0:212_13: Pubbaṇhepi hi sattā maranti majjhanhikādīnaṃ aññatarasmimpi.
atk-s0301a0:212_21: “ito cutena idha nibbattitabba”nti evaṃ vavatthānābhāvato animittā.
atk-s0301a0:212_23: manussalokato cutā devalokādīnaṃ yattha katthaci nibbattantīti evaṃ yante yuttagoṇo viya gatipañcake loko samparivattati.
atk-s0301a0:212_24: Tassevaṃ samparivattato “imasmiṃ nāma kāle maraṇaṃ bhavissatī”ti imaṃ maraṇassa kālaṃ vohaṃ na jānāmi.
atk-s0301a0:213_0: Channo kālo na dissatīti ayaṃ kālo mayhaṃ paṭicchanno avibhūto na paññāyati.
atk-s0301a0:213_1: Tasmāti yasmā ayaṃ kālo paṭicchanno na paññāyati,
atk-s0301a0:213_3: Mā maṃ kālo upaccagāti ettha samaṇadhammakaraṇakālaṃ sandhāya “kālo”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:213_4: Ayañhi samaṇadhammo nāma pacchime kāle tisso vayosīmā atikkantena obhaggena daṇḍaparāyaṇena pavedhamānena kāsasāsābhibhūtena na sakkā kātuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:213_5: Tadā hi na sakkā hoti icchiticchitaṃ buddhavacanaṃ vā gaṇhituṃ,
atk-s0301a0:213_12: taruṇayobbanakāle panetaṃ sabbaṃ sakkā kātunti ayaṃ samaṇadhammakaraṇassa kālo mā maṃ upaccagā,
atk-s0301a0:213_14: tāva kāme abhutvāva samaṇadhammaṃ karomīti āha.
atk-s0301a0:214_3: sahetukaṃ katheti sānisaṃsa”nti ettāvatāva there lajjaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā mahābrahmaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0301a0:214_4: viya ca naṃ maññamānā gāravajātā ākāsā oruyha pathaviyaṃ aṭṭhāsi,
atk-s0301a0:214_12: Ekacco hi daharopi samāno kāṇo vā hoti kuṇiādīnaṃ vā aññataro,
atk-s0301a0:214_13: so bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:214_14: Yo pana abhirūpo hoti dassanīyo pāsādiko sabbasampattisampanno,
atk-s0301a0:214_16: tena tena alaṅkato devaputto viya carati,
atk-s0301a0:214_17: ayaṃ bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:215_2: Mā sandiṭṭhikaṃ hitvāti yebhuyyena hi tā adiṭṭhasaccā avītarāgā aparacittavidūniyo devatā bhikkhū dasapi vassāni vīsatimpi…pe…
atk-s0301a0:215_3: saṭṭhimpi vassāni parisuddhaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caramāne disvā –
atk-s0301a0:215_4: “ime bhikkhū mānusake pañca kāmaguṇe pahāya dibbe kāme patthayantā samaṇadhammaṃ karontī”ti saññaṃ uppādenti,
atk-s0301a0:216_1: ahaṃ sandiṭṭhike kāme hitvā kālike kāme na anudhāvāmi na patthemi na pihemi.
atk-s0301a0:216_4: kālikaṃ kāmaṃ hitvā sandiṭṭhikaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ anudhāvāmi.
atk-s0301a0:216_5: Iti thero cittānantaraṃ aladdhabbatāya dibbepi mānusakepi pañca kāmaguṇe kālikāti akāsi,
atk-s0301a0:216_7: Pañcakāmaguṇesu samohitesupi sampannakāmassāpi kāmino cittānantaraṃ icchiticchitārammaṇānubhavanaṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0301a0:216_8: Cakkhudvāre iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ anubhavitukāmena hi cittakārapotthakārarūpakārādayo pakkosāpetvā,
atk-s0301a0:217_2: Tattha kālikāti vuttanayena samohitasampattināpi kālantare pattabbā.
atk-s0301a0:217_3: Bahudukkhāti pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya pattabbadukkhassa bahutāya bahudukkhā.
atk-s0301a0:217_5: Ādīnavo ettha bhiyyoti pañca kāmaguṇe nissāya laddhabbasukhato ādīnavo bhiyyo,
atk-s0301a0:217_7: Sandiṭṭhiko ayaṃ dhammoti ayaṃ lokuttaradhammo yena yena adhigato hoti,
atk-s0301a0:217_8: tena tena parasaddhāya gantabbataṃ hitvā paccavekkhaṇañāṇena sayaṃ daṭṭhabboti sandiṭṭhiko.
atk-s0301a0:217_9: Attano phaladānaṃ sandhāya nāssa kāloti akālo,
atk-s0301a0:217_12: so attano pavattisamanantarameva phalaṃ detīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:217_13: “Ehi passa imaṃ dhamma”nti evaṃ pavattaṃ ehipassavidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
atk-s0301a0:217_14: Ādittaṃ celaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā ajjhupekkhitvāpi bhāvanāvasena attano citte upanayaṃ arahatīti opaneyyiko.
atk-s0301a0:217_17: sacchikato nirodho”ti attani attani veditabboti paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhīti.
atk-s0301a0:218_0: Idāni sā devatā andho viya rūpavisesaṃ therena kathitassa atthe ajānantī kathañca bhikkhūtiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:218_1: Tattha kathañcātipadassa “kathañca bhikkhu kālikā kāmā vuttā bhagavatā,
atk-s0301a0:219_0: Navoti aparipuṇṇapañcavasso hi bhikkhu navo nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:220_0: Navopi ekacco sattaṭṭhavassakāle pabbajitvā dvādasaterasavassāni sāmaṇerabhāveneva atikkanto cirapabbajito hoti,
atk-s0301a0:220_6: iti tīhi piṭakehi pakāsitaṃ paṭipattiṃ adhunā āgatomhīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:221_1: Ekekassa hi devarañño koṭisatampi koṭisahassampi parivāro hoti,
atk-s0301a0:221_2: te attānaṃ mahante ṭhāne ṭhapetvā tathāgataṃ passanti.
atk-s0301a0:221_3: Tattha amhādisānaṃ appesakkhānaṃ mātugāmajātikānaṃ kuto okāsoti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:222_0: Mayampi āgaccheyyāmāti idaṃ sā devatā “sacepi cakkavāḷaṃ pūretvā parisā nisinnā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:222_1: mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā satthu santikaṃ gantuṃ labhatī”ti ñatvā āha.
atk-s0301a0:223_2: phusso”tiādinā nayena akkheyyato sabbesaṃ akkhānānaṃ sabbāsaṃ kathānaṃ vatthubhūtato pañcakkhandhā “akkheyyā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0301a0:223_3: “Satto naro poso puggalo itthī puriso”ti evaṃ saññā etesaṃ atthīti saññino,
atk-s0301a0:223_6: Akkheyyasmiṃ patiṭṭhitāti pañcasu khandhesu aṭṭhahākārehi patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0301a0:223_15: Akkheyyaṃ apariññāyāti pañcakkhandhe tīhi pariññāhi aparijānitvā.
atk-s0301a0:223_16: Yogamāyanti maccunoti maccuno yogaṃ payogaṃ pakkhepaṃ upakkhepaṃ upakkamaṃ abbhantaraṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:224_13: Evaṃ ñātaṃ katvā pañcakkhandhe tīreti aniccato dukkhato rogatoti dvācattālīsāya ākārehi.
atk-s0301a0:224_16: Evaṃ tīrayitvā aggamaggena pañcasu khandhesu chandarāgaṃ pajahati.
atk-s0301a0:225_0: Akkhātāraṃ na maññatīti evaṃ tīhi pariññāhi pañcakkhandhe parijānitvā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu akkhātāraṃ puggalaṃ na maññati.
atk-s0301a0:225_5: “Tisso”ti vā “phusso”ti vā evaṃ yena kenaci nāmena vā gottena vā pakāsetabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:225_6: Tañhi tassa na hotīti taṃ tassa khīṇāsavassa na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:225_7: Yena naṃ vajjāti yena naṃ “rāgena ratto”ti vā “dosena duṭṭho”ti vā “mohena mūḷho”ti vāti koci vadeyya,
atk-s0301a0:226_0: Sace vijānāsi vadehīti sace evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ jānāsi,
atk-s0301a0:226_5: Iti imāya gāthāya sandiṭṭhiko navavidho lokuttaradhammo kathito.
atk-s0301a0:227_0: Yo maññatīti yo attānaṃ “ahaṃ samo”ti vā “visesī”ti vā “nihīno”ti vā maññati.
atk-s0301a0:227_2: Tesu gahitesu nava mānā gahitāva honti.
atk-s0301a0:227_3: So vivadetha tenāti so puggalo teneva mānena yena kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ –
atk-s0301a0:227_11: Iti imāyapi upaḍḍhagāthāya kālikā kāmā kathitā.
atk-s0301a0:228_12: Avikampamānoti so puggalo etesu saṅkhepato tīsu,
atk-s0301a0:228_15: Samo visesīti na tassa hotīti tassa pahīnamānassa khīṇāsavassa “ahaṃ sadiso”ti vā “seyyo”ti vā “hīno”ti vā na hotīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:228_17: Iti imāyapi upaḍḍhagāthāya navavidho sandiṭṭhiko lokuttaradhammo kathito.
atk-s0301a0:229_2: “Atthi te koci gaṇako vā muddiko vā saṅkhāyako vā,
atk-s0301a0:229_3: yo pahoti gaṅgāya vālukaṃ gaṇetu”nti ettha gaṇanā.
atk-s0301a0:229_5: “Yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā”ti ettha paṇṇatti “saṅkhā”ti āgatā.
atk-s0301a0:229_8: ratto duṭṭho mūḷho iti imaṃ paṇṇattiṃ khīṇāsavo pahāsi jahi pajahīti.
atk-s0301a0:230_0: Na vimānamajjhagāti navabhedaṃ tividhamānaṃ na upagato.
atk-s0301a0:230_2: taṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhivasena na upagacchītipi attho.
atk-s0301a0:230_9: Nājjhagamunti na adhigacchanti na vindanti na passanti.
atk-s0301a0:230_11: Idha vā huraṃ vāti idhaloke vā paraloke vā.
atk-s0301a0:230_17: iti imesupi sabbesu sattanivesanesu evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ kāyassa bhedā uppajjamānaṃ vā uppannaṃ vā na passantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:231_0: Imañca gāthaṃ sutvā sāpi devatā atthaṃ sallakkhesi,
atk-s0301a0:231_3: Tattha pāpaṃ na kayirāti gāthāya dasakusalakammapathavasenapi kathetuṃ vaṭṭati aṭṭhaṅgikamaggavasenapi.
atk-s0301a0:231_4: Dasakusalakammapathavasena tāva vacasāti catubbidhaṃ vacīsucaritaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:231_6: Kāyena vā kiñcana sabbaloketi tividhaṃ kāyasucaritaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:231_8: Kāme pahāyāti iminā pana kāmasukhallikānuyogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-s0301a0:231_9: Satimā sampajānoti iminā dasakusalakammapathakāraṇaṃ satisampajaññaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:231_10: Dukkhaṃ na sevetha anatthasaṃhitanti iminā attakilamathānuyogo paṭisiddho.
atk-s0301a0:231_11: Iti devatā “ubho ante vivajjetvā kāraṇehi satisampajaññehi saddhiṃ dasakusalakammapathadhamme tumhehi kathite ājānāmi bhagavā”ti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:232_1: tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne mahatī dhammadesanā ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:232_2: Desanāpariyosāne devatā yathāṭhāne ṭhitāva desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya attanā
atk-s0301a0:232_5: mano pana aṅgaṃ na hotīti manasāti maggasampayuttakaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:232_6: Kāyena vā kiñcana sabbaloketi sammākammanto gahito,
atk-s0301a0:232_12: Iti ime dve ante anupagamma majjhimaṃ paṭipadaṃ tumhehi kathitaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:232_13: ājānāmi bhagavāti vatvā tathāgataṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmīti.
atk-s0301a0:237_4: Cattāro hi pahārā omaṭṭho ummaṭṭho maṭṭho vimaṭṭhoti.
atk-s0301a0:237_5: Tattha upari ṭhatvā adhomukhaṃ dinnapahāro omaṭṭho nāma;
atk-s0301a0:237_6: heṭṭhā ṭhatvā uddhaṃmukhaṃ dinno ummaṭṭho nāma;
atk-s0301a0:237_7: aggaḷasūci viya vinivijjhitvā gato maṭṭho nāma;
atk-s0301a0:237_10: So hi sabbadāruṇo duruddharasallo duttikiccho antodoso antopubbalohitova hoti,
atk-s0301a0:237_12: Pubbalohitaṃ niharitukāmehi mañcena saddhiṃ bandhitvā adhosiro kātabbo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:237_13: maraṇaṃ vā maraṇamattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0301a0:238_4: Yathā ca ḍayhamāno matthake ādittasīso tassa nibbāpanatthāya vīriyaṃ ārabhati,
atk-s0301a0:238_6: evameva bhikkhu kāmarāgaṃ pahānāya sato appamatto hutvā vihareyya bhagavāti kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:239_1: imāya devatāya upamā tāva daḷhaṃ katvā ānītā,
atk-s0301a0:239_3: punappunaṃ kathentīpi hesā kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanapahānameva katheyya.
atk-s0301a0:239_4: Yāva ca kāmarāgo maggena na samugghāṭiyati,
atk-s0301a0:239_6: Iti tameva opammaṃ gahetvā paṭhamamaggavasena desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā desento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:241_1: Dutiye nāphusantaṃ phusatīti kammaṃ aphusantaṃ vipāko na phusati,
atk-s0301a0:241_2: kammameva vā aphusantaṃ kammaṃ na phusati.
atk-s0301a0:241_4: Phusantañca tato phuseti kammaṃ phusantaṃ vipāko phusati,
atk-s0301a0:241_12: suddhassa posassa anaṅgaṇassā”ti evaṃ vutto appaduṭṭhapadosī puggalo,
atk-s0301a0:241_13: taṃ puggalaṃ kammaṃ phusantameva kammaṃ phusati,
atk-s0301a0:241_15: So hi parassa upaghātaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti vā mā vā,
atk-s0301a0:241_16: attā panānena catūsu apāyesu ṭhapito nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:243_1: Tatiye antojaṭāti gāthāyaṃ jaṭāti taṇhāya jāliniyā adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:243_2: Sā hi rūpādīsu ārammaṇesu heṭṭhupariyavasena punappunaṃ uppajjanato saṃsibbanaṭṭhena veḷugumbādīnaṃ sākhājālasaṅkhātā jaṭā viyāti jaṭā.
atk-s0301a0:243_5: bāhirāyatanesu ca uppajjanato antojaṭā bahijaṭāti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:243_6: Tāya evaṃ uppajjamānāya jaṭāya jaṭitā pajā.
atk-s0301a0:243_8: evaṃ tāya taṇhājaṭāya sabbāpi ayaṃ sattanikāyasaṅkhātā pajā jaṭitā vinaddhā,
atk-s0301a0:243_11: taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmīti tasmā taṃ pucchāmi.
atk-s0301a0:243_13: Ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti imaṃ evaṃ tedhātukaṃ jaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ jaṭaṃ ko vijaṭeyya,
atk-s0301a0:244_0: Athassa bhagavā tamatthaṃ vissajjento sīle patiṭṭhāyātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:244_2: Ettha ca bhagavā jaṭāvijaṭanaṃ pucchito sīlaṃ ārabhanto na “aññaṃ puṭṭho aññaṃ kathetī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:245_2: Cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayanti samādhiñceva vipassanañca bhāvayamāno.
atk-s0301a0:245_12: ayaṃ kālo paripucchāyā”tiādinā nayena sabbattha kārāpitā pariharitabbapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:246_0: So imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭanti so imehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu.
atk-s0301a0:246_1: Yathā nāma puriso pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhāya sunisitaṃ satthaṃ ukkhipitvā mahantaṃ veḷugumbaṃ vijaṭeyya,
atk-s0301a0:246_2: evamevaṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya samādhisilāyaṃ sunisitaṃ vipassanāpaññāsatthaṃ vīriyabalapaggahitena pārihāriyapaññāhatthena
atk-s0301a0:246_3: ukkhipitvā sabbampi taṃ attano santāne patitaṃ taṇhājaṭaṃ vijaṭeyya sañchindeyya sampadāleyyāti.
atk-s0301a0:247_0: Ettāvatā sekhabhūmiṃ kathetvā idāni jaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ dassento yesantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:247_1: Evaṃ jaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā ṭhitaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ dassetvā puna jaṭāya vijaṭanokāsaṃ dassento yattha nāmañcātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:247_3: Paṭighaṃ rūpasaññā cāti ettha paṭighasaññāvasena kāmabhavo gahito,
atk-s0301a0:247_5: Tesu dvīsu gahitesu arūpabhavo gahitova hoti bhavasaṅkhepenāti.
atk-s0301a0:247_6: Etthesā chijjate jaṭāti ettha tebhūmakavaṭṭassa pariyādiyanaṭṭhāne esā jaṭā chijjati,
atk-s0301a0:247_7: nibbānaṃ āgamma chijjati nirujjhatīti ayaṃ attho dassito hoti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:249_1: Catutthe yato yatoti pāpato vā kalyāṇato vā.
atk-s0301a0:249_2: Ayaṃ kira devatā “yaṃkiñci kusalādibhedaṃ lokiyaṃ vā lokuttaraṃ vā mano,
atk-s0301a0:249_9: vibhajitvā namassā dassessāmī”ti cintetvā dutiyagāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0301a0:249_13: yaṃ taṃ sabbato na nivāretabbanti ce.
atk-s0301a0:249_20: Yato yato ca pāpakanti yato yato akusalaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:251_9: na hoti nu kho”ti jānanatthaṃ evaṃ pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:252_7: khandhānaṃ cīvara”nti hi vutte vohārabhedo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:253_2: mānavasena nu kho vadatī”ti cintetvā puna yo hotīti pucchi.
atk-s0301a0:253_3: Tattha mānaṃ nu khoti so bhikkhu mānaṃ upagantvā mānavasena vadeyya nu khoti.
atk-s0301a0:253_5: “ayaṃ devatā khīṇāsavaṃ samānaṃ viya karotī”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0301a0:253_6: “khīṇāsavassa navavidhopi māno pahīno”ti dassento paṭigāthaṃ āha.
atk-s0301a0:253_8: Mānaganthassāti mānā ca ganthā ca assa.
atk-s0301a0:255_4: Tattha tatthāti yattha yattheva pajjalito hoti,
atk-s0301a0:255_8: Ñāṇāloko vā hotu pītiāloko vā pasādāloko vā dhammakathāāloko vā,
atk-s0301a0:255_9: sabbopi buddhānaṃ pātubhāvā uppanno āloko buddhābhā nāma.
atk-s0301a0:257_1: Sattame kuto sarā nivattantīti ime saṃsārasarā kuto nivattanti,
atk-s0301a0:259_1: Aṭṭhame nidhānagataṃ muttasārādi mahantaṃ dhanametesanti mahaddhanā.
atk-s0301a0:259_5: Ussukkajātesūti nānākiccajātesu anuppannānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ uppādanatthāya uppannānaṃ anubhavanatthāya ussukkesu.
atk-s0301a0:261_6: Kathaṃ yātrā bhavissatīti etassa evarūpassa sarīrassa kathaṃ niggamanaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0301a0:261_7: kathaṃ mutti parimutti samatikkamo bhavissatīti pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:261_10: aparakāle upanāhoti evaṃ pavattaṃ balavakodhanti attho.
atk-s0301a0:261_14: Idha pana pāḷiniddiṭṭhe kilese ṭhapetvā avasesā “varattā”ti veditabbā,
atk-s0301a0:261_16: Icchā lobhanti ekoyeva dhammo icchanaṭṭhena icchā,
atk-s0301a0:263_3: Atha vā ātapena milātaṃ mālāgandhavilepanehi anupabrūhitasarīrantipi attho.
atk-s0301a0:263_18: ubhayehi pana avinibhuttadhamme gahetvā pañcakkhandhādivasenapettha bhummaṃ yojetabbanti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:267_1: Satullapakāyikavaggassa paṭhame satullapakāyikāti sataṃ dhammaṃ samādānavasena ullapetvā sagge nibbattāti satullapakāyikā.
atk-s0301a0:267_3: sambahulā kira samuddavāṇijā nāvāya samuddaṃ pakkhandiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:267_4: Tesaṃ khittasaravegena gacchantiyā nāvāya sattame divase samuddamajjhe mahantaṃ uppātikaṃ pātubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:267_6: Nāvāya nimujjamānāya mahājano attano attano devatānaṃ nāmāni gahetvā āyācanādīni karonto paridevi.
atk-s0301a0:267_8: “atthi nu kho me evarūpe bhaye patiṭṭhā”ti āvajjento attano parisuddhāni saraṇāni ceva sīlāni ca disvā yogī viya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:267_11: “ambho ahaṃ nāvaṃ abhirūhanadivase bhikkhusaṅghassa dānaṃ datvā saraṇāni ceva sīlāni ca aggahesiṃ,
atk-s0301a0:267_13: Kiṃ pana sāmi etāni aññesampi vattantīti?
atk-s0301a0:267_14: Āma vattantīti tena hi amhākampi dethāti.
atk-s0301a0:267_15: So te manusse sataṃ sataṃ katvā satta koṭṭhāse akāsi,
atk-s0301a0:267_17: Tesu paṭhamaṃ jaṅghasataṃ gopphakamatte udake ṭhitaṃ aggahesi,
atk-s0301a0:267_27: Tāni sattapi jaṅghasatāni tattha kālaṃ katvā āsannakāle gahitasīlaṃ nissāya tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbattiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:267_29: Sabbesaṃ majjhe ācariyassa yojanasatikaṃ suvaṇṇavimānaṃ nibbatti,
atk-s0301a0:267_30: avasenāni tassa parivārāni hutvā sabbaheṭṭhimaṃ dvādasayojanikaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:267_31: Te nibbattakkhaṇeyeva kammaṃ āvajjentā ācariyaṃ nissāya sampattilābhaṃ ñatvā,
atk-s0301a0:267_33: dasabalassa santike amhākaṃ ācariyassa vaṇṇaṃ katheyyāmā”ti majjhimayāmasamanantare bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:267_34: tā devatā ācariyassa vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ ekekaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:268_8: Taṇhāsanthavo pana na kenaci saddhiṃ kātabbo,
atk-s0301a0:268_17: Na pāpiyoti lāmakaṃ kiñci na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:268_18: Nāññatoti vālikādīhi telādīni viya aññato andhabālato paññā nāma na labbhati,
atk-s0301a0:268_19: tilādīhi pana telādīni viya sataṃ dhammaṃ ñatvā paṇḍitameva sevanto bhajanto labhatīti.
atk-s0301a0:268_20: Sokamajjheti sokavatthūnaṃ sokānugatānaṃ vā sattānaṃ majjhagato na socati bandhulamallasenāpatissa upāsikā viya,
atk-s0301a0:268_21: pañcannaṃ corasatānaṃ majjhe dhammasenāpatissa saddhivihāriko saṃkiccasāmaṇero viya ca.
atk-s0301a0:269_0: Ñātimajjhe virocatīti ñātigaṇamajjhe saṃkiccatherassa saddhivihāriko adhimuttakasāmaṇero viya sobhati.
atk-s0301a0:269_7: So “sādhū”ti theraṃ vanditvā pattacīvaramādāya coraaṭaviyā orabhāge bhaginigāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya cari,
atk-s0301a0:269_8: taṃ bhaginī disvā vanditvā gehe nisīdāpetvā bhojesi.
atk-s0301a0:269_14: Tamenaṃ dūratova corapuriso disvā corānaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0301a0:269_16: gacchatha naṃ ānethā”ti āṇāpetvā ekacce “mārema na”nti āhaṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:269_20: imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā sotthimattānaṃ karissāmī”ti corajeṭṭhakaṃ āmantetvā,
atk-s0301a0:271_0: Ceto kūṭāni oḍḍetvā, sasakaṃ avadhī tadā.
atk-s0301a0:280_0: So tehi corehi vissajjito gacchanto ñātayopi disvā tesampi na ārocesi.
atk-s0301a0:280_1: Atha te anuppatte corā gahetvā viheṭhayiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:280_2: uraṃ paharitvā paridevamānañcassa mātaraṃ corā etadavocuṃ –
atk-s0301a0:281_0: “Kiṃ te hoti adhimutto, udare vasiko asi;
atk-s0301a0:282_0: Puṭṭhā me amma akkhāhi, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ maya”nti.
atk-s0301a0:284_0: Bhaginī bhātaro cāpi, sabbeva idha ñātayo.
atk-s0301a0:286_0: Etaṃ kho vattaṃ samaṇānaṃ, ariyānaṃ dhammajīvinaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:289_0: Sabbeva abhayaṃ pattā, sotthiṃ gacchantu ñātayo”ti.
atk-s0301a0:290_0: Evaṃ te corehi vissajjitā gantvā adhimuttaṃ āhaṃsu –
atk-s0301a0:293_0: Tepi pañcasatā corā pasādaṃ āpajjitvā adhimuttassa sāmaṇerassa santike pabbajiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:293_1: So te ādāya upajjhāyassa santikaṃ gantvā paṭhamaṃ attanā upasampanno pacchā te pañcasate attano antevāsike katvā upasampādesi.
atk-s0301a0:293_2: Te adhimuttatherassa ovāde ṭhitā sabbe aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:293_3: Imamatthaṃ gahetvā devatā “sataṃ saddhammamaññāya ñātimajjhe virocatī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:294_0: Sātatanti satataṃ sukhaṃ vā ciraṃ tiṭṭhantīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:296_1: Dutiye maccherā ca pamādā cāti attasampattinigūhanalakkhaṇena maccherena ceva sativippavāsalakkhaṇena pamādena ca.
atk-s0301a0:296_2: Ekacco hi ‘idaṃ me dentassa parikkhayaṃ gamissati,
atk-s0301a0:296_3: mayhaṃ vā gharamānusakānaṃ vā na bhavissatī”ti macchariyena dānaṃ na deti.
atk-s0301a0:296_4: Ekacco khiḍḍādipasutattā ‘dānaṃ dātabba”nti cittampi na uppādeti.
atk-s0301a0:296_5: Evaṃ dānaṃ na dīyatīti evametaṃ yasadāyakaṃ sirīdāyakaṃ sampattidāyakaṃ sukhadāyakaṃ dānaṃ nāma na dīyatītiādinā kāraṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:296_7: Deyyaṃ hoti vijānatāti atthi dānassa phalanti jānantena dātabbamevāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:297_0: Tameva bālaṃ phusatīti taṃyeva bālaṃ idhalokaparalokesu jighacchā ca pipāsā ca phusati anubandhati na vijahati.
atk-s0301a0:297_3: Dajjā dānaṃ malābhibhūti malābhibhū hutvā taṃ maccheramalaṃ abhibhavitvā dānaṃ dadeyya.
atk-s0301a0:298_0: Te matesu na mīyantīti adānasīlatāya maraṇena matesu na mīyanti.
atk-s0301a0:298_1: Yathā hi mato samparivāretvā ṭhapite bahumhipi annapānādimhi “idaṃ imassa hotu,
atk-s0301a0:298_2: idaṃ imassā”ti uṭṭhahitvā saṃvibhāgaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0301a0:298_3: evaṃ adānasīlopīti matakassa ca adānasīlassa ca bhogā samasamā nāma honti.
atk-s0301a0:298_4: Tena dānasīlā evarūpesu matesu na mīyantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:298_6: appasmiṃ ye pavecchantīti yathā addhānaṃ kantāramaggaṃ saha vajantā pathikā saha vajantānaṃ pathikānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:298_7: appasmiṃ pātheyye saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā pavecchanti dadantiyeva,
atk-s0301a0:298_8: evamevaṃ ye pana anamataggaṃ saṃsārakantāraṃ saha vajantā saha vajantānaṃ appasmimpi deyyadhamme saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā dadantiyeva,
atk-s0301a0:299_0: Esa dhammo sanantanoti esa porāṇako dhammo,
atk-s0301a0:299_4: Bahuneke na dicchareti bahunāpi bhogena samannāgatā ekacce na dadanti.
atk-s0301a0:299_5: Sahassena samaṃ mitāti sahassena saddhiṃ mitā,
atk-s0301a0:300_5: Dadaṃ appakasminti appakasmiṃ paṇṇasākamattasmimpi saṃvibhāgaṃ katvā dadantova so dhammaṃ carati.
atk-s0301a0:300_6: Sataṃ sahassānanti sahassaṃ sahassaṃ katvā gaṇitānaṃ purisānaṃ sataṃ,
atk-s0301a0:300_8: Sahassayāginanti bhikkhusahassassa vā yāgo kahāpaṇasahassena vā nibbattito yāgopi sahassayāgo.
atk-s0301a0:300_11: Etena dasannaṃ vā bhikkhukoṭīnaṃ dasannaṃ vā kahāpaṇakoṭīnaṃ piṇḍapāto dassito hoti.
atk-s0301a0:300_18: Yaṃ tena daliddena ekapaṭivīsakamattampi salākabhattamattampi vā dinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:300_19: tassa dānassa sabbesampi tesaṃ dānaṃ kalaṃ nagghatīti.
atk-s0301a0:300_23: tasmiṃ satadhā vibhatte itaresaṃ dasakoṭisahassadānaṃ tato ekakoṭṭhāsampi nagghatīti āha.
atk-s0301a0:301_0: Evaṃ tathāgate dānassa agghaṃ karonte samīpe ṭhitā devatā cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:301_1: “evaṃ bhagavā mahantaṃ dānaṃ pādena pavaṭṭetvā ratanasatike viya narake pakkhipanto idaṃ evaṃ parittakaṃ dānaṃ candamaṇḍale paharanto viya ukkhipati,
atk-s0301a0:301_2: kathaṃ nu kho etaṃ mahapphalatara”nti jānanatthaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:301_7: Athassā bhagavā dānaṃ vibhajitvā dassento dadanti heketiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:301_8: Tattha visame niviṭṭhāti visame kāyavacīmanokamme patiṭṭhitā hutvā.
atk-s0301a0:301_14: Sadaṇḍāti daṇḍena tajjetvā paharitvā dinnadakkhiṇā sadaṇḍāti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:301_15: Evanti nāhaṃ sammāsambuddhatāya mahādānaṃ gahetvā appaphalaṃ nāma kātuṃ sakkomi parittakadānaṃ vā mahapphalaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:301_16: Idaṃ pana mahādānaṃ attano uppattiyā aparisuddhatāya evaṃ appaphalaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:301_17: itaraṃ parittadānaṃ attano uppattiyā parisuddhatāya evaṃ mahapphalaṃ nāmāti imamatthaṃ dassento evantiādimāhāti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:303_2: Yathā hi yaṃ telaṃ mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti vissanditvā gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:303_4: Yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:303_7: evamevaṃ yaṃ pītivacanaṃ hadayaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:303_8: adhikaṃ hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi nikkhamati,
atk-s0301a0:303_11: Saddhāyapi sāhu dānanti kammañca kammaphalañca saddahitvāpi dinnadānaṃ sāhu laddhakaṃ bhaddakameva.
atk-s0301a0:303_13: Kathaṃ panetaṃ ubhayaṃ samaṃ nāma hotīti?
atk-s0301a0:303_16: “Jīvitañca rakkhissāmi yujjhissāmi cā”ti hi vadanto na yujjhati.
atk-s0301a0:303_22: Bhogesu pana ālayaṃ vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ dassāmīti ussahantova deti.
atk-s0301a0:303_25: Appāpi santā bahuke jinantīti yathā ca yuddhe appakāpi vīrapurisā bahuke bhīrupurise jinanti,
atk-s0301a0:303_26: evaṃ saddhādisampanno appakampi dānaṃ dadanto bahumaccheraṃ maddati,
atk-s0301a0:306_0: Imassa ca panatthassa pakāsanatthaṃ ekasāṭakabrāhmaṇavatthu ca aṅkuravatthu ca vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:307_0: Dhammaladdhassāti dhammena samena laddhassa bhogassa dhammaladdhassa ca puggalassa.
atk-s0301a0:307_1: Ettha puggalo laddhadhammo nāma adhigatadhammo ariyapuggalo.
atk-s0301a0:307_2: Iti yaṃ dhammaladdhassa bhogassa dānaṃ dhammaladdhassa ariyapuggalassa dīyati,
atk-s0301a0:307_4: Yo dhammaladdhassāti imasmimpi gāthāpade ayameva attho.
atk-s0301a0:307_5: Uṭṭhānavīriyādhigatassāti uṭṭhānena ca vīriyena ca adhigatassa bhogassa.
atk-s0301a0:307_7: Yamassa pana vetaraṇimpi sañjīvakāḷasuttādayopi ekatiṃsamahānirayepi sabbasova atikkamitvāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:308_2: Tesu lāmakalāmake paccaye apanetvā paṇītapaṇīte vicinitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:308_3: Vipannasīle ito bahiddhā pañcanavutipāsaṇḍabhede vā dakkhiṇeyye pahāya sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ sāsane pabbajitānaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:308_7: Bījāni vuttāni yathāti iminā pana dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ āha.
atk-s0301a0:308_8: Avipannabījasadisā hi vicinitvā gahitā paṇītapaṇītā deyyadhammāti.
atk-s0301a0:309_0: Pāṇesupi sādhu saṃyamoti pāṇesu saṃyatabhāvopi bhaddako.
atk-s0301a0:309_1: Ayaṃ devatā itarāhi kathitaṃ dānānisaṃsaṃ atikkamitvā sīlānisaṃsaṃ kathetumāraddhā.
atk-s0301a0:309_5: Dānā ca kho dhammapadaṃva seyyoti dānato nibbānasaṅkhātaṃ dhammapadameva seyyo.
atk-s0301a0:309_6: Pubbe ca hi pubbatare ca santoti pubbe ca kassapabuddhādikāle pubbatare ca koṇāgamanabuddhādikāle,
atk-s0301a0:309_7: sabbepi vā ete pubbe ca pubbatare ca santo nāmāti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:311_2: Apunāgamanaṃ anāgantā puriso maccudheyyāti tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhātā maccudheyyā apunāgamanasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ anāgantā.
atk-s0301a0:311_5: Taṃ kāmesu baddho ca pamatto ca anāgantā nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:311_12: Aghavinayā dukkhavinayoti pañcakkhandhavinayena vaṭṭadukkhaṃ vinītameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:311_15: Evamettha vatthukāmaṃ paṭikkhipitvā kilesakāmo kāmoti vutto.
atk-s0301a0:311_17: Pasūraparibbājako hi therena “saṅkapparāgo purisassa kāmo”ti vutte –
atk-s0301a0:324_0: Athettha dhīrāti atha etesu ārammaṇesu paṇḍitā chandarāgaṃ vinayanti.
atk-s0301a0:324_3: Nānupatanti dukkhāti vaṭṭadukkhā pana tassa upari na patanti.
atk-s0301a0:324_5: “pahāsi saṅkha”nti gāthaṃ sutvā tassaṃ parisati anusandhikusalo mogharājā nāma thero “imissā gāthāya
atk-s0301a0:324_6: attho na yathānusandhiṃ gato”ti cintetvā yathānusandhiṃ ghaṭento evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:324_7: Tattha idha vā huraṃ vāti idhaloke vā paraloke vā.
atk-s0301a0:324_8: Naruttamaṃ atthacaraṃ narānanti kiñcāpi sabbe khīṇāsavā naruttamā ceva atthacarā ca narānaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:324_10: Ye taṃ namassanti pasaṃsiyā teti yadi tathāvimuttaṃ devamanussā namassanti,
atk-s0301a0:324_11: atha ye taṃ bhagavantaṃ kāyena vā vācāya vā anupaṭipattiyā vā namassanti,
atk-s0301a0:324_16: Saṅgātigā tepi bhavantīti ye taṃ kāyena vā vācāya vā anupaṭipattiyā vā namassanti.
atk-s0301a0:324_17: Te catusaccadhammaṃ aññāya vicikicchaṃ pahāya saṅgātigāpi honti,
atk-s0301a0:326_1: Pañcame ujjhānasaññikāti ujjhānasaññī devaloko nāma pāṭiyekko natthi,
atk-s0301a0:326_2: imā pana devatā tathāgatassa catupaccayaparibhogaṃ nissāya ujjhāyamānā āgatā.
atk-s0301a0:326_7: sayaṃ pana pattuṇṇadukūla khomādīni paṇītacīvarāni dhāreti,
atk-s0301a0:327_4: So hi agumbova samāno sākhapaṇṇādipaṭicchādanena gumbavaṇṇaṃ dassetvā upagate moratittirādayo sakuṇe māretvā dārabharaṇaṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a0:327_5: Iti tassa kitavassa imāya vañcanāya evaṃ vañcetvā sakuṇamaṃsabhojanaṃ viya kuhakassāpi paṃsukūlena attānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:327_6: paṭicchādetvā kathāchekatāya mahājanaṃ vañcetvā khādamānassa vicarato.
atk-s0301a0:327_7: Bhuttaṃ theyyena tassa tanti sabbopi tassa catupaccayaparibhogo theyyena paribhutto nāma hotīti devatā bhagavantaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0301a0:327_8: Parijānanti paṇḍitāti ayaṃ kārako vā akārako vāti paṇḍitā jānanti.
atk-s0301a0:327_9: Iti tā devatā “tathāgatāpi mayameva paṇḍitā”ti maññamānā evamāhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:328_1: Tattha yāyaṃ paṭipadā daḷhāti ayaṃ dhammānudhammapaṭipadā daḷhā thirā.
atk-s0301a0:328_2: Yāya paṭipadāya dhīrā paṇḍitā ārammaṇūpanijjhānena lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena cāti dvīhi jhānehi jhāyino mārabandhanā pamuccanti,
atk-s0301a0:328_3: taṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāsitamattena vā savanamattena vā okkamituṃ paṭipajjituṃ na sakkāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:328_4: Na ve dhīrā pakubbantīti dhīrā paṇḍitā viditvā lokapariyāyaṃ saṅkhāralokassa udayabbayaṃ ñatvā catusaccadhammañca
atk-s0301a0:328_5: aññāya kilesanibbānena nibbutā loke visattikaṃ tiṇṇā evaṃ na kubbanti,
atk-s0301a0:329_1: akārakameva mayaṃ kārakavādena samudācarimhā”ti lajjamānā mahābrahmani viya bhagavati gāravaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0301a0:329_2: aggikkhandhaṃ viya bhagavantaṃ durāsadaṃ katvā passamānā ākāsato otaritvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhatvāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:329_6: Tā kira devatā bhagavantaṃ kāyena vācāyāti dvīhipi ghaṭṭayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:329_7: Tathāgataṃ avanditvā ākāse patiṭṭhamānā kāyena ghaṭṭayiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:329_8: kitavopamaṃ āharitvā nānappakārakaṃ asabbhivādaṃ vadamānā vācāya ghaṭṭayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:330_0: Sitaṃ pātvākāsīti aggadante dassento pahaṭṭhākāraṃ dassesi. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a0:330_1: Tā kira devatā na sabhāvena khamāpenti,
atk-s0301a0:330_2: lokiyamahājanañca sadevake loke aggapuggalaṃ tathāgatañca ekasadisaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a0:330_3: Atha bhagavā “parato kathāya uppannāya buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā pacchā khamissāmī”ti sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0301a0:330_5: Imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsīti kupito esa amhākanti maññamānā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:331_2: Dosagarūti dosaṃ garuṃ katvā ādāya viharanto.
atk-s0301a0:331_3: Sa veraṃ paṭimuñcatīti so evarūpo gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya taṃ veraṃ attani paṭimuñcati ṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a0:331_5: Accayo ce na vijjethāti sace accāyikakammaṃ na bhaveyya.
atk-s0301a0:331_6: No cidhāpagataṃ siyāti yadi aparādho nāma na bhāveyya.
atk-s0301a0:331_7: Kenīdha kusalo siyāti yadi verāni na sammeyyuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:332_4: Imaṃ kira gāthaṃ bhaṇāpanatthaṃ bhagavato sitapātukammaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:332_5: Tasmā idāni devatānaṃ buddhabalaṃ dīpetvā khamissāmīti tathāgatassa buddhassātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:332_6: Tattha tathāgatassāti tathā āgatoti evamādīhi kāraṇehi tathāgatassa.
atk-s0301a0:332_7: Buddhassāti catunnaṃ saccānaṃ buddhattādīhi kāraṇehi vimokkhantikapaṇṇattivasena evaṃ laddhanāmassa.
atk-s0301a0:332_8: Accayaṃ desayantīnanti yaṃ vuttaṃ tumhehi “accayaṃ desayantīnaṃ…pe…
atk-s0301a0:332_11: ahaṃ pana taṃ veraṃ nābhinandāmi na patthayāmīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:332_12: Paṭiggaṇhāmi voccayanti tumhākaṃ aparādhaṃ khamāmīti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:334_1: Chaṭṭhe saddhā dutiyā purisassa hotīti purisassa devaloke manussaloke ceva nibbānañca gacchantassa saddhā dutiyā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:334_3: No ce assaddhiyaṃ avatiṭṭhatīti yadi assaddhiyaṃ na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a0:334_7: Nānupatanti saṅgāti rāgasaṅgādayo pañca saṅgā na anupatanti.
atk-s0301a0:334_10: Dhanaṃ seṭṭhaṃva rakkhatīti muttāmaṇisārādiuttamadhanaṃ viya rakkhati.
atk-s0301a0:334_11: Jhāyantoti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena ca ārammaṇūpanijjhānena ca jhāyanto.
atk-s0301a0:334_13: Vipassanā hi tīṇi lakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:334_16: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo pana kasiṇārammaṇassa upanijjhāyanato ārammaṇūpanijjhānanti veditabbā.
atk-s0301a0:336_2: bho kumārā”ti udānaṃ paṭicca sakkāti laddhanāmānaṃ rājakumārānaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado rūḷhīsaddena sakkāti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:336_4: Mahāvaneti sayaṃjāte aropime himavantena saddhiṃ ekābaddhe mahati vane.
atk-s0301a0:336_5: Sabbeheva arahantehīti imaṃ suttaṃ kathitadivaseyeva pattaarahantehi.
atk-s0301a0:337_1: sākiyakoliyā hi kira kapilavatthunagarassa ca koliyanagarassa ca antare rohiṇiṃ nāma nadiṃ ekeneva āvaraṇena bandhāpetvā sassāni kārenti.
atk-s0301a0:337_2: Atha jeṭṭhamūlamāse sassesu milāyantesu ubhayanagaravāsīnampi kammakārā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:337_6: amhākaṃ pana sassaṃ ekena udakeneva nipphajjissati,
atk-s0301a0:337_9: “tumhesu koṭṭhe pūretvā ṭhitesu mayaṃ rattasuvaṇṇanīlamaṇikāḷakahāpaṇe ca gahetvā pacchipasibbakādihatthā
atk-s0301a0:337_15: Evaṃ kathaṃ vaḍḍhetvā eko uṭṭhāya ekassa pahāraṃ adāsi,
atk-s0301a0:337_16: sopi aññassāti evaṃ aññamaññaṃ paharitvā rājakulānaṃ jātiṃ ghaṭṭetvā kalahaṃ vaḍḍhayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:338_2: ye soṇasiṅgālādayo viya attano bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:338_3: etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:338_6: ye anāthā niggatikā tiracchānā viya kolarukkhe vasiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:338_7: etesaṃ hatthino ca assā ca phalakāvudhāni ca amhākaṃ kiṃ karissantī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:338_8: Te gantvā tasmiṃ kamme niyuttaamaccānaṃ kathesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:338_11: “bhaginīhi saddhiṃ saṃvasitakānaṃ thāmañca balañca dassessāmā”ti yuddhasajjā nikkhamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:339_0: Bhagavāpi rattiyā paccūsasamayeva mahākaruṇāsamāpattito uṭṭhāya lokaṃ volokento ime evaṃ yuddhasajje nikkhamante addasa. Disvā –
atk-s0301a0:339_1: “mayi gate ayaṃ kalaho vūpasammissati nu kho udāhu no”ti upadhārento –
atk-s0301a0:339_4: Atha sāmaggidīpanatthāya dve jātakāni kathetvā attadaṇḍasuttaṃ desessāmi.
atk-s0301a0:339_5: Desanaṃ sutvā ubhayanagaravāsinopi aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni dassanti,
atk-s0301a0:339_8: Tasmā imesu yuddhasajjesu nikkhamantesu kassaci anārocetvā sayameva pattacīvaramādāya gantvā dvinnaṃ
atk-s0301a0:339_9: senānaṃ antare ākāse pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:340_2: Diṭṭho nu kho tena amhākaṃ kalahakaraṇabhāvo”ti cintetvā,
atk-s0301a0:340_3: “na kho pana sakkā bhagavati āgate amhehi parassa sarīre satthaṃ pātetuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:340_4: Koliyanagaravāsino amhe hanantu vā bajjhantu vā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:341_6: imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne saṅgāmaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā āgatamhā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:341_15: Appamūlaṃ udakaṃ nissāya kimatthaṃ anagghe khattiye nāsetha, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:341_18: aṭṭhāne veraṃ katvā ekāya rukkhadevatāya kāḷasīhena saddhiṃ baddhāghāto sakalampi imaṃ kappaṃ anuppattoyevāti vatvā phandanajātakaṃ kathesi”.
atk-s0301a0:341_21: Parapattiyā hutvā hi ekassa sasakassa kathāya tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante catuppadagaṇā mahāsamuddaṃ pakkhandino ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:341_27: Laṭukikāpi hi sakuṇikā hatthināgaṃ ghātesī”ti laṭukikajātakaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:341_28: Evaṃ kalahavūpasamanatthāya tīṇi jātakāni kathetvā sāmaggiparidīpanatthāya dve jātakāni kathesi. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0301a0:341_30: koci otāraṃ nāma passituṃ na sakkotīti vatvā,
atk-s0301a0:341_35: atha te nesādaputto jīvitā voropetvā ādāya gatoti vivāde assādo nāma natthī”ti vatvā,
atk-s0301a0:341_37: Evaṃ imāni pañca jātakāni kathetvā avasāne attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:342_2: mayaṃ sahatthā aññamaññaṃ vadhitvā lohitanadiṃ pavattayissāma.
atk-s0301a0:342_3: Amhākaṃ puttabhātaro ca gehadvāre na passeyyāma,
atk-s0301a0:342_6: Sace pana satthā āgāraṃ ajjhāvasissa dīpasahassadvayaparivāraṃ catumahādīparajjamassa hatthagataṃ abhavissa,
atk-s0301a0:342_9: Taṃ kho panesa sampattiṃ pahāya nikkhamitvā sambodhiṃ patto.
atk-s0301a0:342_10: Idānipi khattiyaparivāroyeva vicaratū”ti ubhayanagaravāsino aḍḍhatiyāni aḍḍhatiyāni kumārasatāni adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:342_12: Tesaṃ garugāravena na attano ruciyā pabbajitānaṃ anabhirati uppajji.
atk-s0301a0:342_15: gharāvāso na saṇṭhātī”tiādīni vatvā sāsanaṃ pesenti.
atk-s0301a0:343_1: “ime bhikkhū mādisena buddhena saddhiṃ ekato vasantā ukkaṇṭhanti,
atk-s0301a0:343_2: handa nesaṃ kuṇāladahassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā tattha netvā anabhiratiṃ vinodemī”ti kuṇāladahassa vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:343_9: Iddhimantānaṃ bhagavā gamanaṭṭhānaṃ mayaṃ kathaṃ gamissāmāti.
atk-s0301a0:343_11: ahaṃ mamānubhāvena gahetvā gamissāmīti. Sādhu, bhanteti.
atk-s0301a0:343_12: Bhagavā pañca bhikkhusatāni gahetvā ākāse uppatitvā kuṇāladahe patiṭṭhāya te bhikkhū āha –
atk-s0301a0:343_14: imasmiṃ kuṇāladahe yesaṃ macchānaṃ nāmaṃ na jānātha mamaṃ pucchathā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:344_4: tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe rukkhānampi pabbatapāde dvipadacatuppadasakuṇānampi nāmāni pucchāpetvā kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:344_5: Atha dvīhi sakuṇehi mukhatuṇḍakena ḍaṃsitvā gahitadaṇḍake nisinno kuṇālasakuṇarājā purato pacchato ubhosu ca passesu sakuṇasaṅghaparivuto āgacchati.
atk-s0301a0:344_13: Yaṃ pana bhagavā “ayampi mameva vaṃso mama paveṇī”ti āha,
atk-s0301a0:344_18: Tena hi suṇāthāti tīhi gāthāsatehi maṇḍetvā kuṇālajātakaṃ kathento anabhiratiṃ vinodesi.
atk-s0301a0:344_21: Bhagavā “hotu tāva ettakaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūna”nti ākāse uppatitvā mahāvanameva agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:344_22: Tepi bhikkhū gamanakāle dasabalassa ānubhāvena gantvā āgamanakāle attano ānubhāvena bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā mahāvane otariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:345_0: Bhagavā paññattāsane nisīditvā te bhikkhū āmantetvā – “etha,
atk-s0301a0:345_3: Uparimaggattayavajjhānaṃ vo kilesānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathessāmī”ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:345_5: “bhagavā amhākaṃ anabhiratabhāvaṃ ñatvā kuṇāladahaṃ netvā anabhiratiṃ vinodesi,
atk-s0301a0:345_6: tattha sotāpattiphalaṃ pattānaṃ no idāni idha tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ adāsi,
atk-s0301a0:345_7: na kho pana amhehi ‘sotāpannā maya’nti vītināmetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0301a0:345_8: purisapurisehi no bhavituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti te dasabalassa pāde vanditvā uṭṭhāya nisīdanaṃ papphoṭetvā visuṃ visuṃ pabbhārarukkhamūlesu nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:346_2: laddhupāyassa pana bhikkhuno kilamanakāraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:346_3: Gacchantā gacchantā ca vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ patvā ‘attanā paṭividdhaguṇaṃ ārocessāmā’ti mama santikaṃ āgamissanti.
atk-s0301a0:346_6: vivitte okāse mayā nisīdituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti tato vivitte okāse buddhāsanaṃ paññāpetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:347_0: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā gatatthero saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a0:347_1: Tato aparo tato aparoti pañcasatāpi paduminiyaṃ padumāni viya vikasiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:347_2: Sabbapaṭhamaṃ arahattaṃ pattabhikkhu “bhagavato ārocessāmī”ti pallaṅkaṃ vinibbhujitvā nisīdanaṃ papphoṭetvā uṭṭhāya dasabalābhimukho ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:347_3: Evaṃ aparopi aparopīti pañcasatā bhattasālaṃ pavisantā viya paṭipāṭiyāva āgamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:347_6: paṭividdhaguṇaṃ ārocetukāmo “atthi nu kho añño koci?
atk-s0301a0:347_7: Natthī”ti nivattitvā āgatamaggaṃ olokento aparampi addasa aparampi addasayevāti sabbepi te āgantvā ekamantaṃ nisīditvā,
atk-s0301a0:347_11: “aho vata mayā paṭividdhaguṇaṃ sadevako loko khippameva paṭivijjheyyā”ti cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0301a0:347_12: Paṭividdhabhāvaṃ pana nidhiladdhapuriso viya na aññassa ārocetukāmā honti.
atk-s0301a0:348_0: Evaṃ osaṭamatte pana tasmiṃ ariyamaṇḍale pācīnayugandharaparikkhepato abbhā mahikā dhūmo rajo rāhūti,
atk-s0301a0:348_1: imehi upakkilesehi vippamuttaṃ buddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitassa lokassa rāmaṇeyyakadassanatthaṃ pācīnadisāya ukkhittarajatamayamahāādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya,
atk-s0301a0:348_5: Iti evarūpe khaṇe laye muhutte bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ mahāvane mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
atk-s0301a0:349_1: tepi pañcasatā bhikkhū mahāsammatassa kule uppannā.
atk-s0301a0:349_6: Bhagavāpi setacchattaṃ pahāya hatthagataṃ cakkavattirajjaṃ nissajjitvā pabbajito,
atk-s0301a0:349_7: tepi setacchattaṃ pahāya hatthagatāni rajjāni vissajjitvā pabbajitā.
atk-s0301a0:350_1: mandā na sannipatitā asaññī arūpāvacaradevatā samāpannadevatāyo ca.
atk-s0301a0:350_7: Āyāma āyāmā”ti! Mahāsaddaṃ kurumānā āgantvā bhagavantañca taṃmuhuttaṃ arahattappattakhīṇāsave ca vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:350_8: Eteneva upāyena tāsaṃ tāsaṃ saddaṃ sutvā saddantaraaḍḍhagāvutagāvutaaḍḍhayojanayojanādivasena tiyojanasahassavitthate himavante,
atk-s0301a0:350_17: tato dutiyatatiyacakkavāḷeti evaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷesu devatā sannipatitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0301a0:350_20: “dasahi ca lokadhātūhi devatā yebhuyyena sannipatitā hontī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:351_0: Evaṃ sannipatitāhi devatāhi sakalacakkavāḷagabbhaṃ yāva brahmalokā sūcighare nirantaraṃ pakkhittasūcīhi viya paripuṇṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:351_2: lohapāsāde kira sattakūṭāgārasamo pāsāṇo brahmaloke ṭhatvā adho khitto catūhi māsehi pathaviṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0301a0:351_3: Evaṃ mahante okāse yathā heṭṭhā ṭhatvā khittāni pupphāni vā dhūmo vā upari gantuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:351_4: upari vā ṭhatvā khittasāsapā heṭṭhā otarituṃ antaraṃ na labhanti,
atk-s0301a0:351_6: Yathā kho pana cakkavattirañño nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ asambādhaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:351_10: āgatāgatā mahesakkhā devā ca brahmāno ca okāsaṃ labhantiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:351_11: Api sudaṃ bhagavato āsannāsannaṭṭhāne vālagganittudanamatte padese dasapi vīsatipi devā sukhume attabhāve māpetvā aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:352_1: Suddhāvāsā nāma suddhānaṃ anāgāmikhīṇāsavānaṃ āvāsā pañca brahmalokā.
atk-s0301a0:352_3: Te kira brahmāno samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā yathā paricchedena vuṭṭhitā brahmabhavanaṃ olokentā pacchābhatte bhattagehaṃ viya suññataṃ addasaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:352_4: Tato “kuhiṃ brahmāno gatā”ti āvajjantā mahāsamāgamaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0301a0:352_8: tasmā gacchantā atucchahatthā hutvā ekekaṃ gāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā gacchāma.
atk-s0301a0:352_9: Tāya mahāsamāgame ca attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpessāma,
atk-s0301a0:352_11: Iti tesaṃ samāpattito uṭṭhāya āvajjitattā etadahosi.
atk-s0301a0:353_0: Bhagavato purato pāturahesunti pāḷiyaṃ bhagavato santike abhimukhaṭṭhāneyeva otiṇṇā viya katvā vuttā,
atk-s0301a0:353_1: na kho panettha evaṃ attho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:353_2: Te pana brahmaloke ṭhitāyeva gāthā abhisaṅkharitvā eko puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otari,
atk-s0301a0:353_6: Tato puratthimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā nīlakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā nīlarasmiyo vissajjetvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
