atk-s0301a0:353_7: maṇivammaṃ paṭimuñcanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā buddhavīthi nāma kenaci uttarituṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0301a0:353_8: tasmā mahatiyā buddhavīthiyāva āgantvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:353_9: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho attanā abhisaṅkhataṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:354_0: Dakkhiṇacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā pītakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā suvaṇṇapabhaṃ muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:354_1: suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:354_2: Pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā lohitakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā lohitakarasmiyo muñcitvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:354_3: rattavarakambalena parikkhipanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:354_4: Uttaracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ otiṇṇabrahmā odātakasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā odātarasmiyo vissajjetvā dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:354_5: sumanakusumapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā tatheva akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:355_1: Atha kho tā devatā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsūti evaṃ ekakkhaṇe viya purato pātubhāvo ca abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhitabhāvo ca vutto,
atk-s0301a0:355_4: Gāthābhāsanaṃ pana pāḷiyampi visuṃ visuṃyeva vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:356_2: Ubhayenapi bhagavā “imasmiṃ pana vanasaṇḍe ajja mahāsamūho sannipāto”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:356_6: Āgatamha imaṃ dhammasamayanti evaṃ samāgate devakāye disvā mayampi imaṃ dhammasamūhaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0301a0:356_8: Dakkhitāye aparājitasaṅghanti kenaci aparājitaṃ ajjeva tayo māre madditvā vijitasaṅgāmaṃ imaṃ aparājitasaṅghaṃ dassanatthāya āgatamhāti attho. So pana, brahmā,
atk-s0301a0:357_1: Tattha tatra bhikkhavoti tasmiṃ sannipātaṭṭhāne bhikkhū.
atk-s0301a0:357_3: Cittamattano ujukaṃ akaṃsūti attano citte sabbe vaṅkakuṭilajimhabhāve haritvā ujukaṃ akariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:357_4: Sārathīva nettāni gahetvāti yathā samappavattesu sindhavesu odhastapatodo sārathī sabbayottāni gahetvā acodento avārento tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a0:357_5: evaṃ chaḷaṅgupekkhāya samannāgatā guttadvārā sabbepete pañcasatā bhikkhū indriyāni rakkhanti paṇḍitā,
atk-s0301a0:358_4: Ūhacca manejāti ete taṇhāejāya anejā bhikkhū indakhīlaṃ ūhacca samūhanitvā catūsu disāsu appaṭihatacārikaṃ caranti.
atk-s0301a0:358_9: Sudantāti cakkhutopi dantā sotatopi ghānatopi jivhātopi kāyatopi manatopi dantā.
atk-s0301a0:358_13: tena tena maggena pahīne kilese na āgacchantīti nāgā,
atk-s0301a0:364_3: Te evarūpe anuttarena yoggācariyena damite taruṇanāge dassanāya āgatamha bhagavāti.
atk-s0301a0:367_3: “ayaṃ mayhaṃ kucchigato gabbho rañño sattu bhavissati.
atk-s0301a0:367_7: Migānaṃ pana abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:368_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti ettha ayaṃ anupubbikathā –
atk-s0301a0:368_1: devadatto hi ajātasattuṃ nissāya dhanuggahe ca dhanapālakañca payojetvāpi tathāgatassa jīvitantarāyaṃ
atk-s0301a0:368_2: kātuṃ asakkonto “sahattheneva māressāmī”ti gijjhakūṭapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā mahantaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ silaṃ
atk-s0301a0:368_5: Mahāthāmavā kiresa pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti.
atk-s0301a0:368_7: yaṃ buddhānaṃ parūpakkamena jīvitantarāyo bhaveyyāti taṃ tathāgatassa sarīrābhimukhaṃ āgacchantaṃ ākāse aññā silā uṭṭhahitvā sampaṭicchi.
atk-s0301a0:368_8: Dvinnaṃ silānaṃ sampahārena mahanto pāsāṇassa sakalikā uṭṭhahitvā bhagavato piṭṭhipādapariyantaṃ abhihani,
atk-s0301a0:368_9: pādo mahāpharasunā pahato viya samuggatalohitena lākhārasamakkhito viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:368_13: yo tvaṃ paduṭṭhacitto vadhakacitto tathāgatassa lohitaṃ uppādesī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:368_18: Te tathāgataṃ mañcasivikāya ādāya maddakucchiṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:368_20: “tena kho pana samayena bhagavato pādo sakalikāya khato hotī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:369_8: na tā manaṃ appāyanti vaḍḍhentīti amanāpā.
atk-s0301a0:370_6: kāmabhogī sattā vāmena passena sentī”ti ayaṃ kāmabhogiseyyā.
atk-s0301a0:370_7: Tesu hi yebhuyyena dakkhiṇapassena sayāno nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:370_11: Appamaṃsalohitattā hi aṭṭhisaṅghāṭajaṭitā ekena passena sayituṃ na sakkonti,
atk-s0301a0:370_15: sīho migarājā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi anupakkhipitvā dakkhiṇena passena setī”ti ayaṃ sīhaseyyā.
atk-s0301a0:370_16: Tejussadattā hi sīho migarājā dve purimapāde ekasmiṃ,
atk-s0301a0:370_17: ‘pacchimapāde ekasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhapetvā naṅguṭṭhaṃ antarasatthimhi pakkhipitvā purimapādapacchimapādanaṅguṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:370_18: ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkhetvā dvinnaṃ purimapādānaṃ matthake sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā sayati,
atk-s0301a0:370_19: divasampi sayitvā pabujjhamāno na utrasanto pabujjhati,
atk-s0301a0:370_20: sīsaṃ pana ukkhipitvā purimapādādīnaṃ ṭhitokāsaṃ sallakkheti’.
atk-s0301a0:370_21: Sace kiñci ṭhānaṃ vijahitvā ṭhitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:370_23: na sūrabhāvassa anurūpa”nti anattamano hutvā tattheva sayati,
atk-s0301a0:370_25: Avijahitvā ṭhite pana “tuyhaṃ jātiyā ca sūrabhāvassa ca anurūpamida”nti haṭṭhatuṭṭho uṭṭhāya sīhavijambhitaṃ
atk-s0301a0:370_26: vijambhitvā kesarabhāraṃ vidhunitvā tikkhattuṃ sīhanādaṃ naditvā gocarāya pakkamati.
atk-s0301a0:371_3: Gopphakena hi gopphake jāṇunā vā jāṇumhi saṅghaṭṭiyamāne abhiṇhaṃ vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:372_0: Sattasatāti imasmiṃ sutte sabbāpi tā devatā gilānaseyyaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā.
atk-s0301a0:372_1: Udānaṃ udānesīti gilānaseyyaṃ āgatānaṃ domanassena bhavitabbaṃ siyā.
atk-s0301a0:372_3: “aho buddhānaṃ mahānubhāvatā! Evarūpāsu nāma vedanāsu vattamānāsu vikāramattampi natthi,
atk-s0301a0:372_4: sirīsayane alaṅkaritvā ṭhapitasuvaṇṇarūpakaṃ viya aniñjamānena kāyena nipanno,
atk-s0301a0:372_6: ābhāsampanno puṇṇacando viya sampati vikasitaṃ viya ca aravindaṃ assa mukhaṃ sobhati,
atk-s0301a0:372_7: kāyepi vaṇṇāyatanaṃ idāni susammaṭṭhakañcanaṃ viya vippasīdatī”ti udānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0301a0:373_10: Bhagavā pana appaṭisamaṭṭhena āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ paṭijānāti.
atk-s0301a0:374_3: Rāgānugataṃ pana cittaṃ abhinataṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:374_5: Tadubhayapaṭikkhepena na cābhinataṃ na cāpanatanti āha.
atk-s0301a0:374_6: Na ca sasaṅkhāraniggayhavāritagatanti na sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilese niggahetvā vāritavataṃ,
atk-s0301a0:374_7: kilesānaṃ pana chinnattā vataṃ phalasamādhinā samāhitanti attho.
atk-s0301a0:374_10: Aññāṇī hi andhabālova evarūpe satthari aparajjheyyāti devadattaṃ ghaṭṭayamānā vadanti.
atk-s0301a0:375_4: Na sammāvimuttanti sacepi evarūpā brāhmaṇā vassasataṃ caranti,
atk-s0301a0:375_5: cittañca nesaṃ sammā vimuttaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:375_6: Hīnattarūpā na pāraṃ gamā teti hīnattasabhāvā te nibbānaṅgamā na honti.
atk-s0301a0:375_10: Vatasīlabaddhāti ajavatakukkuravatādīhi ca vatehi tādiseheva ca sīlehi baddhā.
atk-s0301a0:375_12: Idāni sā devatā sāsanassa niyyānikabhāvaṃ kathentī na mānakāmassātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:377_1: Navame pajjunnassa dhītāti pajjunnassa nāma vassavalāhakadevarañño cātumahārājikassa dhītā.
atk-s0301a0:377_5: “idaṃ mayā pubbe paresaṃ santike kevalaṃ sutaṃyeva āsī”ti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:377_17: Tattha hi sattā aggimhi jalante jalante punappunaṃ ravaṃ ravanti,
atk-s0301a0:377_20: Khantiyā upasamena upetāti ruccitvā khamāpetvā gahaṇakhantiyā ca rāgādiupasamena ca upetāti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:379_2: iti tīṇi ratanāni namassamānā idhāgatāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:379_5: Bahunāpi kho tanti yaṃ dhammaṃ sā abhāsi,
atk-s0301a0:379_6: taṃ dhammaṃ bahunāpi pariyāyena ahaṃ vibhajeyyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:379_9: taṃsaṇṭhito tappaṭibhāgo bahūhi pariyāyehi vibhajitabbayuttakoti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:379_12: Yāvatā me manasā pariyattanti yattakaṃ mayā manasā pariyāpuṭaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:379_13: tassatthaṃ divasaṃ avatvā madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷentī viya muhutteneva saṃkhittena kathessāmi.
atk-s0301a0:383_1: Ādittavaggassa paṭhame jarāya maraṇena cāti desanāsīsametaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:383_2: rāgādīhi pana ekādasahi aggīhi loko ādittova.
atk-s0301a0:383_4: Dinnaṃ hoti sunīhatanti dānapuññacetanāhi dāyakasseva hoti gharasāmikassa viya nīhatabhaṇḍakaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:383_6: Corā harantīti adinne bhoge corāpi haranti rājānopi,
atk-s0301a0:383_10: Sarīraṃ sapariggahanti sarīrañceva corādīnaṃ vasena avinaṭṭhabhoge ca.
atk-s0301a0:383_11: Saggamupetīti vessantaramahārājādayo viya sagge nibbattatīti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:385_1: Dutiye annadoti yasmā atibalavāpi dve tīṇi bhattāni abhutvā uṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:385_2: bhutvā pana dubbalopi hutvā balasampanno hoti,
atk-s0301a0:385_4: Vatthadoti yasmā surūpopi duccoḷo vā acoḷo vā virūpo hoti ohīḷito duddasiko,
atk-s0301a0:390_6: Sukhado hotīti yānassa sukhāvahanato sukhado nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:390_7: Cakkhudoti andhakāre cakkhumantānampi rūpadassanābhāvato dīpado cakkhudo nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:391_0: Sabbadado hotīti sabbesaṃyeva balādīnaṃ dāyako hoti.
atk-s0301a0:391_1: Dve tayo gāme piṇḍāya caritvā kiñci aladdhā āgatassāpi sītalāya pokkharaṇiyā nhāyitvā patissayaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0301a0:391_2: muhuttaṃ mañce nipajjitvā uṭṭhāya nisinnassa hi kāye balaṃ āharitvā pakkhittaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0301a0:391_3: Bahi vicarantassa ca kāye vaṇṇāyatanaṃ vātātapehi jhāyati,
atk-s0301a0:391_4: patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya muhuttaṃ nipannassa ca visabhāgasantati vūpasammati,
atk-s0301a0:391_10: patissayaṃ pavisitvā dvāraṃ pidhāya nipannassa sabbete parissayā na honti,
atk-s0301a0:391_13: Tathā bahi vicarantassa ca sedā muccanti,
atk-s0301a0:391_15: senāsanaṃ pavisanakkhaṇe kūpe otiṇṇo viya hoti,
atk-s0301a0:391_17: Muhuttaṃ nisinnassa pana akkhipasādo āharitvā pakkhitto viya hoti,
atk-s0301a0:392_0: Amataṃdado ca so hotīti paṇītabhojanassa pattaṃ pūrento viya amaraṇadānaṃ nāma deti.
atk-s0301a0:398_4: Tasmāti yasmā idhaloke paraloke ca annadāyakameva anugacchati, tasmā.
atk-s0301a0:400_5: Sā ca rāgādīhi tīhi malehi timalā.
atk-s0301a0:400_11: Ajjhattikabāhiresu panesā dvādasāyatanesu āvaṭṭati parivaṭṭatīti dvādasāvaṭṭā.
atk-s0301a0:402_3: Nipuṇatthadassinti bhagavā saṇhasukhume khandhantarādayo atthe passatīti nipuṇatthadassī.
atk-s0301a0:402_4: Paññādadanti anvayapaññādhigamāya paṭipadaṃ kathanavasena paññāya dāyakaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:402_9: Mahesinti mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esitāraṃ pariyesitāranti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:404_1: Chaṭṭhe accharāgaṇasaṅghuṭṭhanti ayaṃ kira devaputto satthusāsane pabbajitvā vattapaṭipattiṃ pūrayamāno
atk-s0301a0:404_2: pañcavassakāle pavāretvā dvemātikaṃ paguṇaṃ katvā kammākammaṃ uggahetvā cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhitvā
atk-s0301a0:404_3: sallahukavuttiko araññaṃ pavisitvā yo bhagavatā majjhimayāmo sayanassa koṭṭhāsoti anuññāto.
atk-s0301a0:404_4: Tasmimpi sampatte “pamādassa bhāyāmī”ti mañcakaṃ ukkhipitvā rattiñca divā ca nirāhāro kammaṭṭhānameva manasākāsi.
atk-s0301a0:405_0: Athassa abbhantare satthakavātā uppajjitvā jīvitaṃ pariyādiyiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:405_2: Yo hi koci bhikkhu caṅkame caṅkamamāno vā ālambanatthambhaṃ nissāya ṭhito vā caṅkamakoṭiyaṃ cīvaraṃ sīse
atk-s0301a0:405_3: ṭhapetvā nisinno vā nipanno vā parisamajjhe alaṅkatadhammāsane dhammaṃ desento vā kālaṃ karoti,
atk-s0301a0:405_4: sabbo so dhurasmiṃ kālaṃ karoti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:405_5: Iti ayaṃ caṅkamane kālaṃ katvā upanissayamandatāya āsavakkhayaṃ appatto tāvatiṃsabhavane mahāvimānadvāre
atk-s0301a0:405_7: Tāvadevassa suvaṇṇatoraṇaṃ viya tigāvuto attabhāvo nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:406_4: pabbajitasaññīyeva accharā oloketvā vihāracārikaṃ āgataṃ mātugāmaṃ disvā lajjī.
atk-s0301a0:406_5: Paṃsukūliko viya upari ṭhitaṃ ghanadukūlaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karonto aṃsakūṭaṃ paṭicchādetvā indriyāni okkhipitvā adhomukho aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:406_6: Tassa kāyavikāreneva tā devatā “samaṇadevaputto aya”nti ñatvā evamāhaṃsu – “ayya,
atk-s0301a0:407_2: “na mayā imaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā samaṇadhammo kato,
atk-s0301a0:407_3: uttamatthaṃ arahattaṃ patthetvā kato”ti sampattiyā vippaṭisārī ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:407_4: “suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ paṭilabhissāmī”ti takkayitvā yuddhaṭṭhānaṃ otiṇṇamallo mūlakamuṭṭhiṃ labhitvā viya. So –
atk-s0301a0:407_6: buddhānaṃ pātubhāvo dullabho”ti cintetvā vimānaṃ apavisitvāva asambhinneneva sīlena accharāsaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0301a0:407_7: dasabalassa santikaṃ āgamma abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:408_1: Pisācagaṇasevitanti tameva accharāgaṇaṃ pisācagaṇaṃ katvā vadati.
atk-s0301a0:408_3: Ayañhi niyāmacittatāya attano garubhāvena devagaṇaṃ “devagaṇo”ti vattuṃ na roceti.
atk-s0301a0:408_6: Kathaṃ yātrā bhavissatīti kathaṃ niggamanaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0301a0:408_8: arahattassa me padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassanaṃ ācikkhatha bhagavāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:409_4: ajjāpissa caṅkamanasmiṃyeva attabhāvo asambhinnena sīlena āgato”ti cintesi.
atk-s0301a0:409_5: Buddhā ca akatābhinivesassa ādikammikassa akataparikammassa antevāsino cittakāro bhittiparikammaṃ viya –
atk-s0301a0:409_8: kammassakatapaññaṃ ujuṃ karohī”ti paṭhamaṃ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṃ ācikkhanti,
atk-s0301a0:409_9: kārakassa pana yuttapayuttassa arahattamaggapadaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ saṇhasukhumaṃ suññatāvipassanaṃyeva ācikkhanti,
atk-s0301a0:409_11: eko maggo assa anāgatoti suññatāvipassanaṃ ācikkhanto ujuko nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:410_0: Tattha ujukoti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvato aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo ujuko nāma.
atk-s0301a0:410_1: Abhayā nāma sā disāti nibbānaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a0:410_3: taṃ vā pattassa bhayaṃ natthīti “abhayā nāma sā disā”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:410_5: Yathā hi pākatikaratho akkhe vā anabbhañjite atirekesu vā manussesu abhiruḷhesu kūjati viravati,
atk-s0301a0:410_7: So hi ekappahārena caturāsītiyāpi pāṇasahassesu abhiruhantesu na kūjati na viravati.
atk-s0301a0:411_0: Hirīti ettha hiriggahaṇena ottappampi gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:411_1: Tassa apālamboti yathā bāhirakarathassa rathe ṭhitānaṃ yodhānaṃ apatanatthāya dārumayaṃ apālambanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:411_2: evaṃ imassa maggarathassa ajjhattabahiddhāsamuṭṭhānaṃ hirottappaṃ apālambanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:411_3: Satyassa parivāraṇanti rathassa sīhacammādiparivāro viya imassāpi maggarathassa sampayuttā sati parivāraṇaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:411_7: Yathā hi paṭhamataraṃ rājapurisehi kāṇakuṇiādīnaṃnīharaṇena magge sodhite pacchā rājā nikkhamati,
atk-s0301a0:411_8: evamevaṃ vipassanā sammādiṭṭhiyā aniccādivasena khandhādīsu sodhitesu pacchā bhūmiladdhavaṭṭaṃ parijānamānā maggasammādiṭṭhi uppajjati.
atk-s0301a0:412_0: Iti bhagavā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā avasāne cattāri saccāni dīpesi.
atk-s0301a0:412_2: Yathā hi rañño bhojanakāle attano mukhappamāṇe kabaḷe ukkhitte aṅke nisinno putto attano mukhappamāṇeneva tato kabaḷaṃ karoti,
atk-s0301a0:412_3: evamevaṃ bhagavati arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ desentepi sattā attano upanissayānurūpena sotāpattiphalādīni pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0301a0:412_4: Ayampi devaputto sotāpattiphalaṃ patvā bhagavantaṃ gandhādīhi pūjetvā pakkāmīti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:414_3: Bhagavā imaṃ pañhaṃ thāvaravatthunā dīpento ārāmaropātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:414_6: kārakā chāyūpage rukkhe ropetvā dadamānāpi vanaropāyeva nāma.
atk-s0301a0:415_0: Sadā puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatīti na akusalavitakkaṃ vā vitakkentassa niddāyantassa vā pavaḍḍhati.
atk-s0301a0:415_4: Dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannāti tasmiṃ dhamme ṭhitattā tenapi sīlena sampannattā dhammaṭṭhā sīlasampannā.
atk-s0301a0:415_5: Atha vā evarūpāni puññāni karontānaṃ dasa kusalā dhammā pūrenti,
atk-s0301a0:415_7: Teneva ca sīlena sampannattā sīlasampannāti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:417_1: Aṭṭhame idaṃ hi taṃ jetavananti anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto jetavanassa ceva buddhādīnañca vaṇṇabhaṇanatthaṃ āgato evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:418_0: Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa kathento kammaṃ vijjātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:418_4: Sīlaṃ jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttamanti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:418_8: Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ sīle ṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:418_9: Etena maccā sujjhantīti etena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggena sattā visujjhanti.
atk-s0301a0:419_2: Yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena samādhipakkhiyadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0301a0:419_3: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ ariyamagge visujjhati.
atk-s0301a0:419_4: Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ vicineyya.
atk-s0301a0:419_5: Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhati.
atk-s0301a0:420_7: na therena uttaritaro nāma atthīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:422_2: Ekacco hi attano vasanaṭṭhāne bhikkhuṃ hatthaṃ pasāretvāpi na vandati,
atk-s0301a0:422_3: aññattha gato vihāraṃ pavisitvā sakkaccaṃ vanditvā madhurapaṭisanthāraṃ karoti – “bhante,
atk-s0301a0:422_6: paṭibalā mayaṃ ayyānaṃ yāgubhattādīhi upaṭṭhānaṃ kātu”nti.
atk-s0301a0:422_8: Atheko thero tassa gāmaṃ gantvā piṇḍāya carati.
atk-s0301a0:422_9: So taṃ disvā aññena vā gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:422_17: yena samannāgato adāyakopi dāyako viya paññāyati.
atk-s0301a0:422_21: “kiṃ mayhaṃ pādā rujjantī”tiādīni vatvā silāthambho viya khāṇuko viya ca thaddho hutvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a0:423_3: Diṭṭhe dhammesa vipākoti tasmiṃ nibbattabhavane diṭṭhe dhamme esa vipāko.
atk-s0301a0:423_4: Samparāye ca duggatīti “yamalokaṃ upapajjare”ti vutte samparāye ca duggati.
atk-s0301a0:424_0: Vadaññūti bhikkhū gharadvāre ṭhitā kiñcāpi tuṇhīva honti,

atk-s0301a0:526_11: Yepi jhānāni labhitvā appamattā kilese jahanti,
atk-s0301a0:526_12: te suttajālaṃ bhinditvā macchā viya nibbānaṃ gamissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:528_5: Kāle te appamajjantāti kāle te appamādaṃ karontā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:530_1: Tatiye dīghalaṭṭhīti devaloke sabbe samappamāṇā tigāvutikāva honti,
atk-s0301a0:530_3: So puññāni katvā devaloke nibbattopi tatheva paññāyi. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:532_2: Anāvaṭanti tathāgatassa hi sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pesentassa rukkho vā pabbato vā āvarituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:532_4: Iti tathāgataṃ thometvā devaloke abhisaṅkhatapañhaṃ pucchanto kathaṃvidhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:532_5: Tattha dukkhamaticca iriyatīti dukkhaṃ atikkamitvā viharati.
atk-s0301a0:534_1: Pañcame appatiṭṭhe anālambeti heṭṭhā apatiṭṭhe upari anālambane.
atk-s0301a0:534_9: Evaṃ yassa dasa saṃyojanāni tayo ca kammābhisaṅkhārā pahīnā,
atk-s0301a0:534_14: nandīrāgena tayo kammābhisaṅkhārā gahitāti evaṃ yassa tīsu bhavesu tayo saṅkhārā natthi,
atk-s0301a0:534_15: so gambhīre na sīdatītipi dasseti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:537_1: Sattame subrahmāti so kira devaputto accharāsaṅghaparivuto nandanakīḷikaṃ gantvā pāricchattakamūle paññattāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:537_4: Nanu ca devatānaṃ cittavasena yojanasatikopi rukkho onamitvā hatthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0301a0:537_7: Abhiruyha pana madhurassarena gāyitvā gāyitvā pupphāni pātenti,
atk-s0301a0:537_9: Atha rukkhaṃ abhiruḷhā upacchedakakammavasena ekappahāreneva kālaṃ katvā avīcimhi nibbattā mahādukkhaṃ anubhavanti.
atk-s0301a0:538_0: Atha kāle gacchante devaputto “imāsaṃ neva saddo suyyati,
atk-s0301a0:538_3: Āvajjento niraye nibbattabhāvaṃ disvā piyavatthukasokena ruppamāno cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:538_6: “sattame divase mayāpi avasesāhi pañcasatāhi saddhiṃ kālaṃ katvā tattheva nibbattitabba”nti disvā balavatarena sokena ruppi. So –
atk-s0301a0:538_7: “imaṃ mayhaṃ sokaṃ sadevake loke aññatra tathāgatā niddhamituṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti cintetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā niccaṃ utrastanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:539_2: Niccanti ca padassa devaloke nibbattakālato paṭṭhāyāti attho na gahetabbo,
atk-s0301a0:539_4: Anuppannesu kicchesūti ito sattāhaccayena yāni dukkhāni uppajjissanti, tesu.
atk-s0301a0:539_5: Atho uppatitesu cāti yāni pañcasatānaṃ accharānaṃ niraye nibbattānaṃ diṭṭhāni,
atk-s0301a0:539_6: tesu cāti evaṃ imesu uppannānuppannesu dukkhesu niccaṃ mama utrastaṃ cittaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:539_7: abbhantare ḍayhamāno viya homi bhagavāti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:540_0: Nāññatra bojjhā tapasāti bojjhaṅgabhāvanañca tapoguṇañca aññatra muñcitvā sotthiṃ na passāmīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:540_5: Indiyasaṃvare hi gahite catupārisuddhisīlaṃ gahitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:540_6: Tasmiṃ patiṭṭhito bhikkhu nissayamuttako dhutaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ tapoguṇaṃ samādāya araññaṃ pavisitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:540_8: Tassa ariyamaggo yaṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:542_1: Aṭṭhame kakudho devaputtoti ayaṃ kira kolanagare mahāmoggallānattherassa upaṭṭhākaputto daharakāleyeva
atk-s0301a0:542_2: therassa santike vasanto jhānaṃ nibbattetvā kālaṅkato,
atk-s0301a0:542_6: Kiṃ laddhāti tuṭṭhi nāma kiñci manāpaṃ labhitvā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:542_8: Kiṃ jīyitthāti yassa hi kiñci manāpaṃ cīvarādivatthu jiṇṇaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:542_15: Aghanti evarūpassa hi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:542_18: sukhavipariṇāmena dukkhaṃ āgatamevāti nandījātassa aghaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:544_0: 101. Dasame ānandattherassa anumānabuddhiyā ānubhāvappakāsanatthaṃ aññataroti āha. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:551_7: so dānasaṅkhātassa deyyadhammassa dāso hutvā deti.
atk-s0301a0:551_11: Yo pana attanā yena tena yāpeti,
atk-s0301a0:551_13: so pati jeṭṭhako sāmi hutvā deti.
atk-s0301a0:552_0: Catūsu dvāresuti tassa kira rañño sindhavaraṭṭhaṃ sodhivākaraṭṭhanti dve raṭṭhāni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:552_2: Tassa ekekasmiṃ dvāre devasikaṃ satasahassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0301a0:552_4: So bahuhiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ rāsibhūtaṃ disvā kammassakatañāṇaṃ uppādetvā catūsu dvāresu dānasālāyo kāretvā
atk-s0301a0:552_5: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ dvāre uṭṭhitaāyena dānaṃ dethāti amacce ṭhapesi. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a0:553_5: Vanibbakāti ye “iṭṭhaṃ, dinnaṃ, kantaṃ, manāpaṃ, kālena,
atk-s0301a0:553_8: gacchatu bhavaṃ brahmaloka”ntiādinā nayena dānassa vaṇṇaṃ thomayamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0301a0:553_10: sarāvamattaṃ dethā”tiādīni ca vatvā yācamānā vicaranti.
atk-s0301a0:553_11: Itthāgārassa dānaṃ dīyitthāti paṭhamadvārassa laddhattā tattha uppajjanakasatasahasse aññampi dhanaṃ
atk-s0301a0:553_12: pakkhipitvā rañño amacce hāretvā attano amacce ṭhapetvā raññā dinnadānato rājitthiyo mahantataraṃ dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:553_14: Mama dānaṃ paṭikkamīti yaṃ mama dānaṃ tattha dīyittha,
atk-s0301a0:553_19: Ettakaṃ kira kālaṃ tassa rañño dānaṃ dīyittha. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:556_1: Pañcame kosalesu viharantīti bhagavato santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tattha gantvā viharanti.
atk-s0301a0:556_2: Uddhatāti akappiye kappiyasaññitāya ca kappiye akappiyasaññitāya ca anavajje sāvajjasaññitāya ca sāvajje anavajjasaññitāya ca uddhaccapakatikā hutvā.
atk-s0301a0:557_6: “ime bhikkhū satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nikkhantā,
atk-s0301a0:557_8: na kho panete pāṭiyekkaṃ nisinnaṭṭhāne codiyamānā kathaṃ gaṇhissanti,
atk-s0301a0:557_9: samāgamanakāle codissāmī”ti uposathadivase tesaṃ sannipatitabhāvaṃ ñatvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:557_10: Gāthāhi ajjhabhāsīti sabbesaṃ majjhe ṭhatvā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:558_0: Tattha yasmā guṇakathāya saddhiṃ nigguṇassa aguṇo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:558_1: tasmā guṇaṃ tāva kathento sukhajīvino pure āsuntiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:558_2: Tattha sukhajīvino pure āsunti pubbe bhikkhū supposā subharā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:558_3: uccanīcakulesu sapadānaṃ caritvā laddhena missakapiṇḍena yāpesunti adhippāyena evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:559_0: Evaṃ porāṇakabhikkhūnaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni tesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathento dupposantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:559_1: Tattha gāme gāmaṇikā viyāti yathā gāme gāmakuṭā nānappakārena janaṃ pīḷetvā khīradadhitaṇḍulādīni āharāpetvā bhuñjanti,
atk-s0301a0:559_2: evaṃ tumhepi anesanāya ṭhitā tumhākaṃ jīvikaṃ kappethāti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0301a0:559_3: Nipajjantīti uddesaparipucchāmanasikārehi anatthikā hutvā sayanamhi hatthapāde vissajjetvā nipajjanti.
atk-s0301a0:560_4: Yathā hi susāne chaḍḍitā nānāsakuṇādīhi khajjanti,
atk-s0301a0:560_8: evamevaṃ evarūpāpi ācariyupajjhāyādīnaṃ santikā ovādānusāsaniṃ na labhantīti apaviddhā anāthā,
atk-s0301a0:562_2: Na cavati na upapajjatīti idaṃ aparāparaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:562_4: Nāhaṃ taṃ lokassa antanti satthā saṅkhāralokassa antaṃ sandhāya vadati.
atk-s0301a0:563_2: So pana attano pañhena saddhiṃ satthu byākaraṇaṃ sametīti saññāya pasaṃsanto acchariyantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:564_3: Susikkhitoti dasa dvādasa vassāni dhanusippaṃ sikkhito.
atk-s0301a0:564_4: Katahatthoti usabhappamāṇepi vālaggaṃ vijjhituṃ samatthabhāvena katahattho.
atk-s0301a0:564_9: tāvatā kālena ekacakkavāḷaṃ atikkamāmīti attano javasampattiṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:565_0: Puratthimā samuddā pacchimoti yathā puratthimasamuddā pacchimasamuddo dūre,
atk-s0301a0:565_1: evaṃ me dūre padavītihāro ahosīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:565_2: So kira pācīnacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ ṭhito pādaṃ pasāretvā pacchimacakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ akkamati,
atk-s0301a0:565_3: puna dutiyaṃ pādaṃ pasāretvā paracakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ akkamati.
atk-s0301a0:565_6: Bhikkhācārakāle kiresa nāgalatādantakaṭṭhaṃ khāditvā anotatte mukhaṃ dhovitvā kāle sampatte uttarakurumhi
atk-s0301a0:565_7: piṇḍāya caritvā cakkavāḷamukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisinno bhattakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0301a0:565_10: ayaṃ pana vassasatāvasiṭṭhe āyumhi gamanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0301a0:565_12: Antarāva kālaṅkatoti cakkavāḷalokassa antaṃ appatvā antarāva mato.
atk-s0301a0:565_13: So pana tattha kālaṃ katvāpi āgantvā imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:565_24: imasmiṃ pana cātumahābhūtike kāyasmiṃ yeva paññapemī”ti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:568_2: sāriputto ruccatīti satthā therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo,
atk-s0301a0:568_3: vaṇṇo ca nāmesa visabhāgapuggalassa santike kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0301a0:568_4: Tassa santike kathito hi matthakaṃ na pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0301a0:568_5: So hi “asuko nāma bhikkhu sīlavā”ti vutte.
atk-s0301a0:568_8: Kiṃ tayā añño sīlavā na diṭṭhapubbo”ti vā?
atk-s0301a0:568_11: Kiṃ tayā añño paññavā na diṭṭhapubbo”ti? Vā,
atk-s0301a0:568_15: attano upaṭṭhākadārake pabbājetvā therassa santike upajjhaṃ gaṇhāpeti,
atk-s0301a0:568_21: “amhākaṃ jeṭṭhabhātiko ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ satasahassañca kappe pāramiyo pūretvā soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ paṭivijjhitvā
atk-s0301a0:568_22: dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhito”ti therassa guṇesu pasīditvāva theraṃ mamāyati.
atk-s0301a0:568_24: “sammāsambuddhassa mayā kattabbaṃ mukhodakadānādikiccaṃ sabbaṃ ānando karoti.
atk-s0301a0:568_25: Ānandaṃ nissāya ahaṃ icchiticchitaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjituṃ labhāmī”ti āyasmato ānandassa guṇesu pasīditvāva taṃ mamāyati.
atk-s0301a0:568_26: Tasmā bhagavā sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetukāmo ānandattherassa santike kathetuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0301a0:569_2: sāriputtassa ācāro gocaro vihāro abhikkamo paṭikkamo ālokitavilokitaṃ samiñjitapasāraṇaṃ mayhaṃ ruccati,
atk-s0301a0:570_0: Tato thero sāṭakantare laddhokāso balavamallo viya tuṭṭhamānaso hutvā –
atk-s0301a0:570_3: dīpadhajabhūtaṃ mahājambuṃ vidhunanto viya valāhakantarato candaṃ nīharitvā dassento viya sāriputtattherassa
atk-s0301a0:570_4: vaṇṇaṃ kathetu”nti cintetvā paṭhamataraṃ tāva catūhi padehi puggalapalāpe haranto kassa hi nāma, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:570_9: vipallatthacitto ummattako cittavipallāsena vaṇṇaṃ “vaṇṇo”ti vā avaṇṇaṃ “avaṇṇe”ti vā,
atk-s0301a0:570_14: Na rucceyyāti bālādīnaṃyeva hi so na rucceyya,
atk-s0301a0:571_0: Evaṃ puggalapalāpe haritvā idāni soḷasahi padehi yathābhūtaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathento paṇḍito,
atk-s0301a0:571_6: bhikkhu dhātukusalo ca hoti āyatanakusalo ca paṭiccasamuppādakusalo ca ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalo ca,
atk-s0301a0:572_0: Sā pana therassa devorohanaṃ katvā saṅkassanagaradvāre ṭhitena satthārā puthujjanapañcake pañhe pucchite taṃ vissajjentassa pākaṭā jātā.
atk-s0301a0:573_23: puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
atk-s0301a0:574_1: Idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ paripūreti,
atk-s0301a0:574_22: hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikarotīti hāsapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:575_0: Thero ca sarado nāma tāpaso hutvā anomadassissa bhagavato pādamūle aggasāvakapatthanaṃ paṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0301a0:575_1: Taṃkālato paṭṭhāya hāsabahulo sīlaparipūraṇādīni akāsīti hāsapañño.
atk-s0301a0:576_3: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:576_17: anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Vedanā… saññā… saṅkhārā… viññāṇaṃ…
atk-s0301a0:576_20: vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:576_23: jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti
atk-s0301a0:576_24: tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:577_6: uppannaṃ rāgaṃ… dosaṃ… mohaṃ… kodhaṃ… upanāhaṃ… makkhaṃ… paḷāsaṃ… issaṃ…
atk-s0301a0:577_19: cha ca abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā phassitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:578_0: Thero ca bhāgineyyassa dīghanakhaparibbājakassa vedanāpariggahasutte desiyamāne ṭhitakova sabbakilese
atk-s0301a0:578_1: chinditvā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ paṭividdhakālato paṭṭhāya tikkhapañño nāma jāto. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a0:579_1: Idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu,
atk-s0301a0:579_2: anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā.
atk-s0301a0:580_3: Santuṭṭhoti catūsu paccayesu yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantosoti,
atk-s0301a0:580_9: Asaṃsaṭṭhoti dassanasaṃsaggo savanasaṃsaggo samullapanasaṃsaggo paribhogasaṃsaggo kāyasaṃsaggoti,
atk-s0301a0:580_11: Ayañca pañcavidho saṃsaggo rājūhi rājamahāmattehi titthiyehi titthiyasāvakehi upāsakehi upasikāhi bhikkhūhi
atk-s0301a0:581_1: Tattha āraddhavīriyo bhikkhu gamane uppannakilesassa ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:581_3: nisajjāya uppannassa seyyaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:581_4: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ iriyāpathe uppannaṃ tattha tattheva niggaṇhāti.
atk-s0301a0:581_5: Thero pana catucattālīsa vassāni mañce piṭṭhiṃ na pasāreti.
atk-s0301a0:581_10: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ yeva ṭhāne ovadati anusāsatīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:582_8: Thero kiñci avatvāva ekamantaṃ gantvā parimaṇḍalaṃ nivāsetvā āgamma “ettakaṃ vaṭṭati ācariyā”ti añjaliṃ paggayha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:586_0: Codakoti vatthusmiṃ otiṇṇe vā anotiṇṇe vā vītikkamaṃ disvā – “āvuso,
atk-s0301a0:587_0: Pāpagarahīti pāpapuggale na passe, na tesaṃ vacanaṃ suṇe, tehi saddhiṃ ekacakkavāḷepi na vaseyyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:590_2: uppanno rāgo doso moho pahātabbo”ti evaṃ pāpadhammepi garahatīti dvīhi kāraṇehi “pāpagarahī, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:591_0: Evaṃ āyasmatā ānandena soḷasahi padehi therassa yathābhūtavaṇṇappakāsane kate –
atk-s0301a0:591_1: “kiṃ ānando attano piyasahāyassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ na labhati,
atk-s0301a0:591_2: kathetu kiṃ pana tena kathitaṃ tatheva hoti,
atk-s0301a0:591_4: Koci pāpapuggalo vattuṃ mā labhatūti satthā taṃ vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ akuppaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto jinamuddikāya lañchanto evametantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:592_0: Evaṃ tathāgatena ca ānandattherena ca mahātherassa vaṇṇe kathiyamāne bhumaṭṭhakā devatā uṭṭhahitvā eteheva soḷasahi padehi vaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:592_1: Tato ākāsaṭṭhakadevatā sītavalāhakā uṇhavalāhakā cātumahārājikāti yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā devatā uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0301a0:592_3: Etenupāyena ekacakkavāḷaṃ ādiṃ katvā dasasu cakkavāḷasahassesu devatā uṭṭhahitvā kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:592_4: Athāyasmato sāriputtassa saddhivihāriko susīmo devaputto cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:592_5: “imā devatā attano attano nakkhattakīḷaṃ pahāya tattha tattha gantvā mayhaṃ upajjhāyasseva vaṇṇaṃ kathenti,
atk-s0301a0:592_9: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho susīmotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:593_0: Uccāvacāti aññesu ṭhānesu paṇītaṃ uccaṃ vuccati,
atk-s0301a0:593_8: Teneva seyyathāpi nāmāti catasso upamā āgatā.
atk-s0301a0:593_13: Evamevanti rattakambale nikkhittamaṇi viya sabbā ekappahāreneva virocituṃ āraddhā.
atk-s0301a0:593_17: mahājambuphalarase vā pathaviyaṃ paviṭṭhe suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0301a0:594_9: sāriputtamoggallāne”tiādinā nayena therassa vaṇṇaṃ āharīti thero ābhatavaṇṇo nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:594_13: divasasaṅkhepaṃ vetanaṃ gahetvā ṭhitapuriso viya kālaṃ pana pattheti,
atk-s0301a0:596_0: Kālañca paṭikaṅkhāmi, nibbisaṃ bhatako yathā”ti. ; Navamaṃ;
atk-s0301a0:598_1: Dasame nānātitthiyasāvakāti te kira kammavādino ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:598_2: tasmā dānādīni puññāni katvā sagge nibbattā,
atk-s0301a0:598_3: te “attano attano satthari pasādena nibbattamhā”ti saññino hutvā “gacchāma dasabalassa santike ṭhatvā
atk-s0301a0:598_4: amhākaṃ satthārānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathessāmā”ti āgantvā paccekagāthāhi kathayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:598_5: Tattha chinditamāriteti chindite ca mārite ca.
atk-s0301a0:598_7: Puññaṃ vā panāti attano puññampi na samanupassati,
atk-s0301a0:598_10: “evaṃ katapāpānampi katapuññānampi vipāko natthī”ti vadanto sattānaṃ vissāsaṃ avassayaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ ācikkhati,
atk-s0301a0:598_11: tasmā mānanaṃ vandanaṃ pūjanaṃ arahatīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:599_5: Cātuyāmo nāma sabbavārivārito ca hoti sabbavāriyutto ca sabbavāridhuto ca sabbavāriphuṭo cāti ime cattāro koṭṭhāsā.
atk-s0301a0:599_13: Diṭṭhaṃ sutañca ācikkhanti diṭṭhaṃ “diṭṭhaṃ me”ti sutaṃ “sutaṃ me”ti ācikkhanto,
atk-s0301a0:599_15: Na hi nūna kibbisīti evarūpo satthā kibbisakārako nāma na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:600_6: Na hi nūna teti sappurisehi na dūre,
atk-s0301a0:600_8: Paccabhāsīti “ayaṃ ākoṭako imesaṃ nagganissirikānaṃ dasabalassa santike ṭhatvā vaṇṇaṃ kathetīti tesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathessāmī”ti patiabhāsīti.
atk-s0301a0:601_4: Na sataṃ sarikkhoti paṇḍitānaṃ sappurisānaṃ sadiso na hoti,
atk-s0301a0:601_5: kiṃ tvaṃ kālasigālasadise titthiye sīhe karosīti?
atk-s0301a0:602_1: teneva naṃ mukhena vaṇṇaṃ kathāpessāmī”ti cintetvā tassa sarīre anuāvisi adhimucci,
atk-s0301a0:602_5: Te kira “nhāpitapavivekaṃ pālessāmā”ti sayaṃ kese luñcanti.
atk-s0301a0:602_7: “Piṇḍapātapavivekaṃ pālessāmā”ti sunakhā viya bhūmiyaṃ vā bhuñjanti hatthesu vā.
atk-s0301a0:602_12: te ve maccā paralokatthāya sammā anusāsantīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:603_0: Iti viditvāti “ayaṃ paṭhamaṃ etesaṃ avaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni vaṇṇaṃ katheti,
atk-s0301a0:603_1: ko nu kho eso”ti āvajjento jānitvāva.
atk-s0301a0:603_2: Ye cantalikkhasmiṃ pabhāsavaṇṇāti ye antalikkhe candobhāsasūriyobhāsasañjhārāgaindadhanutārakarūpānaṃ pabhāsavaṇṇā.
atk-s0301a0:603_3: Sabbeva te teti sabbeva te tayā.
atk-s0301a0:603_5: Āmisaṃva macchānaṃ vadhāya khittāti yathā macchānaṃ vadhatthāya baḷisalaggaṃ āmisaṃ khipati,
atk-s0301a0:603_6: evaṃ tayā pasaṃsamānena ete rūpā sattānaṃ vadhāya khittāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:604_11: evaṃ sadevakassa lokassa buddho seṭṭhoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:610_1: Kosalasaṃyuttassa paṭhame bhagavatā saddhiṃ sammodīti yathā khamanīyādīni pucchanto bhagavā tena,
atk-s0301a0:610_2: evaṃ sopi bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:610_3: Sītodakaṃ viya uṇhodakena sammoditaṃ ekībhāvaṃ agamāsi. Yāya ca – “kacci,
atk-s0301a0:610_7: kacci bhoto ca gotamassa sāvakānañca appābādhaṃ appātaṅkaṃ lahuṭṭhānaṃ balaṃ phāsuvihāro”tiādikāya kathāya sammodi,
atk-s0301a0:610_8: taṃ pītipāmojjasaṅkhātasammodajananato sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato ca sammodanīyaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:610_9: atthabyañjanamadhuratāya cirampi kālaṃ sāretuṃ nirantaraṃ pavattetuṃ araharūpato saritabbabhāvato ca sāraṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:610_13: atthaparisuddhatāya sāraṇīyanti evaṃ anekehi pariyāyehi sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ sāraṇīyaṃ vītisāretvā pariyosāpetvā
atk-s0301a0:610_14: niṭṭhapetvā ito pubbe tathāgatassa adiṭṭhattā guṇāguṇavasena gambhīrabhāvaṃ vā uttānabhāvaṃ vā ajānanto
atk-s0301a0:610_16: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho yaṃ ovaṭṭikasāraṃ katvā āgato lokanissaraṇabhavokkantipañhaṃ satthu sammāsambuddhataṃ pucchituṃ bhavampi notiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:611_5: Idaṃ pana rājā na attano laddhiyā,
atk-s0301a0:611_7: Atha bhagavā buddhasīhanādaṃ nadanto yaṃ hi taṃ mahārājātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:611_8: Tattha ahaṃ hi mahārājāti anuttaraṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sammāsambodhiṃ ahaṃ abhisambuddhoti attho.
atk-s0301a0:611_11: Saṅghinotiādīsu pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto saṅgho etesaṃ atthīti saṅghino.
atk-s0301a0:611_15: “Appicchā santuṭṭhā appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsentī”ti evaṃ samuggato yaso etesaṃ atthīti yasassino.
atk-s0301a0:611_22: So pana gosālāya jātattā gosāloti vutto.
atk-s0301a0:612_0: Tepi mayāti kappakolāhalaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ cakkavattikolāhalanti tīṇi kolāhalāni.
atk-s0301a0:612_1: Tattha “vassasatasahassamatthake kappuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti kappakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti –
atk-s0301a0:612_4: karuṇaṃ muditaṃ upekkha”nti manussappathe devatā ghosentiyo vicaranti.
atk-s0301a0:612_5: “Vassasahassamatthake pana buddho uppajjissatī”ti buddhakolāhalaṃ nāma hoti –
atk-s0301a0:612_6: “ito vassasahassamatthake buddho uppajjitvā dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannena saṅgharatanena parivārito
atk-s0301a0:612_8: “Vassasatamatthake pana cakkavattī uppajjissatī”ti cakkavattikolāhalaṃ nāma hoti –
atk-s0301a0:612_9: “ito vassasatamatthake sattaratanasampanno catuddīpissaro sahassa puttaparivāro vehāsaṅgamo cakkavattirājā uppajjissatī”ti devatā ugghosenti.
atk-s0301a0:613_0: Imesu tīsu kolāhalesu ime cha satthāro buddhakolāhalaṃ sutvā ācariye payirupāsitvā cintāmāṇivijjādīni uggaṇhitvā –
atk-s0301a0:613_1: “mayaṃ buddhamhā”ti paṭiññaṃ katvā mahājanaparivutā janapadaṃ vicarantā anupubbena sāvatthiyaṃ pattā.
atk-s0301a0:613_5: ajito kesakambalo buddho kira sabbaññū kirā”ti ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:613_9: Rañño gehe bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathā”ti vuttā gantuṃ na ussahanti,
atk-s0301a0:613_10: punappunaṃ vuccamānā upaṭṭhākānaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthāya adhivāsetvā sabbe ekatova agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:613_13: te mahārahesu āsanesu nisīdituṃ asakkontā phalakesu ceva bhūmiyaṃ ca nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:614_0: Rājā “ettakeneva natthi tesaṃ anto sukkadhammo”ti vatvā āhāraṃ adatvāva tālato patitaṃ muggarena pothento viya “tumhe buddhā,
atk-s0301a0:614_4: rājā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ pucchitvā kathetuṃ asakkonte ‘tumhe mayaṃ buddhāti mahājanaṃ vañcetvā āhiṇḍathā’ti jivhampi chindāpeyya,
atk-s0301a0:614_5: aññampi anatthaṃ kareyyā”ti sakapaṭiññāya eva ‘na mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:614_8: “kiṃ ācariyā rājā tumhe pañhaṃ pucchitvā sakkārasammānaṃ akāsī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:614_11: “sace ayaṃ rājā buddhavisaye pañhaṃ kathiyamānaṃ ajānanto amhesu manaṃ padosessati,
atk-s0301a0:614_12: bahuṃ apuññaṃ pasavissatī”ti rañño anukampāya ‘na mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadimhā,
atk-s0301a0:614_19: Tattha kiṃ pana bhavaṃ gotamo daharo ceva jātiyā,
atk-s0301a0:614_20: navo ca pabbajjāyāti idaṃ attano paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vadati.
atk-s0301a0:614_22: Ete jātimahallakā ca cirapabbajitā ca “buddhamhā”ti na paṭijānanti,
atk-s0301a0:614_23: bhavaṃ gotamo jātiyā ca daharo pabbajjāya ca navo kiṃ paṭijānāti?
atk-s0301a0:615_6: Bhikkhūti imasmiṃ pana pade desanākusalatāya attānaṃ abbhantaraṃ katvā sīlavantaṃ pabbajitaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:615_12: heṭṭhā katvā maññanavasena aññampi evarūpaṃ anācāraṃ karonto khattiyaṃ avajānāti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_15: kiṃ nāma yaṃkiñci corūpaddavaṃ vūpasametuṃ yattha katthaci ṭhāne rajjaṃ anusāsituṃ sakkhissatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_16: Añjanisalākamattampi āsīvisapotakaṃ kaṇṇādīsu piḷandhanto aṅgulimpi jivhampi ḍaṃsāpento uragaṃ avajānāti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_17: “Bhaddako vatāyaṃ āsīviso udakadeḍḍubho viya kiṃ nāma kiñcideva ḍaṃsituṃ kassacideva kāye visaṃ pharituṃ sakkhissatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_18: Khajjopanakamattampi aggiṃ gahetvā hatthena kīḷanto bhaṇḍukkhalikāya khipanto cūḷāya vā sayanapiṭṭhasāṭakapasibbakādīsu
atk-s0301a0:615_20: “Bhaddako vatāyaṃ aggi kataraṃ nu kho yāgubhattaṃ pacissati,
atk-s0301a0:615_22: kassa sītaṃ vinodessatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_23: Daharasāmaṇerampi pana disvā ukkamitvā maggaṃ adentoti rājakumāre vuttaṃ anācāraṃ karonto bhikkhuṃ avajānāti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_24: “Bhaddako vatāyaṃ sāmaṇero mahākaṇṭho mahodaro yaṃkiñci buddhavacanaṃ uggahetuṃ yaṃkiñci araññaṃ ajjhogāhetvā vasituṃ sakkhissati,
atk-s0301a0:615_25: saṅghattherakāle manāpo bhavissatī”tiādīni vadanto paribhoti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:615_26: Taṃ sabbampi na kātabbanti dassento na uññātabbo na paribhotabboti āha.
atk-s0301a0:616_1: Gāthā ca nāmetā tadatthadīpanāpi honti visesatthadīpanāpi,
atk-s0301a0:617_5: Tasmiṃ pakkamate bhusanti tasmiṃ puggale balavaupakkamaṃ upakkamati.
atk-s0301a0:617_6: Rakkhaṃ jīvitamattanoti attano jīvitaṃ rakkhamāno taṃ khattiyaṃ parivajjeyya na ghaṭṭeyya.
atk-s0301a0:618_2: Yena yena hi vaṇṇena caranto gocaraṃ labhati,
atk-s0301a0:618_9: taṃ bālaṃ naraṃ vā nāriṃ vā ḍaṃseyya.
atk-s0301a0:620_2: Jāyanti tattha pārohāti tattha agginā daḍḍhavane pārohā jāyanti.
atk-s0301a0:620_4: Te hi agginā daḍḍhaṭṭhāne mūlamattepi avasiṭṭhe pādato rohanti jāyanti vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0301a0:621_0: Bhikkhu ḍahati tejasāti ettha akkosantaṃ paccakkosanto bhaṇḍantaṃ paṭibhaṇḍanto paharantaṃ paṭipaharanto
atk-s0301a0:621_1: bhikkhu nāma kiñci bhikkhutejasā ḍahituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:621_7: Na tassa puttā pasavoti tassa puttadhītaropi gomahiṃsakukkuṭasūkarādayo pasavopi na bhavanti,
atk-s0301a0:621_9: Dāyādā vindare dhananti tassa dāyādāpi dhanaṃ na vindanti.
atk-s0301a0:621_10: Tālāvatthū bhavanti teti te bhikkhutejasā daḍḍhā vatthumattāvasiṭṭho matthakacchinnatālo viya bhavanti,
atk-s0301a0:622_0: Tasmāti yasmā samaṇatejena daḍḍhā matthakacchinnatālo viya aviruḷhidhammā bhavanti, tasmā.
atk-s0301a0:622_4: uragaṃ nissāya tassa kīḷāpanena laddhabbaṃ vatthahiraññasuvaṇṇādiānisaṃsaṃ aggiṃ nissāya tassānubhāvena
atk-s0301a0:622_6: bhikkhuṃ nissāya tassa vasena pattabbaṃ asutasavanasutapariyodapana-
atk-s0301a0:622_7: saggamaggādhigamādiānisaṃsaṃ sampassamānena “ete nissāya pubbe vuttappakāro ādīnavo atthi.
atk-s0301a0:622_10: Issariyatthikena pana vuttappakāraṃ avajānanañca paribhavanañca akatvā pubbuṭṭhāyipacchānipātitādīhi upāyehi khattiyakumāro tosetabbo,
atk-s0301a0:622_12: Ahituṇḍikena urage vissāsaṃ akatvā nāgavijjaṃ parivattetvā ajapadena daṇḍena gīvāya gahetvā visaharena
atk-s0301a0:622_13: mūlena dāṭhā dhovitvā peḷāyaṃ pakkhipitvā kīḷāpentena caritabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:622_15: Yāgupacanādīni kattukāmena aggiṃ vissāsena bhaṇḍukkhalikādīsu apakkhipitvā hatthehi anāmasantena gomayacuṇṇādīhi jāletvā yāgupacanādīni kattabbāni,
atk-s0301a0:622_17: Asutasavanādīni patthayantenapi bhikkhuṃ ativissāsena vejjakammanavakammādīsu ayojetvā catūhi paccayehi sakkaccaṃ upaṭṭhātabbo,
atk-s0301a0:622_18: evaṃ taṃ nissāya asutapubbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ asutapubbaṃ pañhāvinicchayaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ
atk-s0301a0:622_19: tisso kulasampattiyo cha kāmasaggāni nava ca brahmaloke patvā amatamahānibbānadassanampi labhissatīti
atk-s0301a0:623_0: Etadavocāti dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pasanno pasādaṃ āvikaronto etaṃ “abhikkanta”ntiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:623_3: Ettha ekena abhikkantasaddena desanaṃ thometi “abhikkantaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:623_6: yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ āgamma mama pasādo”ti.
atk-s0301a0:624_0: Tato paraṃ catūhi upamāhi desanaṃyeva thometi.
atk-s0301a0:624_7: Maggaṃ ācikkheyyāti hatthe gahetvā “esa maggo”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0301a0:624_8: Andhakāreti kāḷapakkhacātuddasī aḍḍharattaghanavanasaṇḍa meghapaṭalehi caturaṅge tame.
atk-s0301a0:624_11: evaṃ saddhammavimukhaṃ asaddhamme patitaṃ maṃ asaddhammā vuṭṭhāpentena,
atk-s0301a0:624_13: evaṃ kassapassa bhagavato sāsanantaradhānā pabhuti micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ vivarantena,
atk-s0301a0:624_17: evaṃ mohandhakāre nimuggassa me buddhādiratanarūpāni apassato tappaṭicchādakamohandhakāraviddhaṃsakadesanāpajjotaṃ
atk-s0301a0:624_18: dhārentena mayhaṃ bhagavatā etehi pariyāyehi pakāsitattā anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsitoti.
atk-s0301a0:625_0: Evaṃ desanaṃ thometvā imāya desanāya ratanattaye pasannacitto pasannākāraṃ karonto esāhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:625_2: Bhagavantaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti bhagavantañca dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañcāti imaṃ ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.
atk-s0301a0:625_4: bhagavā dhāretūti maṃ bhagavā ‘upāsako aya’nti evaṃ dhāretu,
atk-s0301a0:625_10: Pāṇupetanti pāṇehi upetaṃ yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattati,
atk-s0301a0:625_11: tāva upetaṃ anaññasatthukaṃ tīhi saraṇagamanehi saraṇaṃ gataṃ upāsakaṃ kappiyakārakaṃ maṃ bhagavā dhāretūti ayamettha saṅkhepo,
atk-s0301a0:625_12: vitthāro pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sāmaññaphalasutte sabbākārena vuttoti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:627_1: Dutiye abhivādetvāti purimasutte saraṇagatattā idha abhivādesi.
atk-s0301a0:627_9: Tacasāraṃva samphalanti yathā tacasāraṃ veḷuṃ vā naḷaṃ vā attano phalaṃ hiṃsati vināseti,
atk-s0301a0:629_1: Tatiye aññatra jarāmaraṇāti jarāmaraṇato mutto nāma atthīti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:629_3: Yesaṃ hi khattiyānaṃ heṭṭhimantena koṭisataṃ nidhānagataṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:629_4: tayo kahāpaṇakumbhā valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapitā honti,
atk-s0301a0:629_7: diyaḍḍho kahāpaṇakumbho valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-s0301a0:629_10: kahāpaṇakumbho valañjanatthāya gehamajjhe rāsiṃ katvā ṭhapito hoti,
atk-s0301a0:630_7: Tesampi jātānaṃ natthi aññatra jarāmaraṇāti tesampi evaṃ issarānaṃ jātānaṃ nibbattānaṃ natthi aññatra jarāmaraṇā,
atk-s0301a0:631_3: Catūhi maggehi karaṇīyaṃ etesaṃ katanti katakaraṇīyā.
atk-s0301a0:631_6: Anuppatto arahattasaṅkhāto sako attho etesanti anuppattasadatthā.
atk-s0301a0:631_9: Maggapaññāya catusaccadhammaṃ ñatvā phalavimuttiyā vimuttāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:631_18: Tattha bhagavā citrāni rathayānādīni disvā diṭṭhameva upamaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:632_3: Atho sarīrampi jaraṃ upetīti evarūpesu anupādiṇṇakesu sāradārumayesu rathesu jīrantesu imasmiṃ ajjhattike
atk-s0301a0:632_6: Santo have sabbhi pavedayantīti santo sabbhīhi saddhiṃ sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetīti evaṃ pavedayanti.
atk-s0301a0:632_10: Yasmā vā nibbānaṃ āgamma sīdanasabhāvā kilesā bhijjanti,
atk-s0301a0:632_12: Iti purimapadassa kāraṇaṃ dassento “santo have sabbhi pavedayantī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:632_16: Ajaraṃ nibbānaṃ sataṃ dhammoti ācikkhantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:632_18: Yaṃ sabbhidhammabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ santo pavedayanti kathayanti,
atk-s0301a0:632_19: so sataṃ dhammo na jaraṃ upetītipi attho. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:634_3: mahārājāti idha bhagavā imaṃ suttaṃ sabbaññubhāsitaṃ karonto āha.
atk-s0301a0:636_4: Sādhu sabbattha saṃvaroti iminā kammapathabhedaṃ apattassa kammassa saṃvaraṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:636_6: Lajjīgahaṇena cettha ottappampi gahitameva hoti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:638_1: Chaṭṭhe uḷāre uḷāreti paṇīte ca bahuke ca.
atk-s0301a0:640_7: Tattha paṭhamataraṃ lañjaṃ gahetvā nisinnā amaccā assāmikepi sāmike kariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:640_11: Paññāyissati dāni viṭaṭūbho senāpati sakena rajjena,
atk-s0301a0:640_12: kiṃ mayhaṃ evarūpehi lañjakhādakehi musāvādīhi saddhiṃ ekaṭṭhāne nisajjāyā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0301a0:640_15: Yathā macchā oḍḍitaṃ kuminaṃ pavisantā na jānanti,
atk-s0301a0:640_16: evaṃ sattā kilesakāmena vatthukāmaṃ vītikkamantā na jānantīti attho. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:642_1: Aṭṭhame atthi nu kho te malliketi kasmā pucchati?
atk-s0301a0:642_3: ekadivasaṃ āpaṇato pūvaṃ gahetvā “mālārāmaṃ gantvāva khādissāmī”ti gacchantī paṭipathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivāraṃ
atk-s0301a0:642_4: bhagavantaṃ bhikkhācāraṃ pavisantaṃ disvā pasannacittā taṃ bhagavato adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:642_7: Bhagavā tattha nisīditvā taṃ pūvaṃ paribhuñjitvā mukhaṃ vikkhāletvā sitaṃ pātvākāsi.
atk-s0301a0:642_12: Taṃdivasameva ca rājā kāsigāme bhāgineyyena yuddhena parājito palāyitvā nagaraṃ āgacchanto mālārāmaṃ pavisitvā balakāyassa āgamanaṃ āgamesi.
atk-s0301a0:642_14: So tāya vatte pasīditvā taṃ antepūraṃ atihārāpetvā taṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapesi.
atk-s0301a0:643_1: “mayā imissā duggatakulassa dhītuyā mahantaṃ issariyaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:643_6: Iti so aññamaññaṃ vissāsajananatthaṃ sammodanīyaṃ kathaṃ kathento pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:643_7: Sā pana devī paṇḍitā buddhupaṭṭhāyikā dhammupaṭṭhāyikā saṅghupaṭṭhāyikā mahāpaññā,
atk-s0301a0:643_11: Rājā tāya sarasena kathitattā nivattituṃ alabhanto sayampi saraseneva kathetvā “sakāraṇaṃ idaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:643_12: tathāgatassa naṃ ārocessāmī”ti gantvā bhagavato ārocesi.
atk-s0301a0:643_14: Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresanti yathā ekassa attā piyo,
atk-s0301a0:643_15: evaṃ paresaṃ puthusattānampi attā piyoti attho. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:645_3: Parikammāni karontīti ettāvatā tehi bhikkhūhi rañño āraddhayañño tathāgatassa ārocito.
atk-s0301a0:645_4: Kasmā pana raññā ayaṃ yañño āraddho?
atk-s0301a0:645_6: Ekadivasaṃ kira rājā sabbālaṅkārappaṭimaṇḍito hatthikkhandhavaragato nagaraṃ anusañcaranto vātapānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:645_7: vivaritvā olokayamānaṃ ekaṃ itthiṃ disvā tassā paṭibaddhacitto tatova paṭinivattitvā antepuraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0301a0:645_8: ekassa purisassa tamatthaṃ ārocetvā “gaccha tassā sassāmikabhāvaṃ vā assāmikabhāvaṃ vā jānāhī”ti pesesi.
atk-s0301a0:645_10: Sā “eso me sāmiko āpaṇe nisinno”ti dassesi.
atk-s0301a0:645_12: Rājā taṃ purisaṃ pakkosāpetvā “maṃ upaṭṭhahā”ti āha. “Nāhaṃ, deva,
atk-s0301a0:645_13: upaṭṭhahituṃ jānāmī”ti ca vutte “upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma na ācariyassa santike uggahetabba”nti balakkārena āvudhaphalakaṃ gāhāpetvā upaṭṭhākaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:645_14: Upaṭṭhahitvā gehaṃ gatamattameva ca naṃ puna pakkosāpetvā “upaṭṭhākena nāma rañño vacanaṃ kattabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:645_15: gaccha ito yojanamatte amhākaṃ sīsadhovanapokkharaṇī atthi,
atk-s0301a0:646_1: “ajja sāyanheyeva dvāraṃ pidahitvā ‘ahaṃ rājadūto’ti vā ‘uparājadūto’ti vā bhaṇantānampi mā vivarī”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:646_2: So puriso mattikañca uppalāni ca gahetvā dvāre pihitamatte āgantvā bahuṃ vadantopi dvāraṃ alabhitvā parissayabhayena jetavanaṃ gato.
atk-s0301a0:646_6: sanniṭṭhānaṃ alabhanto yattha katthaci nisinnakova makkaṭaniddāya niddāyati.
atk-s0301a0:647_0: Pubbe ca tasmiṃyeva nagare cattāro seṭṭhiputtā paradārikakammaṃ katvā nandopanandāya nāma lohakumbhiyā nibbattiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:647_1: Te pheṇuddehakaṃ paccamānā tiṃsavassasahassāni heṭṭhā gacchantā kumbhiyā talaṃ pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0301a0:647_3: Te taṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ oloketvā attano dukkaṭabhayena ekekaṃ gāthaṃ vattukāmā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharameva āhaṃsu. Eko sa- kāraṃ, eko so- kāraṃ, eko na- kāraṃ, eko du-
atk-s0301a0:647_5: Rājā tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ saddaṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya sukhaṃ avindamānova taṃrattāvasesaṃ vītināmesi.
atk-s0301a0:648_0: Aruṇe uṭṭhite purohito āgantvā taṃ sukhaseyyaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0301a0:648_5: “imassa rañño iminā supinena vuḍḍhi vā hāni vā natthi,
atk-s0301a0:648_6: apica kho pana yaṃ imassa gehe atthi,
atk-s0301a0:648_18: Gacchatha ācariyehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhākaṃ sotthiṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:649_0: So sivikasālāyaṃ brāhmaṇe sannipātetvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā,
atk-s0301a0:649_1: “visuṃ visuṃ gantvā evaṃ vadathā”ti tayo vagge akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:649_3: Rājā purohitassa kathitaniyāmeneva kathetvā “kathaṃ sotthi bhaveyyā”ti pucchi.
atk-s0301a0:649_5: “sabbapañcasataṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā etassa kammassa sotthi bhaveyya, evaṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:649_7: Rājā tesaṃ sutvā anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:649_11: Tato paṭṭhāya brāhmaṇā usabhādayo pāṇe āharāpesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:649_13: Taṃ pavattiṃ ñatvā mallikā rājānaṃ tathāgatassa santikaṃ pesesi.
atk-s0301a0:649_14: So gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:649_17: āgacchasi divādivassā”ti āha. Rājā – “ajja me, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:649_21: sabbapañcasataṃ yaññaṃ yajitvā paṭikammaṃ karomāti āraddhā”’ti āha. Kinti te, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:649_24: Atha naṃ bhagavā āha – pubbe, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:649_25: imasmiṃyeva nagare cattāro seṭṭhiputtā paradārikā hutvā nandopanandāya lohakumbhiyā nibbattā saṭṭhivassasahassamatthake uggacchiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:654_0: “Sohaṃ nūna ito gantvā, yoniṃ laddhāna mānusiṃ;
atk-s0301a0:657_0: “Natthi anto kuto anto, na anto paṭidissati;
atk-s0301a0:658_0: Tadā hi pakataṃ pāpaṃ, mama tuyhañca mārisā”ti. –
atk-s0301a0:662_1: Te imā gāthā vattuṃ asakkontā ekekaṃ akkharaṃ vatvā tattheva nimuggā. Iti, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:662_3: Tassa saddassa sutapaccayā tuyhaṃ hāni vā vuḍḍhi vā natthi.
atk-s0301a0:662_4: Ettakānaṃ pana pasūnaṃ ghātanakammaṃ nāma bhāriyanti nirayabhayena tajjetvā dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:662_9: sīto ca nesaṃ vāto upavāyatū”ti vatvā,
atk-s0301a0:662_11: Te gantvā brāhmaṇe palāpetvā taṃ pāṇasaṅghaṃ bandhanato mocetvā nagare dhammabheriṃ carāpesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:663_0: Atha rājā dasabalassa santike nisinno āha – “bhante,
atk-s0301a0:663_2: mayhaṃ pana ajja dve rattiyo ekato ghaṭitā viya ahesu”nti.
atk-s0301a0:663_5: mayhaṃ pana ajja dve yojanāni ekato katāni viya ahesu”nti.
atk-s0301a0:663_9: vaṭṭapatitassa pana bālaputhujjanassa anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭaṃ ekantadīghamevā”ti rājānañca tañca purisaṃ
atk-s0301a0:663_10: nerayikasatte ca ārabbha dhammapade imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0301a0:666_0: Gāthāpariyosāne so itthisāmiko puriso sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahi.
atk-s0301a0:667_1: porāṇarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ purisamedhaṃ sammāpāsaṃ vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:667_8: Daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vināva vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ sammāpāsaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:667_14: Evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti phītañca pahūtaannapānaṃ khemaṃ nirabbudaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:667_15: Manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharadvārā viharanti.
atk-s0301a0:667_16: Idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato niraggaḷanti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:668_0: Aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattetvā
atk-s0301a0:668_1: uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā assamedhaṃ purisamedhanti ādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:668_3: Dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ majjhimadivaseyeva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassa
atk-s0301a0:668_4: ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:668_6: Catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:668_8: Divase divase sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatinadiyā nimuggokāsato
atk-s0301a0:668_9: pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:668_11: Ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:668_13: Navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa
atk-s0301a0:668_20: taṃ aparāparaṃ anupacchinnattā manussā dadantīti attho. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:670_2: raññāti idaṃ te bhikkhū tesu manussesu ānandattherassa sukatakāraṇaṃ ārocentā ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:670_3: Rañño kira sakkena kusarājassa dinno aṭṭhavaṅko maṇi paveṇiyā āgato.
atk-s0301a0:670_4: Rājā alaṅkaraṇakāle taṃ maṇiṃ āharathāti āha.
atk-s0301a0:670_7: Ānandatthero te disvā maṇipaṭisāmakānaṃ ekaṃ upāyaṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0301a0:670_11: Paṭisāmakamanussā rājaṅgaṇe udakacāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā sāṇiyā parikkhipāpetvā te manusse āhaṃsu –
atk-s0301a0:670_14: “rājabhaṇḍaṃ vissajjetuṃ vā valañjetuṃ vā na sakkā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:670_15: So gehaṃ gantvā maṇiṃ upakacchake ṭhapetvā sāṭakaṃ pārupitvā āgamma udakacāṭiyaṃ pakkhipitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a0:670_16: Mahājane paṭikkante rājamanussā cāṭiyaṃ hatthaṃ otāretvā maṇiṃ disvā āharitvā rañño adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:670_17: “Ānandattherena kira dassitanayena maṇi diṭṭho”ti mahājano kolāhalaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:670_18: Te bhikkhū taṃ kāraṇaṃ tathāgatassa ārocentā imaṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Satthā –
atk-s0301a0:670_22: yattha pubbe paṇḍitā attano ñāṇe ṭhatvā ahetukapaṭisandhiyaṃ nibbattānaṃ tiracchānagatānampi hatthāruḷhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āharāpetvā rañño adaṃsū”ti vatvā –
atk-s0301a0:672_0: Piyañca annapānamhi, atthe jāte ca paṇḍita”nti. –
atk-s0301a0:674_0: Na taṃ daḷhanti taṃ bandhanaṃ thiranti na kathenti.
atk-s0301a0:674_8: Sithilanti na āyasādibandhanaṃ viya iriyāpathaṃ nivāretvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:674_9: Tena hi bandhanena baddhā paradesampi gacchantiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:674_10: Duppamuñcanti aññatra lokuttarañāṇena muñcituṃ asakkuṇeyyanti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:678_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame pubbārāme migāramātupāsādeti pubbārāmasaṅkhāte vihāre migāramātuyā pāsāde.
atk-s0301a0:678_3: atīte satasahassakappamatthake ekā upāsikā padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ nimantetvā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0301a0:678_5: “anāgate tumhādisassa buddhassa aggupaṭṭhāyikā homī”ti patthanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:678_6: Sā kappasatasahassaṃ devesu ca manussesu ca saṃsaritvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle bhaddiyanagare meṇḍakaputtassa
atk-s0301a0:678_7: dhanañcayaseṭṭhino gehe sumanadeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0301a0:678_10: tadā pañcahi dārikāsatehi saddhiṃ bhagavato paccuggamanaṃ gatā paṭhamadassanamhiyeva sotāpannā ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:678_11: Aparabhāge sāvatthiyaṃ migāraseṭṭhiputtassa puṇṇavaḍḍhanakumārassa gehaṃ gatā.
atk-s0301a0:679_2: So kira pāsādo lohapāsādo viya samantā catudvārakoṭṭhakayuttena pākārena parikkhitto.
atk-s0301a0:679_3: Tesu pācīnadvārakoṭṭhakassa bahi pāsādacchāyāyaṃ pācīnalokadhātuṃ olokento paññatte varabuddhāsane nisinno hoti.
atk-s0301a0:680_3: Avidūre atikkamantīti avidūramaggena nagaraṃ pavisanti. Rājāhaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:680_7: Kasmā pana rājā loke aggapuggalassa santike nisinno evarūpānaṃ naggabhogganissirikānaṃ añjaliṃ paggaṇhātīti.
atk-s0301a0:680_12: ayaṃ amhākaṃ añjalimattampi na karotī’ti attanā diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ paṭicchādetvā na katheyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:682_1: Sīlaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ susīlo vā dussīlo vāti saṃvasantena upasaṅkamantena jānitabbo.
atk-s0301a0:682_2: Tañca kho dīghena addhunā na ittaranti tañca sīlaṃ dīghena kālena veditabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:682_4: Dvīhatīhañhi saṃyatākāro ca saṃvutindriyākāro ca na sakkā dassetuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:682_5: Manasikarotāti sīlamassa pariggahessāmīti manasikarontena paccavekkhanteneva sakkā jānituṃ,
atk-s0301a0:682_8: Bālo hi manasikarontopi jānituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:685_0: Evaṃ vāseṭṭha jānāhi, vāṇijo so na brāhmaṇo”ti. –
atk-s0301a0:686_5: Ekaccassa hi sammukhā kathā parammukhāya kathāya na sameti,
atk-s0301a0:686_9: So kathenteneva sakkā jānituṃ “asuci eso puggalo”ti.
atk-s0301a0:686_14: tasmā kathentena sakkā sucibhāvo jānitunti pakāsento evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:687_2: so uppannesu upaddavesu gahetabbaggahaṇaṃ katabbakiccaṃ apassanto advāragharaṃ paviṭṭho viya carati.
atk-s0301a0:687_6: Duppaññassa hi kathā udake geṇḍu viya uppalavati,
atk-s0301a0:687_8: Udakavipphanditeneva hi maccho khuddako vā mahanto vāti ñāyati.
atk-s0301a0:689_2: Kāmānaṃ agganti etaṃ kāmānaṃ uttamaṃ seṭṭhanti rūpagaruko āha.
atk-s0301a0:689_7: Puggalamanāpaṃ nāma yaṃ ekassa puggalassa iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:689_9: Paccantavāsīnañhi gaṇḍuppādāpi iṭṭhā honti kantā manāpā,
atk-s0301a0:690_2: Vibhajantena ca na atiissarānaṃ mahāsammatamahāsudassanadhammāsokādīnaṃ vasena vibhajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:690_5: Tesañhi kaṇājakabhattasitthānipi pūtimaṃsassa rasopi atimadhuro amatasadiso hoti.
atk-s0301a0:690_6: Majjhimānaṃ pana gaṇakamahāmattaseṭṭhi kuṭumbikavāṇijādīnaṃ kālena iṭṭhaṃ kālena aniṭṭhaṃ labhamānānaṃ vasena vibhajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:690_7: Tañca panetaṃ ārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ paricchindituṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:690_11: Kiñcāpi hi micchādiṭṭhikā buddhaṃ vā saṅghaṃ vā mahācetiyādīni vā uḷārāni ārammaṇāni disvā akkhīni pidahanti domanassaṃ āpajjanti,
atk-s0301a0:690_14: Kiñcāpi gūthasūkarādayo gūthagandhaṃ ghāyitvā khādituṃ labhissāmāti somanassajātā honti,
atk-s0301a0:690_18: Bhagavā pana puggalamanāpataṃ sandhāya te ca, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:691_1: Paṭibhāti maṃ bhagavāti bhagavā mayhaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ upaṭṭhāti paññāyati.
atk-s0301a0:691_2: Tassa te pañca rājāno āmuttamaṇikuṇḍale sajjitāya āpānabhūmiyā nisinnavaseneva mahatā rājānubhāvena paramena
atk-s0301a0:691_3: issariyavibhavena āgantvāpi dasabalassa santike ṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya divā padīpe viya udakābhisitte aṅgāre
atk-s0301a0:691_4: viya sūriyuṭṭhāne khajjopanake viya ca hatappabhe hatasobhe taṃ tathāgatañca tehi sataguṇena sahassaguṇena
atk-s0301a0:691_6: “mahantā vata bho buddhā nāmā”ti paṭibhānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0301a0:692_7: Yathā kokanadasaṅkhātaṃ padumaṃ pātova phullaṃ avītagandhaṃ siyā,
atk-s0301a0:692_8: evameva bhagavantaṃ aṅgīrasaṃ tapantaṃ ādiccamiva antalikkhe virocamānaṃ passāti ayamettha saṅkhepattho.
atk-s0301a0:692_12: “ete tathāgatassa guṇesu pasīditvā mayhaṃ pañca uttarāsaṅge denti,
atk-s0301a0:692_13: ahampi te bhagavatova dassāmī”ti cintetvā adāsi. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:694_2: doṇassa taṇḍulānaṃ pakkabhattaṃ tadūpiyañca sūpabyañjanaṃ bhuñjatīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:694_3: Bhuttāvīti pubbe bhattasammadaṃ vinodetvā muhuttaṃ vissamitvā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:694_4: taṃdivasaṃ pana bhuñjantova dasabalaṃ saritvā hatthe dhovitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:694_5: Mahassāsīti tassa gacchato balavā bhattaparīḷāho udapādi,
atk-s0301a0:694_8: tamenaṃ ubhosu passesu ṭhatvā yamakatālavaṇṭehi bījanti,
atk-s0301a0:694_9: buddhagāravena pana nipajjituṃ na ussahatīti idaṃ sandhāya “mahassāsī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:694_12: phāsu vihāraṃ dānissa karissāmīti cintetvā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:694_14: Kahāpaṇasatanti pātarāse paṇṇāsaṃ sāyamāse paṇṇāsanti evaṃ kahāpaṇasataṃ.
atk-s0301a0:694_15: Pariyāpuṇitvāti raññā saddhiṃ thokaṃ gantvā “imaṃ maṅgalaasiṃ kassa dammi,
atk-s0301a0:694_17: Asukassa nāma dehīti so taṃ asiṃ datvā dasabalassa santikaṃ āgamma vanditvā ṭhitakova “gāthaṃ vadatha,
atk-s0301a0:694_18: bho gotamā”ti vatvā bhagavatā vuttaṃ pariyāpuṇitvāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:695_3: imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne mā avaca,
atk-s0301a0:695_4: rañño bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā vosānapiṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi,
atk-s0301a0:695_6: Atha rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake taṇḍule hāreyyāsi,
atk-s0301a0:695_7: pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:695_8: So sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā taṃdivasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:695_9: Rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi.
atk-s0301a0:695_10: Rañño hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:696_0: Nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsīti so kira māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:696_2: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi “rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:696_7: Diṭṭhadhammikena ceva atthena samparāyikena cāti ettha sallikhitasarīratā diṭṭhadhammikattho nāma,
atk-s0301a0:696_9: Bhojane mattaññutā hi sīlaṅgaṃ nāma hotīti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:698_7: Mahākosalaraññā kira bimbisārassa dhītaraṃ dentena dvinnaṃ rajjānaṃ antare satasahassuṭṭhāno kāsigāmo nāma dhītu dinno.
atk-s0301a0:698_8: Ajātasattunā ca pitari mārite mātāpissa rañño viyogasokena nacirasseva matā.
atk-s0301a0:698_11: mayhaṃ pitu santako gāmo”ti tassatthāya aḍḍaṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a0:698_12: Ajātasattupi “mayhaṃ mātu santako”ti tassa gāmassatthāya dvepi mātulabhāgineyyā yujjhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:699_4: Dukkhaṃ setīti jitāni hatthiādīni anusocanto dukkhaṃ sayissati.
atk-s0301a0:699_5: Idaṃ bhagavā puna tassa jayakāraṇaṃ disvā āha.
atk-s0301a0:699_6: Jayaṃ veraṃ pasavatīti jinanto veraṃ pasavati,
atk-s0301a0:701_1: Pañcame abbhuyyāsīti parājaye garahappatto “ārāmaṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti rattibhāge
atk-s0301a0:701_2: buddharakkhitena nāma vuḍḍhapabbajitena dhammarakkhitassa vuḍḍhapabbajitassa “sace rājā imañca upāyaṃ
atk-s0301a0:702_0: Yāvassa upakappatīti yāva tassa upakappati sayhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:702_6: Jetāraṃ labhate jayanti jayanto puggalo pacchā jetārampi labhati.
atk-s0301a0:702_11: So vilutto viluppatīti so vilumpako vilumpiyati. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:704_1: Chaṭṭhe upasaṅkamīti mallikāya deviyā gabbhavuṭṭhānakāle sūtigharaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā ārakkhaṃ datvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:704_7: Seyyāti dandhapaññasmā elamūgaputtato ekaccā itthīyeva seyyā.
atk-s0301a0:706_5: Evameva khoti hatthipadaṃ viya hi kārāpakaappamādo,
atk-s0301a0:706_7: Te hatthipade sesapadāni viya appamāde samodhānaṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:706_9: Yathā ca hatthipadaṃ sesapadānaṃ aggaṃ seṭṭhaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:706_11: Mahaggatalokuttaradhammānampi hesa paṭilābhakaṭṭhena lokiyopi samāno aggova hoti.
atk-s0301a0:707_0: Appamādaṃ pasaṃsantīti “etāni āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabbo”ti appamādameva pasaṃsanti.
atk-s0301a0:707_1: Yasmā vā puññakiriyāsu paṇḍitā appamādaṃ pasaṃsanti,
atk-s0301a0:707_2: tasmā āyuādīni patthayantena appamādova kātabboti attho.
atk-s0301a0:709_1: Aṭṭhame so ca kho kalyāṇamittassāti so cāyaṃ dhammo kalyāṇamittasseva svākkhāto nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:709_4: kalyāṇamittassa pana sussūsantassa saddahantassa atthaṃ pūreti bhesajjaṃ viya vaḷañjantassa na itarassāti.
atk-s0301a0:710_1: “ayaṃ samaṇadhammo nāma ovādake anusāsake kalyāṇamitte sati paccattapurisakāre ṭhitassa sampajjati,
atk-s0301a0:710_5: “ahaṃ padesañāṇe ṭhito nippadesaṃ cintetuṃ na sakkomi,
atk-s0301a0:710_9: Yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatāti yā esā kalyāṇamittatā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:710_18: yathā ca mātāpitaro nissāya uppannesu puttesu “ettakaṃ mātito nibbattaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:710_23: kalyāṇamittatāya pana upaḍḍhaguṇo labbhatīti therassa ajjhāsayena upaḍḍhaṃ nāma jātaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:710_24: sakalaguṇo paṭilabbhatīti bhagavato ajjhāsayena sakalaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:710_26: Atthato kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya laddhā sīlasamādhivipassanāvasena cattāro khandhā.
atk-s0301a0:711_2: bahussuto tvaṃ sekhapaṭisambhidappatto aṭṭha vare gahetvā maṃ upaṭṭhahasi,
atk-s0301a0:711_8: “cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni tisso vijjā cha abhiññā sabbaṃ kalyāṇamittamūlakameva hotī”ti sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a0:712_1: Sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetītiādīsu aṭṭhannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva tāva ayaṃ saṅkhepavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0301a0:713_2: sammādiṭṭhi tāva aññehipi attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhiṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ pajahati,
atk-s0301a0:713_7: Visesato panettha sammādiṭṭhi sahajātadhamme sammā dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:714_0: Apicesā sammādiṭṭhi nāma pubbabhāge nānākhaṇā nānārammaṇā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:714_2: Kiccato pana sammādiṭṭhi dukkhe ñāṇantiādīni cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0301a0:714_5: Tesu sammāsaṅkappo kiccato nekkhammasaṅkappotiādīni tīṇi nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0301a0:714_8: Sammāvāyāmo sammāsatīti idampi dvayaṃ kiccato sammappadhānasatipaṭṭhānavasena cattāri nāmāni labhati.
atk-s0301a0:715_0: Evaṃ tāva “sammādiṭṭhi”ntiādinā nayena vuttānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ ādipadānaṃyeva atthavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā idāni bhāveti vivekanissitantiādīsu evaṃ ñātabbo.
atk-s0301a0:715_13: Vivekanissitanti tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ samucchedavivekanissitaṃ nissaraṇavivekanissitañca sammādiṭṭhiṃ bhāvetīti ayamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:715_14: Tathā hi ayaṃ ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto yogī vipassanākkhaṇe kiccato tadaṅgavivekanissitaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:716_0: Kevalañcettha vossaggo duvidho pariccāgavossaggo ca pakkhandanavossaggo cāti.
atk-s0301a0:716_6: Tathā hi ayaṃ sammādiṭṭhi yathāvuttena pakārena kilese ca pariccajati,
atk-s0301a0:717_0: Vossaggapariṇāminti iminā pana sakalena vacanena vossaggatthaṃ pariṇamantaṃ pariṇatañca,
atk-s0301a0:717_2: Ayañhi ariyamaggabhāvanānuyutto bhikkhu yathā sammādiṭṭhi kilesapariccāgavossaggatthaṃ nibbānapakkhandanavossaggatthañca paripaccati,
atk-s0301a0:718_2: Tasmāti yasmā sakalo ariyamaggopi kalyāṇamittaṃ nissāya labbhati, tasmā.
atk-s0301a0:720_4: Ko pana vādo rūpiyassāti suvaṇṇarajatatambalohakāḷalohaphālakacchapakādibhedassa ghanakatassa ceva paribhogabhājanādibhedassa
atk-s0301a0:720_10: Tipakkhavasananti tīṇi khaṇḍāni dvīsu ṭhānesu sibbitvā katanivāsanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:721_1: Uddhaggikantiādīsu uparūparibhūmīsu phaladānavasena uddhaṃ aggamassāti uddhaggikā.
atk-s0301a0:721_4: Suṭṭhu aggānaṃ dibbavaṇṇādīnaṃ visesānaṃ nibbattanato saggasaṃvattanikā.
atk-s0301a0:722_1: Settodakāti vīcīnaṃ bhinnaṭṭhāne udakassa setatāya setodakā.
atk-s0301a0:722_4: taṃ udakaṃ jano bhājanāni pūretvā neva hareyya.
atk-s0301a0:722_9: Kiccakaro ca hotīti attanā kattabbakiccakaro ceva kusalakiccakaro ca,
atk-s0301a0:724_1: Dasame piṇḍapātena paṭipādesīti piṇḍapātena saddhiṃ saṃyojesi,
atk-s0301a0:724_4: Pacchā vippaṭisārī ahosīti so kira aññesupi divasesu taṃ paccekasambuddhaṃ passati,
atk-s0301a0:724_6: Tasmiṃ pana divase ayaṃ padumavatideviyā tatiyaputto taggarasikhī paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbate phalasamāpattisukhena
atk-s0301a0:724_7: vītināmetvā pubbaṇhasamaye vuṭṭhāya anotattadahe mukhaṃ dhovitvā manosilātale nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ
atk-s0301a0:724_8: bandhitvā pattacīvaramādāya abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā iddhiyā vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0301a0:724_9: nagaradvāre oruyha cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya nagaravāsīnaṃ gharadvāresu sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ ṭhapento
atk-s0301a0:724_10: viya pāsādikehi abhikkantādīhi anupubbena seṭṭhino gharadvāraṃ sampatto.
atk-s0301a0:724_11: Taṃdivasañca seṭṭhi pātova uṭṭhāya paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā,
atk-s0301a0:724_15: taṃdivasaṃ pāto bhutvā nisinnattā dānacittaṃ uppādetvā,
atk-s0301a0:725_1: “mayā ettakena kālena imassa ‘dethā’ti vacanaṃ na sutapubbaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:725_2: dāpentopi ca ajja na yassa vā tassa vā dāpeti,
atk-s0301a0:725_4: yaṃ vā taṃ vā adatvā paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dassāmī”ti,
atk-s0301a0:725_5: gharā nikkhamma paccekabuddhaṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā pattaṃ ādāya antonivesane paññattāsane nisīdāpetvā
atk-s0301a0:725_6: suparisuddhehi sālitaṇḍulehi bhattaṃ sampādetvā tadanurūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ byañjanaṃ supeyyañca sallakkhetvā
atk-s0301a0:725_7: pattaṃ pūretvā bahi gandhehi samalaṅkaritvā paccekabuddhassa hatthesu patiṭṭhapetvā vandi.
atk-s0301a0:725_9: “aññesampi paccekabuddhānaṃ saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti aparibhuñjitvāva anumodanaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a0:725_10: Sopi kho seṭṭhi bāhirato āgacchanto paccekabuddhaṃ disvā mayaṃ “tumhākaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ dethā”ti vatvā pakkantā,
atk-s0301a0:725_15: So cittaṃ saṃyametuṃ asakkonto pacchā vippaṭisārī āhosīti.
atk-s0301a0:726_1: Bhātu ca pana ekaputtakaṃ sāpateyyassa kāraṇā jīvitā voropesīti tadā kirassa avibhatteyeva kuṭumbe mātāpitaro ca jeṭṭhabhātā ca kālamakaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:726_5: “ayaṃ dāso ayaṃ dāsī idaṃ yānaṃ idaṃ dhanaṃ tava santaka”nti.
atk-s0301a0:727_3: idānevassa kattabbaṃ karissāmī”ti ekadivasaṃ vāsiṃ ādāya –
atk-s0301a0:727_5: araññaṃ gacchāmā”ti taṃ araññaṃ netvā viravantaṃ viravantaṃ māretvā āvāṭe pakkhipitvā paṃsunā paṭicchādesi.
atk-s0301a0:727_9: Ekapiṇḍapātadānasmiñhi ekāva cetanā dve paṭisandhiyo na deti,
atk-s0301a0:728_1: Anujīvinoti ekaṃ mahākulaṃ nissāya paṇṇāsampi saṭṭhipi kulāni jīvanti,
atk-s0301a0:728_3: Sabbaṃ nādāya gantabbanti sabbametaṃ na ādiyitvā gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:732_1: Tatiyavaggassa paṭhame “nīce kule paccājāto”tiādikena tamena yuttoti tamo.
atk-s0301a0:733_13: mahārājāti ettha eko puggalo bahiddhā ālokaṃ adisvā mātukucchismiṃyeva kālaṃ katvā apāyesu nibbattanto sakalaṃ kappampi saṃsarati,
atk-s0301a0:733_16: Kuhakassa hi evarūpā nibbatti hotīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:734_0: Ettha ca “nīce kule paccājāto hoti caṇḍālakule vā”tiādīhi āgamanavipatti ceva pubbuppannapaccayavipatti ca dassitā.
atk-s0301a0:734_5: Na lābhītiādīhi sukhakāraṇavipatti ceva upabhogavipatti ca.
atk-s0301a0:737_6: Piyā manāpāti rañño kira mātari matāya ayyikā mātuṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭijaggi,
atk-s0301a0:737_9: Hatthiratanenāti satasahassagghanako hatthī satasahassagghanakena alaṅkārena alaṅkato hatthiratanaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:737_12: Sabbāni tāni bhedanadhammānīti tesu hi kiñci kariyamānameva bhijjati,
atk-s0301a0:737_16: evameva sattesupi koci paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā marati,
atk-s0301a0:740_2: Bhagavato kira paṭhamabodhiyaṃ mahālābhasakkāro udapādi bhikkhusaṅghassa ca.
atk-s0301a0:740_3: Titthiyā hatalābhasakkārā hutvā kulesu evaṃ kanthentā vicaranti –
atk-s0301a0:740_13: Yuttaṃ nu kho sayampi bhikkhācāranissitena paresaṃ bhikkhācāranissitānaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ antarāyaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:740_21: evaṃ sā kathā nijjhattiṃ na gaccheyya,
atk-s0301a0:740_22: imassa mahājanassa sannipatitakāleyeva naṃ nijjhāpessāmī”ti ekaṃ chaṇadivasaṃ āgamento tuṇhī ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:741_0: Aparena samayena mahāchaṇe sampatte “ayaṃ imassa kālo”ti nagare bheriṃ carāpesi –
atk-s0301a0:741_1: “saddhā vā assaddhā vā sammādiṭṭhikā vā micchādiṭṭhikā vā geharakkhake dārake vā mātugāme vā ṭhapetvā avasesā ye vihāraṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:741_3: Sayampi pātova nhatvā katapātarāso sabbābharaṇapaṭimaṇḍito mahatā balakāyena saddhiṃ vihāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:741_5: “bhagavā tumhe kira evaṃ vadatha ‘mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ…pe…
atk-s0301a0:741_6: na aññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphala’nti evaṃ pucchituṃ ayuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:741_8: pañhaṃ kathento ca me bhagavā avasāne titthiyānaṃ vādaṃ bhañjissatī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:741_9: So pañhaṃ pucchanto kattha nu kho, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:742_0: Evaṃ vutte rājā yehi manussehi titthiyānaṃ vacanaṃ ārocitaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:742_2: Te raññā olokitamattāva maṅkubhūtā adhomukhā pādaṅguṭṭhakena bhūmiṃ lekhamānā aṭṭhaṃsu. Rājā –
atk-s0301a0:742_4: hatā titthiyā”ti mahājanaṃ sāvento mahāsaddena abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:742_6: “bhagavā cittaṃ nāma nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādīsu yattha katthaci pasīdati,
atk-s0301a0:742_14: pañhākathanaṃ pana mayhaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā sīlavato khotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:742_15: Tattha idha tyassāti idha te assa.
atk-s0301a0:743_0: Kāmacchando pahīnotiādīsu arahattamaggena kāmacchando pahīno hoti,
atk-s0301a0:743_6: Asekkhena sīlakkhandhenāti asekkhassa sīlakkhandho asekkho sīlakkhandho nāma.
atk-s0301a0:743_8: Ettha ca purimehi catūhi padehi lokiyalokuttarasīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiyo kathitā.
atk-s0301a0:744_5: “ayaṃ jātisampanno”ti evaṃ jātikāraṇā asūraṃ na bhareyya.
atk-s0301a0:746_0: Idāni etesu araññasenāsanesu vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhācāravattaṃ ācikkhanto annaṃ pānantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:746_2: Vippasannenāti khīṇāsavassa dentopi sakaṅkhena kilesamalinena cittena adatvā vippasanneneva cittena dadeyya.
atk-s0301a0:747_4: Dātāraṃ abhivassatīti yathā ākāse samuṭṭhitameghato nikkhantā udakadhārā pathaviṃ sinehayantī tementī kiledayantī abhivassati,
atk-s0301a0:747_5: evameva ayampi dāyakassa abbhantare uppannā puññadhārā tameva dātāraṃ anto sineheti pūreti abhisandeti.
atk-s0301a0:749_1: Pañcame muddhāvasittānanti khattiyābhisekena muddhani avasittānaṃ katābhisekānaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:749_7: Esa kira rājā divasassa tikkhattuṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:749_9: Tassa nibaddhaṃ gacchato balakāyo mahāpi hoti appopi.
atk-s0301a0:749_11: “ayaṃ rājā avelāya appena balena samaṇassa gotamassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:749_15: Atha tesaṃyeva abbhantarato eko puriso nikkhamitvā rañño ārocesi.
atk-s0301a0:749_16: Rājā mahantaṃ balakāyaṃ ādāya andhavanaṃ parivāretvā te sabbe gahetvā andhavanato yāva nagaradvārā maggassa
atk-s0301a0:749_17: ubhosu passesu yathā aññamaññaṃ cakkhunā cakkhuṃ upanibandhitvā olokenti,
atk-s0301a0:749_18: evaṃ āsannāni sūlāni ropāpetvā sūlesu uttāsesi.
atk-s0301a0:750_3: mādise nāma sammāsambuddhe dhuravihāre vasante tayā evarūpaṃ dāruṇaṃ kammaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0301a0:750_5: athāyaṃ rājā maṅku hutvā santhambhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-s0301a0:750_6: pariyāyena dhammaṃ kathentasseva me sallakkhessatī”ti dhammadesanaṃ ārabhanto taṃ kiṃ maññasītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:750_12: Nippothento āgacchatīti pathavitalato yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā sabbe satte saṇhakaraṇīyaṃ tiṇacuṇṇaṃ viya karonto pisanto āgacchati.
atk-s0301a0:751_0: Aññatra dhammacariyāyāti ṭhapetvā dhammacariyaṃ aññaṃ kātabbaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a0:751_7: Hatthiyuddhānīti nāḷāgirisadise hemakappane nāge abhiruyha yujjhitabbayuddhāni.
atk-s0301a0:751_11: Na hi sakkā tehi jarāmaraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ.
atk-s0301a0:751_14: Vehāsaṭṭhanti cammapasibbake pūretvā tulāsaṅghāṭādīsu laggetvā ceva niyyuhādīsu ca pūretvā ṭhapitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:751_16: Yathā dve janā ekena maggena na gacchanti evaṃ kātuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:752_1: Evaṃ jarā ca maccu cāti idha dveyeva pabbatā gahitā,
atk-s0301a0:752_2: rājovāde pana “jarā āgacchati sabbayobbanaṃ vilumpamānā”ti evaṃ jarā maraṇaṃ byādhi vipattīti cattāropete āgatāva.
atk-s0301a0:752_3: Tasmāti yasmā hatthiyuddhādīhi jarāmaraṇaṃ jinituṃ na sakkā, tasmā.
atk-s0301a0:758_1: Mārasaṃyuttassa paṭhame uruvelāyaṃ viharatīti paṭividdhasabbaññutaññāṇo uruvelagāmaṃ upanissāya viharati.
atk-s0301a0:758_4: Māro pāpimāti attano visayaṃ atikkamituṃ paṭipanne satte māretīti māro.
atk-s0301a0:759_2: Amaraṃ tapanti amaratapaṃ amarabhāvatthāya kataṃ lūkhatapaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:759_5: “sabbaṃ tapaṃ mayhaṃ atthāvahaṃ na bhavatī”ti ñatvā.
atk-s0301a0:759_6: Phiyārittaṃva dhammanīti araññe thale phiyārittaṃ viya.
atk-s0301a0:759_8: yathā araññe thale nāvaṃ ṭhapetvā bhaṇḍassa pūretvā mahājanā abhirūhitvā phiyārittaṃ gahetvā saṃkaḍḍheyyuṃ ceva uppīleyyuṃ ca,
atk-s0301a0:759_9: so mahājanassa vāyāmo ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi nāvāya gamanaṃ asādhento niratthako bhaveyya na anatthāvaho,
atk-s0301a0:759_10: evameva ahaṃ ‘sabbaṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ anatthāvahaṃ hotī’ti ñatvā vissajjesinti.
atk-s0301a0:760_0: Idāni taṃ amaraṃ tapaṃ pahāya yena maggena buddho jāto,
atk-s0301a0:760_5: Maggaṃ bodhāya bhāvayanti imaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikameva ariyamaggaṃ bodhatthāya bhāvayanto.
atk-s0301a0:760_13: Nihatoti tvaṃ mayā nihato parājito. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:762_1: Dutiye rattandhakāratimisāyanti rattiṃ andhabhāvakārake mahātame caturaṅge tamasi.
atk-s0301a0:762_2: Abbhokāse nisinno hotīti gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pāsāṇaphalake mahācīvaraṃ sīse ṭhapetvā padhānaṃ pariggaṇhamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0301a0:763_0: Nanu ca tathāgatassa abhāvito vā maggo,
atk-s0301a0:763_6: “Anāgate hi kulaputtā mayā gatamaggaṃ āvajjitvā abbhokāsavāsaṃ vasitabbaṃ maññamānā padhānakammaṃ karissantī”ti sampassamāno satthā evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a0:763_10: Evamassa sīsaṃ hotīti evarūpaṃ tassa kāḷavaṇṇaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ mahāpāsāṇasadisaṃ sīsaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:764_0: Subhāsubhanti dīghamaddhānaṃ saṃsaranto sundarāsundaraṃ vaṇṇaṃ katvā āgatosīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:764_3: pure bodhāya vā chabbassāni dukkarakārikasamayasaṅkhātaṃ dīghakālaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:764_4: Vaṇṇaṃ katvā subhāsubhanti sundarañca asundarañca nānappakāraṃ vaṇṇaṃ katvā anekavāraṃ mama santikaṃ āgatosīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:764_6: yena vaṇṇena māro vibhiṃsakatthāya bhagavato santikaṃ na āgatapubbo.
atk-s0301a0:764_8: Alaṃ te tenāti alaṃ tuyhaṃ etena māravibhiṃsākāradassanabyāpārena. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:766_4: Na te mārassa baddhagūti te tuyhaṃ mārassa baddhacarā sissā antevāsikā na honti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:768_4: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ attanā vīriyaṃ katvā arahattaṃ patvāpi na tussati,
atk-s0301a0:769_1: Ye dibbā ye ca mānusāti ye dibbā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā mānusā kāmaguṇasaṅkhātā ca mārapāsā nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a0:769_5: Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti samaṇa tvaṃ mama visayato na muccissasi.
atk-s0301a0:771_5: (Pavāretvā) divase divase yojanaparamaṃ gacchantā carathāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:771_6: Mā ekena dveti ekamaggena dve janā mā agamittha.
atk-s0301a0:772_2: Ādimajjhapariyosānañca nāmetaṃ sāsanassa ca desanāya ca vasena duvidhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:772_12: Desanāya pana catuppadikāya gāthāya tāva paṭhamapādo ādi,
atk-s0301a0:773_1: Sabyañjananti byañjanehi ceva padehi ca paripūraṃ katvā desetha.
atk-s0301a0:774_1: dukūlasāṇiyā paṭicchannā viya catuppadikagāthāpariyosāne arahattaṃ pattuṃ samatthā santīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:774_5: sujātāya vā pitu senānī nāma nigamo.
atk-s0301a0:774_6: Tenupasaṅkamissāmīti nāhaṃ tumhe uyyojetvā pariveṇādīni kāretvā upaṭṭhākādīhi paricariyamāno viharissāmi,
atk-s0301a0:774_7: tiṇṇaṃ pana jaṭilānaṃ aḍḍhuḍḍhāni pāṭihāriyasahassāni dassetvā dhammameva desetuṃ upasaṅkamissāmīti.
atk-s0301a0:774_12: imasmiṃ pana ekasmimpi dhammaṃ desente mayhaṃ cittassādaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a0:776_8: ghaṭṭayissāmi na”nti vuttappakāraṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā niyāmabhūmiyaṃ ito cito ca sañcarantaṃ vijjulatālokena disvā,
atk-s0301a0:777_2: Ṭhassāmi caṅkamissāmi nisīdissāmi nipajjissāmīti etadatthāya yo suññāgārāni sevatīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:777_3: So muni attasaññatoti so buddhamuni hatthapādakukkuccābhāvena saṃyatattabhāvo.
atk-s0301a0:777_4: Vossajja careyya tattha soti so tasmiṃ attabhāve ālayaṃ nikantiṃ vossajjitvā pahāya careyya.
atk-s0301a0:777_5: Patirūpaṃ hi tathāvidhassa tanti tādisassa taṃsaṇṭhitassa buddhamunino taṃ attabhāve nikantiṃ vossajjitvā caraṇaṃ nāma patirūpaṃ yuttaṃ anucchavikaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:778_4: Tepi hi tasmiṃ kāle yakkhā viya upaṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0301a0:778_6: Tatthāti tesu bheravesu suññāgāragato buddhamuni lomacalanamattakampi na karoti.
atk-s0301a0:779_1: Tattha phaleyyāti kākapadaṃ viya hīrahīraso phaleyya.
atk-s0301a0:779_2: Caleyyāti pokkharapatte vātāhato udakabindu viya caleyya.
atk-s0301a0:779_3: Sallampi ce urasi pakappayeyyunti tikhiṇasattisallaṃ cepi urasmiṃ cāreyeyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:779_5: Tāṇaṃ na karontīti tikhiṇe salle urasmiṃ cāriyamāne bhayena gumbantarakandarādīni pavisantā tāṇaṃ karonti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:779_6: Buddhā pana samucchinnasabbabhayā evarūpaṃ tāṇaṃ nāma na karonti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:781_2: Buddhānaṃ pana sarīre rajojallaṃ na upalimpati,
atk-s0301a0:781_3: udakampi pokkharapatte pakkhittaṃ viya vivaṭṭitvā gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:781_4: Apica kho dhotapādake gehe pāde dhovitvā pavisanaṃ pabbajitānaṃ vattaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:781_12: Upasaṅkamīti samaṇo gotamo sabbarattiṃ abbhokāse caṅkamitvā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā niddāyati,
atk-s0301a0:782_2: Kiṃ nu soppasīti kasmā nu supasi?
atk-s0301a0:782_5: Suññamagāranti suññaṃ me gharaṃ laddhanti soppasīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:783_0: Jālinīti tayo bhave ajjhottharitvā ṭhitena “ajjhattikassupādāya aṭṭhārasataṇhāvicaritānī”tiādinā tena tena attano koṭṭhāsabhūtena jālena jālinī.
atk-s0301a0:783_1: Visattikāti rūpādīsu tattha tattha visattatāya visamūlatāya visaparibhogatāya ca visattikā.
atk-s0301a0:783_3: Sabbūpadhi parikkhayāti sabbesaṃ khandhakilesābhisaṅkhārakāmaguṇabhedānaṃ upadhīnaṃ parikkhayā.
