atk-s0301a0:783_6: Kasmā tvaṃ uṇhayāguyaṃ nilīyituṃ asakkontī khuddakamakkhikā viya antanteneva ujjhāyanto āhiṇḍasīti. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:787_1: Navame appaṃ vā bhiyyoti bhiyyo jīvanto aparaṃ vassasataṃ jīvituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:787_2: paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati.
atk-s0301a0:788_0: Na naṃ hīḷeti taṃ āyuṃ “appakamida”nti na hīḷeyya.
atk-s0301a0:788_1: Khīramatto vāti yathā daharo kumāro uttānaseyyako khīraṃ pivitvā dukūlacumbaṭake nipanno asaññī viya niddāyati,
atk-s0301a0:788_2: kassaci āyuṃ appaṃ vā dīghaṃ vāti na cinteti,
atk-s0301a0:788_4: Careyyādittasīso vāti āyuṃ parittanti ñatvā pajjalitasīso viya careyya. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:790_1: Dasame nemīva rathakubbaranti yathā divasaṃ gacchantassa rathassa cakkanemi kubbaraṃ anupariyāyati na vijahati,
atk-s0301a0:794_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame nisinnoti pubbe vuttanayeneva padhānaṃ pariggaṇhanto nisinno.
atk-s0301a0:796_2: Buddhānaṃ panesa paññācakkhuṃ vināsetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:796_3: parisāya bheravārammaṇaṃ sāvento vā dassento vā sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:796_4: Vijitāvī nu maññasīti kiṃ nu tvaṃ “vijitavijayo aha”nti maññasi?
atk-s0301a0:798_2: Udāhu kāveyyamattoti udāhu yathā kavi kabbaṃ cintento tena kabbakaraṇena matto sayati,
atk-s0301a0:798_5: Kimidaṃ soppase vāti kasmā idaṃ soppaṃ soppasiyeva?
atk-s0301a0:798_7: Mayhaṃ hi asaṅgaho nāma saṅgahavipanno vā attho natthi.
atk-s0301a0:798_9: Jaggaṃ na saṅketi yathā ekacco sīhapathādīsu jagganto saṅkati,
atk-s0301a0:798_11: Napi bhemi sottunti yathā ekacco sīhapathādīsuyeva supituṃ bhāyati,
atk-s0301a0:798_13: Nānutapanti māmanti yathā ācariyassa vā antevāsikassa vā aphāsuke jāte uddesaparipucchāya ṭhitattā antevāsiṃ rattindivā atikkamantā anutapanti,
atk-s0301a0:798_15: Na hi mayhaṃ kiñci apariniṭṭhitakammaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0301a0:798_16: Tenevāha hāniṃ na passāmi kuhiñci loketi. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:800_2: Mā sajjittho tadācaranti evaṃ dhammakathaṃ ācaranto mā laggi.
atk-s0301a0:800_3: Dhammakathaṃ kathentassa hi ekacce sādhukāraṃ dadanti,
atk-s0301a0:804_1: Chaṭṭhe pañcannaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ upādāyāti pañca upādānakkhandhe ādiyitvā,
atk-s0301a0:804_8: “ayaṃ no adhigantabbo attho”ti evaṃ sallakkhetvā tāya desanāya atthikā hutvā.
atk-s0301a0:804_10: Sabbacetaso samannāharitvāti sabbena tena kammakārakacittena samannāharitvā.
atk-s0301a0:805_3: Evaṃ tattha virajjatīti “eso ahaṃ na homi,
atk-s0301a0:805_4: etaṃ mayhaṃ na hotī”ti passanto evaṃ tesu khandhesu virajjati.
atk-s0301a0:807_1: Sattame phassāyatanānanti sañjātisamosaraṇaṭṭhena chadvārikassa phassassa āyatanānaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:807_3: Pathavī maññe undrīyatīti ayaṃ mahāpathavī paṭapaṭasaddaṃ kurumānā viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:807_4: Ettha loko vimucchitoti etesu chasu ārammaṇesu loko adhimucchito.
atk-s0301a0:809_1: Aṭṭhame pāhunakāni bhavantīti tathārūpe nakkhatte tattha tattha pesetabbāni pāhunakāni bhavanti,
atk-s0301a0:809_3: Sayaṃcaraṇadivase samavayajātigottā kumārakā tato tato sannipatanti.
atk-s0301a0:809_4: Kumārikāyopi attano attano vibhavānurūpena alaṅkatā tahaṃ tahaṃ vicaranti.
atk-s0301a0:809_5: Tatra kumārikāyopi yathārucikānaṃ kumārakānaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pesenti,
atk-s0301a0:809_6: kumārakāpi kumārikānaṃ aññasmiṃ asati antamaso mālāguḷenapi parikkhipanti.
atk-s0301a0:809_8: Taṃdivasaṃ kira pañcasatā kumārikāyo uyyānakīḷaṃ gacchantiyo paṭipathe satthāraṃ disvā chaṇapūvaṃ dadeyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:809_11: Māro tāsaṃ sampattiyā antarāyaṃ karissāmīti anvāvisi.
atk-s0301a0:809_12: Pāḷiyaṃ pana mā samaṇo gotamo piṇḍamalatthāti ettakaṃyeva vuttanti.
atk-s0301a0:810_0: Kiṃ pana satthā mārāvaṭṭanaṃ ajānitvā paviṭṭhoti?
atk-s0301a0:811_0: Upasaṅkamīti amittavijayena viya tuṭṭho sakalagāme kaṭacchumattampi bhattaṃ alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamantaṃ bhagavantaṃ gāmiyamanussavesena upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:811_1: Tathāhaṃ karissāmīti idaṃ so musā bhāsati.
atk-s0301a0:811_4: atha naṃ gāmadārakā ‘sakalagāme caritvā kaṭacchubhikkhampi alabhitvā gāmato nikkhamma puna paviṭṭhosī’tiādīni vatvā uppaṇḍessantī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:811_6: “sacāyaṃ maṃ evaṃ viheṭhessati muddhamasseva sattadhā phalissatī”ti tasmiṃ anukampāya apavisitvā gāthādvayamāha.
atk-s0301a0:812_2: Na me pāpaṃ vipaccatīti mama pāpaṃ na paccati.
atk-s0301a0:812_3: Nipphalaṃ etanti kiṃ nu tvaṃ evaṃ maññasi?
atk-s0301a0:812_5: atthi tayā katassa pāpassa phalanti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:812_7: Ābhassarā yathāti yathā ābhassarā devā sappītikajjhānena yāpentā pītibhakkhā nāma honti,
atk-s0301a0:814_5: Mama cakkhusamphassaviññāṇāyatananti cakkhuviññāṇena sampayutto cakkhusamphassopi viññāṇāyatanampi mamevāti.
atk-s0301a0:814_6: Ettha ca cakkhusamphassena viññāṇasampayuttakā dhammā gahitā,
atk-s0301a0:815_1: cakkhūti yaṃ loke timirakācādīhi upaddutaṃ anekarogāyatanaṃ upakkavipakkaṃ antamaso kāṇacakkhupi,
atk-s0301a0:816_0: Yaṃ vadantīti yaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ “mama ida”nti vadanti.
atk-s0301a0:816_1: Ye vadanti mamanti cāti ye ca puggalā “mama”nti vadanti.
atk-s0301a0:816_2: Ettha ce te mano atthīti etesu ca ṭhānesu yadi cittaṃ atthi.
atk-s0301a0:816_3: Na me samaṇa mokkhasīti samaṇa mayhaṃ visayato na muccissasi.
atk-s0301a0:816_6: Ye vadantīti yepi puggalā evaṃ vadanti,
atk-s0301a0:816_8: Na me maggampi dakkhasīti bhavayonigatiādīsu mayhaṃ gatamaggampi na passasi. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:818_2: Ajinaṃ ajāpayanti parassa dhanajāniṃ akarontena akārāpentena.
atk-s0301a0:818_4: Iti bhagavā adhammikarājūnaṃ rajje vijite daṇḍakarapīḷite manusse disvā kāruññavasena evaṃ cintesi.
atk-s0301a0:818_5: Upasaṅkamīti “samaṇo gotamo ‘sakkā nu kho rajjaṃ kāretu’nti cintesi,
atk-s0301a0:818_16: Paricitāti sātaccakiriyāya suparicitā katā issāsassa avirādhitavedhihattho viya.
atk-s0301a0:819_2: dvikkhattumpi tāva mahanto suvaṇṇapabbato ekassa nālaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:819_4: Iti vidvā samañcareti evaṃ jānanto samaṃ careyya.
atk-s0301a0:819_8: Kathaṃ nameyyāti so jantu tesu dukkhassa nidānabhūtesu kāmesu kena kāraṇena nameyya.
atk-s0301a0:819_11: Tasseva jantu vinayāya sikkheti tasseva upadhissa vinayāya sikkheyya. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:823_2: Ajinakkhipanivatthoti sakhuraṃ ajinacammaṃ ekaṃ nivattho ekaṃ pāruto.
atk-s0301a0:823_3: Udumbaradaṇḍanti appicchabhāvappakāsanatthaṃ īsakaṃ vaṅkaṃ udumbaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0301a0:823_4: Etadavocāti loke brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ nāma sussūsanti,
atk-s0301a0:823_6: pabbajitesupi mahallakassāti mahallakabrāhmaṇassa pabbajitavesaṃ gahetvā padhānabhūmiyaṃ kammaṃ karonte
atk-s0301a0:823_7: te bhikkhū upasaṅkamitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā etaṃ “daharā bhavanto”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:823_8: Okampetvāti hanukena uraṃ paharanto adhonataṃ katvā.
atk-s0301a0:823_9: Jivhaṃ nillāletvāti kabaramahājivhaṃ nīharitvā uddhamadho ubhayapassesu ca lāletvā.
atk-s0301a0:823_13: Pakkāmīti tumhe jānantānaṃ vacanaṃ akatvā attanova tele paccissathāti vatvā ekaṃ maggaṃ gahetvā gato. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:825_2: suladdhaṃ vata meti evarūpassa satthu ceva dhammassa ca sabrahmacārīnañca laddhattā mayhaṃ lābhā mayhaṃ suladdhanti.
atk-s0301a0:825_3: So kirāyasmā pacchā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasitvā “arahattaṃ gahessāmī”ti pāsādikaṃ tāva kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0301a0:825_4: buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā cittakallataṃ uppādetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā tosetvā nisinno.
atk-s0301a0:825_6: Upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ samiddhi bhikkhu pāsādikaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā nisinnasadiso,
atk-s0301a0:825_7: yāva mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā arahattaṃ na gaṇhāti,
atk-s0301a0:825_9: Gaccha tvanti satthā sakalajambudīpaṃ olokento “tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ bhavissatī”ti addasa,
atk-s0301a0:825_11: Satipaññā ca me buddhāti mayā sati ca paññā ca ñātā.
atk-s0301a0:825_12: Karassu rūpānīti bahūnipi vibhiṃsakārahāni rūpāni karassu.
atk-s0301a0:825_13: Neva maṃ byādhayissasīti maṃ neva vedhayissasi na kampassesi. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:827_1: Tatiye isigilipasseti isigilissa nāma pabbatassa passe.
atk-s0301a0:827_4: ārammaṇe ca adhimuccatīti lokiyasamāpatti sāmayikā cetovimutti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:827_8: Therassa kira vātapittasemhavasena anusāyiko ābādho atthi,
atk-s0301a0:827_9: tena samādhissa sappāye upakārakadhamme pūretuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:828_0: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthaṃ āhareyyanti so kira cintesi,
atk-s0301a0:828_1: yasmā parihīnajjhānassa kālaṅkaroto anibaddhā gati hoti,
atk-s0301a0:828_7: satthāharaṇañca nāmetaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhassa hoti.
atk-s0301a0:828_8: Yo evaṃ kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkho hoti,
atk-s0301a0:828_9: so mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasitvā arahattampi gahetuṃ samattho hoti,
atk-s0301a0:828_10: mayā pana paṭibāhitopi esa na oramissati,
atk-s0301a0:828_11: satthārā paṭibāhito oramissatī”ti therassa atthakāmo viya hutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:829_1: Pāde vandāmi cakkhumāti pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā tava pāde vandāmi.
atk-s0301a0:829_6: Satthaṃ āharitaṃ hotīti thero kira “kiṃ mayhaṃ iminā jīvitenā”ti?
atk-s0301a0:829_9: Thero vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā taṃyeva vedanaṃ pariggahetvā satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasanto arahattaṃ patvā samasīsī hutvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0301a0:830_0: Tattha yo ṭhānādīsu iriyāpathesu aññataraṃ adhiṭṭhāya –
atk-s0301a0:830_2: athassa arahattappatti ca iriyāpathakopanañca ekappahāreneva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:830_6: athassa arahattappatti ca rogato vuṭṭhānañca ekappahāreneva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:830_8: Keci pana tasmiṃyeva iriyāpathe tasmiñca roge parinibbānavasenettha samasīsitaṃ paññāpenti.
atk-s0301a0:830_9: Yassa pana āsavakkhayo ca jīvitakkhayo ca ekappahāreneva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:830_12: “yassa puggalassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca,
atk-s0301a0:831_0: Ettha ca pavattisīsaṃ kilesasīsanti dve sīsāni.
atk-s0301a0:831_9: taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ vā hoti aparipuṇṇaṃ vā.
atk-s0301a0:831_10: Tikhiṇena asinā sīse chijjantepi hi eko vā dve vā paccavekkhaṇavārā avassaṃ uppajjantiyeva,
atk-s0301a0:831_11: cittānaṃ pana lahuparivattitāya āsavakkhayo ca jīvitapariyādānañca ekakkhaṇe viya paññāyati.
atk-s0301a0:832_0: Samūlaṃ taṇhamabbuyhāti avijjāmūlena samūlakaṃ taṇhaṃ arahattamaggena uppāṭetvā.
atk-s0301a0:833_3: tathāpissa dakkhiṇena passena paricitasayanattā sīsaṃ dakkhiṇatova parivattitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:833_5: Tasmiṃ hi khaṇe dhūmavalāhakā viya timiravalāhakā viya ca uṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:833_12: samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ pucchitvā nikkaṅkho bhavissāmī”ti khuddakadārakavaṇṇī hutvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:835_1: Catutthe satta vassānīti pure bodhiyā chabbassāni,
atk-s0301a0:835_3: Otārāpekkhoti “sace samaṇassa gotamassa kāyadvārādīsu kiñcideva ananucchavikaṃ passāmi,
atk-s0301a0:838_0: Upasaṅkamīti “ajja samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ atigahetvā gamissāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:839_1: Vittaṃ nu jīnoti sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā jitosi nu.
atk-s0301a0:839_3: kiṃ nu antogāme pamāṇātikkantaṃ pāpakammaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0301a0:839_4: yena aññesaṃ mukhaṃ oloketuṃ avisahanto araññe vicarasi?
atk-s0301a0:840_2: Anāsavo jhāyāmīti nittaṇho hutvā dvīhi jhānehi jhāyāmi.
atk-s0301a0:841_0: Sace maggaṃ anubuddhanti yadi tayā maggo anubuddho.
atk-s0301a0:843_6: atha so tattha assādaṃ alabhitvāva vāyaso etto apakkameyya,
atk-s0301a0:843_8: evaṃ mayampi so kāko viya selaṃ gotamaṃ āsajja assādaṃ vā santhavaṃ vā alabhantā gotamā nibbinditvā apagacchāma.
atk-s0301a0:845_5: Upasaṅkamiṃsūti “gopālakadārakaṃ viya daṇḍakena bhūmiṃ lekhaṃ datvā ativiya dummano hutvā nisinno.
atk-s0301a0:846_1: Āraññamiva kuñjaranti yathā araññato pesitagaṇikārahatthiniyo āraññakaṃ kuñjaraṃ itthikuttadassanena palobhetvā bandhitvā ānayanti,
atk-s0301a0:847_2: mayaṃ taṃ ānessāmā”ti pitaraṃ samassāsetvā upasaṅkamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:847_4: Ekasataṃ ekasatanti ekekaṃ sataṃ sataṃ katvā.
atk-s0301a0:848_7: piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ eko jhāyanto “atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ anubujjhiṃ.
atk-s0301a0:848_9: teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī na sampajjatīti.
atk-s0301a0:849_4: katamena jhānena bahulaṃ jhāyantaṃ taṃ puggalaṃ kāmasaññā alabhitvāva paribāhirā hontīti.
atk-s0301a0:850_9: Imesu tīsu mūlakilesesu gahitesu diyaḍḍhakilesasahassaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:851_4: Gaṇasaṅghacārīti gaṇe ca saṅghe ca caratīti satthā gaṇasaṅghacārī nāma.
atk-s0301a0:851_5: Addhā carissantīti aññepi saddhā bahujanā ekaṃsena carissanti.
atk-s0301a0:852_1: maccurājassa hatthato acchinditvā nibbānapāraṃ nayissatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:853_1: pātāle gādhamesathāti mahantaṃ kūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ silaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā pātāle patiṭṭhagavesanaṃ viya.
atk-s0301a0:853_2: Khāṇuṃva urasāsajjāti urasi khāṇuṃ paharitvā viya.
atk-s0301a0:853_4: Imasmiṃ ṭhāne saṅgītikārā “idamavocā”ti desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā daddallamānāti gāthaṃ āhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:853_8: Tūlaṃ bhaṭṭhaṃva mālutoti yathā phalato bhaṭṭhaṃ simbalitūlaṃ vā poṭakitūlaṃ vā vāto panudati nīharati,
atk-s0301a0:858_1: Bhikkhunīsaṃyuttassa paṭhame āḷavikāti āḷaviyaṃ jātā āḷavinagaratoyeva ca nikkhamma pabbajitā.
atk-s0301a0:858_2: Andhavananti kassapasammāsambuddhassa cetiye navakammatthāya dhanaṃ samādapetvā āgacchantassa yasodharassa
atk-s0301a0:858_3: nāma dhammabhāṇakassa ariyapuggalassa akkhīni uppāṭetvā tattheva akkhibhedappattehi pañcahi corasatehi
atk-s0301a0:858_4: nivutthattā tato paṭṭhāya “andhavana”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ vanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:858_5: Taṃ kira sāvatthito dakkhiṇapasse gāvutamatte hoti rājārakkhāya guttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:858_6: Tattha pavivekakāmā bhikkhū ca bhikkhuniyo ca gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:858_7: Tasmā ayampi kāyavivekatthinī yena taṃ vanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:858_11: Na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ padanti tvaṃ etaṃ nibbānapadaṃ vā nibbānagāmimaggapadaṃ vā na jānāsi.
atk-s0301a0:858_13: Khandhāsaṃ adhikuṭṭanāti khandhā tesaṃ adhikuṭṭanabhaṇḍikā. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:860_4: Yasmā vā dvīhi aṅgulehi kappāsavaṭṭiṃ gahetvā suttaṃ kantanti,
atk-s0301a0:860_9: Kiñci vā pana aññasmīti aññaṃ vā kiñci “ahaṃ asmī”ti taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena yassa siyā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:862_3: Pubbe kira sāvatthiyaṃ ekasmiṃ kule asītikoṭidhanaṃ sabbaṃ aṅgārāva jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:862_6: tassa puññena puna pākatikaṃ bhavissatī”ti suvaṇṇahiraññassa cāṭiyo pūretvā āpaṇe ṭhapetvā samīpe nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:862_8: “aḍḍhamāsakaṃ gahetvā dārusākaṃ āharissāmī”ti vīthiṃ gatā taṃ disvā kuṭumbikaṃ āha –
atk-s0301a0:862_13: So “puññavatī esā bhavissatī”ti tassā vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pucchitvā āpaṇe bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā tassā mātāpitaro upasaṅkamitvā evamāha –
atk-s0301a0:862_16: Kiṃ sāmi duggatehi saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karosīti?
atk-s0301a0:862_19: kuṭumbasāminī bhavissatīti naṃ gahetvā gharaṃ ānesi.
atk-s0301a0:862_22: Sā duggatakule uppajjitvā mahākulaṃ gantvāpi “puttavināsaṃ pattāmhī”ti uppannabalavasokā puttassa sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0301a0:862_23: vāretvā taṃ matakaḷevaraṃ ādāya nagare vippalapantī carati.
atk-s0301a0:863_0: Ekadivasaṃ mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā dasabalassa santikaṃ gantvā –
atk-s0301a0:863_1: “puttassa me arogabhāvatthāya bhesajjaṃ detha bhagavā”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:863_2: Gaccha sāvatthiṃ āhiṇḍitvā yasmiṃ gehe matapubbo natthi,
atk-s0301a0:863_5: Sā nagaraṃ pavisitvā dhuragehato paṭṭhāya bhagavatā vuttanayena gantvā siddhatthakaṃ yācantī ghare ghare,
atk-s0301a0:863_6: “kuto tvaṃ evarūpaṃ gharaṃ passissasī”ti vuttā katipayāni gehāni āhiṇḍitvā –
atk-s0301a0:863_8: na mayhaṃ puttassevā”ti sālāyaṃ chavaṃ chaḍḍetvā pabbajjaṃ yāci.
atk-s0301a0:863_11: Imaṃ theriṃ sandhāya “atha kho kisāgotamī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:864_2: Accantaṃ mataputtāmhīti ettha antaṃ atītaṃ accantaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:864_7: idāni mama puna puttamaraṇaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:864_12: Sabbattha vihatā nandīti sabbesu khandhāyatanadhātubhavayonigatiṭhitinivāsesu mama taṇhānandī vihatā.
atk-s0301a0:866_1: Catutthe pañcaṅgikenāti ātataṃ vitataṃ ātatavitataṃ ghanaṃ susiranti evaṃ pañcaṅgasamannāgatena.
atk-s0301a0:866_4: Pūtikāyenāti suvaṇṇavaṇṇopi kāyo niccaṃ uggharitapaggharitaṭṭhena pūtikāyova,
atk-s0301a0:866_10: Santā samāpattīti aṭṭhavidhā lokiyasamāpatti ārammaṇasantatāya aṅgasantatāya ca santāti vuttā.
atk-s0301a0:866_12: tesaṃ dvinnaṃ bhavānaṃ gahitattā gahite kāmabhave aṭṭhasu ca samāpattīsūti etesu sabbesu ṭhānesu mayhaṃ avijjātamo vihatoti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:868_1: Pañcame supupphitagganti aggato paṭṭhāya suṭṭhu pupphitaṃ sālarukkhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:868_2: Na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātūti tava vaṇṇadhātusadisā dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu natthi,
atk-s0301a0:868_3: tayā sadisā aññā bhikkhunī natthīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:868_4: Idhāgatā tādisikā bhaveyyunti yathā tvaṃ idhāgatā kiñci santhavaṃ vā sinehaṃ vā na labhasi,
atk-s0301a0:868_6: Pakhumantarikāyanti dvinnaṃ akkhīnaṃ majjhe nāsavaṃsepi tiṭṭhantiṃ maṃ na passasi.
atk-s0301a0:870_1: Chaṭṭhe ko nu taṃ idamādapayīti ko nu mandabuddhi bālo taṃ evaṃ gāhāpesi?
atk-s0301a0:870_7: loke pana aggapuggalo satthā dhammaṃ desesī”ti dassetuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:870_9: Tattha sacce nivesayīti paramatthasacce nibbāne nivesesi.
atk-s0301a0:872_1: Sattame enti māravasaṃ punāti punappunaṃ maraṇamārakilesamāradevaputtamārānaṃ vasaṃ āgacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:872_3: Agati yattha mārassāti yattha tuyhaṃ mārassa agati.
atk-s0301a0:874_1: Aṭṭhame samaṇī viya dissasīti samaṇisadisā dissasi.
atk-s0301a0:874_2: Kimiva carasi momūhāti kiṃ kāraṇā momūhā viya carasi?
atk-s0301a0:875_0: Idāni “kaṃ nu uddissa muṇḍāsī”ti pañhaṃ kathentī atthi sakyakule jātotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:875_1: Tattha sabbābhibhūti sabbāni khandhāyatanadhātubhavayonigatiādīni abhibhavitvā ṭhito.
atk-s0301a0:875_3: Sabbatthamaparājitoti sabbesu rāgādīsu vā mārayuddhe vā ajito.
atk-s0301a0:875_7: Upadhisaṅkhayeti upadhisaṅkhayasaṅkhāte nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:877_1: Navame kenidaṃ pakatanti kena idaṃ kataṃ.
atk-s0301a0:879_1: Dasame nayidha sattupalabbhatīti imasmiṃ suddhasaṅkhārapuñje paramatthato satto nāma na upalabbhati.
atk-s0301a0:879_2: Khandhesu santesūti pañcasu khandhesu vijjamānesu tena tenākārena vavatthitesu.
atk-s0301a0:879_5: Nāññatra dukkhāti ṭhapetvā dukkhaṃ añño neva sambhoti na nirujjhatīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:884_1: Brahmasaṃyuttassa paṭhame parivitakko udapādīti sabbabuddhānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo ayaṃ cetaso vitakko udapādi.
atk-s0301a0:884_3: Buddhabhūtassa aṭṭhame sattāhe rājāyatanamūle sakkena devānamindena ābhataṃ dantakaṭṭhañca osadhaharītakañca
atk-s0301a0:884_4: khāditvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā catūhi lokapālehi upanīte paccagghe selamayapatte tapussabhallikānaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ
atk-s0301a0:885_10: Atakkāvacaroti takkena avacaritabbo ogāhitabbo na hoti,
atk-s0301a0:885_21: Yatheva hi susajjitaṃ pupphaphalabharitarukkhādisampannaṃ uyyānaṃ paviṭṭho rājā tāya tāya sampattiyā ramati,
atk-s0301a0:885_27: Tena tesaṃ bhagavā duvidhaṃ ālayaṃ uyyānabhūmiṃ viya dassento “ālayarāmā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:886_5: idappaccayatā ca sā paṭiccasamuppādo cāti idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppādo.
atk-s0301a0:886_8: Yasmā hi taṃ āgamma sabbasaṅkhāravipphanditāni samanti,
atk-s0301a0:886_11: Yasmā ca taṃ āgamma sabbe upadhayo paṭinissaṭṭhā honti,
atk-s0301a0:886_15: tasmā sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodhoti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:886_17: phalena vā saddhiṃ kammaṃ vinati saṃsibbatīti katvā vānanti vuccati,
atk-s0301a0:886_19: So mamassa kilamathoti yā ajānantānaṃ desanā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:886_22: Kāyakilamatho ceva kāyavihesā ca assāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:887_2: Buddhānaṃ hi cattāropi maggā sukhapaṭipadāva honti.
atk-s0301a0:887_3: Pāramīpūraṇakāle pana sarāgasadosasamohasseva sato āgatāgatānaṃ yācakānaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ sīsaṃ kantitvā
atk-s0301a0:887_4: galalohitaṃ nīharitvā suañjitāni akkhīni uppāṭetvā kulavaṃsappadīpaṃ puttaṃ manāpacāriniṃ bhariyanti
atk-s0301a0:887_5: evamādīni dentassa aññāni ca khantivādisadisesu attabhāvesu chejjabhejjādīni pāpuṇantassa āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃ
atk-s0301a0:887_11: evaṃ kicchena adhigatassa alaṃ desituṃ pariyattaṃ desituṃ.
atk-s0301a0:888_2: Rāgarattāti kāmarāgena bhavarāgena diṭṭhirāgena ca rattā.
atk-s0301a0:888_3: Na dakkhantīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattā asubhanti iminā sabhāvena na passissanti,
atk-s0301a0:888_4: te apassante ko sakkhissati evaṃ gāhāpetuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:892_0: Patthanaṃ katvā pāramiyo pūretvā sabbaññutaṃ pattoti?
atk-s0301a0:892_2: tadevaṃ paccavekkhaṇānubhāvena panassa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0301a0:892_3: Tassa hi sabbaññutaṃ patvā sattānaṃ kilesagahanataṃ,
atk-s0301a0:892_4: dhammassa ca gambhīrataṃ paccavekkhantassa sattānaṃ kilesagahanatā ca dhammagambhīratā ca sabbākārena pākaṭā jātā. Athassa –
atk-s0301a0:892_8: añjanamakkhitahattho viya ca kilesabharitā atisaṃkiliṭṭhā rāgarattā dosaduṭṭhā mohamūḷhā,
atk-s0301a0:893_1: pabbatena paṭicchādetvā ṭhapito sāsapo viya duddaso,
atk-s0301a0:893_2: satadhā bhinnassa vālassa koṭiyā koṭipaṭipādanaṃ viya duranubodho.
atk-s0301a0:893_3: Nanu mayā hi imaṃ dhammaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantena adinnaṃ dānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a0:893_6: tassa me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassāpi pathavī na kampittha,
atk-s0301a0:893_9: pacchimayāme pana paṭiccasamuppādaṃ paṭivijjhantasseva me dasasahassilokadhātu kampittha.
atk-s0301a0:893_10: Iti mādisenāpi tikkhañāṇena kicchenevāyaṃ dhammo paṭividdho.
atk-s0301a0:894_0: Apica brahmunā yācite desetukāmatāyapissa evaṃ cittaṃ nami.
atk-s0301a0:894_2: “mama appossukkatāya citte namamāne maṃ mahābrahmā dhammadesanaṃ yācissati,
atk-s0301a0:894_4: Te ‘satthā kira dhammaṃ na desetukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:894_7: paṇīto vata bho dhammo’ti maññamānā sussūsissantī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:894_8: Idampissa kāraṇaṃ paṭicca appossukkatāya cittaṃ nami,
atk-s0301a0:895_0: Sahampatissāti so kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane sahako nāma thero paṭhamajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ kappāyukabrahmā hutvā nibbatto.
atk-s0301a0:895_3: Nassati vata bhoti so kira imaṃ saddaṃ tathā nicchāresi,
atk-s0301a0:895_5: Yatra hi nāmāti yasmiṃ nāma loke.
atk-s0301a0:895_6: Purato pāturahosīti tehi dasahi brahmasahassehi saddhiṃ pāturahosi.
atk-s0301a0:895_7: Apparajakkhajātikāti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesaṃ evaṃsabhāvāti apparajakkhajātikā.
atk-s0301a0:895_9: Bhavissantīti purimabuddhesu dasapuññakiriyavasena katādhikārā paripākagatā padumāni viya sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:895_10: dhammadesanaṃyeva ākaṅkhamānā catuppadikagāthāvasāne ariyabhūmiṃ okkamanārahā na eko, na dve,
atk-s0301a0:896_1: Samalehi cintitoti samalehi chahi satthārehi cintito.
atk-s0301a0:896_2: Te hi puretaraṃ uppajjitvā sakalajambudīpe kaṇṭake pattharamānā viya,
atk-s0301a0:896_3: visaṃ siñcamānā viya ca samalaṃ micchādiṭṭhidhammaṃ desayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:896_5: Amatassa dvāranti amatassa nibbānassa dvārabhūtaṃ ariyamaggaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:896_6: Suṇantu dhammaṃ vimalenānubuddhanti ime sattā rāgādimalānaṃ abhāvato vimalena sammāsambuddhena anubuddhaṃ
atk-s0301a0:897_0: Sele yathā pabbatamuddhaniṭṭhitoti selamaye ekagghane pabbatamuddhani yathāṭhitova.
atk-s0301a0:897_1: Na hi tassa ṭhitassa dassanatthaṃ gīvukkhipanapasāraṇādikiccaṃ atthi.
atk-s0301a0:897_4: yathā selapabbatamuddhani ṭhitova cakkhumā puriso samantato janataṃ passeyya,
atk-s0301a0:897_5: tathā tvampi sumedha sundarapañña sabbaññutañāṇena samantacakkhu bhagavā dhammamayaṃ pāsādamāruyha sayaṃ
atk-s0301a0:897_6: apetasoko sokāvatiṇṇaṃ jātijarābhibhūtaṃ janataṃ avekkhassu upadhāraya upaparikkha.
atk-s0301a0:897_8: yathā hi pabbatapāde samantā mahantaṃ khettaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:897_9: tattha kedārapāḷīsu kuṭikāyo katvā rattiṃ aggiṃ jāleyyuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:897_11: atha tassa pabbatassa matthake ṭhatvā cakkhumato purisassa bhūmiṃ olokayato neva khettaṃ na kedārapāḷiyo
atk-s0301a0:897_12: na kuṭiyo na tattha sayitamanussā paññāyeyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:897_14: evaṃ dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha sattanikāyaṃ olokayato tathāgatassa ye te akatakalyāṇā sattā,
atk-s0301a0:897_15: te ekavihāre dakkhiṇajāṇupasse nisinnāpi buddhacakkhussa āpāthaṃ nāgacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:897_18: te evassa dūrepi ṭhitā āpāthaṃ āgacchanti so aggi viya himavantapabbato viya ca.
atk-s0301a0:899_0: Asantettha na dissanti, rattiṃ khittā yathā sarā”ti. ;
atk-s0301a0:900_5: Apparajakkhetiādīsu yesaṃ vuttanayeneva paññācakkhumhi rāgādirajaṃ appaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:901_34: iti imasmiñca loke imasmiñca vajje tibbā bhayasaññā paccupaṭṭhitā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:901_36: Imehi paññāsāya ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni jānāti passati aññāsi paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0301a0:902_3: Udakaṃ accuggamma ṭhitānī ti udakaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhitāni.
atk-s0301a0:902_5: tāni sūriyarasmisamphassaṃ āgamayamānāni ṭhitāni ajja pupphanakāni.
atk-s0301a0:902_10: Udakā pana anuggatāni aññānipi sarogauppalādīni nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a0:902_16: evamevaṃ ugghaṭitaññū vipañcitaññū neyyo padaparamoti cattāro puggalā.
atk-s0301a0:903_0: Tattha “yassa puggalassa saha udāhaṭavelāya dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:903_2: Yassa puggalassa saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthe vibhajiyamāne dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:903_4: Yassa puggalassa uddesato paripucchato yoniso manasikaroto kalyāṇamitte sevato bhajato payirupāsato anupubbena dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:903_6: Yassa puggalassa bahumpi suṇato bahumpi bhaṇato bahumpi dhārayato bahumpi vācayato na tāya jātiyā dhammābhisamayo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:903_15: tatrāpi ettakā ugghaṭitaññū”ti evaṃ sabbākāratova addasa.
atk-s0301a0:904_0: Tattha tiṇṇaṃ puggalānaṃ imasmiṃyeva attabhāve bhagavato dhammadesanā atthaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0301a0:904_2: Atha bhagavā imesaṃ catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ atthāvahaṃ dhammadesanaṃ viditvā desetukamyataṃ uppādetvā puna
atk-s0301a0:904_3: sabbepi tīsu bhavesu satte bhabbābhabbavasena dve koṭṭhāse akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:904_6: Ye te sattā kammāvaraṇena samannāgatā kilesāvaraṇena samannāgatā vipākāvaraṇena samannāgatā assaddhā
atk-s0301a0:904_7: acchandikā duppaññā abhabbā niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:904_12: Tattha sabbepi abhabbapuggale pahāya bhabbapuggaleyeva ñāṇena pariggahetvā,
atk-s0301a0:905_5: Pamuñcantu saddhanti sabbe attano saddhaṃ pamuñcantu vissajjentu.
atk-s0301a0:905_7: ahañhi attano paguṇaṃ suppavattitampi imaṃ paṇītaṃ uttamaṃ dhammaṃ kāyavācākilamathasaññī hutvā na bhāsiṃ.
atk-s0301a0:905_8: Idāni pana sabbo jano saddhābhājanaṃ upanetu,
atk-s0301a0:906_2: Gate ca pana tasmiṃ bhagavā “kassa nu kho ahaṃ paṭhamaṃ dhammaṃ deseyya”nti?
atk-s0301a0:906_4: pañcavaggiyānañca bahūpakārabhāvaṃ ñatvā tesaṃ dhammaṃ desetukāmo bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ gantvā dhammacakkaṃ pavattesīti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:908_1: Dutiye udapādīti ayaṃ vitakko pañcame sattāhe udapādi.
atk-s0301a0:909_1: Devaggahaṇena cettha mārabrahmesu gahitesupi māro nāma vasavattī sabbesaṃ upari vasaṃ vatteti,
atk-s0301a0:909_2: brahmā nāma mahānubhāvo ekaṅguliyā ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷasahasse ālokaṃ pharati.
atk-s0301a0:909_4: dasahi aṅgulīhi dasasupi cakkavāḷasahassesu ālokaṃ pharati,
atk-s0301a0:909_5: so iminā sīlasampannataroti vattuṃ mā labhatūti samārake sabrahmaketi visuṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:909_6: Tathā samaṇā nāma ekanikāyādivasena bahussutā sīlavanto paṇḍitā,
atk-s0301a0:909_8: te iminā sīlasampannatarāti vattuṃ mā labhantūti sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāyāti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:909_9: Sadevamanussāyāti idaṃ pana nippadesato dassanatthaṃ gahitameva gahetvā vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:909_10: Apicettha purimāni tīṇi padāni lokavasena vuttāni,
atk-s0301a0:909_15: Ettha ca sīlādayo cattāro dhammā lokiyalokuttarā kathitā,
atk-s0301a0:910_1: “ayaṃ satthā avīcito yāva bhavaggā sīlādīhi attanā adhikataraṃ apassanto ‘mayā paṭividdhaṃ navalokuttaradhammameva
atk-s0301a0:910_2: sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya viharissāmī’ti cinteti,
atk-s0301a0:910_5: gacchāmissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti cintetvā purato pākaṭo ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:911_0: Viharanti cāti ettha yo vadeyya “viharantīti vacanato paccuppannepi bahū buddhā”ti,
atk-s0301a0:911_2: etarahi arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti iminā vacanena paṭibāhitabbo.
atk-s0301a0:912_0: “Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
atk-s0301a0:914_0: Ādīhi cassa suttehi aññesaṃ buddhānaṃ abhāvo dīpetabbo.
atk-s0301a0:914_1: Tasmāti yasmā sabbepi buddhā saddhammagaruno, tasmā.
atk-s0301a0:916_8: Sammadevāti na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na jīvitapakatā hutvā,
atk-s0301a0:916_9: yathā vā tathā vā pabbajitāpi ye anulomapaṭipadaṃ pūrenti,
atk-s0301a0:916_10: te sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:916_13: Sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvāti sāmaṃ jānitvā paccakkhaṃ katvā.
atk-s0301a0:917_2: na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇā pubbeva khīṇattā,
atk-s0301a0:917_5: Maggassa pana abhāvitattā yā uppajjeyya ekacatupañcavokārabhavesu ekacatupañcakkhandhappabhedā jāti.
atk-s0301a0:917_6: Sā maggassa bhāvitattā anuppādadhammataṃ āpajjanena khīṇā.
atk-s0301a0:917_8: “kilesābhāve vijjamānampi kammaṃ āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikaṃ hotī”ti jānanto jānāti.
atk-s0301a0:918_3: Kataṃ karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi pariññāpahānasacchikiriyabhāvanāvasena soḷasavidhampi kiccaṃ niṭṭhāpitanti attho.
atk-s0301a0:918_8: imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ khandhasantānaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a0:918_9: ime pana pañcakkhandhā pariññātā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlako rukkho viyāti abbhaññāsi.
atk-s0301a0:919_3: Mātā panassa puttaṃ disvāva gharā nikkhamma pattaṃ gahetvā antonivesanaṃ pavesetvā paññattāsane nisīdāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:920_0: Āhutiṃ niccaṃ paggaṇhātīti niccakāle āhutipiṇḍaṃ paggaṇhāti.
atk-s0301a0:920_1: Taṃ divasaṃ pana tasmiṃ ghare bhūtabalikammaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:920_2: Sabbagehaṃ haritupalittaṃ vippakiṇṇalājaṃ vanamālaparikkhittaṃ ussitaddhajapaṭākaṃ tattha tattha puṇṇaghare
atk-s0301a0:920_5: Sāpi brāhmaṇī kālasseva vuṭṭhāya soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkārena attabhāvaṃ alaṅkari.
atk-s0301a0:920_8: “mahābrahmaṃ bhojessāmī”ti suvaṇṇapātiyaṃ pāyāsaṃ pūretvā sappimadhusakkharādīhi yojetvā nivesanassa
atk-s0301a0:920_12: catūsu koṇesu majjhe ca ekekaṃ pāyāsapiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0301a0:920_14: yāva kapparā sappinā paggharantena pathaviyaṃ jāṇumaṇḍalaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā “bhuñjatu bhavaṃ mahābrahmā,
atk-s0301a0:920_16: tappetu bhavaṃ mahābrahmā”ti vadamānā brahmānaṃ bhojeti.
atk-s0301a0:921_0: Etadahosīti mahākhīṇāsavassa sīlagandhaṃ chadevaloke ajjhottharitvā brahmalokaṃ upagataṃ ghāyamānassa etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:921_3: ‘Ayaṃ hi evarūpaṃ aggadakkhiṇeyyaṃ mahākhīṇāsavaṃ nisīdāpetvā yāguuḷuṅkamattampi adatvā,
atk-s0301a0:921_4: “mahābrahmaṃ bhojessāmī”ti tulaṃ pahāya hatthena tulayantī viya,
atk-s0301a0:921_6: aggiṃ pahāya khajjopanakaṃ dhamamānā viya bhūtabaliṃ kurumānā āhiṇḍati.
atk-s0301a0:921_7: Gacchāmissā micchādassanaṃ bhinditvā apāyamaggato uddharitvā yathā asītikoṭidhanaṃ buddhasāsane vippakiritvā saggamaggaṃ ārohati,
atk-s0301a0:922_0: Dūre itoti imamhā ṭhānā dūre brahmaloko.
atk-s0301a0:922_1: Tato hi kūṭāgāramattā silā pātitā ekena ahorattena aṭṭhacattālīsayojanasahassāni khepayamānā catūhi māsehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhaheyya,
atk-s0301a0:922_5: Brahmapathanti ettha brahmapatho nāma cattāri kusalajjhānāni,
atk-s0301a0:922_7: taṃ brahmapathaṃ ajānantī tvaṃ kiṃ jappasi vippalapasi?
atk-s0301a0:922_9: na etaṃ tiṇabījāni pakkhipitvā randhaṃ goyūsaṃ khādanti,
atk-s0301a0:923_0: Evaṃ vatvā puna so mahābrahmā añjaliṃ paggayha avakujjo hutvā theraṃ upadisanto eso hi te brāhmaṇi brahmadevotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:923_2: Atidevapattoti devānaṃ atidevabhāvaṃ brahmānaṃ atibrahmabhāvaṃ patto.
atk-s0301a0:923_3: Anaññaposīti ṭhapetvā imaṃ attabhāvaṃ aññassa attabhāvassa vā puttadārassa vā aposanatāya anaññaposī.
atk-s0301a0:925_0: Na tassa pacchā na puratthamatthīti pacchā vuccati atītaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:925_2: atītānāgatesu khandhesu chandarāgavirahitassa pacchā vā puratthaṃ vā natthīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:925_6: kattaradaṇḍādīni gahetvā vicarantopi vadhakacetanāya abhāvā nikkhittadaṇḍo.
atk-s0301a0:925_7: Tasathāvaresūti ettha pana puthujjanā tasā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:925_9: Satta pana sekhā tasāti vattuṃ na sakkā,
atk-s0301a0:926_5: Ettakena kathāmaggena brahmā therassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento āyatane brāhmaṇiṃ niyojesi.
atk-s0301a0:928_2: Idaṃ niccanti idaṃ saha kāyena brahmaṭṭhānaṃ aniccaṃ “nicca”nti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:928_8: Idaṃ hi na jāyatītiādīsu imasmiṃ ṭhāne koci jāyanako vā jīyanako vā mīyanako vā cavanako vā upapajjanako vā natthi,
atk-s0301a0:928_10: Ito ca panaññanti ito sahakāyā brahmaṭṭhānā uttari aññaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0301a0:928_12: Evaṃvādī ca pana so upari tisso jhānabhūmiyo cattāro magge cattāri phalāni nibbānanti sabbaṃ paṭibāhati.
atk-s0301a0:929_1: heṭṭhupapattiko kiresa brahmā anuppanne buddhuppāde isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiyo
atk-s0301a0:929_2: nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno kālaṃ katvā catutthajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vehapphalabrahmaloke pañcakappasatikaṃ
atk-s0301a0:929_4: Tattha yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā heṭṭhupapattikaṃ katvā tatiyajjhānaṃ paṇītaṃ bhāvetvā subhakiṇhabrahmaloke catusaṭṭhikappaṃ āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:929_5: Tattha dutiyajjhānaṃ bhāvetvā ābhassare aṭṭha kappe āyuṃ gahetvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:929_8: So paṭhamakāle attanā katakammañca nibbattaṭṭhānañca aññāsi,
atk-s0301a0:929_9: kāle pana gacchante gacchante ubhayaṃ pamussitvā sassatadiṭṭhiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0301a0:930_0: Avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato samannāgato aññāṇī andhībhūto.
atk-s0301a0:931_0: Evaṃ vutte so brahmā yathā nāma maggacoro dve tayo pahāre adhivāsento sahāye anācikkhitvāpi uttariṃ pahāraṃ
atk-s0301a0:931_1: pahariyamāno “asuko ca asuko ca mayhaṃ sahāyo”ti ācikkhati,
atk-s0301a0:931_3: “bhagavā mayhaṃ padānupadaṃ pekkhanto maṃ nippīḷitukāmo”ti bhīto attano sahāye ācikkhanto dvāsattatītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:931_6: mayaṃ dvāsattati janā puññakammā tena puññakammena idha nibbattā.
atk-s0301a0:931_7: Vasavattino sayaṃ aññesaṃ vase avattitvā pare attano vase vattema,
atk-s0301a0:931_9: ayaṃ no vedehi gatattā “vedagū”ti saṅkhaṃ gatā bhagavā antimā brahmupapatti.
atk-s0301a0:931_10: Asmābhijappanti janā anekāti anekajanā amhe abhijappanti.
atk-s0301a0:931_15: vasavattī, issaro, kattā, nimmātā, seṭṭho, sajitā, vasī,
atk-s0301a0:932_0: Atha naṃ bhagavā appaṃ hi etantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:932_1: Tattha etanti yaṃ tvaṃ idha tava āyuṃ “dīgha”nti maññasi,
atk-s0301a0:932_5: “idāni tava avasiṭṭhaṃ ettakaṃ āyū”ti ahaṃ jānāmi.
atk-s0301a0:932_13: Yamahaṃ vijaññāti yaṃ ahaṃ tayā kathitaṃ jāneyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:933_0: Idānissa ācikkhanto bhagavā yaṃ tvaṃ apāyesītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:933_2: pubbe kiresa kulaghare nibbattitvā kāmesu ādīnavaṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a0:933_3: “jātijarāmaraṇassa antaṃ karissāmī”ti nikkhamma isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiyo nibbattetvā abhiññāpādakajjhānassa
atk-s0301a0:933_4: lābhī hutvā gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ kāretvā jhānaratiyā vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a0:933_5: Tadā ca kālenakālaṃ satthavāhā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi marukantāraṃ paṭipajjanti.
atk-s0301a0:933_6: Marukantāre pana divā na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:933_8: Atha purimasakaṭassa aggayuge yuttabalibaddā gacchantā gacchantā nivattitvā āgatamaggābhimukhā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:933_9: sabbasakaṭāni tatheva nivattitvā aruṇe uggate nivattitabhāvaṃ jāniṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:934_0: Tāpasopi kālasseva paṇṇasālato nikkhamitvā paṇṇasāladvāre nisinno gaṅgaṃ olokayamāno addasa gaṅgaṃ mahatā
atk-s0301a0:934_3: “atthi nu kho imasmiṃ loke evarūpassa madhurodakassa alābhena kilissamānā sattā”ti?
atk-s0301a0:934_4: So evaṃ āvajjento marukantāre taṃ satthaṃ disvā ‘ime sattā mā nassantū’ti “ito cito ca mahāudakakkhandho
atk-s0301a0:934_5: chijjitvā marukantāre satthābhimukho gacchatū”ti abhiññācittena adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:934_6: Saha cittuppādena mātikāruḷhaṃ viya udakaṃ tattha agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:934_7: Manussā udakasaddena vuṭṭhāya udakaṃ disvā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā nhāyitvā pivitvā goṇepi pāyetvā sotthinā icchitaṭṭhānaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:934_8: Satthā taṃ brahmuno pubbakammaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:935_0: Aparasmimpi samaye tāpaso gaṅgātīre paṇṇasālaṃ māpetvā araññagāmakaṃ nissāya vasati.
atk-s0301a0:935_1: Tena ca samayena corā taṃ gāmaṃ paharitvā hatthasāraṃ gahetvā gāviyo ca karamare ca gahetvā gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:935_3: Tāpaso taṃ saddaṃ sutvā “kinnu kho eta”nti?
atk-s0301a0:935_4: Āvajjento “manussānaṃ bhayaṃ uppanna”nti ñatvā “mayi passante ime sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:935_5: samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena corānaṃ paṭipathe caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ māpesi.
atk-s0301a0:935_12: Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento dutiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:936_0: Puna ekasmiṃ samaye uparigaṅgāvāsikaṃ ekaṃ kulaṃ heṭṭhāgaṅgāvāsikena kulena saddhiṃ mittasanthavaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:936_2: bahuṃ khādanīyañceva bhojanīyañca gandhamālādīni ca āropetvā gaṅgāsotena āgacchati.
atk-s0301a0:936_3: Manussā khādamānā bhuñjamānā naccantā gāyantā devavimānena gacchantā viya balavasomanassā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:936_4: Gaṅgeyyako nāgo disvā kupito “ime mayi saññampi na karonti.
atk-s0301a0:936_5: Idāni ne samuddameva pāpessāmī”ti mahantaṃ attabhāvaṃ māpetvā udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā uṭṭhāya phaṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:936_13: “mayi passante sattā mā nassantū”ti abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā attabhāvaṃ pajahitvā supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā nāgarājassa dassesi.
atk-s0301a0:936_14: Nāgarājā bhīto phaṇaṃ saṃharitvā udakaṃ paviṭṭho,
atk-s0301a0:936_16: Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento tatiyaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:937_0: Aparasmimpi samaye esa isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā kesavo nāma tāpaso ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:937_1: Tena samayena amhākaṃ bodhisatto kappo nāma māṇavo kesavassa baddhacaro antevāsiko hutvā ācariyassa kiṃkārapaṭissāvī
atk-s0301a0:937_3: Kesavo tena vinā vasituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:937_5: Satthā idampi tassa pubbakammaṃ dassento catutthaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:938_3: “sammā buddhimā vatasampanno aya”nti evaṃ maññamāno kappo tava antevāsiko ahosiṃ ahaṃ so tena samayenāti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:938_4: Aññepi jānāsīti na kevalaṃ mayhaṃ āyumeva,
atk-s0301a0:938_6: Tathā hi buddhoti tathā hi tvaṃ buddho,
atk-s0301a0:938_9: Tathā hi tyāyaṃ jalitānubhāvoti yasmā ca tvaṃ buddho,
atk-s0301a0:938_11: Obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhatīti sabbaṃ brahmalokaṃ obhāsayanto tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a0:940_1: Pañcame tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvāti tejokasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya,
atk-s0301a0:940_2: “sarīrato jālā nikkhamantū”ti adhiṭṭhahanto adhiṭṭhānacittānubhāvena sakalasarīrato jālā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0301a0:940_5: Tasmiṃ brahmaloketi kasmā thero tattha agamāsi?
atk-s0301a0:940_6: Therassa kira tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā tassa brahmuno upari nisinnaṃ tathāgataṃ disvā “aṭṭhivedhī ayaṃ puggalo,
atk-s0301a0:940_10: So hi brahmā tathāgatassa ceva tathāgatasāvakānañca ānubhāvaṃ adisvā abhabbo vinayaṃ upagantuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:940_12: Tattha tathāgatassa sarīrato uggatajālā sakalabrahmalokaṃ atikkamitvā ajaṭākāse pakkhandā,
atk-s0301a0:941_0: Passasi vītivattantanti imasmiṃ brahmaloke aññabrahmasarīravimānālaṅkārādīnaṃ pabhā atikkamamānaṃ buddhassa
atk-s0301a0:941_1: bhagavato pabhassaraṃ pabhaṃ passasīti pucchati. Na me, mārisa,
atk-s0301a0:941_3: “idhāgantuṃ samattho añño samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā natthī”ti pure diṭṭhi,
atk-s0301a0:941_6: Niccomhi sassatoti imassa kira brahmuno laddhidiṭṭhi sassatadiṭṭhi cāti dve diṭṭhiyo.
atk-s0301a0:941_7: Tatrāssa tathāgatañceva tathāgatasāvake ca passato laddhidiṭṭhi pahīnā.
atk-s0301a0:942_1: Therānañhi bhaṇḍagāhakadaharā viya brahmānampi pārisajjā brahmāno nāma honti.
atk-s0301a0:942_3: There kirassa tattakeneva kathāsallāpena vissāso udapādi,
atk-s0301a0:942_4: tasmā tasseva santikaṃ pesesi aññepīti yathā tumhe cattāro janā,
atk-s0301a0:942_11: Dibbasotaṃ pana tāsaṃ vasena āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:942_12: Bahūti evarūpā chaḷabhiññā buddhasāvakā bahū gaṇanapathaṃ atikkantā,
atk-s0301a0:942_13: sakalaṃ jambudīpaṃ kāsāvapajjotaṃ katvā vicarantīti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:944_1: Chaṭṭhe paccekaṃ dvārabāhanti ekeko ekekaṃ dvārabāhaṃ nissāya dvārapālā viya aṭṭhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:944_5: Etadavocāti etesaṃ nimmitabrahmānaṃ majjhe nisinno etaṃ “passasi me”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:945_0: Tayo supaṇṇāti gāthāya pañcasatāti satapadaṃ rūpavasena vā pantivasena vā yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:945_1: Rūpavasena tāva tayo supaṇṇāti tīṇi supaṇṇarūpasatāni.
atk-s0301a0:945_3: Bugghīnisā pañcasatāti byagghasadisā ekacce migā byagghīnisā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:945_8: Jhāyinoti jhāyissa mayhaṃ vimāne ayaṃ vibhūtīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:945_10: Uttarassaṃ disāyanti taṃ kira kanakavimānaṃ tesaṃ mahābrahmānaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhānato uttaradisāyaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:945_13: evarūpe kanakavimāne vasanto ahaṃ kassa aññassa upaṭṭhānaṃ gamissāmīti.
atk-s0301a0:945_14: Rūpe raṇaṃ disvāti rūpamhi jātijarābhaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ dosaṃ disvā.
atk-s0301a0:945_15: Sadā pavedhitanti sītādīhi ca niccaṃ pavedhitaṃ calitaṃ ghaṭṭitaṃ rūpaṃ disvā.
atk-s0301a0:945_16: Tasmā na rūpe ramati sumedhoti yasmā rūpe raṇaṃ passati,
atk-s0301a0:945_18: tasmā sumedho sundarapañño so satthā rūpe na ramatīti. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:947_1: Sattame appameyyaṃ paminantoti appameyyaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ “ettakaṃ sīlaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:947_4: Kodhavidvā vikappayeti ko idha vidvā medhāvī vikappeyya,
atk-s0301a0:947_6: Nivutaṃ taṃ maññeti yo pana puthujjano taṃ pametuṃ ārabhati,
atk-s0301a0:949_0: 179. Aṭṭhame akissavanti kissavā vuccati paññā, nippaññoti attho. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:951_1: Navame ābādhikoti “sāsapamattīhi pīḷakāhī”tiādinā nayena anantarasutte āgatena ābādhena ābādhiko.
atk-s0301a0:951_3: Turūti kokālikassa upajjhāyo turutthero nāma anāgāmiphalaṃ patvā brahmaloke nibbatto.
atk-s0301a0:951_5: “ayuttaṃ kokālikena kataṃ aggasāvake antimavatthunā abbhācikkhantenā”ti paramparāya brahmalokasampattaṃ kokālikassa pāpakammaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0301a0:951_7: ovadissāmi naṃ theresu cittapasādatthāyā”ti āgantvā tassa purato aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:951_12: Passa yāvañca teti passa yattakaṃ tayā aparaddhaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:951_13: attano nalāṭe mahāgaṇḍaṃ apassanto sāsapamattāya pīḷakāya maṃ codetabbaṃ maññasīti āha.
atk-s0301a0:952_1: gilaviso viya kassaci vacanaṃ na karissatī”ti ñatvā purisassa hītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:952_10: so taṃ aparādhaṃ mukhena vicināti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:952_11: Kalinā tenāti tena aparādhena sukhaṃ na vindati.
atk-s0301a0:952_12: Nindiyapasaṃsāya hi pasaṃsiyanindāya ca samakova vipāko.
atk-s0301a0:953_0: Sabbassāpi sahāpi attanāti sabbena sakenapi attanāpi saddhiṃ yo akkhesu dhanaparājayo nāma,
atk-s0301a0:953_2: Yo sugatesūti yo pana sammaggatesu puggalesu cittaṃ padusseyya,
atk-s0301a0:953_3: ayaṃ cittapadosova tato kalito mahantataro kali.
atk-s0301a0:954_0: Idāni tassa mahantatarabhāvaṃ dassento sataṃ sahassānantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:954_4: Yamariyagarahīti yaṃ ariye garahanto nirayaṃ upapajjati,
atk-s0301a0:956_1: Dasame kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti,
atk-s0301a0:956_4: Ayaṃ kira kokālikaraṭṭhe kokālikanagare kokālikaseṭṭhissa putto pabbajitvā pitarā kārāpite vihāre paṭivasati cūḷakokālikoti nāmena,
atk-s0301a0:956_7: Bhagavati pana sāvatthiyaṃ viharante dve aggasāvakā pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ janapadacārikaṃ
atk-s0301a0:956_8: caramānā upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya vivekāvāsaṃ vasitukāmā te bhikkhū uyyojetvā attano pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0301a0:956_9: tasmiṃ janapade taṃ nagaraṃ patvā taṃ vihāraṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:956_13: mā kassaci ārocehī”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā vasiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:956_18: vasitvā sve gamissathā”ti vatvā dutiyadivase nagaraṃ pavisitvā manusse āmantesi – “āvuso,
atk-s0301a0:956_19: tumhe aggasāvake idhāgantvā vasamānepi na jānātha,
atk-s0301a0:956_24: kiṃ na passatha dve bhikkhū therāsane nisīdante,
atk-s0301a0:956_26: Te khippaṃ sannipatitvā sappiphāṇitādīni ceva cīvaradussāni ca saṃhariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:957_1: “paramappicchā aggasāvakā payuttavācāya uppannaṃ lābhaṃ na sādiyissanti,
atk-s0301a0:957_3: Taṃ taṃ lābhaṃ gāhāpetvā therānaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:957_6: Kokāliko “kathaṃ hi nāma attanā agaṇhantā mayhampi adāpetvā pakkamissantī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:957_8: Tepi bhagavato santikaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā puna attano parisaṃ ādāya janapadacārikaṃ carantā
atk-s0301a0:957_9: anupubbena tasmiṃ raṭṭhe tameva nagaraṃ paccāgamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:957_10: Nāgarā there sañjānitvā saha parikkhārehi dānaṃ sajjitvā nagaramajjhe maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:957_18: idāni pana pāpabhikkhū jātā”ti vatvā “mūlaṭṭhāneyeva nesaṃ patiṭṭhaṃ bhindissāmī”ti taramānarūpo nikkhamitvā
atk-s0301a0:957_20: Ayameva kokāliko iminā ca kāraṇena upasaṅkamīti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:958_0: Bhagavā taṃ turitaturitaṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva āvajjento aññāsi –
atk-s0301a0:958_4: theresu aparajjhitvā kālaṅkato ekaṃsena padumaniraye nibbattissatī”ti disvā,
atk-s0301a0:958_5: “sāriputtamoggallānepi nāma garahantaṃ sutvā na nisedhetī”ti vādamocanatthaṃ ariyūpavādassa ca mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a0:958_7: Tattha mā hevanti mā evaṃ abhaṇi.
atk-s0301a0:958_8: Saddhāyikoti saddhāya ākaro pasādāvaho saddhātabbavacano vā.
atk-s0301a0:959_1: Okāsakataṃ hi kammaṃ na sakkā paṭibāhituṃ,
atk-s0301a0:959_2: taṃ tassa tattha ṭhātuṃ na adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:959_4: Sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosīti kesaggamattampi okāsaṃ āvajjetvā sakalasarīraṃ aṭṭhīni bhinditvā uggatāhi pīḷakāhi ajjhotthaṭaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:959_5: Yasmā pana buddhānubhāvena tathārūpaṃ kammaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāve vipākaṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:959_11: Tāsu bhinnāsu sakalasarīraṃ panasapakkaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:959_12: So pakkena gattena jetavanadvārakoṭṭhake visagilito maccho viya kadalipattesu sayi.
atk-s0301a0:959_17: attanoyeva mukhaṃ nissāya anayabyasanaṃ patto”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:959_20: Ārakkhakadevatānaṃ ākāsadevatāti iminā upāyena yāva akaniṭṭhabhavanā ekadhikāro udapādi.
atk-s0301a0:959_21: Athassa upajjhāyo āgantvā ovādaṃ agaṇhantaṃ ñatvā garahitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a0:960_1: Padumaṃ nirayanti pāṭiyekko padumanirayo nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a0:960_2: avīcimahānirayamhiyeva pana padumagaṇanāya paccitabbe ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:961_0: Vīsatikhārikoti māgadhakena patthena cattāro patthā kosalaraṭṭhe ekapattho hoti,
atk-s0301a0:961_7: Abbudo nirayoti abbudo nāma pāṭiyekko nirayo natthi.
atk-s0301a0:962_1: yatheva hi sataṃ satasahassāni koṭi hoti,
atk-s0301a0:962_2: evaṃ sataṃ satasahassakoṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:966_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhame sappinītīreti sappinīnāmikāya nadiyā tīre.
atk-s0301a0:966_2: Sanaṅkumāroti so kira pañcasikhakumārakakāle jhānaṃ bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbatto kumārakavaṇṇeneva vicarati.
atk-s0301a0:966_7: Ye gottapaṭisārinoti ye janetasmiṃ gottaṃ paṭisaranti tesu loke gottapaṭisārīsu khattiyo seṭṭho.
atk-s0301a0:966_9: ambaṭṭhasuttapariyāyena vipassanāñāṇaṃ manomayiddhi cha abhiññāyoti imāhi vā aṭṭhahi vijjāhi,
atk-s0301a0:966_10: sīlesu paripūrakāritā indriyesu guttadvāratā bhojane mattaññutā jāgariyānuyogo satta saddhammā cattāri
atk-s0301a0:966_11: rūpāvacarajjhānānīti evaṃ pannarasadhammabhedena caraṇena ca samannāgato.
atk-s0301a0:966_12: So seṭṭho devamānuseti so khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo devesu ca manussesu ca seṭṭho uttamoti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:968_1: Dutiye acirapakkanteti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā nacirasseva veḷuvanato gayāsīsaṃ gate.
atk-s0301a0:970_3: gacchāmissa santike ṭhatvā sāsanānucchavikaṃ vīriyapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ gāthaṃ vakkhāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:971_0: Pantānīti janataṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāre ṭhitāni.
atk-s0301a0:971_1: Saṃyojanavippamokkhāti tāni ca senāsanāni sevamāno na cīvarādīnaṃ atthāya seveyya,
atk-s0301a0:971_3: Saṅghe vaseti tesu senāsanesu ratiṃ alabhanto upaṭṭhākādīnaṃ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṃ gadrabhapiṭṭhe rajaṃ
atk-s0301a0:971_4: viya uppatanto araññe acaritvā saṅghamajjhe vaseyya.
atk-s0301a0:971_5: Rakkhitatto satīmāti tattha ca vasanto sagavacaṇḍo goṇo viya sabrahmacārino avijjhanto aghaṭṭento rakkhitatto satipaṭṭhānaparāyaṇo hutvā vaseyya.
atk-s0301a0:972_0: Idāni saṅghe vasamānassa bhikkhuno bhikkhācāravattaṃ ācikkhanto kulākulantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:972_2: Sevetha pantāni senāsanānīti saṅghamajjhaṃ otaritvā vasamānopi dhurapariveṇe tālanāḷikeraādīni ropetvā upaṭṭhākādisaṃsaṭṭho na vaseyya,
atk-s0301a0:972_3: cittakallataṃ pana janetvā cittaṃ hāsetvā tosetvā puna pantasenāsane vaseyyāti araññasseva vaṇṇaṃ katheti.
atk-s0301a0:973_0: Yattha bheravāti yasmiṃ ṭhāne bhayajanakā saviññāṇakā sīhabyagghādayo,
atk-s0301a0:973_3: Nisīdi tattha bhikkhūti tādise ṭhāne bhikkhu nisinno.
atk-s0301a0:973_5: bhagavā yathā tumhe etarahi tatraṭṭhakabheravārammaṇāni ceva sarīsape ca vijjunicchāraṇādīni ca amanasikatvā nisinnā,
atk-s0301a0:974_0: Jātu me diṭṭhanti ekaṃsena mayā diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:974_1: Na yidaṃ itihītihanti idaṃ itiha itihāti na takkahetu vā nayahetu vā piṭakasampadānena vā ahaṃ vadāmi.
atk-s0301a0:975_0: Dasā ca dasadhā dasāti ettha dasāti daseva,
atk-s0301a0:975_2: aññe ca dasuttaraṃ sekhasataṃ passāmīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:975_6: Saṅkhātuṃ nopi sakkomīti musāvādabhayena ettakā nāma puññabhāgino sattāti gaṇetuṃ na sakkomīti bahuṃ brahmadhammadesanaṃ sandhāya evamāha. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:977_1: Catutthe abhibhūsambhavanti abhibhū ca sambhavo ca.
atk-s0301a0:977_2: Tesu abhibhūthero sāriputtatthero viya paññāya aggo,
atk-s0301a0:977_12: Thero pana “pakativaṇṇaṃ vijahitvā nāgavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā dasseti,
atk-s0301a0:977_13: supaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā vā dassetī”tiādinā nayena āgataṃ anekappakāraṃ iddhivikubbanaṃ dassesi.
atk-s0301a0:977_14: Imā gāthāyo abhāsīti thero kira cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:977_15: “kathaṃ desitā nu kho dhammadesanā sabbesaṃ piyā assa manāpā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:977_17: “sabbepi pāsaṇḍā sabbe devamanussā attano attano samaye purisakāraṃ vaṇṇayanti,
atk-s0301a0:977_20: evaṃ ayaṃ dhammadesanā sabbesaṃ piyā bhavissati manāpā”ti ñatvā tīsu piṭakesu vicinitvā imā gāthā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:978_3: Maccuno senanti maccuno senā nāma kilesasenā,
atk-s0301a0:978_8: Kiṃ pana katvā thero sahassilokadhātuṃ viññāpesīti?
atk-s0301a0:978_9: Nīlakasiṇaṃ tāva samāpajjitvā sabbattha ālokaṭṭhāne andhakāraṃ phari,
atk-s0301a0:978_16: Atha tesaṃ theroti vadantānaṃ imā gāthāyo abhāsi,
atk-s0301a0:978_17: sabbe osaṭāya parisāya majjhe nisīditvā dhammaṃ desentassa viya saddaṃ suṇiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:980_1: Pañcame upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti yatheva hi kadambanadītīrato rājamātuvihāradvārena thūpārāmaṃ gantabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:980_2: evaṃ hiraññavatikāya nāma nadiyā pārimatīrato sālavanaṃ uyyānaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:980_5: Yathā thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati,
atk-s0301a0:980_6: evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā.
atk-s0301a0:980_9: Antarena yamakasālānanti mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbitvā ṭhitasālānaṃ antarikāya.
atk-s0301a0:980_11: Iti bhagavā yathā nāma maraṇamañce nipanno mahaddhano kuṭumbiko puttānaṃ dhanasāraṃ ācikkheyya,
atk-s0301a0:980_12: evamevaṃ parinibbānamañce nipanno pañcacattālīsa vassāni dinnaṃ ovādaṃ sabbaṃ ekasmiṃ appamādapadeyeva pakkhipitvā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:980_13: Ayaṃ tathāgatassa pacchimā vācāti idaṃ pana saṅgītikārānaṃ vacanaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:981_0: Ito paraṃ yaṃ parinibbānaparikammaṃ katvā bhagavā parinibbuto,
atk-s0301a0:981_2: atha kho bhagavā paṭhamaṃ jhānantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:981_3: Tattha saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpanne bhagavati assāsapassāsānaṃ appavattiṃ disvā,
atk-s0301a0:981_13: Thero kira satthārā saddhiṃyeva taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjanto yāva nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavuṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:981_16: antonirodhe ca kālaṃkiriyā nāma natthī”ti aññāsi.
atk-s0301a0:982_0: Atha kho bhagavā saññāvedayitanirodhasamāpattito vuṭṭhahitvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajji…pe…
atk-s0301a0:982_1: tatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjīti ettha pana bhagavā catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0301a0:982_4: pannarasasu ṭhānesu catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0301a0:982_5: Dasasu asubhesu dvattiṃsākāre aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu mettākaruṇāmuditesu ānāpāne paricchedākāseti imesu tāva catuvīsatiyā ṭhānesu paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0301a0:982_6: Ṭhapetvā pana dvattiṃsākārañca dasa ca asubhāni sesesu terasasu dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ…
atk-s0301a0:982_8: Aṭṭhasu pana kasiṇesu upekkhābrahmavihāre ānāpāne paricchedākāse catūsu arūpesūti imesu pannarasasu ṭhānesu catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajji.
atk-s0301a0:982_10: Nibbānapuraṃ pavisanto pana bhagavā dhammassāmi sabbāpi catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo pavisitvā
atk-s0301a0:982_11: videsaṃ gacchanto ñātijanaṃ āliṅgetvā viya sabbasamāpattisukhaṃ anubhavitvā paviṭṭho.
atk-s0301a0:983_0: Catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā samanantarā bhagavā parinibbāyīti ettha ca jhānasamanantaraṃ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaranti,
atk-s0301a0:983_2: Catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhāya bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ jhānasamanantaraṃ nāma,
atk-s0301a0:983_3: catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhahitvā puna jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇassa tattheva parinibbānaṃ paccavekkhaṇasamanantaraṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:983_5: Bhagavā pana jhānaṃ samāpajjitvā jhānā vuṭṭhāya jhānaṅgāni paccavekkhitvā bhavaṅgacittena abyākatena dukkhasaccena parinibbāyi.
atk-s0301a0:983_6: Ye hi keci buddhā vā paccekabuddhā vā ariyasāvakā vā antamaso kunthakipillikaṃ upādāya sabbe bhavaṅgacitteneva abyākatena dukkhasaccena kālaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a0:984_6: Tadāsīti “saha parinibbānā mahābhūmicālo ahosī”ti evaṃ mahāparinibbāne vuttaṃ bhūmicālaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a0:984_7: So hi lomahaṃsanako ca bhiṃsanako ca āsi.
atk-s0301a0:984_11: Santimārabbhāti anupādisesaṃ nibbānaṃ ārabbha paṭicca sandhāya.
atk-s0301a0:984_16: na vedanānuvattī hutvā ito cito samparivatti.
atk-s0301a0:984_17: Vimokkhoti kenaci dhammena anāvaraṇavimokkho sabbaso apaññattibhāvūpagamo pajjotanibbānasadiso jātoti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:990_4: dhanañjānigottā matthakaṃ bhinditvā nikkhantāti tesaṃ laddhi.
atk-s0301a0:990_6: So kira brāhmaṇo micchādiṭṭhiko “buddho dhammo saṅgho”ti vutte kaṇṇe pidahati,
atk-s0301a0:990_9: Brāhmaṇo dānaṃ dento pañcasatānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ appodakaṃ pāyāsaṃ deti,
atk-s0301a0:990_11: Brāhmaṇassa dānadivase brāhmaṇī tassa vasavattitāya pahīnamaccheratāya ca sahatthā parivisati.
atk-s0301a0:990_12: Brāhmaṇiyā pana dānadivase brāhmaṇo pātova gharā nikkhamitvā palāyati.
atk-s0301a0:990_13: Athekadivasaṃ brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiyā saddhiṃ asammantetvā pañcasate brāhmaṇe nimantetvā brāhmaṇiṃ āha –
atk-s0301a0:990_14: “sve bhoti amhākaṃ ghare pañcasatā brāhmaṇā bhuñjissantī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:990_18: Yaṃ pana tvaṃ ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi khipitvāpi ukkāsitvāpi “namo buddhassā”ti tassa muṇḍakassa samaṇakassa namakkāraṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a0:990_20: Taṃ hi sutvā brāhmaṇā anattamanā honti,
atk-s0301a0:990_22: Tvaṃ brāhmaṇehi vā bhijja devehi vā,
atk-s0301a0:990_23: ahaṃ pana satthāraṃ anussaritvā na sakkomi anamassamānā saṇṭhātunti.
atk-s0301a0:990_24: Bhoti kulasatike gāme gāmadvārampi tāva pidahituṃ vāyamanti,
atk-s0301a0:990_25: tvaṃ dvīhaṅgulehi pidahitabbaṃ mukhaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ bhojanakālamattaṃ pidahituṃ na sakkosīti.
atk-s0301a0:990_26: Evaṃ punappunaṃ kathetvāpi so nivāretuṃ asakkonto ussīsake ṭhapitaṃ maṇḍalaggakhaggaṃ gahetvā –
atk-s0301a0:990_27: “bhoti sace sve brāhmaṇesu nisinnesu taṃ muṇḍasamaṇakaṃ namassasi,
atk-s0301a0:990_28: iminā taṃ khaggena pādatalato paṭṭhāya yāva kesamatthakā kaḷīraṃ viya koṭṭetvā rāsiṃ karissāmī”ti imaṃ gāthaṃ abhāsi –
atk-s0301a0:992_0: Kaḷīramiva chejjāmi, yadi micchaṃ na kāhasi.
atk-s0301a0:994_0: Sace saṅghoti kittesi, jīvantī me nivesane”ti.
atk-s0301a0:995_0: Ariyasāvikā pana pathavī viya duppakampā, sineru viya dupparivattiyā. Sā tena naṃ evamāha –
atk-s0301a0:999_0: Dhītāhaṃ buddhaseṭṭhassa, chinda vā maṃ vadhassu vā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1000_0: Evaṃ dhanañjānigajjitaṃ nāma gajjantī pañca gāthāsatāni abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1000_1: Brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇiṃ parāmasituṃ vā paharituṃ vā asakkonto “bhoti yaṃ te ruccati,
atk-s0301a0:1000_2: taṃ karohī”ti vatvā khaggaṃ sayane khipi.
atk-s0301a0:1000_3: Punadivase gehaṃ haritupalittaṃ kārāpetvā lājāpuṇṇaghaṭamālāgandhādīhi tattha tattha alaṅkārāpetvā pañcannaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1000_4: brāhmaṇasatānaṃ navasappisakkharamadhuyuttaṃ appodakapāyāsaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā kālaṃ ārocāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:1001_0: Brāhmaṇīpi pātova gandhodakena sayaṃ nhāyitvā sahassagghanakaṃ ahatavatthaṃ nivāsetvā pañcasatagghanakaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1001_1: ekaṃsaṃ katvā sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitā suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā bhattagge brāhmaṇe parivisamānā tehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0301a0:1001_2: ekapantiyaṃ nisinnassa tassa brāhmaṇassa bhattaṃ upasaṃharantī dunnikkhitte dārubhaṇḍe pakkhali.
atk-s0301a0:1001_5: Satisampannatāya pana pāyāsapātiṃ achaḍḍetvā saṇikaṃ otāretvā bhūmiyaṃ saṇṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ brāhmaṇasatānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1001_6: majjhe sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā yena veḷuvanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1002_0: Tasmiñca samaye tesu brāhmaṇesu keci bhuttā honti,
atk-s0301a0:1002_4: Te taṃ saddaṃ sutvāva sinerumattena muggarena sīse pahaṭā viya kaṇṇesu sūlena viddhā viya dukkhadomanassaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1002_5: paṭisaṃvediyamānā “iminā aññaladdhikena mayaṃ gharaṃ pavesitā”ti kujjhitvā hatthe piṇḍaṃ chaḍḍetvā mukhena
atk-s0301a0:1002_6: gahitaṃ niṭṭhubhitvā dhanuṃ disvā kākā viya brāhmaṇaṃ akkosamānā disāvidisā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1002_7: Brāhmaṇo evaṃ bhijjitvā gacchante brāhmaṇe disvā brāhmaṇiṃ sīsato paṭṭhāya oloketvā,
atk-s0301a0:1002_8: “idameva bhayaṃ sampassamānā mayaṃ hiyyo paṭṭhāya bhotiṃ yācantā na labhimhā”ti nānappakārehi brāhmaṇiṃ akkositvā,
atk-s0301a0:1003_1: na sakkā gantvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā vatvā santajjetuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1003_2: ekameva naṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī”ti gacchantova “kiṃsu chetvā”ti gāthaṃ abhisaṅkharitvā –
atk-s0301a0:1003_10: atha naṃ ‘tvaṃ rāgādīnampi vadhaṃ na icchasi.
atk-s0301a0:1003_13: Iti imaṃ ubhatokoṭikaṃ pañhaṃ samaṇo gotamo neva gilituṃ na uggilituṃ sakkhissatī”ti cintetvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:1003_14: Sammodīti attano paṇḍitatāya kuddhabhāvaṃ adassetvā madhurakathaṃ kathento sammodi.
atk-s0301a0:1005_2: pañcamattehi pana gāthā satehi tathāgataṃ akkosanto āgatoti.
atk-s0301a0:1005_4: Kupito anattamanoti “samaṇena gotamena mayhaṃ jeṭṭhakabhātaraṃ pabbājentena jāni katā,
atk-s0301a0:1005_5: pakkho bhinno”ti kodhena kupito domanassena ca anattamano hutvāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1005_6: Akkosatīti “corosi, bālosi, mūḷhosi, thenosi, oṭṭhosi, meṇḍosi, goṇosi,
atk-s0301a0:1005_12: idāni te rājakulaṃ gantvā daṇḍaṃ āropessāmī”tiādīni vadanto paribhāsati nāma.
atk-s0301a0:1006_7: “Isayo nāma kupitā sapanaṃ denti kisavacchādayo viyā”ti anussavavasena “sapati maṃ maññe samaṇo gotamo”ti bhayaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0301a0:1007_2: Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tasseva puggalassa tena kodhena pāpaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1007_3: Sato upasammatīti satiyā samannāgato hutvā adhivāseti.
atk-s0301a0:1007_12: Akovidāti tasmiṃ dhamme akusalā andhabālaputhujjanā. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1009_3: Jayañcevassa taṃ hotīti asseva taṃ jayaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1009_6: Yā titikkhā vijānato adhivāsanāya guṇaṃ vijānantassa titikkhā adhivāsanā,
atk-s0301a0:1009_8: Bālo pana pharusaṃ bhaṇanto “mayhaṃ jayo”ti kevalaṃ jayaṃ maññati. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1011_2: nānappakāraṃ pana suddhañca sambhārayuttañca kañjikaṃ kāretvā vikkiṇāpento bahudhanaṃ saṅkharīti “bilaṅgikabhāradvājo”ti
atk-s0301a0:1011_4: Tuṇhībhūtoti “tayo me jeṭṭhakabhātaro iminā pabbājitā”ti ativiya kuddho kiñci vattuṃ asakkonto tuṇhībhūto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1013_7: iti me bhavaṃ gotamo jānātūti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1013_10: Na hiṃsatīti na viheṭheti na dukkhāpeti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1015_2: jaṭāpañhassa pana pucchitattā saṅgītikārehi evaṃ vutto.
atk-s0301a0:1017_2: suddhikapañhassa pana pucchitattā saṅgītikārehi evaṃ vutto.
atk-s0301a0:1017_6: So sujjhati na aññā itarā pajāti so tevijjo brāhmaṇo sujjhati,
atk-s0301a0:1017_7: ayaṃ pana aññā nāmikā pajā na sujjhatīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1017_8: Bahumpi palapaṃ jappanti bahumpi palapaṃ jappanto,
atk-s0301a0:1019_2: aggi paricaraṇavasena panassa saṅgītikārehi etaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1019_5: Bhagavā kira paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1019_6: “ayaṃ brāhmaṇo evarūpaṃ aggapāyāsaṃ gahetvā ‘mahābrahmānaṃ bhojemī’ti aggimhi jhāpento aphalaṃ karoti apāyamaggaṃ okkamati,
atk-s0301a0:1019_9: micchādiṭṭhiṃ bhinditvā pabbājetvā cattāro magge ceva cattāri ca phalāni demī”ti,
atk-s0301a0:1019_10: tasmā pubbaṇhasamaye rājagahaṃ pavisitvā tattha aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1020_1: Jātimāti yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā parisuddhāya jātiyā samannāgato.
atk-s0301a0:1020_2: Sutavā bahūti bahu nānappakāre ganthe sutavā.
atk-s0301a0:1020_3: Somaṃ bhuñjeyyāti so tevijjo brāhmaṇo imaṃ pāyāsaṃ bhuñjituṃ yutto,
atk-s0301a0:1021_1: Saggāpāyanti dibbena cakkhunā saggampi apāyampi passati.
atk-s0301a0:1021_4: Brāhmaṇo bhavanti avīcito yāva bhavaggā bhotā gotamena sadiso jātisampanno khīṇāsavabrāhmaṇo natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1022_0: Evañca pana vatvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ pūretvā dasabalassa pāyāsaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0301a0:1022_1: Satthā uppattiṃ dīpetvā bhojanaṃ paṭikkhipanto gāthābhigītaṃ metiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1022_5: mayhaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhikkhācāravattena ṭhitassa kaṭacchumattampi dātuṃ nāsakkhi,
atk-s0301a0:1022_6: idāni pana mayā tuyhaṃ kilañjamhi tile vitthārentena viya sabbe buddhaguṇā pakāsitā,
atk-s0301a0:1022_7: iti gāyanena gāyitvā laddhaṃ viya idaṃ bhojanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1022_11: atthañca dhammañca sampassantānaṃ “evarūpaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjitabba”nti esa dhammo na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1022_16: dhamme sati dhammaṃ apekkhitvā dhamme patiṭṭhāya jīvitaṃ kappentānaṃ esā vutti ayaṃ ājīvo –
atk-s0301a0:1023_1: ahaṃ pubbe samaṇassa gotamassa guṇe vā aguṇe vā na jānāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1023_2: Idāni panassāhaṃ guṇe ñatvā mama gehe asītikoṭimattaṃ dhanaṃ sāsane vippakiritukāmo jāto,
atk-s0301a0:1023_5: Atha bhagavā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pesetvā tassa cittācāraṃ vīmaṃsanto,
atk-s0301a0:1023_7: Yaṃ hi bhojanaṃ ārabbha kathā uppannā,
atk-s0301a0:1023_9: sesā niddosā”ti brāhmaṇassa catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ dānadvāraṃ dassento aññena cātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1023_13: aññehi tayā “pariccajissāmī”ti sallakkhitehi cīvarādīhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahassu.
atk-s0301a0:1023_14: Khettaṃ hi taṃ puññapekkhassa hotīti etaṃ tathāgatasāsanaṃ nāma puññapekkhassa puññatthikassa tuyhaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1023_15: appepi bīje bahusassaphaladāyakaṃ sukhettaṃ viya paṭiyattaṃ hoti. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1025_1: Navame sundarikabhāradvājoti sundarikāya nadiyā tīre aggijuhaṇena evaṃladdhanāmo.
atk-s0301a0:1025_5: Ko nu kho imaṃ habyasesaṃ bhuñjeyyāti so kira brāhmaṇo aggimhi hutāvasesaṃ pāyāsaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1025_8: taṃ yadi brahmuno mukhato jātassa brāhmaṇassa dadeyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1025_9: evaṃ me pitarā saha puttopi santappito bhaveyya,
atk-s0301a0:1025_11: So brāhmaṇassa dassanatthaṃ uṭṭhāyāsanā catuddisā anuvilokesi,
atk-s0301a0:1026_1: Sasīsaṃ pārutaṃ nisinnanti saha sīsena pārutakāyaṃ nisinnaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1026_3: Bhagavā kira paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento imaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1026_4: ayaṃ brāhmaṇo evarūpaṃ aggapāyāsaṃ gahetvā “mahābrahmānaṃ bhojemī”ti aggimhi jhāpento aphalaṃ karoti…pe…
atk-s0301a0:1026_5: cattāro magge ceva cattāri ca phalāni demīti.
atk-s0301a0:1026_6: Tasmā kālasseva vuṭṭhāya sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya gantvā vuttanayena tasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:1026_15: atha maṃ so disvā kathaṃ pavattessati,
atk-s0301a0:1026_16: tassāhaṃ kathānusārena dhammaṃ desessāmī”ti kathāpavattanatthaṃ evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1027_2: Imassa dakkhiṇodakaṃ datvā imaṃ habyasesaṃ dassāmī”ti,
atk-s0301a0:1027_5: muṇḍako ayaṃ bhavanti sīse vivaritamatte nīcakesantaṃ disvā “muṇḍo”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1027_6: Tato suṭṭhutaraṃ olokento pavattamattampi sikhaṃ adisvā hīḷento “muṇḍako”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1027_9: Muṇḍāpi hīti kenaci kāraṇena muṇḍitasīsāpi honti.
atk-s0301a0:1028_0: Mā jātiṃ pucchāti yadi dānassa mahapphalataṃ paccāsīsasi,
atk-s0301a0:1028_3: Caraṇañca pucchāti apica kho sīlādiguṇabhedaṃ caraṇaṃ puccha.
atk-s0301a0:1028_5: Idānissa tamatthaṃ vibhāvento kaṭṭhā have jāyati jātavedotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1028_8: na ca so sālādikaṭṭhā jātova aggikiccaṃ karoti, sāpāna-
atk-s0301a0:1028_10: attano pana acciyādiguṇasampattiyā yato vā tato vā jāto karotiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1028_11: Evaṃ na brāhmaṇakulādīsu jātova dakkhiṇeyyo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1028_15: Imāya dhitihiripamokkhāya guṇasampattiyā jātimā uttamadakkhiṇeyyo hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1029_3: catūhi vā maggavedehi kilesānaṃ antaṃ gato.
atk-s0301a0:1029_15: So juhati dakkhiṇeyyeti yo evaṃ kāle khīṇāsavaṃ āmantetvā tattha catupaccayadakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a0:1030_0: Iti brāhmaṇo bhagavato kathaṃ suṇanto pasīditvā idāni attano pasādaṃ āvikaronto addhā suyiṭṭhantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1030_2: addhā mama yidaṃ idāni suyiṭṭhañca suhutañca bhavissati,
atk-s0301a0:1030_3: pubbe pana aggimhi jhāpitaṃ niratthakaṃ ahosīti.
atk-s0301a0:1031_2: Tasmiṃ kira bhojane upahaṭamatteva “satthā bhuñjissatī”ti saññāya catūsu mahādīpesu dvīsu parittadīpasahassesu
atk-s0301a0:1031_3: devatā pupphaphalādīni ceva sappinavanītatelamadhuphāṇitādīni ca ādāya madhupaṭalaṃ pīḷetvā madhuṃ gaṇhantiyo
atk-s0301a0:1031_6: manussānañca oḷārikaṃ vatthūti tesaṃ tāva oḷārikavatthutāya sammā pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1031_7: Goyūse pana tilabījāni pakkhipitvā pakkattā oḷārikamissakaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1031_8: devānañca sukhumaṃ vatthūti tesaṃ sukhumavatthutāya sammā pariṇāmaṃ na gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1032_7: Appāṇaketi sappāṇakasmiṃ hi parittake udake pakkhitte pāṇakā maranti,
atk-s0301a0:1032_17: Ayaṃ hi brāhmaṇo taṃ pāyāsaṃ opilāpetvā ummaggaṃ āruyha satthu santikaṃ anāgantvāva gaccheyya,
atk-s0301a0:1032_20: Athassāhaṃ dhammadesanāya micchādiṭṭhigahaṇaṃ bhinditvā sāsane otāretvā amatapānaṃ pāyessāmī”ti adhiṭṭhānabalena evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1033_1: Bahiddhā hi etanti etaṃ dārujjhāpanaṃ nāma ariyadhammato bahiddhā.
atk-s0301a0:1033_6: Ajjhattamevujjalayāmi jotinti niyakajjhatte attano santānasmiṃyeva ñāṇajotiṃ jālemi.
atk-s0301a0:1033_9: Brahmacariyaṃ carāmīti bodhimaṇḍe caritaṃ brahmacariyaṃ gahetvā evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1034_1: khāribhāroti yathā khāribhāro khandhena vayhamāno upari ṭhitopi akkantakkantaṭṭhāne pathaviyā saddhiṃ phuseti,
atk-s0301a0:1034_2: evameva jātigottakulādīni mānavatthūni nissāya ussāpito mānopi tattha tattha issaṃ uppādento catūsu apāyesu saṃsīdāpeti.
atk-s0301a0:1034_5: Kodho dhūmoti tava ñāṇaggissa upakkilesaṭṭhena kodho dhumo.
atk-s0301a0:1034_6: Tena hi te upakkiliṭṭho ñāṇaggi na virocati.
atk-s0301a0:1034_7: Bhasmani mosavajjanti nirojaṭṭhena musāvādo chārikā nāma.
atk-s0301a0:1034_8: Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno aggi na joteti,
atk-s0301a0:1034_9: evaṃ te musāvādena paṭicchannaṃ ñāṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1034_10: Jivhā sujāti yathā tuyhaṃ suvaṇṇarajatalohakaṭṭhamattikāsu aññataramayā yāgayajanatthāya sujā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1034_11: evaṃ mayhaṃ dhammayāgaṃ yajanatthāya pahūtajivhā sujāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1034_12: Hadayaṃ jotiṭṭhānanti yathā tuyhaṃ nadītīre jotiṭṭhānaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1034_13: evaṃ mayhaṃ dhammayāgassa yajanaṭṭhānatthena sattānaṃ hadayaṃ jotiṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1035_0: Dhammo rahadoti yathā tvaṃ aggiṃ paricaritvā dhūmachārikasedakiliṭṭhasarīro sundarikaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā nhāyasi,
atk-s0301a0:1035_1: evaṃ mayhaṃ sundarikāsadisena bāhirena rahadena attho natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1035_3: tatrāhaṃ pāṇasatampi pāṇasahassampi caturāsītipāṇasahassānipi ekappahārena nhāpemi.
atk-s0301a0:1035_4: Sīlatitthoti tassa pana me dhammarahadassa catupārisuddhisīlaṃ titthanti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1035_5: Anāviloti yathā tuyhaṃ sundarikā nadī catūhi pañcahi ekato nhāyantehi heṭṭhupariyavālikā āluḷā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1035_7: anekasatasahassesupi pāṇesu otaritvā nhāyantesu so anāvilo vippasannova hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1035_8: Sabbhi sataṃ pasatthoti paṇḍitehi paṇḍitānaṃ pasaṭṭho.
atk-s0301a0:1036_0: Idāni ariyamaggarahadassa aṅgāni uddharitvā dassento saccaṃ dhammotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1036_8: Sammādiṭṭhiyā pana gahitāya taggatikattā sammāsaṅkappo gahitova hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1036_14: Dhammotipadena diṭṭhi saṅkappo vāyāmo sati samādhīti pañcaṅgāni gahitāni.
atk-s0301a0:1036_18: Majjhe sitāti sassatucchede vajjetvā majjhe nissitā.
atk-s0301a0:1036_20: Sa tujjubhūtesu namo karohīti ettha ta-
atk-s0301a0:1036_22: sa tvaṃ ujubhūtesu khīṇāsavesu namo karohīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1036_23: Tamahaṃ naraṃ dhammasārīti brūmīti yo evaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0301a0:1036_24: tamahaṃ puggalaṃ “dhammasārī eso dhammasāriyā paṭicchanno”ti ca “kusaladhammehi akusaladhamme sāretvā ṭhito”ti vāti vadāmīti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1038_1: Dasame aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍeti paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento tassa brāhmaṇassa arahattassa upanissayaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1038_2: disvā “gacchāmissa saṅgahaṃ karissāmī”ti gantvā tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe viharati.
atk-s0301a0:1038_3: Naṭṭhā hontīti kasitvā vissaṭṭhā aṭavimukhā caramānā brāhmaṇe bhuñjituṃ gate palātā honti.
atk-s0301a0:1038_6: Ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāyāti uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā,
atk-s0301a0:1038_8: Parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti kammaṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ satiṃ ṭhapayitvā,
atk-s0301a0:1038_11: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti sūpaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā,
atk-s0301a0:1038_16: Tena vuccati parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā”ti evaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttanayenapettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a0:1038_19: Evaṃ nisīdanto ca pana chabbaṇṇā ghanabuddharasmiyo vissajjetvā nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:1039_0: Ajjasaṭṭhiṃ na dissantīti ajja chadivasamattakā paṭṭhāya na dissanti.
atk-s0301a0:1039_2: Tena kira tilakhette vapite tadaheva devo vassitvā tile paṃsumhi osīdāpesi,
atk-s0301a0:1039_3: pupphaṃ vā phalaṃ vā gahetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1039_5: tesaṃ upari pāṇakā patitvā paṇṇāni khādiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:1039_7: Brāhmaṇo khettaṃ oloketuṃ gato te disvā –
atk-s0301a0:1040_0: Ussoḷhikāyāti ussāhena kaṇṇanaṅguṭṭhādīni ukkhipitvā vicarantā uppatanti.
atk-s0301a0:1040_1: Tassa kira anupubbena bhogesu parikkhīṇesu pakkhipitabbassa abhāvena tucchakoṭṭhā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1040_2: Tassa ito cito ca sattahi gharehi āgatā mūsikā te tucchakoṭṭhe pavisitvā uyyānakīḷaṃ kīḷantā viya naccanti,
atk-s0301a0:1041_1: Tassa kira brāhmaṇassa sayanatthāya santhataṃ tiṇapaṇṇasanthāraṃ koci antarantarā paṭijagganto natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1041_2: So divasaṃ araññe kammaṃ katvā sāyaṃ āgantvā tasmiṃ nipajjati.
atk-s0301a0:1041_3: Athassa uppāṭakapāṇakā sarīraṃ ekacchannaṃ karontā khādanti,
atk-s0301a0:1042_1: Yāva kira tassa brāhmaṇassa gehe vibhavamattā ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:1042_2: tāva tā vidhavāpi hutvā patikulesu vasituṃ labhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1042_4: tadā tā “pitugharaṃ gacchathā”ti sassusasurādīhi nikkaḍḍhitā tato tasseva gharaṃ āgantvā vasantiyo brāhmaṇassa
atk-s0301a0:1042_5: bhojanakāle “gacchatha ayyakena saddhiṃ bhuñjathā”ti putte pesenti,
atk-s0301a0:1042_6: tehi pātiyaṃ hatthesu otāritesu brāhmaṇo hatthassa okāsaṃ na labhati.
atk-s0301a0:1043_2: Sottaṃ pādena bodhetīti niddaṃ okkantaṃ pādena paharitvā pabodheti.
atk-s0301a0:1043_3: Ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo mūsikasaddena ubbāḷho uppāṭakehi ca khajjamāno sabbarattiṃ niddaṃ alabhitvā paccūsakāle niddāyati.
atk-s0301a0:1043_6: pacchā ca pubbe ca gahitassa iṇassa?
atk-s0301a0:1043_10: gaccha kammaṃ karohī”ti pādena paharitvā pabodheti.
atk-s0301a0:1044_0: Iṇāyikāti yesaṃ anena hatthato iṇaṃ gahitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1044_1: So kira kassaci hatthato ekaṃ kahāpaṇaṃ kassaci dve kassaci dasa…pe…
atk-s0301a0:1044_2: kassaci satanti evaṃ bahūnaṃ hatthato iṇaṃ aggahesi.
atk-s0301a0:1044_3: Te divā brāhmaṇaṃ apassantā “gehato taṃ nikkhantameva gaṇhissāmā”ti balavapaccūse gantvā codenti.
atk-s0301a0:1045_0: Bhagavā tena brāhmaṇena imāhi sattahi gāthāhi dukkhe kathite “yaṃ yaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0301a0:1045_2: sabbametaṃ mayhaṃ natthī”ti dassento paṭigāthāhi brāhmaṇassa dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.
atk-s0301a0:1045_3: Brāhmaṇo tā gāthā sutvā bhagavati pasanno saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a0:1045_4: Taṃ dassetuṃ evaṃ vutte bhāradvājagottotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1046_0: Tañca pana brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā pabbājetvā ādāya jetavanaṃ gantvā punadivase tena therena pacchāsamaṇena kosalarañño gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1046_1: Rājā “satthā āgato”ti sutvā pāsādā oruyha vanditvā hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā tathāgataṃ uparipāsādaṃ āropetvā
atk-s0301a0:1046_2: varāsane nisīdāpetvā gandhodakena pāde dhovitvā satapākatelena makkhetvā yāguṃ āharāpetvā rajatadaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1046_5: Rājā tathāgatassa pādesu patitvā, “sace me, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1046_13: paṭibalo ahaṃ palibodhaṃ dātuṃ, gaṇhatha, bhanteti.
atk-s0301a0:1046_15: Mahallakattheropi dīgharattaṃ chāto yāvadatthaṃ yāguṃ pivi.
atk-s0301a0:1046_16: Rājā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ datvā bhattakiccāvasāne bhagavantaṃ vanditvā āha –
atk-s0301a0:1046_17: “bhagavā tumhe paveṇiyā āgate okkākavaṃse uppajjitvā cakkavattisiriṃ pahāya pabbajitvā loke aggataṃ patto, ko nāma, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1047_5: Rañño “ekaṃ dve sataṃ sahassa”nti gaṇentassa aṅguliyo nappahonti.
atk-s0301a0:1047_7: nagare bheriṃ carāpehi ‘sabbe bahudhītikabrāhmaṇassa iṇāyikā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatantū”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1047_9: Rājā tesaṃ hatthato paṇṇāni āharāpetvā sabbesaṃ anūnaṃ dhanamadāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1047_16: etā pana satta dārikā mahāpalibodhā mayhanti.
atk-s0301a0:1047_17: Rājā yānāni pesetvā tassa dhītaro āharāpetvā attano dhītaro katvā taṃ taṃ kulagharaṃ pesetvā, “aññopi, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1047_25: mama santakaṃ tumhākaṃ bhikkhubhāvaṃ jānāthā”ti āha. Āma,
atk-s0301a0:1047_28: cīvarapiṇḍapātādayopi sabbe paccayā amhākaṃ santakā bhavissanti.
atk-s0301a0:1047_29: Tumhe tathāgatassa manaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1047_30: Thero tatheva appamatto samaṇadhammaṃ karonto nacirasseva āsavakkhayaṃ pattoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1051_2: Dakkhiṇāgirisminti rājagahaṃ parivāretvā ṭhitassa girino dakkhiṇabhāge janapado atthi,
atk-s0301a0:1051_5: Ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāmeti ekanāḷāti tassa gāmassa nāmaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1052_0: Tena kho pana samayenāti yaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā magadharaṭṭhe ekanāḷaṃ brāhmaṇagāmaṃ upanissāya dakkhiṇagirimahāvihāre
atk-s0301a0:1052_3: Kasibhāradvājassāti so brāhmaṇo kasiṃ nissāya jīvati,
atk-s0301a0:1052_8: balībaddānaṃ khandhesu ṭhapetvā yuge yottehi yojitānīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1053_8: sabbe setamālāhi ceva gandhapañcaṅgulīhi ca alaṅkatā paripuṇṇapañcaṅgā sabbalakkhaṇasampannā,
atk-s0301a0:1053_13: Evaṃ pañcasatā kassakā sabbe ahatasetavatthā gandhamālālaṅkatā dakkhiṇaaṃsakūṭesu patiṭṭhitapupphacumbaṭakā
atk-s0301a0:1053_14: haritālamanosilālañjanujjalagattā dasa dasa naṅgalā ekekagumbā hutvā gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1053_15: Naṅgalānaṃ sīsañca yugañca patodā ca suvaṇṇakhacitā.
atk-s0301a0:1054_0: Brāhmaṇo pana pageva massukammaṃ kārāpetvā nhāyitvā sugandhagandhehi vilitto pañcasatagghanakaṃ vatthaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1054_1: nivāsetvā sahassagghanakaṃ ekaṃsaṃ karitvā ekekissā aṅguliyā dve dveti vīsati aṅgulimuddikāyo kaṇṇesu
atk-s0301a0:1054_2: sīhakuṇḍalāni sīse brahmaveṭhanaṃ paṭimuñcitvā suvaṇṇamālaṃ kaṇṭhe katvā brāhmaṇagaṇaparivuto kammantaṃ vosāsati.
atk-s0301a0:1054_3: Athassa brāhmaṇī anekasatabhājanesu pāyāsaṃ pacāpetvā mahāsakaṭesu āropetvā gandhodakena nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā
atk-s0301a0:1054_5: Gehampissa haritupalittaṃ vippakiṇṇalājaṃ puṇṇaghaṭakadalidhajapaṭākāhi alaṅkataṃ gandhapupphādīhi sukatabalikammaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1054_6: khettañca tesu tesu ṭhānesu samussitaddhajapaṭākaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1055_0: Atha brāhmaṇo suvaṇṇapātiṃ dhovāpetvā pāyāsassa pūretvā sappimadhuphāṇitehi abhisaṅkharitvā naṅgalabalikammaṃ kārāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:1055_1: Brāhmaṇī pañcannaṃ kassakasatānaṃ suvaṇṇarajatakaṃsatambalohamayāni bhājanāni dāpetvā suvaṇṇakaṭacchuṃ gahetvā pāyāsena parivisantī gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1055_2: Brāhmaṇo pana balikammaṃ kāretvā rattabandhikāyo upāhanāyo ārohitvā rattasuvaṇṇadaṇḍakaṃ gahetvā,
atk-s0301a0:1056_0: Vihāre pana yattha yattha buddhā vasanti,
atk-s0301a0:1056_1: tattha tattha nesaṃ devasikaṃ pañca kiccāni bhavanti,
atk-s0301a0:1057_1: bhagavā hi pātova uṭṭhāya upaṭṭhākānuggahatthaṃ sarīraphāsukatthañca mukhadhovanādiparikammaṃ katvā yāva bhikkhācāravelā,
atk-s0301a0:1057_2: tāva vivittāsane vītināmetvā bhikkhācāravelāya nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattamādāya
atk-s0301a0:1057_3: kadāci ekako kadāci bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisati kadāci pakatiyā,
atk-s0301a0:1057_6: piṇḍāya pavisato lokanāthassa purato purato gantvā mudugatiyo vātā pathaviṃ sodhenti,
atk-s0301a0:1057_7: valāhakā udakaphusitāni muñcantā magge reṇuṃ vūpasametvā upari vitānaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0301a0:1057_8: apare vātā pupphāni upaharitvā magge okiranti.
atk-s0301a0:1057_13: Indakhīlassa anto ṭhapitamatte dakkhiṇapāde sarīrā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo nikkhamitvā suvaṇṇarasasiñcanāni
atk-s0301a0:1057_14: viya citrapaṭaparikkhittāni viya ca pāsādakūṭāgārādīni karontiyo ito cito ca vidhāvanti.
atk-s0301a0:1057_15: Hatthiassavihaṅgādayo sakasakaṭṭhānesu ṭhitāyeva madhurenākārena saddaṃ karonti,
atk-s0301a0:1057_16: tathā bherivīṇādīni tūriyāni manussānañca kāyūpagāni ābharaṇāni.
atk-s0301a0:1057_17: Tena saññāṇena manussā jānanti “ajja bhagavā idha piṇḍāya paviṭṭho”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1057_18: Te sunivatthā supārutā gandhapupphādīni ādāya gharā nikkhamitvā antaravīthiṃ paṭipajjitvā bhagavantaṃ gandhapupphādīhi sakkaccaṃ pūjetvā vanditvā – “amhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1057_21: amhākaṃ bhikkhusataṃ dethā”ti yācitvā bhagavatopi pattaṃ gahetvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā sakkaccaṃ piṇḍapātena paṭimānenti.
atk-s0301a0:1058_0: Bhagavā katabhattakicco tesaṃ santānāni oloketvā tathā dhammaṃ deseti,
atk-s0301a0:1058_5: Evaṃ mahājanaṃ anuggahetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1058_6: Tattha gandhamaṇḍalamāḷe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdati bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosānaṃ āgamayamāno.
atk-s0301a0:1058_7: Tato bhikkhūnaṃ bhattakiccapariyosāne upaṭṭhāko bhagavato nivedeti.
atk-s0301a0:1059_0: Atha bhagavā evaṃ katapurebhattakicco gandhakuṭiyā upaṭṭhāne nisīditvā pāde pakkhāletvā pādapīṭhe ṭhatvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ ovadati –
atk-s0301a0:1059_9: Bhagavā tesaṃ attano cariyānurūpaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ deti.
atk-s0301a0:1059_10: Tato sabbepi bhagavantaṃ vanditvā attano attano rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni gacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:1059_16: Tato bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā sace ākaṅkhati,
atk-s0301a0:1059_17: dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno muhuttaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0301a0:1059_18: Atha samassāsitakāyo uṭṭhahitvā dutiyabhāge lokaṃ voloketi.
atk-s0301a0:1059_19: Tatiyabhāge yaṃ gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā upanissāya viharati,
atk-s0301a0:1059_20: tattha mahājano purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ sunivattho supāruto gandhapupphādīni ādāya vihāre sannipatati.
atk-s0301a0:1059_21: Tato bhagavā sampattaparisāya anurūpena pāṭihāriyena gantvā dhammasabhāyaṃ paññattavarabuddhāsane nisajja dhammaṃ deseti kālayuttaṃ samayayuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1060_0: So evaṃ niṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco sace gattāni osiñcitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1060_1: buddhāsanā vuṭṭhāya nhānakoṭṭhakaṃ pavisitvā upaṭṭhākena paṭiyāditaudakena gattāni utuṃ gāhāpeti.
atk-s0301a0:1060_2: Upaṭṭhākopi buddhāsanaṃ ānetvā papphoṭetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññāpeti.
atk-s0301a0:1060_3: Bhagavā surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā kāyabandhanaṃ bandhitvā uttarāsaṅgaṃ katvā tattha āgantvā nisīdati ekakova muhuttaṃ paṭisallīno.
atk-s0301a0:1060_4: Atha bhikkhū tato tato āgamma bhagavato upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1060_8: Bhagavā tesaṃ adhippāyaṃ sampādento purimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a0:1061_0: Purimayāmakiccapariyosāne pana bhikkhūsu bhagavantaṃ vanditvā pakkamantesu sakaladasasahassilokadhātudevatāyo
atk-s0301a0:1061_1: okāsaṃ labhamānā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchanti yathābhisaṅkhataṃ antamaso caturakkharampi.
atk-s0301a0:1061_2: Bhagavā tāsaṃ tāsaṃ devatānaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento majjhimayāmaṃ vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a0:1062_0: Pacchimayāmaṃ pana tayo koṭṭhāse katvā purebhattato paṭṭhāya nisajjāpīḷitassa sarīrassa kilāsubhāvamocanatthaṃ ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmeti.
atk-s0301a0:1062_1: Dutiyakoṭṭhāse gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā dakkhiṇena passena sato sampajāno sīhaseyyaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0301a0:1062_2: Tatiyakoṭṭhāse paccuṭṭhāya nisīditvā purimabuddhānaṃ santike dānasīlādivasena katādhikārapuggaladassanatthaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ oloketi.
atk-s0301a0:1063_0: Tadāpi evaṃ olokento kasibhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ arahattassa upanissayasampannaṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a0:1063_2: kathāvasāne dhammadesanaṃ sutvā eso brāhmaṇo saputtadāro tīsu saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya asītikoṭidhanaṃ mama
atk-s0301a0:1063_3: sāsane vippakiritvā aparabhāge nikkhamma pabbajitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti ñatvā tattha gantvā kathaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1063_5: Etamatthaṃ dassetuṃ atha kho bhagavātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1064_7: Bhagavato kira piṇḍāya pavisitukāmassa bhamaro viya vikasitapadumadvayamajjhaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1064_9: Taṃ evamāgataṃ pattaṃ hatthehi sampaṭicchitvā cīvarañca parimaṇḍalaṃ pārutaṃ kāyena dhāretvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1064_13: Yadā hi bhagavā ekakova katthaci gantukāmo hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1064_14: yāva bhikkhācāravelā dvāraṃ pidahitvā antogandhakuṭiyaṃ nisīdati.
atk-s0301a0:1064_15: Bhikkhū tāya saññāya jānanti “ajja bhagavā ekakova piṇḍāya caritukāmo,
atk-s0301a0:1064_17: Te attano pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭiṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā vanditvā bhikkhācāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1065_0: Parivesanā vattatīti tesaṃ suvaṇṇabhājanādīni gahetvā nisinnānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ kassakānaṃ parivisanā vippakatā hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1065_1: Ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsīti yattha ṭhitaṃ brāhmaṇo passati,
atk-s0301a0:1065_3: Ṭhatvā ca rajatasuvaṇṇarasapiñjaraṃ candimasūriyānaṃ pabhaṃ atirocamānaṃ samantato sarīrappabhaṃ muñci,
atk-s0301a0:1065_4: yāya ajjhotthaṭattā brāhmaṇassa kammantasālābhittirukkhakasitamattikapiṇḍādayo suvaṇṇamayā viya ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1065_5: Atha manussā bhuñjantā ca kasantā ca sabbakiccāni pahāya asītianubyañjanaparivāraṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1065_6: sarīraṃ byāmappabhāparikkhepavibhūsitaṃ bāhuyugalaṃ jaṅgamaṃ viya padumasaraṃ,
