atk-s0301a0:1065_8: vijjulatāvinaddhamiva ca kanakasikharaṃ siriyā jalamānaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ disvā hatthapāde
atk-s0301a0:1065_10: Evaṃ tehi samparivāritaṃ addasā kho kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ piṇḍāya ṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1065_11: disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca – ahaṃ kho, samaṇa,
atk-s0301a0:1066_1: kiṃ samantapāsādike pasādanīye uttamadamathasamathamanuppattepi tathāgate appasādena,
atk-s0301a0:1066_2: udāhu aḍḍhatiyānaṃ janasahassānaṃ pāyāsaṃ paṭiyādetvāpi kaṭacchubhikkhāya maccherenāti?
atk-s0301a0:1066_4: bhagavato panassa dassanena atittaṃ nikkhittakammantaṃ janaṃ disvā “kammabhaṅgaṃ me kātuṃ āgato”ti anattamanatā ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:1066_8: sakalajambudīpe manussānaṃ sīse cūḷāmaṇi viya abhavissa,
atk-s0301a0:1066_10: evamevaṃ alasatāya kammante appayojetvā vappamaṅgalādīsu piṇḍāya caratī”tipissa anattamanatā ahosi. Tenāha –
atk-s0301a0:1067_2: na camhi yathā tvaṃ evaṃ lakkhaṇasampanno,
atk-s0301a0:1067_3: tvampi kasitvā ca vapitvā ca bhuñjassu,
atk-s0301a0:1067_4: ko te attho na sampajjeyya evaṃ lakkhaṇasampannassāti.
atk-s0301a0:1067_8: Tasmā idāni “ayaṃ so”ti ñatvā “cakkavattirajjaṃ pahāya kilantosī”ti upārambhaṃ āropento evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1067_11: bhagavato pana rūpasampattiṃ disvā puññasampattiṃ sambhāvayamāno kathāpavattanatthampi evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1067_12: Atha bhagavā veneyyavasena sadevake loke aggakassakavappakabhāvaṃ attano dassento ahampi kho brāhmaṇotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1068_1: “ayaṃ samaṇo” ‘ahampi kasāmi ca vapāmi cā’ti bhaṇati.
atk-s0301a0:1068_2: Na cassa oḷārikāni yuganaṅgalādīni kasibhaṇḍāni passāmi,
atk-s0301a0:1068_4: Bhagavantaṃ pādatalato paṭṭhāya yāva kesaggā olokayamāno,
atk-s0301a0:1068_6: “aṭṭhānametaṃ yaṃ evarūpo musā bhaṇeyyā”ti sañjātabahumāno bhagavati samaṇavādaṃ pahāya gottena bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1068_7: samudācaramāno na kho pana mayaṃ passāma bhoto gotamassātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1068_8: Bhagavā pana yasmā pubbadhammasabhāgatāya kathanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ ānubhāvo,
atk-s0301a0:1069_1: Nanu brāhmaṇena bhagavā naṅgalādikasisambhārasamāyogaṃ puṭṭho apucchitassa bījassa sabhāgatāya āha “saddhā bīja”nti,
atk-s0301a0:1069_3: Na hi buddhānaṃ ananusandhikakathā nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a0:1069_6: brāhmaṇena hi bhagavā yuganaṅgalādikasisambhāravasena kasiṃ pucchito.
atk-s0301a0:1069_7: So tassa anukampāya “idaṃ apucchita”nti aparihāpetvā samūlaṃ saupakāraṃ sasambhāraṃ saphalaṃ kasiṃ paññāpetuṃ
atk-s0301a0:1069_13: Bīje hi sati kasiṃ karonti, na asati.
atk-s0301a0:1069_14: Bījappamāṇena ca kusalā kassakā khettaṃ kasanti,
atk-s0301a0:1069_16: na adhikaṃ “mā no mogho vāyāmo ahosī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1069_18: tasmā bhagavā mūlato paṭṭhāya kasisambhāraṃ dassento tassa brāhmaṇassa kasiyā pubbadhammassa bījassa
atk-s0301a0:1069_19: sabhāgatāya attano kasiyā pubbadhammaṃ dassento āha “saddhā bīja”nti.
atk-s0301a0:1070_0: Pucchitaṃyeva vatvā apucchitaṃ pacchā kiṃ na vuttanti ce?
atk-s0301a0:1070_4: saddhārahito ca paññavā paresaṃ saddhāya attano avisaye apaṭipajjamāno visesaṃ nādhigacchati,
atk-s0301a0:1070_5: kilesakālussiyaparāmaṭṭhāpi cassa dubbalā saddhā balavatiyā paññāya sahasā vattamānā atthasiddhiṃ na karoti hatthinā saddhiṃ ekadhure yutto goṇo viya.
atk-s0301a0:1070_6: Itissa saddhā upakārikāti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ saddhāya patiṭṭhāpentena pacchāpi vattabbo ayamattho desanākusalatāya pubbe vutto.
atk-s0301a0:1070_10: añño ca evarūpo īsāyottādi pubbe vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:1071_2: Bījanti pañcavidhaṃ bījaṃ mūlabījaṃ khandhabījaṃ phalubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījameva pañcamanti.
atk-s0301a0:1071_3: Taṃ sabbampi viruhaṇaṭṭhena bījanteva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1072_0: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa kasiyā mūlabhūtaṃ bījaṃ dve kiccāni karoti,
atk-s0301a0:1072_3: evaṃ bhagavato kasiyā mūlabhūtā saddhā heṭṭhā sīlamūlena patiṭṭhāti,
atk-s0301a0:1072_5: Yathā ca taṃ mūlena pathavirasaṃ āporasaṃ gahetvā nāḷena dhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati,
atk-s0301a0:1072_6: evamayaṃ sīlamūlena samathavipassanārasaṃ gahetvā ariyamagganāḷena ariyaphaladhaññaparipākagahaṇatthaṃ vaḍḍhati.
atk-s0301a0:1072_7: Yathā ca taṃ subhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā mūlaṅkurapaṇṇanāḷakaṇḍapasavehi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā
atk-s0301a0:1072_9: evamesā cittasantāne patiṭṭhahitvā chahi visuddhīhi vuddhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ patvā ñāṇadassanavisuddhikhīraṃ
atk-s0301a0:1073_0: Kasmā pana aññesu paropaññāsāya kusaladhammesu ekato uppajjamānesu saddhāva “bīja”nti vuttāti ce?
atk-s0301a0:1073_2: Yathā hi tesu viññāṇaṃyeva vijānanakiccaṃ karoti,
atk-s0301a0:1074_5: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa vassavuṭṭhisamanuggahitaṃ bījaṃ bījamūlakañca sassaṃ viruhati na milāyati nipphattiṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:1075_2: tapo me vuṭṭhī”ti tena kiṃ dīpeti? Yathā, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0301a0:1075_3: tayā vapite khette sace vuṭṭhi atthi,
atk-s0301a0:1075_7: Tathā mayā hiriīse paññāyuganaṅgale manoyottena ekābaddhe kate vīriyabalībadde yojetvā satipācanena vijjhitvā
atk-s0301a0:1075_8: attano cittasantānakhettamhi saddhābīje vapite vuṭṭhiyā abhāvo nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1075_9: ayaṃ pana me niccakālaṃ indriyasaṃvaratapo vuṭṭhīti.
atk-s0301a0:1076_1: Idha pana saha vipassanāya maggapaññā adhippetā.
atk-s0301a0:1076_4: evaṃ bhagavato duvidhāpi vipassanā paññā ca.
atk-s0301a0:1076_5: Tattha yathā yugaṃ īsāya upanissayaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1076_9: evaṃ paññā hirippamukhānaṃ dhammānaṃ upanissayā hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0301a0:1076_13: Kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena purato ca hoti. Yathāha –
atk-s0301a0:1076_15: anvāyikā paññavato bhavantī”ti hirivippayogena anuppattito pana īsābaddho hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1076_16: Manosaṅkhātassa samādhiyottassa nissayapaccayato yottānaṃ nissayo hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1076_18: yathā ca naṅgalaṃ phālayuttaṃ kasanakāle pathavighanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a0:1076_20: evaṃ satiyuttā paññā vipassanākāle dhammānaṃ santatisamūhakiccārammaṇaghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a0:1077_1: Taggahaṇena tāya avippayuttaṃ ottappampi gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1077_3: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa īsā yuganaṅgalaṃ dhāreti,
atk-s0301a0:1077_4: evaṃ bhagavatopi hirī lokiyalokuttarapaññāsaṅkhātaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ dhāreti hiriabhāve paññāya abhāvato.
atk-s0301a0:1077_5: Yathā ca īsāpaṭibaddhayuganaṅgalaṃ kiccakaraṃ hoti acalaṃ asithilaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1077_6: evaṃ hiripaṭibaddhā ca paññā kiccakārī hoti acalā asithilā abbokiṇṇā ahirikena.
atk-s0301a0:1077_10: Idha pana manosīsena taṃsampayutto samādhi adhippeto.
atk-s0301a0:1077_12: Taṃ tividhaṃ īsāya saha yugassa bandhanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1077_15: Tattha yathā brāhmaṇassa yottaṃ īsāyugabalībadde ekābaddhe katvā sakakicce paṭipādeti,
atk-s0301a0:1077_16: evaṃ bhagavato samādhi sabbeva te hiripaññāvīriyadhamme ekārammaṇe avikkhepasabhāvena bandhitvā sakakicce paṭipādeti.
atk-s0301a0:1078_7: evaṃ bhagavato vipassanāsampayuttā maggasampayuttā ca sati.
atk-s0301a0:1078_10: evaṃ sati kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānā ārammaṇe vā upaṭṭhāpayamānā paññānaṅgalaṃ rakkhati.
atk-s0301a0:1078_11: Tenevesā “satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”tiādīsu viya ārakkhāti vuttā.
atk-s0301a0:1078_15: Yathā ca pācanaṃ balībaddānaṃ vijjhanabhayaṃ dassentaṃ saṃsīdituṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:1078_17: evaṃ sati vīriyabalībaddānaṃ apāyabhayaṃ dassentī kosajjasaṃsīdanaṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:1078_18: kāmaguṇasaṅkhāte agocare cāraṃ nivāretvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojentī uppathagamanaṃ vāreti.
atk-s0301a0:1079_3: Āhāre udare yatoti ettha āhāramukhena sabbapaccayānaṃ gahitattā catubbidhepi paccaye yato saṃyato nirupakkilesoti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1079_5: Udare yatoti udare yato saṃyato mitabhojī,
atk-s0301a0:1079_10: bījaṃ vapitvā sassaparipālanatthaṃ kaṇṭakavatiṃ vā rukkhavatiṃ vā pākāraparikkhepaṃ vā karosi,
atk-s0301a0:1079_11: tena te gomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā sassaṃ na vilumpanti,
atk-s0301a0:1079_12: evamahampi taṃ saddhābījaṃ vapitvā nānappakārakusalasassaparipālanatthaṃ kāyavacīāhāraguttimayaṃ tividhaṃ parikkhepaṃ karomi,
atk-s0301a0:1079_13: tena me rāgādiakusaladhammagomahiṃsamigagaṇā pavesaṃ alabhantā nānappakārakaṃ kusalasassaṃ na vilumpantīti.
atk-s0301a0:1080_0: Saccaṃ karomi niddānanti ettha dvīhākārehi avisaṃvādanaṃ saccaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1080_5: “yathā tvaṃ bāhiraṃ kasiṃ katvā sassadūsakānaṃ tiṇānaṃ hatthena vā asitena vā niddānaṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a0:1080_6: evaṃ ahampi ajjhattikaṃ kasiṃ katvā kusalasassadūsakānaṃ visaṃvādanatiṇānaṃ saccena niddānaṃ karomī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1080_8: Tena attasaññādīnaṃ tiṇānaṃ niddānaṃ karomīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1080_9: Atha vā niddānanti chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakanti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1080_10: Yathā tvaṃ dāsaṃ vā kammakaraṃ vā niddānaṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a0:1080_11: “niddehi tiṇānī”ti tiṇānaṃ chedakaṃ lāvakaṃ uppāṭakaṃ karosi,
atk-s0301a0:1080_16: Iti imesu dvīsu vikappesu upayogenevattho yujjati.
atk-s0301a0:1081_0: Soraccaṃ me pamocananti ettha yaṃ taṃ “kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo”ti sīlameva “soracca”nti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1081_4: Taṃ hi sundare nibbāne ratattā “soracca”nti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:1081_7: yathā tava pamocanaṃ punapi sāyanhe vā dutiyadivase vā anāgatasaṃvacchare vā yojetabbato appamocanameva hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1081_9: Na hi mama antarā mocanaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0301a0:1081_10: Ahaṃ hi dīpaṅkaradasabalakālato paṭṭhāya paññānaṅgale vīriyabalībadde yojetvā kappasatasahassādhikāni
atk-s0301a0:1081_11: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni mahākasiṃ kasanto tāva na muñciṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1081_13: Yadā ca me sabbaṃ taṃ kālaṃ khepetvā bodhimūle aparājitapallaṅke nisinnassa sabbaguṇaparivāraṃ arahattaphalaṃ udapādi,
atk-s0301a0:1082_0: Vīriyaṃ me dhuradhorayhanti ettha vīriyanti kāyikacetasiko vīriyārambho.
atk-s0301a0:1082_3: Yathā hi brāhmaṇassa dhurāyaṃ dhorayhākaḍḍhitaṃ naṅgalaṃ bhūmighanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a0:1082_5: evaṃ bhagavato vīriyākaḍḍhitaṃ paññānaṅgalaṃ yathā vuttaṃ ghanaṃ bhindati,
atk-s0301a0:1082_11: Iti yathā brāhmaṇassa ekekasmiṃ naṅgale catubalībaddapabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannuppannaṃ tiṇamūlaghātañceva sassasampattiñca sādheti,
atk-s0301a0:1082_12: evaṃ bhagavato catusammappadhānavīriyabhedaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ vahantaṃ uppannuppannaṃ akusalaghātañceva kusalasampattiñca sādheti.
atk-s0301a0:1083_0: Yogakkhemādhivāhananti ettha yogehi khemattā nibbānaṃ yogakkhemaṃ nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1083_5: yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ puratthimādīsu aññataradisābhimukhaṃ vāhīyati,
atk-s0301a0:1083_8: Yathā tava naṅgalaṃ vahantaṃ dhuradhorayhaṃ khettakoṭiṃ patvā puna nivattati,
atk-s0301a0:1083_10: Yasmā vā tena tena maggena pahīnā kilesā na punappunaṃ pahātabbā honti,
atk-s0301a0:1083_11: yathā tava naṅgalena chinnāni tiṇāni puna aparasmiṃ samaye chinditabbāni honti,
atk-s0301a0:1083_16: Atha vā gacchati anivattanti nivattanarahitaṃ hutvā gacchatīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1083_19: Evaṃ gacchantañca yathā tava dhuradhorayhaṃ na taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0301a0:1083_20: yattha gantvā kassako asoko virajo hutvā na socati.
atk-s0301a0:1083_21: Etaṃ pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchati yattha gantvā na socati.
atk-s0301a0:1083_22: Yattha satipācanena etaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ codento gantvā mādiso kassako asoko virajo hutvā na socati,
atk-s0301a0:1083_23: taṃ sabbasokasallasamugghātabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma asaṅkhataṃ ṭhānaṃ gacchatīti.
atk-s0301a0:1084_0: Idāni nigamanaṃ karonto evamesā kasīti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1084_2: esā saddhābījā tapovuṭṭhiyā anuggahitā kasī paññāmayaṃ yuganaṅgalaṃ hirimayañca īsaṃ manomayena yottena
atk-s0301a0:1084_3: ekābaddhaṃ katvā paññānaṅgalena satiphālaṃ ākoṭetvā satipācanaṃ gahetvā kāyavacīāhāraguttiyā gopetvā
atk-s0301a0:1084_4: saccaṃ niddānaṃ katvā soraccapamocanaṃ vīriyadhuradhorayhaṃ yogakkhemābhimukhaṃ anivattantaṃ vāhantena
atk-s0301a0:1084_5: kaṭṭhā kasī kammapariyosānaṃ catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pāpitā,
atk-s0301a0:1084_10: Sā kho panesā kasī na mamevekassa amatapphalā hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1084_11: atha kho yo koci khattiyo vā brāhmaṇo vā vesso vā suddo vā gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā etaṃ kasiṃ kasati,
atk-s0301a0:1084_12: so sabbopi etaṃ kasitvāna sabbadukkhā pamuccatīti.
atk-s0301a0:1085_0: Evaṃ bhagavā brāhmaṇassa arahattanikūṭena nibbānapariyosānaṃ katvā desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:1085_2: “mama kasiphalaṃ bhuñjitvā punapi divaseyeva chāto hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1085_4: tassa phalaṃ bhuñjitvā sabbadukkhā pamuccatī”ti ñatvā pasanno pasannākāraṃ karonto bhuñjatu bhavaṃ gotamotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1085_5: Taṃ sabbaṃ tato parañca vuttatthamevāti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1087_1: Dutiye odanena pūresīti attano atthāya sampāditena sūpabyañjanena odanena pūretvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1087_2: Bhagavā kira paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokentova taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ disvā,
atk-s0301a0:1087_17: Tāni kira tīṇi divasāni nirantaraṃ brāhmaṇassa gharadvāraṃ gacchantassa bhagavato antarā añño koci uṭṭhāya pattaṃ gahetuṃ samattho nāma nāhosi,
atk-s0301a0:1088_0: Etadavocāti brāhmaṇo tīṇi divasāni pattaṃ pūretvā dentopi na saddhāya adāsi,
atk-s0301a0:1088_1: “gharadvāraṃ āgantvā ṭhitassa pabbajitassa bhikkhāmattampi adatvā bhuñjatī”ti upārambhabhayena adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1088_2: Dadanto ca dve divasāni datvā kiñci avatvāva nivatto.
atk-s0301a0:1088_4: Tatiyadivase pana adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto etaṃ “pakaṭṭhako”tiādivacanaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:1088_5: Bhagavāpi etaṃ vacanaṃ nicchārāpanatthameva yāva tatiyamagamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1089_0: Punappunaṃ ceva vapanti bījanti satthā brāhmaṇassa vacanaṃ sutvā,
atk-s0301a0:1089_2: tvaṃ tīṇi divasāni piṇḍapātaṃ datvā osakkasi,
atk-s0301a0:1089_3: punappunaṃ kātabbā nāma lokasmiṃ soḷasa dhammā”ti vatvā te dhamme dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0301a0:1089_4: Tattha punappunaṃ ceva vapantīti ekasmiṃ sassavāre vuttaṃ “alamettāvatā”ti anosakkitvā aparāparesupi sassavāresu ca vapantiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1089_5: Punappunaṃ vassatīti na ekadivasaṃ vassitvā tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a0:1090_0: Yācakāti imasmiṃ pade satthā desanākusalatāya attānampi pakkhipitvā dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1090_2: Na hi te ekavārameva thanaṃ añchanti,
atk-s0301a0:1090_4: Kilamati phandati cāti ayaṃ satto tena iriyāpathena kilamati ceva phandati ca.
atk-s0301a0:1090_7: mataṃ mataṃ sattaṃ tattha punappunaṃ harantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1090_8: Maggañca laddhā apunabbhavāyāti apunabbhavāya maggo nāma nibbānaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1091_0: Evaṃ vutteti evaṃ bhagavatā antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhatvāva soḷasa punappunadhamme desentena vutte.
atk-s0301a0:1091_1: Etadavocāti desanāpariyosāne pasanno saddhiṃ puttadāramittañātivaggena bhagavato pāde vanditvā etaṃ “abhikkantaṃ bho”tiādivacanaṃ avoca. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1093_2: Bhagavato kira chabbassāni dukkarakārikaṃ karontassa pasatamuggayūsādīni āhārayato dubbhojanena ceva dukkhaseyyāya ca udaravāto kuppi.
atk-s0301a0:1093_3: Aparabhāge sambodhiṃ patvā paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuñjantassāpi antarantarā so ābādho attānaṃ dassetiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1093_5: Upaṭṭhāko hotīti paṭhamabodhiyaṃ anibaddhupaṭṭhākakāle upaṭṭhāko hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1093_6: Tasmiṃ kira kāle satthuasītimahātheresu upaṭṭhāko abhūtapubbo nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1093_7: Nāgasamālo upavāno sunakkhatto cundo samaṇuddeso sāgato bodhi meghiyoti ime pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatupaṭṭhākā.
atk-s0301a0:1093_8: Imasmiṃ pana kāle upavānatthero pātova uṭṭhāya pariveṇasammajjanaṃ dantakaṭṭhadānaṃ nhānodakapariyādanaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1093_9: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā anugamananti sabbaṃ bhagavato upaṭṭhānamakāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1093_10: Upasaṅkamīti paṭhamabodhiyaṃ kira vīsati vassāni niddhūmaṃ araññameva hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1093_12: So ca brāhmaṇo uddhanapāḷiṃ bandhāpetvā mahācāṭiyo uddhanamāropetvā uṇhodakaṃ kāretvā,
atk-s0301a0:1093_13: nhānīyacuṇṇādīhi saddhiṃ taṃ vikkiṇanto jīvikaṃ kappeti.
atk-s0301a0:1093_14: Nhāyitukāmā tattha gantvā mūlaṃ datvā nhāyitvā gandhe vilimpitvā mālaṃ piḷandhitvā pakkamanti.
atk-s0301a0:1094_2: Pūjito pūjaneyyānanti idaṃ thero dasabalassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetumārabhi.
atk-s0301a0:1094_3: Gilānabhesajjatthaṃ gatena kira gilānassa vaṇṇo kathetabboti vattametaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1094_4: Vaṇṇaṃ hi sutvā manussā sakkaccaṃ bhesajjaṃ dātabbaṃ maññanti.
atk-s0301a0:1094_6: Kathentena ca jhānavimokkhasamāpattimaggaphalāni ārabbha kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
atk-s0301a0:1094_7: “Sīlavā lajjī kukkuccako bahussuto āgamadharo vaṃsānurakkhako”ti evaṃ pana āgamanīyapaṭipadaṃyeva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0301a0:1094_8: Pūjaneyyānanti asītimahātherā sadevakena lokena pūjetabbāti pūjaneyyā.
atk-s0301a0:1094_11: Bhagavā tesaṃ pūjito sakkato apacito ca,
atk-s0301a0:1094_12: iccassa taṃ guṇaṃ pakāsento thero evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1095_0: Phāṇitassa ca puṭanti mahantaṃ nicchārikaṃ guḷapiṇḍaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1095_5: ito thokena udakena idaṃ phāṇitaṃ āloḷetvā nhānapariyosāne pātuṃ detha,
atk-s0301a0:1095_7: iminā antoti evaṃ samaṇassa gotamassa phāsukaṃ bhavissatī”ti vatvā therassa patte pakkhipitvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1096_0: Upasaṅkamīti tasmiṃ kira ābādhe paṭippassaddhe “devahitena tathāgatassa bhesajjaṃ dinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1096_2: aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ brāhmaṇassā”ti kathā vitthāritā jātā.
atk-s0301a0:1096_3: Taṃ sutvā kittikāmo brāhmaṇo “ettakenapi tāva me ayaṃ kittisaddo abbhuggato”ti somanassajāto attanā katabhāvaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1096_4: jānāpetukāmo tāvatakeneva dasabale vissāsaṃ āpajjitvā upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:1097_1: Kathaṃ hi yajamānassāti kena kāraṇena yajantassa.
atk-s0301a0:1097_8: Abhiññāvositoti jānitvā vosito vosānaṃ katakiccataṃ patto.
atk-s0301a0:1097_9: Evaṃ hi yajamānassāti iminā khīṇāsave yajanākārena yajantassa. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1099_4: So catunnaṃ puttānaṃ āvāhaṃ katvā cattāri satasahassāni adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1099_9: Te cattāropi paṇītehi ghāsacchādanādīhi upaṭṭhahantā hatthapādasambāhanādīni karontā saṅgaṇhitvā ekadivasaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1099_10: divā niddāyitvā vuṭṭhitassa hatthapāde sambāhamānā pāṭiyekkaṃ gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ vatvā –
atk-s0301a0:1099_13: Brāhmaṇo puna ekekassa satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ datvā attano nivatthapārupanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1100_0: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ nhatvā āgacchantaṃ dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhatvā suṇhā evamāha –
atk-s0301a0:1100_1: “kiṃ tayā jeṭṭhaputtassa sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā atirekaṃ dinnamatthi?
atk-s0301a0:1100_2: Nanu sabbesaṃ dve dve satasahassāni dinnāni,
atk-s0301a0:1100_3: kiṃ sesaputtānaṃ gharassa maggaṃ na jānāsī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:1100_4: So “nassa vasalī”ti kujjhitvā aññassa gharaṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0301a0:1100_5: tatopi katipāhaccayena imināva upāyena palāpito aññassāti evaṃ ekagharepi pavesanaṃ alabhamāno paṇḍaraṅgapabbajjaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1100_6: pabbajitvā bhikkhāya caranto kālānamaccayena jarājiṇṇo dubbhojanadukkhaseyyāhi milātasarīro bhikkhācārato āgamma,
atk-s0301a0:1100_7: pīṭhakāya nipanno niddaṃ okkamitvā vuṭṭhāya nisinno attānaṃ oloketvā puttesu patiṭṭhaṃ apassanto cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1100_8: “samaṇo kira gotamo abbhākuṭiko uttānamukho sukhasambhāso paṭisanthārakusalo,
atk-s0301a0:1100_9: sakkā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paṭisanthāraṃ labhitu”nti nivāsanapāvuraṇaṃ saṇṭhapetvā bhikkhābhājanamādāya yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:1101_0: Dārehi saṃpuccha gharā nikkhāmentīti sabbaṃ mama santakaṃ gahetvā mayhaṃ niddhanabhāvaṃ ñatvā attano
atk-s0301a0:1101_1: bhariyāhi saddhiṃ mantayitvā maṃ gharā nikkaḍḍhāpenti.
atk-s0301a0:1102_2: Sāva vārenti sūkaranti yathā sunakhā vaggavaggā hutvā bhussantā bhussantā sūkaraṃ vārenti,
atk-s0301a0:1102_4: evaṃ dārehi saddhiṃ maṃ bahuṃ vatvā viravantaṃ palāpentīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1103_4: Vayogatanti tayo vaye gataṃ atikkantaṃ pacchimavaye ṭhitaṃ maṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1104_1: Khādanā apanīyatīti asso hi yāvadeva taruṇo hoti javasampanno,
atk-s0301a0:1104_5: gāvīhi saddhiṃ aṭaviyaṃ sukkhatiṇāni khādanto carati.
atk-s0301a0:1104_7: evaṃ jiṇṇakāle viluttasabbadhanattā nibbhogo mādisopi bālakānaṃ pitā thero paragharesu bhikkhati.
atk-s0301a0:1105_2: ye mama puttā anassavā appatissā avasavattino,
atk-s0301a0:1105_4: Idānissa seyyabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ caṇḍampi goṇantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1106_1: taṃ purato katvā gantuṃ sukhaṃ hotīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1106_2: Gādhamedhatīti udakaṃ otaraṇakāle gambhīre udake patiṭṭhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a0:1107_1: Sannisinnesūti tathārūpe brāhmaṇānaṃ samāgamadivase sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitesu puttesu taṃ sabhaṃ ogāhetvā brāhmaṇānaṃ majjhe mahārahe āsane nisinnesu.
atk-s0301a0:1107_2: Abhāsīti ‘ayaṃ me kālo’ti sabhāya majjhe pavisitvā hatthaṃ ukkhipitvā,
atk-s0301a0:1107_6: “Tena ca samayena manussānaṃ vattaṃ hoti yo mātāpitūnaṃ santakaṃ khādanto mātāpitaro na poseti,
atk-s0301a0:1107_8: Tasmā te brāhmaṇaputtā pitupādesu nipatitvā “jīvitaṃ no tāta,
atk-s0301a0:1107_10: So pituhadayassa puttānaṃ muduttā “mā me, bho,
atk-s0301a0:1108_1: ajja paṭṭhāya pitaraṃ na sammā paṭijaggissatha,
atk-s0301a0:1108_4: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho naṃ brāhmaṇamahāsālantiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1108_5: Tattha netvāti pīṭhe nisīdāpetvā sayaṃ ukkhipitvā nayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1108_6: Nhāpetvāti sarīraṃ telena abbhañjitvā ubbaṭṭetvā gandhacuṇṇādīhi nhāpesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1109_0: Brāhmaṇo subhojanañca sukhaseyyañca āgamma katipāhaccayena sañjātabalo pīṇitindriyo attabhāvaṃ oloketvā,
atk-s0301a0:1109_1: “ayaṃ me sampatti samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nissāya laddhā”ti paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1109_2: Taṃ dassetuṃ atha kho sotiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1109_3: Tattha etadavocāti dussayugaṃ pādamūle ṭhapetvā etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:1109_11: bho”ti kho brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ vanditvā gharaṃ gantvā putte āmantesi “tātā,
atk-s0301a0:1109_14: tumhe tasmiṃ sampatte mā pamajjathā”ti. Sādhu, tātāti.
atk-s0301a0:1109_15: Punadivase bhagavā pubbaṇhasamaye pattacīvaraṃ ādāya jeṭṭhaputtassa nivesanadvāraṃ gato.
atk-s0301a0:1109_16: So satthāraṃ disvāva hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā gharaṃ pavesetvā mahārahe pallaṅke nisīdāpetvā paṇītabhojanamadāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1109_18: punadivase itarassāti paṭipāṭiyā sabbesaṃ gharāni agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1110_5: Tena hi tumhe pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ svātanāya samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ nimantethāti.
atk-s0301a0:1110_7: Bhagavā adhivāsetvā punadivase bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto tassa gehadvāraṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1110_8: So haritupalittaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ gehaṃ satthāraṃ pavesetvā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paññattāsanesu
atk-s0301a0:1110_10: Antarabhattasmiṃyeva brāhmaṇassa cattāropi puttā satthu santike nisīditvā āhaṃsu –
atk-s0301a0:1110_15: mātāpituposakaṃ nāma porāṇakapaṇḍitānaṃ āciṇṇamevā”ti vatvā mahānāgajātakaṃ nāma kathetvā,
atk-s0301a0:1110_17: Desanāpariyosāne brāhmaṇo saddhiṃ catūhi puttehi catūhi ca suṇhāhi desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0301a0:1110_18: Tato paṭṭhāya satthā na sabbakālaṃ tesaṃ gehaṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0301a0:1112_1: Pañcame mānatthaddhoti vātabharitabhastā viya mānena thaddho.
atk-s0301a0:1112_2: Ācariyanti sippuggahaṇakāle ācariyo anabhivādentassa sippaṃ na deti,
atk-s0301a0:1112_3: aññasmiṃ pana kāle taṃ na abhivādeti,
atk-s0301a0:1112_6: “yasmā ayaṃ samaṇo mādise jātisampannabrāhmaṇe sampatte paṭisanthāramattampi na karoti,
atk-s0301a0:1113_3: Apacitā assūti apacitiṃ dassetuṃ yuttā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1113_4: Arahanteti imāya gāthāya desanākusalattā attānaṃ antokatvā pūjaneyyaṃ dasseti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1115_1: Chaṭṭhe “sabbaṃ seta”nti vutte “sabbaṃ kaṇha”ntiādinā nayena paccanīkaṃ karontassevassa sātaṃ sukhaṃ hotīti paccanīkasāto.
atk-s0301a0:1115_2: Yo ca vineyya sārambhanti yo karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇaṃ sārambhaṃ vinetvā suṇātīti attho. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1117_1: Sattame navakammikabhāradvājoti so kira araññe rukkhaṃ chindāpetvā tattheva pāsādakūṭāgārādīni yojetvā nagaraṃ āharitvā vikkiṇāti,
atk-s0301a0:1117_4: Disvānassa etadahosīti chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjetvā nisinnaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvāna assa etaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1117_6: Ucchinnamūlaṃ me vananti mayhaṃ kilesavanaṃ ucchinnamūlaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1117_9: Aratiṃ vippahāyāti pantasenāsanesu ceva bhāvanāya ca ukkaṇṭhitaṃ jahitvā. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1119_1: Aṭṭhame antevāsikāti veyyāvaccaṃ katvā sippuggaṇhanakā dhammantevāsikā.
atk-s0301a0:1120_4: Sucārurūpaṃ vatāti atisundaraṃ vata jhānaṃ jhāyasīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1121_1: Idanti idaṃ tumhākaṃ evaṃ vane nisinnakāraṇaṃ mayhaṃ accherarūpaṃ paṭibhāti.
atk-s0301a0:1122_4: Kasmā bhavaṃ vijanamaraññamassitoti ahaṃ tāva brahmalokaṃ ākaṅkhamānoti maññāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1122_9: Idha idaṃ tapo kasmā karosīti aparenapi ākārena pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:1123_7: idampi mayha”nti pajappāpanavasena pajappitā nāmāti vuttā.
atk-s0301a0:1123_8: Sabbā mayā byantikatāti sabbā taṇhā mayā aggamaggena vigatantā nirantā katā.
atk-s0301a0:1124_1: Sabbesu dhammesu visuddhadassanoti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:1128_5: Sa ve bhikkhūti vuccatīti so ve bhinnakilesattā bhikkhu nāma vuccati. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1130_4: tasmā thero “ayaṃ varāko maṃ sahāyaṃ labhitvāpi micchādiṭṭhiṃ gahetvā mā apāyapūrako ahosī”ti āyācati.
atk-s0301a0:1130_6: tasmiṃ pasanne pañcakulasatāni anuvattissantīti maññamānopi āyācati.
atk-s0301a0:1130_9: Pavāhemīti galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ otaritvā pavāhemi palāpemi.
atk-s0301a0:1132_1: Dvādasame khomadussaṃ nāmāti khomadussānaṃ ussannattā evaṃladdhanāmaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1132_6: ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca upasaṅkamissāmī”ti adhiṭṭhānavasena vuṭṭhiṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0301a0:1132_7: Sabhādhammanti sukhanisinne kira asañcāletvā ekapassena pavisanaṃ tesaṃ sabhādhammo nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1132_10: tena te kupitā bhagavantaṃ hīḷentā “ke ca muṇḍakā samaṇakā,
atk-s0301a0:1132_13: Pahāyāti ete rāgādayo jahitvā rāgādivinayāya dhammaṃ bhaṇanti,
atk-s0301a0:1137_1: Vaṅgīsasaṃyuttassa paṭhame aggāḷave cetiyeti āḷaviyaṃ aggacetiye.
atk-s0301a0:1137_4: Uppanne buddhe tāni apanetvā manussā vihāre kariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1137_8: Vihārapāloti so kira tadā avassiko hoti pattacīvaraggahaṇe akovido.
atk-s0301a0:1137_10: imāni chattupāhanakattarayaṭṭhiādīni olokento nisīdā”ti vihārarakkhakaṃ katvā piṇḍāya pavisiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1137_14: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti etasmiṃ rāge uppanne taṃ kāraṇaṃ kuto labbhā.
atk-s0301a0:1137_15: Yaṃ me paroti yena me kāraṇena añño puggalo vā dhammo vā anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā idāneva abhiratiṃ uppādeyya ācariyupajjhāyāpi maṃ vihāre ohāya gatā.
atk-s0301a0:1138_6: Sahassaṃ apalāyinanti ye te samantā sarehi parikireyyuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1138_9: Neva maṃ byādhayissantīti maṃ cāletuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0301a0:1138_10: Dhamme samhi patiṭṭhitanti anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā abhiratiṃ uppādanasamatthe sake sāsanadhamme patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1138_12: issāsasahasse tāva samantā sarehi parikirante sikkhito puriso daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā sabbe sare sarīre apatamāne antarāva paharitvā pādamūle pāteti.
atk-s0301a0:1138_13: Tattha ekopi issāso dve sare ekato na khipati,
atk-s0301a0:1138_14: imā pana itthiyo rūpārammaṇādivasena pañca pañca sare ekato khipanti.
atk-s0301a0:1138_15: Evaṃ khipantiyo etā sacepi atirekasahassā honti,
atk-s0301a0:1139_0: Sakkhī hi me sutaṃ etanti mayā hi sammukhā etaṃ sutaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1139_4: Tattha meti tasmiṃ me attano taruṇavipassanāsaṅkhāte nibbānagamanamagge mano nirato.
atk-s0301a0:1139_7: Na me maggampi dakkhasīti yathā me bhavayoniādīsu gatamaggampi na passasi,
atk-s0301a0:1141_2: Aparajju vā kāleti dutiyadivase vā bhikkhācārakāle.
atk-s0301a0:1141_4: Aratiñca ratiñcāti sāsane aratiṃ kāmaguṇesu ca ratiṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1141_5: Sabbaso gehasitañca vitakkanti pañcakāmaguṇagehanissitaṃ pāpavitakkañca sabbākārena pahāya.
atk-s0301a0:1143_4: Paṭighe ca mute cāti ettha paṭighapadena gandharasā gahitā,
atk-s0301a0:1143_6: Yo ettha na limpatīti yo etesu pañcakāmaguṇesu taṇhādiṭṭhilepehi na limpati.
atk-s0301a0:1144_1: puthū janatāya adhammā niviṭṭhāti atha cha ārammaṇanissitā puthū adhammavitakkā janatāya niviṭṭhāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1144_2: Na ca vaggagatassa kuhiñcīti tesaṃ vasena na katthaci kilesavaggagato bhaveyya.
atk-s0301a0:1144_3: No pana duṭṭhullabhāṇīti duṭṭhullavacanabhāṇīpi na siyā.
atk-s0301a0:1144_4: Sa bhikkhūti so evaṃvidho bhikkhu nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1145_6: Paṭicca parinibbuto kaṅkhati kālanti nibbānaṃ paṭicca kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto parinibbānakālaṃ āgameti. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1147_5: amhākaṃ pana pāḷipi aṭṭhakathāpi nayasatena nayasahassena upaṭṭhātī”ti atikkamitvā maññati.
atk-s0301a0:1147_12: Akhilodha padhānavāti akhilo idha padhānavā vīriyasampanno.
atk-s0301a0:1149_1: Catutthe rāgoti āyasmā ānando mahāpuñño sambhāvito,
atk-s0301a0:1149_3: Sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitāpi itthiyo theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā tālavaṇṭena bījenti,
atk-s0301a0:1149_5: Tattha āyasmato vaṅgīsassa navapabbajitassa ārammaṇaṃ pariggahetuṃ asakkontassa itthirūpārammaṇe rāgo cittaṃ anuddhaṃseti.
atk-s0301a0:1149_6: So saddhāpabbajitattā ujujātiko kulaputto “ayaṃ me rāgo vaḍḍhitvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ nāseyyā”ti
atk-s0301a0:1149_7: cintetvā anantaraṃ nisinnova therassa attānaṃ āvikaronto kāmarāgenātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1150_4: Mā ca attatoti attato mā passa.
atk-s0301a0:1150_6: Animittañca bhāvehīti niccādīnaṃ nimittānaṃ ugghāṭitattā vipassanā animittā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1150_8: Mānābhisamayāti mānassa dassanābhisamayā ceva pahānābhisamayā ca.
atk-s0301a0:1152_11: “Yā pana vācāya ce kataṃ kamma”nti evaṃ viññatti ca “yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati…pe…
atk-s0301a0:1152_12: ayaṃ vuccati sammāvācā”ti evaṃ virati ca,
atk-s0301a0:1152_15: āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkatā nirayasaṃvattanikā hotī”ti evaṃ cetanā ca vācāti āgatā,
atk-s0301a0:1153_0: Subhāsitaṃyeva bhāsatīti puggalādhiṭṭhānāya desanāya catūsu vācaṅgesu aññataraniddosavacanametaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1153_4: Aṅgaparidīpanatthaṃ panettha abhāsitabbaṃ pubbe avatvā bhāsitabbamevāha.
atk-s0301a0:1153_6: Ettha ca paṭhamena pisuṇadosarahitaṃ samaggakaraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1153_9: Imehi khoti ādinā tāni aṅgāni paccakkhato dassento taṃ vācaṃ nigameti.
atk-s0301a0:1153_12: liṅgavacanavibhattikālakārakasampattīhi ca samannāgataṃ musāvādādivācampi subhāsitanti maññanti,
atk-s0301a0:1153_14: Avayavādisamannāgatāpi hi tathārūpī vācā dubbhāsitāva hoti attano ca paresañca anatthāvahattā.
atk-s0301a0:1153_15: Imehi pana catūhaṅgehi samannāgatā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannāpi hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1153_17: Tathā hi maggapasse sassaṃ rakkhantiyā sīhaḷaceṭikāya sīhaḷakeneva jātijarāmaraṇayuttaṃ gītikaṃ gāyantiyā
atk-s0301a0:1153_18: saddaṃ sutvā maggaṃ gacchantā saṭṭhimattā vipassakā bhikkhū arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1153_19: Tathā tisso nāma āraddhavipassako bhikkhu padumasarasamīpena gacchanto padumasare padumāni bhañjitvā –
atk-s0301a0:1155_0: Evaṃ manussattaṃ gatā sattā, jarābhivegena maddiyantī”ti. –
atk-s0301a0:1156_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ gāyantiyā ceṭikāya sutvā arahattaṃ patto.
atk-s0301a0:1157_0: Buddhantarepi aññataro puriso sattahi puttehi saddhiṃ aṭavito āgamma aññatarāya itthiyā musalena taṇḍule koṭṭentiyā –
atk-s0301a0:1162_0: Imaṃ gītikaṃ sutvā paccavekkhanto saha puttehi paccekabodhiṃ patto.
atk-s0301a0:1162_1: Evaṃ imehi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā vācā sacepi milakkhubhāsāpariyāpannā ghaṭaceṭikāgītikapariyāpannāpi hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1162_3: Subhāsitattā eva ca anavajjā ca ananuvajjā ca viññūnaṃ atthatthikānaṃ atthapaṭisaraṇānaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1163_2: Na tāpayeti vippaṭisārena na tāpeyya na vibādheyya.
atk-s0301a0:1163_3: Pareti parehi bhindanto nābhibhaveyya na bādheyya.
atk-s0301a0:1163_4: Iti imāya gāthāya apisuṇavācāvasena bhagavantaṃ thometi.
atk-s0301a0:1163_6: Yaṃ anādāyāti yaṃ vācaṃ bhāsanto paresaṃ pāpāni appiyāni pharusavacanāni anādāya atthabyañjanamadhuraṃ piyameva bhāsati,
atk-s0301a0:1164_2: “saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasāna”nti nibbānāmatapaccayattā vā amatā.
atk-s0301a0:1164_3: Esa dhammo sanantanoti yā ayaṃ saccavācā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1165_0: Tattha sacce patiṭṭhitattāva attano ca paresañca atthe patiṭṭhitā,
atk-s0301a0:1165_1: atthe patiṭṭhitattā eva dhamme patiṭṭhitā hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0301a0:1165_6: yaṃ paresaṃ atthato anapetattā atthaṃ anuparodhakaraṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1165_7: dhammato anapetattā dhammaṃ dhammikameva atthaṃ sādhetīti.
atk-s0301a0:1166_5: Atha vā yaṃ buddho nibbānapattiyā dukkhassantakiriyāyāti dvinnaṃ nibbānadhātūnaṃ atthāya khemamaggappakāsanato khemaṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
atk-s0301a0:1166_6: sā ve vācānamuttamāti sā vācā sabbavācānaṃ seṭṭhāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a0:1166_7: Iti imāya gāthāya mantāvacanavasena bhagavantaṃ abhitthavanto arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesīti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1168_3: Dhammasenāpatissa hi kathentassa pittādīnaṃ vasena apalibuddhavacanaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1168_5: Anelagalāyāti anelāya agalāya niddosāya ceva akkhalitapadabyañjanāya ca.
atk-s0301a0:1168_6: Therassa hi kathayato padaṃ vā byañjanaṃ vā na parihāyati.
atk-s0301a0:1169_7: idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccanti yogo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ saṃkhittenapi deseti.
atk-s0301a0:1169_9: dukkhaṃ ariyasacca”ntiādinā nayena tāneva vibhajanto vitthārenapi bhāsati.
atk-s0301a0:1169_11: Sāḷikāyiva nigghosoti yathā madhuraṃ ambapakkaṃ sāyitvā pakkhehi vātaṃ datvā madhurassaraṃ nicchārentiyā sāḷikasakuṇiyā nigghoso,
atk-s0301a0:1169_12: evaṃ therassa dhammaṃ kathentassa madhuro nigghoso hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1169_13: Paṭibhānaṃ udīrayīti samuddato ūmiyo viya anantaṃ paṭibhānaṃ uṭṭhahati.
atk-s0301a0:1171_4: Upavasantīti ca sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1171_10: Nisinno hotīti sāyanhasamaye sampattaparisāya kālayuttaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā udakakoṭṭhake gattāni parisiñcitvā
atk-s0301a0:1171_11: nivatthanivāsano ekaṃsaṃ sugatamahācīvaraṃ katvā majjhimatthambhaṃ nissāya paññatte varabuddhāsane puratthimadisāya
atk-s0301a0:1171_12: uṭṭhahato candamaṇḍalassa siriṃ siriyā abhibhavamāno nisinno hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1171_15: Tattha hi ekabhikkhussāpi hatthakukkuccaṃ vā pādakukkuccaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1171_19: Na ca me kiñci garahathāti ettha na ca kiñcīti pucchanatthe na- kāro.
atk-s0301a0:1171_23: Kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vāti iminā kāyavacīdvārāneva pavāreti,
atk-s0301a0:1172_0: Etadavocāti dhammasenāpatiṭṭhāne ṭhitattā bhikkhusaṅghassa bhāraṃ vahanto etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:1172_3: Kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vāti idaṃ catunnaṃ arakkhiyataṃ sandhāya thero āha.
atk-s0301a0:1173_8: yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya ‘mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī’ti.
atk-s0301a0:1173_25: yaṃ tathāgato rakkheyya “mā me idaṃ paro aññāsī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1174_0: Idāni bhagavato yathābhūtaguṇe kathento bhagavā hi,
atk-s0301a0:1174_2: Tattha anuppannassāti kassapasammāsambuddhato paṭṭhāya aññena samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā anuppāditapubbassa.
atk-s0301a0:1174_5: Pacchā samannāgatāti paṭhamagatassa bhagavato pacchā samanuāgatā.
atk-s0301a0:1174_6: Iti thero yasmā sabbepi bhagavato sīlādayo guṇā arahattamaggameva nissāya āgatā,
atk-s0301a0:1174_10: bhanteti idaṃ thero sadevake loke aggapuggalassa attano ceva saṅghassa ca kāyikavācasikaṃ pavārento āha.
atk-s0301a0:1175_0: Pitarā pavattitanti cakkavattimhi kālaṅkate vā pabbajite vā sattāhaccayena cakkaṃ antaradhāyati,
atk-s0301a0:1175_1: tato dasavidhaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ cakkavattivattaṃ pūretvā nisinnassa puttassa aññaṃ pātubhavati,
atk-s0301a0:1175_3: Ratanamayattā pana sadisaṭṭhena tadeva vattaṃ katvā “pitarā pavattita”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1175_4: Yasmā vā so “appossukko tvaṃ, deva, hohi,
atk-s0301a0:1175_6: tasmā pitarā pavattitaṃ āṇācakkaṃ anuppavatteti nāma.
atk-s0301a0:1175_7: Sammadeva anuppavattesīti sammā nayena hetunā kāraṇeneva anuppavattesi.
atk-s0301a0:1175_14: Paññāvimuttāti paññāya vimuttā tevijjādibhāvaṃ appattā khīṇāsavā.
atk-s0301a0:1176_1: Saṃyojanabandhanacchidāti saṃyojanasaṅkhāte ceva bandhanasaṅkhāte ca kilese chinditvā ṭhitā.
atk-s0301a0:1176_4: Satthavāhanti aṭṭhaṅgikamaggarathe āropetvā veneyyasatthaṃ vāheti saṃsārakantāraṃ uttāretīti bhagavā satthavāho,
atk-s0301a0:1176_7: Ādiccabandhunanti ādiccabandhuṃ satthāraṃ dasabalaṃ vandāmīti vadati. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1178_3: nibbānappattassa vā kutoci bhayaṃ natthīti nibbānaṃ akutobhayaṃ nāma.
atk-s0301a0:1178_4: Isīnaṃ isisattamoti vipassito paṭṭhāya isīnaṃ sattamako isi.
atk-s0301a0:1179_0: Kiṃ nu te vaṅgīsāti idaṃ bhagavā atthuppattivasena āha.
atk-s0301a0:1180_2: Pabhijja khilānīti rāgakhilādīni pañca bhinditvā carasi.
atk-s0301a0:1180_3: Taṃ passathāti taṃ evaṃ abhibhuyya bhinditvā carantaṃ buddhaṃ passatha.
atk-s0301a0:1181_2: Tasmiṃ ca amate akkhāteti tasmiṃ tena akkhāte amate.
atk-s0301a0:1182_8: agge vā pañcavaggiyānaṃ dhammaṃ desesīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1182_9: Tasmāti yasmā esa dhammo sudesitoti jānantena ca pamādo na kātabbo, tasmā.
atk-s0301a0:1184_1: Navame aññāsikoṇḍaññoti paṭhamaṃ dhammassa aññātattā evaṃ gahitanāmo thero.
atk-s0301a0:1184_5: Chaddantabhavane mandākinipokkharaṇiyā tīre paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a0:1184_9: evamassa dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussānaṃ abbhantare guṇā patthaṭāva.
atk-s0301a0:1184_10: Devamanussā tathāgatassa santikaṃ gantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ katvā “aggadhammaṃ paṭividdhasāvako”ti anantaraṃ theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā pūjenti.
atk-s0301a0:1184_11: Santikaṃ āgatānañca nāma tathārūpā dhammakathā vā paṭisanthāro vā kātabbo hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1185_2: Dhammadesanākāle pana majjhaṭṭhāne alaṅkatabuddhāsanamhi satthari nisinne dakkhiṇahatthapasse dhammasenāpati,
atk-s0301a0:1185_6: Dve aggasāvakā aggadhammapaṭividdhattā ca mahallakattā ca there sagāravā theraṃ mahābrahmaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1185_7: viya āsīvisaṃ viya ca maññamānā dhurāsane nisīdantā ottappanti harāyanti.
atk-s0301a0:1185_10: te idāni dhurāsane nisīdantā mama ottappanti harāyanti,
atk-s0301a0:1185_12: So patirūpe kāle tathāgataṃ upasaṅkamitvā “icchāmahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1186_0: Thero senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā pattacīvaramādāya chaddantabhavane mandākinitīraṃ gato.
atk-s0301a0:1186_1: Pubbe paccekabuddhānaṃ pāricariyāya kataparicayā aṭṭhasahassā hatthināgā theraṃ disvāva “amhākaṃ puññakkhettaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1186_2: āgata”nti nakhehi caṅkamanaṃ nittiṇaṃ katvā āvaraṇasākhā haritvā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ paṭijaggitvā
atk-s0301a0:1186_6: thero bahuñātikagāmaṃ gato viya yathādhoteneva pattena gamissati,
atk-s0301a0:1186_8: ekassa pana vāre patte sesehipi nappamajjitabba”nti vāraṃ ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1186_9: Vārikanāgo pātova therassa mukhodakañca dantakaṭṭhañca ṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a0:1187_1: Tassā pañcavīsatiyojanamatte ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1187_3: Tato paraṃ pana kaṭippamāṇe udake aḍḍhayojanavitthataṃ sesapadumavanaṃ paṇṇāsayojanaṃ saraṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1187_19: Saṅkhepato tasmiṃ dahe khāditabbayuttakaṃ phalaṃ nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1187_20: Kusumānaṃ pupphanasamaye vāto reṇuvaṭṭiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā paduminipattesu ṭhapeti,
atk-s0301a0:1187_22: Tato ādiccapākena paccitvā pakkapayoghanikā viya tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a0:1187_28: tassa ekasmiṃ pabbe pādaghaṭakappamāṇaṃ khīraṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1188_1: Thero kālena kālaṃ tassa vimānadvāraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1188_2: So navasappipokkharamadhucuṇṇayuttassa nirudakapāyāsassa pattaṃ pūretvā deti.
atk-s0301a0:1188_3: So kira kassapabuddhakāle vīsativassasahassāni sugandhasappinā khīrasalākaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1188_5: Evaṃ thero dvādasa vassāni vasitvā attano āyusaṅkhāraṃ olokento parikkhīṇabhāvaṃ ñatvā “kattha parinibbāyissāmī”ti cintetvā –
atk-s0301a0:1188_6: “hatthināgehi maṃ dvādasa vassāni upaṭṭhahantehi dukkaraṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1188_7: satthāraṃ anujānāpetvā etesaṃyeva santike parinibbāyissāmī”ti ākāsena bhagavato santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1189_4: “ye maṃ ajānantā ‘ko esa paṇḍarasīso obhaggo gopānasivaṅko mahallako satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ karotī’ti cittaṃ padūsessanti,
atk-s0301a0:1189_7: ‘dasasahassacakkavāḷe satthā viya paññāto pākaṭo mahāsāvako’ti cittaṃ pasādessanti,
atk-s0301a0:1189_9: sattānaṃ apāyamaggaṃ pidahitvā saggamaggaṃ vivaranto nāmaṃ sāveti.
atk-s0301a0:1190_0: Buddhānubuddhoti paṭhamaṃ satthā cattāri saccāni bujjhi,
atk-s0301a0:1190_8: Imissā ca gāthāya pariyosāne parisā sannisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:1190_9: Parisāya sannisinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā thero satthārā saddhiṃ paṭisanthāraṃ katvā “parikkhīṇā me, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1191_3: idaṃ pacchimadassana”nti paridevante mahājane satthāraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā,
atk-s0301a0:1191_8: uppannā saṅkhārā abhijjanakā nāma natthī”ti mahājanaṃ ovaditvā passantasseva mahājanassa vehāsaṃ abbhuggamma
atk-s0301a0:1191_9: mandākinitīre otaritvā pokkharaṇiyaṃ nhatvā nivatthanivāsano katuttarāsaṅgo senāsanaṃ saṃsāmetvā phalasamāpattiyā
atk-s0301a0:1191_11: Therassa sahaparinibbānā himavati sabbarukkhā pupphehi ca phalehi ca onatavinatā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1191_12: Vārikanāgo therassa parinibbutabhāvaṃ ajānanto pātova mukhodakadantakaṭṭhāni upaṭṭhapetvā vattaṃ katvā
atk-s0301a0:1191_14: So yāva sūriyuggamanā therassa nikkhamanaṃ apassanto “kiṃ nu kho etaṃ?
atk-s0301a0:1191_17: Ajja pana paṇṇasālatopi na nikkhamatī”ti kuṭidvāraṃ kampetvā olokento theraṃ nisinnakameva disvā hatthaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1191_18: pasāretvā parāmasitvā assāsapassāse pariyesanto tesaṃ appavattibhāvaṃ ñatvā –
atk-s0301a0:1191_19: “parinibbuto thero”ti soṇḍaṃ mukhe pakkhipitvā mahāravaṃ viravi.
atk-s0301a0:1191_21: Aṭṭhanāgasahassāni sannipatitvā theraṃ jeṭṭhakanāgassa kumbhe nisīdāpetvā supupphitarukkhasākhā gahetvā
atk-s0301a0:1192_4: So tathā katvā theraṃ tattha nipajjāpetvā hatthināgānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1192_5: Te kūṭāgāraṃ ukkhipitvā tiyojanasahassaṃ himavantaṃ punappunaṃ āvijjhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1192_6: Tesaṃ hatthato ākāsaṭṭhakā devā gahetvā sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1192_7: Tato vassavalāhakā sītavalāhakā uṇhavalāhakā cātumahārājikā tāvatiṃsāti etenupāyena yāva brahmalokā kūṭāgāraṃ agamāsi,
atk-s0301a0:1192_8: puna brahmāno devānanti anupubbena hatthināgānaṃyeva kūṭāgāraṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1192_15: Punadivase aruṇuggamanavelāyameva citakaṃ nibbāpetvā sumanamakuḷavaṇṇānaṃ dhātūnaṃ parisāvanaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0301a0:1192_16: bhagavati nikkhamitvā veḷuvanavihārakoṭṭhakaṃ sampatte āharitvā satthu hatthe ṭhapayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1192_17: Satthā dhātuparisāvanaṃ gahetvā pathaviyā hatthaṃ pasāresi,
atk-s0301a0:1192_20: Ajjāpi kira taṃ cetiyaṃ dharatiyevāti. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1198_3: So kira pubbe padumuttarakāle paṭibhānasampannaṃ sāvakaṃ disvā dānaṃ datvā patthanaṃ katvā kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1198_4: pāramiyo pūretvā amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle sakalajambudīpe vādakāmatāya jambusākhaṃ pariharitvā ekena paribbājakena
atk-s0301a0:1198_5: saddhiṃ vādaṃ katvā vāde jayaparājayānubhāvena teneva paribbājakena saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ kappetvā vasamānāya
atk-s0301a0:1198_6: ekissā paribbājikāya kucchimhi nibbatto vayaṃ āgamma mātito pañcavādasatāni,
atk-s0301a0:1198_9: yaṃ vijjaṃ parijappitvā matānaṃ sīsaṃ aṅguliyā paharitvā –
atk-s0301a0:1198_11: So anupubbena gāmanigamādīsu vicaranto pañcahi māṇavakasatehi saddhiṃ sāvatthiṃ anuppatto nagaradvāre sālāya nisīdati.
atk-s0301a0:1199_0: Tadā ca nagaravāsino purebhattaṃ dānaṃ datvā pacchābhattaṃ suddhuttarāsaṅgā gandhamālādihatthā dhammassavanāya vihāraṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1199_4: Sopi saparivāro tehi saddhiṃ gantvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1199_12: Athassa bhagavā attano ānubhāvena niraye nibbattassa sīsaṃ dassetvā, “vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a0:1199_14: So mantaṃ jappitvā aṅguliyā paharitvā “niraye”ti āha. “Sādhu, vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a0:1199_18: So punappunaṃ mantaṃ parivattetvāpi aṅguliyā paharitvāpi nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ na passati.
atk-s0301a0:1200_12: mayhaṃ mantena imaṃ mantaṃ dethāti. Amūliko, vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a0:1200_15: Na sakkā mayhaṃ santike apabbajitassa dātunti.
atk-s0301a0:1200_18: ahaṃ imassa santike pabbajitvā sippaṃ gaṇhāmi,
atk-s0301a0:1200_19: tato sakalajambudīpe amhehi bahutaraṃ jānanto nāma na bhavissati.
atk-s0301a0:1200_21: tāva anukkaṇṭhitvā vicarathā”ti te uyyojetvā “pabbājetha ma”nti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1200_23: Thero taṃ attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ netvā pabbājesi.
atk-s0301a0:1200_24: So pabbajitvā satthu santikaṃ āgamma vanditvā ṭhito “sippaṃ dethā”ti yāci. Vaṅgīsa,
atk-s0301a0:1200_25: tumhe sippaṃ gaṇhantā aloṇabhojanathaṇḍilaseyyādīhi parikammaṃ katvā gaṇhatha,
atk-s0301a0:1200_29: So taṃ anulomapaṭilomaṃ manasikaronto vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anukkamena arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a0:1201_0: Vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedīti evaṃ arahattaṃ patvā vimuttisukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedento.
atk-s0301a0:1201_2: Khandhāyatanadhātuyoti imāni khandhādīni pakāsento dhammaṃ desesi.
atk-s0301a0:1201_3: Ye niyāmagataddasāti ye niyāmagatā ceva niyāmadassāti ca.
atk-s0301a0:1201_8: Evaṃ cha abhiññāpatto eso mahāsāvakoti veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:1205_1: Vanasaṃyuttassa paṭhame kosalesu viharatīti satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā tassa janapadassa sulabhabhikkhatāya tattha gantvā viharati.
atk-s0301a0:1205_5: Jano janasminti tvaṃ jano aññasmiṃ jane chandarāgaṃ vinayassu.
atk-s0301a0:1205_8: Sataṃ taṃ sārayāmaseti satimantaṃ paṇḍitaṃ taṃ mayampi sārayāma,
atk-s0301a0:1205_9: sataṃ vā dhammaṃ mayaṃ taṃ sārayāmāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1205_11: Mā taṃ kāmarajoti ayaṃ kāmarāgarajo taṃ mā avahari,
atk-s0301a0:1205_16: Saṃvegamāpādīti devatāpi nāma maṃ evaṃ sāretīti vivekamāpanno,
atk-s0301a0:1205_17: uttamavīriyaṃ vā paggayha paramavivekaṃ maggameva paṭipannoti. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1207_2: so dūre bhikkhācāragāmaṃ gantvā āgato paṇṇasālāya pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmetvā avidūre jātassaraṃ otaritvā
atk-s0301a0:1207_3: gattāni utuṃ gāhāpetvā divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā tattha nīcamañcakaṃ paññāpetvā niddaṃ anokkamantova nipanno.
atk-s0301a0:1207_4: Khīṇāsavassāpi hi kāyadaratho hotiyevāti tassa vinodanatthaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1207_6: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā divā supati,
atk-s0301a0:1207_7: divāsoppañca nāmetaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ nāsetī”ti maññamānā “codessāmi na”nti cintetvā abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1208_0: Āturassāti jarāturo rogāturo kilesāturoti tayo āturā,
atk-s0301a0:1208_2: Sallaviddhassāti savisena sattisallena viya avijjāvisaviṭṭhena taṇhāsallena hadaye viddhassa.
atk-s0301a0:1209_2: Kasmā pabbajitaṃ tapeti evarūpaṃ khīṇāsavaṃ divāsoppaṃ na tapati,
atk-s0301a0:1209_3: tādisaṃ pana kasmā na tapessatīti? Vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1209_6: baddhesu muttaṃ asitaṃ mādisaṃ khīṇāsavapabbajitaṃ kasmā divāsoppaṃ tape,
atk-s0301a0:1211_2: Ovadatīti so kira migaluddako pātova bhuñjitvā “mige vadhissāmī”ti araññaṃ paviṭṭho ekaṃ rohitamigaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1211_3: disvā “sattiyā naṃ paharissāmī”ti anubandhamāno therassa paṭhamasutte vuttanayeneva divāvihāraṃ nisinnassa
atk-s0301a0:1211_9: Sopi “mahāpaṃsukūlikatthero kathetī”ti gāravena ṭhatvā sotuṃ āraddho.
atk-s0301a0:1211_10: Athassa sotukāmataṃ janessāmīti thero aṅguṭṭhakaṃ jālāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:1211_15: tattha naṃ gantvā ghātetvā yāvadicchakaṃ maṃsaṃ khāditvā sesaṃ kājenādāya gantvā puttake tosessāmī”ti evaṃ migasseva anupadaṃ dhāvati.
atk-s0301a0:1211_16: Evaṃ vikkhittacittassa dhammaṃ desentaṃ theraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “ovadatī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1211_17: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ thero adāruṃ tacchanto viya akhette vappanto viya attanopi kammaṃ nāseti,
atk-s0301a0:1212_5: Āloketīti tava puthujjanikaiddhiyā jalantaṃ aṅguṭṭhakaṃ āloketi.
atk-s0301a0:1212_6: Na passatīti ettha “neva telaṃ na vaṭṭi na dīpakapallikā,
atk-s0301a0:1212_7: therassa pana ānubhāvenāyaṃ jalatī”ti imaṃ kāraṇaṃ na passati.
atk-s0301a0:1212_8: Dasa pajjoteti dasasu aṅgulīsu dasa padīpe.
atk-s0301a0:1212_12: Vīriyaṃ paggayha paramavivekaṃ arahattamaggaṃ paṭipajji. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1214_1: Catutthe sambahulāti bahū suttantikā ābhidhammikā vinayadharā ca.
atk-s0301a0:1214_2: Viharantīti satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā viharanti.
atk-s0301a0:1214_3: Pakkamiṃsūti te kira tasmiṃ janapade aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upasaṅkamante disvā manussā pasannacittā āsanasālāya
atk-s0301a0:1214_10: temāsaṃ vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne senāsanāni kāretvā catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1214_12: tumhehi garukassa satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahitaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1214_14: Māsassa aṭṭha divase dhammassavanaṃ katvā gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya appamattā viharathā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1214_19: Tesaṃ dhammassavanadivase dhammaṃ kathentānaṃyeva aruṇo uggacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1214_22: Padhānadivase sūriyatthaṅgamane gaṇḍiṃ paharitvāva caṅkamaṃ otaritvā padhānaṃ karontānaṃyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1214_23: Te evaṃ vassaṃ vassitvā pavāretvā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1214_25: Paridevamānāti “idāni tathārūpaṃ madhuraṃ dhammassavanaṃ pañhākathanaṃ kuto labhissāmī”tiādīni vatvā rodamānā.
atk-s0301a0:1215_3: Magā viyāti yathā magā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pabbatapāde vā vanasaṇḍe vā vicarantā –
atk-s0301a0:1215_5: yattheva nesaṃ gocaraphāsutā ca hoti paripanthābhāvo ca,
atk-s0301a0:1215_8: amhākaṃ ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ santako paveṇiāgato”ti agahetvā yattheva nesaṃ utusappāyaṃ bhojanasappāyaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1217_3: Gihisaññattibahuloti rattiñca divā ca bahukālaṃ gihī saññāpayanto.
atk-s0301a0:1217_5: mayaṃ rājagahe vassaṃ upagantvā dhammaṃ saṅgāyissāma,
atk-s0301a0:1217_6: gaccha tvaṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā uparimaggattayatthāya vāyāmaṃ karohī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1217_7: So bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya kosalaraṭṭhaṃ gantvā ekasmiṃ araññāvāse vasitvā punadivase ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0301a0:1217_16: vattapaṭivattaṃ karothā”ti bahuṃ vatvā parideviṃsu. Thero – “mā, āvuso, socittha,
atk-s0301a0:1217_18: aniccā saṅkhārā”tiādīni vatvā te saññāpetvā bhattakiccāvasāne vasanaṭṭhānameva gacchati.
atk-s0301a0:1217_19: Manussā sāyampi tattha gantvā tatheva paridevanti.
atk-s0301a0:1217_22: Ajjhabhāsīti “ayaṃ thero bhikkhusaṅghassa kathaṃ sutvā ‘samaṇadhammaṃ karissāmī’ti araññaṃ pavisitvā idāni gihī saññāpento viharati,
atk-s0301a0:1218_1: Hadayasmiṃ opiyāti kiccato ca ārammaṇato ca hadayamhi pakkhipitvā.
atk-s0301a0:1218_2: “Nibbānaṃ pāpuṇissāmī”ti vīriyaṃ karonto nibbānaṃ kiccato hadayamhi opeti nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1218_3: nibbānārammaṇaṃ pana samāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdanto ārammaṇato.
atk-s0301a0:1218_6: Biḷibiḷikāti ayaṃ gihīhi saddhiṃ biḷibiḷikathā. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1220_5: Tā hi sugatiyaṃ ṭhitā sampattiṃ anubhavanti,
atk-s0301a0:1220_7: Tato cutā hi tā nirayepi upapajjantīti duggatā.
atk-s0301a0:1220_8: Patiṭṭhitāti sakkāyasmiṃ hi patiṭṭhahanto aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi patiṭṭhāti –
atk-s0301a0:1221_0: Natthi dānīti sā kira devadhītā there balavasinehā ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:1221_5: Ekasmiṃ divase therassa jiṇṇacīvarassa coḷakabhikkhaṃ carato saṅkārakūṭe dibbadussaṃ ṭhapetvā pakkami.
atk-s0301a0:1221_10: Atha dve aggasāvakā anuruddhatthero cāti tayo janā cīvaraṃ kariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1221_12: Niṭṭhitacīvarassa piṇḍāya carato devatā piṇḍapātaṃ samādapeti.
atk-s0301a0:1221_15: Tadā pana attatatiyā āgantvā divāṭṭhāne theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā –
atk-s0301a0:1221_16: “mayaṃ manāpakāyikā nāma manasā icchiticchitarūpaṃ māpemā”ti āha. Thero –
atk-s0301a0:1221_20: Tā therassa manaṃ ñatvā sabbāva nīlavaṇṇā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1221_23: “thero amhākaṃ dassanaṃ assādetī”ti tā samajjaṃ kātuṃ āraddhā,
atk-s0301a0:1221_28: “na amhākaṃ dassanaṃ thero assādetī”ti ñatvā sinehaṃ vā santhavaṃ vā alabhamānā nibbinditvā gantumāraddhā.
atk-s0301a0:1221_30: “mā punappunaṃ āgacchiṃsū”ti arahattaṃ byākaronto imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1221_32: Jātisaṃsāroti tattha tattha jātisaṅkhāto saṃsāro. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1223_1: Sattame atikālenāti sabbarattiṃ niddāyitvā balavapaccūse koṭisammuñjaniyā thokaṃ sammajjitvā mukhaṃ dhovitvā yāgubhikkhāya pātova pavisati.
atk-s0301a0:1223_2: Atidivāti yāguṃ ādāya āsanasālaṃ gantvā pivitvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nipanno niddāyitvā –
atk-s0301a0:1223_3: “manussānaṃ bhojanavelāya paṇītaṃ bhikkhaṃ labhissāmī”ti upakaṭṭhe majjhanhike uṭṭhāya dhammakaraṇena
atk-s0301a0:1223_4: udakaṃ gahetvā akkhīni pamajjitvā piṇḍāya caritvā yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā majjhanhike vītivatte paṭikkamati.
atk-s0301a0:1223_5: Divā ca āgantvāti atikāle paviṭṭhena nāma aññehi bhikkhūhi paṭhamataraṃ āgantabbaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1223_6: tvaṃ pana ativiya divā āgantvā gatāsīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1223_7: Bhāyāmi nāgadattanti taṃ nāgadattaṃ ahaṃ bhāyāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1225_2: So kira satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā dutiyadivase gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi pāsādikehi abhikkantādīhi.
atk-s0301a0:1225_3: Aññataraṃ kulaṃ tassa iriyāpathe pasīditvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā piṇḍapātaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1225_6: Thero adhivāsetvā tesaṃ āhāraṃ paribhuñjamāno vīriyaṃ paggayha ghaṭento arahattaṃ patvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1225_10: Ajjhabhāsīti sā kira therassa khīṇāsavabhāvaṃ ajānantī cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1226_0: Saṇṭhāneti nagaradvārassa āsanne manussānaṃ bhaṇḍakaṃ otāretvā vissamanaṭṭhāne.
atk-s0301a0:1226_3: Mañca tañcāti mañca kathenti tañca kathenti.
atk-s0301a0:1226_5: Bahū hi saddā paccūhāti bahukā ete lokasmiṃ paṭilomasaddā.
atk-s0301a0:1226_7: tena vā tapassinā na maṅku hotabbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1226_8: Na hi tenāti na hi tena parehi vuttavacanena satto kilissati,
atk-s0301a0:1226_9: attanā katena pana pāpakammeneva kilissatīti dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1226_10: Vātamigo yathāti yathā vane vātamigo vāteritānaṃ paṇṇādīnaṃ saddena paritassati,
atk-s0301a0:1226_12: Nāssa sampajjate vatanti tassa lahucittassa vataṃ na sampajjati.
atk-s0301a0:1226_13: Thero pana khīṇāsavattā sampannavatoti veditabbo. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1228_1: Navame vajjiputtakoti vajjiraṭṭhe rājaputto chattaṃ pahāya pabbajito.
atk-s0301a0:1228_2: Sabbaratticāroti kattikanakkhattaṃ ghosetvā sakalanagaraṃ dhajapaṭākādīhi paṭimaṇḍetvā pavattito sabbaratticāro.
atk-s0301a0:1228_3: Idañhi nakkhattaṃ yāva cātumahārājikehi ekābaddhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1228_4: Tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddanti bheriāditūriyānaṃ tāḷitānaṃ vīṇādīnañca vāditānaṃ nigghosasaddaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1228_5: Abhāsīti vesāliyaṃ kira satta rājasahassāni sattasatāni satta ca rājāno,
atk-s0301a0:1228_7: Tesu alaṅkatapaṭiyattesu nakkhattakīḷanatthāya vīthiṃ otiṇṇesu saṭṭhihatthe mahācaṅkame caṅkamamāno nabhassa
atk-s0301a0:1228_8: majjhe ṭhitaṃ candaṃ disvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ phalakaṃ nissāya ṭhito abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1228_9: Apaviddhaṃva vanasmiṃ dārukanti vatthaveṭhanālaṅkārarahitattā vane chaḍḍitadārukaṃ viya jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1228_10: Pāpiyoti lāmakataro amhehi añño koci atthi.
atk-s0301a0:1228_11: Pihayantīti thero āraññiko paṃsukūliko piṇḍapātiko sapadānacāriko appiccho santuṭṭhoti bahū tuyhaṃ patthayantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1230_2: Sajjhāyabahuloti nissaraṇapariyattivasena sajjhāyanato bahutaraṃ kālaṃ sajjhāyanto.
atk-s0301a0:1230_3: So kira ācariyassa divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā ācariyaṃ udikkhanto tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a0:1230_4: Atha naṃ āgacchantaṃ disvāva paccuggantvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā paññattāsane nisinnassa tālavaṇṭavātaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1230_5: datvā pānīyaṃ āpucchitvā pāde dhovitvā telaṃ makkhetvā vanditvā ṭhito uddesaṃ gahetvā yāva sūriyatthaṅgamā
atk-s0301a0:1230_7: So nhānakoṭṭhake udakaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā aṅgārakapalle aggiṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a0:1230_8: Ācariyassa nhatvā āgatassa pādesu udakaṃ puñchitvā piṭṭhiparikammaṃ katvā vanditvā uddesaṃ gahetvā paṭhamayāme
atk-s0301a0:1230_9: sajjhāyaṃ katvā majjhimayāme sarīraṃ samassāsetvā pacchimayāme uddesaṃ gahetvā yāva aruṇuggamanā sajjhāyaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1230_11: Tato sesaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ bhūtarūpaṃ nāmarūpanti pañcasu khandhesu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a0:1230_12: Appossukkoti uddesaggahaṇe ca sajjhāyakaraṇīye ca nirussukko.
atk-s0301a0:1230_13: Saṅkasāyatīti yassa dāni atthāya ahaṃ sajjhāyaṃ kareyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1230_15: Kiṃ me idāni sajjhāyenāti phalasamāpattisukhena kālaṃ ativatteti.
atk-s0301a0:1230_17: “kiṃ nu kho assa therassa aphāsukaṃ jātaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1230_19: Kena nu kho kāraṇena pubbe viya madhurassarena na sajjhāyatī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:1231_8: Nikkhepananti tassa diṭṭhasutādino vissajjanaṃ santo vadantīti dīpeti,
atk-s0301a0:1231_10: Ettāvatā “thero buddhavacanaṃ na vissajjāpetī”ti na niccakālaṃ sajjhāyanteneva bhavitabbaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1231_12: “ettakassāhaṃ atthassa vā dhammassa vā ādhāro bhavituṃ samattho”ti ñatvā vaṭṭadukkhassa antakiriyāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1233_1: Ekādasame akusale vitakketi kāmavitakkādayo tayo mahāvitakke.
atk-s0301a0:1235_0: 232. Dvādasame yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ devatāsaṃyutte nandanavagge vuttameva. Dvādasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1239_1: Cuddasame ajjhabhāsīti taṃ bhikkhuṃ nāḷe gahetvā padumaṃ siṅghamānaṃ disvāva –
atk-s0301a0:1239_2: “ayaṃ bhikkhu satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ araññaṃ paviṭṭho gandhārammaṇaṃ upanijjhāyati,
atk-s0301a0:1239_3: svāyaṃ ajja upasiṅghaṃ svepi punadivasepi upasiṅghissati,
atk-s0301a0:1239_4: evamassa sā gandhataṇhā vaḍḍhitvā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaṃ atthaṃ nāsessati,
atk-s0301a0:1240_0: Ekaṅgametaṃ theyyānanti thenitabbānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīnaṃ pañcakoṭṭhāsānaṃ idaṃ ekaṅgaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1240_3: Ārāti dūre nāḷe gahetvā nāmetvā dūre ṭhito upasiṅghāmīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1241_1: Tasmiṃ kira devatāya saddhiṃ kathenteyeva eko tāpaso otaritvā bhisakhananādīni kātuṃ āraddho,
atk-s0301a0:1241_6: Na vuccatīti gandhacoroti vā pupphacoroti vā kasmā na vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:1242_2: Dhāticelaṃva makkhitoti yathā dhātiyā nivatthakiliṭṭhavatthaṃ uccārapassāvapaṃsumasikaddamādīhi makkhitaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1242_6: na taṃ lāmakā hīnādhimuttikā micchāpaṭipannakapuggalā labhanti.
atk-s0301a0:1242_7: Tasmiṃ pana attabhāve maggaphalānaṃ bhabbarūpā puggalā taṃ labhanti,
atk-s0301a0:1243_4: Neva taṃ upajīvāmāti devatā kira cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1243_6: sā maṃ codessati sāressatīti pamādampi anuyuñjeyya,
atk-s0301a0:1247_4: Rūpaṃ na jīvanti vadantīti yadi buddhā rūpaṃ jīvanti na vadanti,
atk-s0301a0:1247_5: yadi rūpaṃ satto puggaloti evaṃ na vadantīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1247_7: Kutassa aṭṭhīyakapiṇḍametīti assa sattassa aṭṭhiyakapiṇḍañca kuto āgacchati?
atk-s0301a0:1247_11: athassa imāni ca aṭṭhīni imā ca maṃsapesiyo kuto āgacchantīti pucchati.
atk-s0301a0:1247_12: Kathaṃ nvayaṃ sajjati gabbharasminti kena nu kāraṇena ayaṃ satto mātukucchismiṃ sajjati laggati,
atk-s0301a0:1247_15: “ekappahāreneva satto mātukucchismiṃ nibbattatī”ti gahetvā gabbhaseyyakasattassa mātā macchamaṃsādīni khādati,
atk-s0301a0:1247_16: sabbāni ekarattivāsena pacitvā pheṇaṃ viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0301a0:1247_21: anupubbena pana vaḍḍhatī”ti dassento paṭhamaṃ kalalaṃ hotītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1247_22: Tattha paṭhamanti paṭhamena paṭisandhiviññāṇena saddhiṃ tissoti vā phussoti vā nāmaṃ natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1247_23: atha kho tīhi jātiuṇṇaṃsūhi katasuttagge saṇṭhitatelabinduppamāṇaṃ kalalaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1250_0: Kalalā hoti abbudanti tasmā kalalā sattāhaccayena maṃsadhovanaudakavaṇṇaṃ abbudaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1253_0: Abbudā jāyate pesīti tasmāpi abbudā sattāhaccayena vilīnatipusadisā pesi nāma sañjāyati.
atk-s0301a0:1253_2: Gāmadārikā hi supakkāni maricāni gahetvā sāṭakante bhaṇḍikaṃ katvā pīḷetvā maṇḍaṃ ādāya kapāle pakkhipitvā ātape ṭhapenti,
atk-s0301a0:1256_0: Pesi nibbattatī ghanoti tato pesito sattāhaccayena kukkuṭaṇḍasaṇṭhāno ghano nāma maṃsapiṇḍo nibbattati,
atk-s0301a0:1261_0: Ghanā pasākhā jāyantīti pañcame sattāhe dvinnaṃ hatthapādānaṃ sīsassa catthāya pañca pīḷakā jāyanti,
atk-s0301a0:1262_0: Ito paraṃ chaṭṭhasattamādīni sattāhāni atikkamma desanaṃ saṅkhipitvā dvācattālīse sattāhe pariṇatakālaṃ gahetvā dassento kesātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1262_1: Tattha kesā lomā nakhāpi cāti dvācattālīse sattāhe etāni jāyanti.
atk-s0301a0:1263_0: Tena so tattha yāpetīti tassa hi nābhito uṭṭhito nāḷo mātu udarapaṭalena ekābaddho hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1265_1: Dutiye sakkanāmakoti evaṃ nāmako eko yakkho,
atk-s0301a0:1267_3: Ṭaṅkitamañceti dīghamañce pādamajjhe vijjhitvā aṭaniyo pavesetvā katamañce.
atk-s0301a0:1267_8: Catunnaṃ pāsāṇānaṃ upari pāsāṇaṃ attharitvā katagehampi “ṭaṅkitamañco”ti vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:1267_10: So kira kassapassa bhagavato sāsane pabbajitvā dūraṭṭhānato āgato sedamalaggahitena gattena supaññattaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1267_12: tassa parisuddhasīlassa taṃ kammaṃ suddhavatthe kāḷakaṃ viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1267_13: So tasmiṃ attabhāve visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ asakkonto kālaṃkatvā gayāgāmadvāre saṅkāraṭṭhāne yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:1267_14: Nibbattamattasseva cassa sakalasarīraṃ kathinasūcīhi gavicchivijjhitaṃ viya jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1268_0: Athekadivasaṃ bhagavā paccūsasamaye lokaṃ olokento taṃ yakkhaṃ paṭhamāvajjanasseva āpāthaṃ āgataṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a0:1268_2: Kiṃ nu khvāssa maṃ āgamma sotthikāraṇaṃ bhaveyyā”ti?
atk-s0301a0:1268_4: Athassa saṅgahaṃ kātukāmo surattadupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā sugatamahācīvaraṃ pārupitvā devavimānakappaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0301a0:1268_5: pahāya hatthigavāssamanussakukkurādikuṇapaduggandhaṃ saṅkāraṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃ viya nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:1269_0: Kharoti suṃsumārapiṭṭhi viya chadaniṭṭhakāhi visamacchadanapiṭṭhi viya ca kharasarīro.
atk-s0301a0:1269_1: So kira kassapasammāsambuddhakāle sīlasampanno upāsako ekadivase vihāre cittattharaṇādīhi atthatāya bhūmiyā
atk-s0301a0:1269_2: saṅghike attharaṇe attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ apaccattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0301a0:1269_3: Saṅghikaṃ telaṃ abhājetvā attano uttarāsaṅgaṃ apaccattharitvā nipajji.
atk-s0301a0:1269_4: Saṅghikaṃ telaṃ abhājetvā attano hatthehi sarīraṃ makkhesītipi vadanti.
atk-s0301a0:1269_5: So tena kammena sagge nibbattituṃ asakkonto tasseva gāmassa dvāre saṅkāraṭṭhāne yakkho hutvā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:1270_0: Avidūre atikkamantīti gocaraṃ pariyesantā samāgamaṭṭhānaṃ vā gacchantā āsanne ṭhāne gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1270_2: kharalomo paṭhamataraṃ disvā sūcilomaṃ yakkhaṃ etadavoca –
atk-s0301a0:1270_4: esa tava bhavanaṃ pavisitvā nisinno eko samaṇoti.
atk-s0301a0:1270_6: samaṇako esoti so kira yo maṃ passitvā bhīto palāyati,
atk-s0301a0:1270_10: Tasmā “ayaṃ maṃ disvā bhīto palāyissatī”ti maññamāno evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1271_0: Kāyaṃ upanāmesīti bheravarūpaṃ nimminitvā mahāmukhaṃ vivaritvā sakalasarīre lomāni uṭṭhāpetvā kāyaṃ upanāmesi.
atk-s0301a0:1271_1: Apanāmesīti ratanasatikaṃ suvaṇṇagghanikaṃ viya thokaṃ apanāmesi.
atk-s0301a0:1271_3: So gūthaṃ viya aggi viya kaṇhasappo viya ca parivajjetabbo,
atk-s0301a0:1271_5: Evaṃ vutte pana sūcilomo “pāpako kira me samphasso”ti kuddho pañhaṃ taṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1271_7: Cittaṃ vā te khipissāmīti yesañhi amanussā cittaṃ khipitukāmā honti,
atk-s0301a0:1271_8: tesaṃ setamukhaṃ nīlodaraṃ surattahatthapādaṃ mahāsīsaṃ pajjalitanettaṃ bheravaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā dassenti,
atk-s0301a0:1271_10: kathentānaṃyeva vā mukhe hatthaṃ pakkhipitvā hadayaṃ maddanti,
atk-s0301a0:1271_11: tena te sattā ummattakā honti khittacittā.
atk-s0301a0:1271_13: Pāragaṅgāyāti dvīsu pādesu gahetvā taṃ āviñchetvā yathā na punāgacchasi,
atk-s0301a0:1271_14: evaṃ pāraṃ vā gaṅgāya khipissāmīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1272_2: Kumārakā dhaṅkamivossajantīti yathā kumārakā kākaṃ gahetvā ossajanti khipanti,
atk-s0301a0:1272_3: evaṃ pāpavitakkā kuto samuṭṭhāya cittaṃ ossajantīti pucchati?
atk-s0301a0:1273_0: Itonidānāti ayaṃ attabhāvo nidānaṃ etesanti ito nidānā.
atk-s0301a0:1273_2: Ito samuṭṭhāya manovitakkāti yathā dīghasuttakena pāde baddhaṃ kākaṃ kumārakā tassa suttapariyantaṃ aṅguliyaṃ veṭhetvā ossajanti,
atk-s0301a0:1273_3: so dūraṃ gantvāpi puna tesaṃ pādamūleyeva patati,
atk-s0301a0:1273_4: evameva ito attabhāvato samuṭṭhāya pāpavitakkā cittaṃ ossajanti.
atk-s0301a0:1274_2: Nigrodhasseva khandhajāti nigrodhakhandhe jātā pārohā viya.
atk-s0301a0:1274_3: Puthūti bahū anekappakārā pāpavitakkā taṃsampayuttakilesā ca.
atk-s0301a0:1274_6: Māluvāva vitatā vaneti yathā vane māluvā latā yaṃ rukkhaṃ nissāya jāyati,
atk-s0301a0:1274_8: aggato yāva mūlā punappunaṃ saṃsibbitvā ajjhottharitvā otatavitatā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a0:1274_10: puthū vā sattā tehi kilesakāmehi vatthukāmesu visattā.
atk-s0301a0:1274_11: Ye naṃ pajānantīti ye “attasambhūtā”ti ettha vuttaṃ attabhāvaṃ jānanti.
atk-s0301a0:1275_0: Yatonidānanti yaṃ nidānamassa attabhāvassa tañca jānanti.
atk-s0301a0:1275_1: Te naṃ vinodentīti te evaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātassa dukkhasaccassa nidānabhūtaṃ samudayasaccaṃ maggasaccena vinodenti.
atk-s0301a0:1275_2: Te duttaranti te samudayasaccaṃ nīharantā idaṃ duttaraṃ kilesoghaṃ taranti.
atk-s0301a0:1275_3: Atiṇṇapubbanti anamatagge saṃsāre supinantepi na tiṇṇapubbaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1275_5: Iti imāya gāthāya cattāri saccāni pakāsento arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0301a0:1275_6: Desanāvasāne sūcilomo tasmiṃyeva padese ṭhito desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0301a0:1275_7: Sotāpannā ca nāma na kiliṭṭhattabhāve tiṭṭhantīti saha phalapaṭilābhenassa sarīre setakaṇḍupīḷakasūciyo sabbā patitā.
atk-s0301a0:1275_8: So dibbavatthanivattho dibbavaradukūluttarāsaṅgo dibbaveṭhanaveṭhito dibbābharaṇagandhamāladharo suvaṇṇavaṇṇo hutvā bhummadevatāparihāraṃ paṭilabhīti. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1277_5: Verā na parimuccatīti ahaṃ satimāti ettakena verato na muccati.
atk-s0301a0:1277_12: yassa arahato sabbakālaṃ ahiṃsāya rato mano,
atk-s0301a0:1277_14: tassa kenaci puggalena saddhiṃ veraṃ nāma natthi yakkhāti.
atk-s0301a0:1279_1: Pañcame yakkhena gahito hotīti so kira tassā upāsikāya ekaputtako.
atk-s0301a0:1279_3: So pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya sīlavā ahosi vattasampanno,
atk-s0301a0:1279_5: māsassa aṭṭhamīdivase pāto vuṭṭhāya udakamāḷake udakaṃ upaṭṭhāpetvā dhammassavanaggaṃ sammajjitvā dīpaṃ jāletvā madhurassarena dhammassavanaṃ ghoseti.
atk-s0301a0:1279_9: kāso vā bādhatī”ti kiñci paccāhāraṃ akatvā dhammāsanaṃ abhiruhitvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya sarabhāṇaṃ vatvā otaranto –
atk-s0301a0:1279_11: Tassa manussā mātāpitaro pattiyā dinnabhāvaṃ na jānanti.
atk-s0301a0:1279_17: Sīlasampannā ca nāma bhikkhū sadevakassa lokassa piyā hontīti tasmiṃ sāmaṇere devatā salajjā sagāravā
atk-s0301a0:1279_18: mahābrahmaṃ viya aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca naṃ maññanti.
atk-s0301a0:1279_19: Sāmaṇere gāravena taṃ yakkhiniṃ garuṃ katvā passanti.
atk-s0301a0:1279_20: Dhammassavanayakkhasamāgamādīsu “sānumātā sānumātā”ti yakkhiniyā aggāsanaṃ aggodakaṃ aggapiṇḍaṃ denti.
atk-s0301a0:1279_21: Mahesakkhāpi yakkhā taṃ disvā maggā okkamanti,
atk-s0301a0:1280_0: Atha kho sāmaṇero vuḍḍhimanvāya paripakkindriyo anabhiratipīḷito anabhiratiṃ vinodetuṃ asakkonto parūḷhakesanakho
atk-s0301a0:1280_1: kiliṭṭhanivāsanapārupano kassaci anārocetvā pattacīvaramādāya ekakova mātu gharaṃ gato.
atk-s0301a0:1280_4: tvaṃ pubbe ācariyupajjhāyehi vā daharasāmaṇerehi vā saddhiṃ idhāgacchasi.
atk-s0301a0:1280_7: Saddhā upāsikā nānappakārena gharāvāse ādīnavaṃ dassetvā puttaṃ ovadamānāpi taṃ saññāpetuṃ asakkontī,
atk-s0301a0:1280_8: “appeva nāma attano dhammatāyapi sallakkhessatī”ti anuyojetvāva – “tiṭṭha, tāta,
atk-s0301a0:1280_10: yāguṃ pivitvā katabhattakiccassa te manāpāni vatthāni nīharitvā dassāmī”ti vatvā āsanaṃ paññāpetvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1280_13: Tato “bhattaṃ sampādessāmī”ti avidūre nisinnā taṇḍule dhovati.
atk-s0301a0:1280_14: Tasmiṃ samaye sā yakkhinī “kahaṃ nu kho sāmaṇero?
atk-s0301a0:1280_18: “mā heva kho me devatānaṃ antare lajjaṃ uppādeyya,
atk-s0301a0:1280_19: gacchāmissa vibbhamane antarāyaṃ karomī”ti āgantvā sarīre adhimuccitvā gīvaṃ parivattetvā bhūmiyaṃ pātesi.
atk-s0301a0:1280_20: So akkhīhi viparivattehi kheḷena paggharantena bhūmiyaṃ vipphandati.
atk-s0301a0:1281_0: Abhāsīti upāsikā puttassa taṃ vippakāraṃ disvā vegena gantvā puttaṃ āliṅgetvā ūrūsu nipajjāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:1282_0: Pāṭihāriyapakkhañcāti manussā “aṭṭhamīuposathassa paccuggamanañca anuggamanañca karissāmā”ti sattamiyāpi navamiyāpi uposathaṅgāni samādiyanti,
atk-s0301a0:1282_1: cātuddasīpannarasīnaṃ paccuggamanānuggamanaṃ karontā terasiyāpi pāṭipadepi samādiyanti,
atk-s0301a0:1282_2: “vassāvāsassa anuggamanaṃ karissāmā”ti dvinnaṃ pavāraṇānaṃ antare aḍḍhamāsaṃ nibaddhuposathikā bhavanti.
atk-s0301a0:1282_7: Na te hi yakkhā kīḷantīti na te gahetvā yakkhā kilamenti.
atk-s0301a0:1283_0: Puna cātuddasinti imāya gāthāya sāmaṇerassa kāye adhimuttā yakkhinī āha.
atk-s0301a0:1283_1: Āvi vā yadi vā rahoti kassaci sammukhe vā parammukhe vā.
atk-s0301a0:1283_8: mātā kese pakiriya assasantī passasantī rodati.
atk-s0301a0:1283_11: Mātā me avidūre nisīditvā taṇḍule dhovati.
atk-s0301a0:1284_2: Puna jīvaṃ mato hi soti uppabbajitvā puna jīvantopi so matakova,
atk-s0301a0:1285_1: Tattha kukkuḷāti gharāvāso kira uṇhaṭṭhena kukkuḷā nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1285_6: imaṃ vippakāraṃ kassa mayaṃ ujjhāpayāma nijjhāpayāma ārocayāmā”ti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1285_7: Puna ḍayhitumicchasītiādittagharato nīhaṭabhaṇḍaṃ viya gharā nīharitvā buddhasāsane pabbajito puna mahāḍāhasadise gharāvāse ḍayhituṃ icchasīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1285_8: So mātari kathentiyā kathentiyā sallakkhetvā hirottappaṃ paṭilabhitvā,
atk-s0301a0:1285_16: So ticīvaraṃ kārāpetvā upasampanno buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhanto tepiṭako hutvā sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne taṃ
atk-s0301a0:1285_17: taṃ pūrento nacirasseva arahattaṃ patvā mahādhammakathiko hutvā vīsavassasataṃ ṭhatvā sakalajambudīpaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1287_1: Chaṭṭhe jetavaneti jetavanassa paccante kosambakakuṭi nāma atthi,
atk-s0301a0:1287_3: Dhammapadānīti idha pāṭiyekkaṃ saṅgahaṃ āruḷhā chabbīsativaggā tanti adhippetā.
atk-s0301a0:1287_4: Tatra thero tasmiṃ samaye antovihāre nisinno madhurassarena sarabhaññaṃ katvā appamādavaggaṃ bhāsati.
atk-s0301a0:1287_5: Evaṃ tosesīti sā kira puttaṃ piyaṅkaraṃ aṅkenādāya jetavanassa pacchimabhāgato paṭṭhāya gocaraṃ pariyesantī
atk-s0301a0:1287_6: anupubbena nagarābhimukhī hutvā uccārapassāvakheḷasiṅghāṇikadubbhojanāni pariyesamānā therassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1287_8: Tassā so saddo chaviādīni chetvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca hadayaṅgamanīyo hutvā aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1287_11: Yakkhadārakassa pana daharatāya dhammassavane cittaṃ natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1287_14: Na mayhaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā pariyesasī”ti punappunaṃ mātaraṃ codeti.
atk-s0301a0:1287_15: Sā “dhammassavanassa me antarāyaṃ karotī”ti puttakaṃ “mā saddaṃ kari,
atk-s0301a0:1287_17: Tattha mā saddaṃ karīti saddaṃ mā kari.
atk-s0301a0:1288_0: Pāṇesu cāti gāthāya sā attano dhammatāya samādiṇṇaṃ pañcasīlaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1288_5: Api muccema pisācayoniyāti api nāma yakkhaloke uppannāni pañca verāni pahāya,
atk-s0301a0:1288_6: yoniso paṭipajjitvā imāya chātakadubbhikkhāya pisācayakkhayoniyā muccema,
atk-s0301a0:1290_1: Sattame tena kho pana samayenāti katarasamayena?
atk-s0301a0:1290_3: Tadā kira bhagavā pacchābhatte mahājanassa dhammaṃ desetvā mahājanaṃ uyyojetvā nhānakoṭṭhake nhatvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe
atk-s0301a0:1290_5: Athekacārikadvicārikādayo paṃsukūlikapiṇḍapātikabhikkhū attano attano vasanaṭṭhānehi nikkhamitvā āgamma
atk-s0301a0:1290_6: dasabalaṃ vanditvā rattasāṇiyā parikkhipamānā viya nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1290_7: Atha nesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ viditvā satthā nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:1291_0: Evaṃ tosesīti sā kira dhītaraṃ aṅkenādāya puttaṃ aṅguliyā gahetvā jetavanapiṭṭhiyaṃ pākāraparikkhepasamīpe
atk-s0301a0:1291_5: vighāsādānaṃ dānaṃ dehī”ti kathentassa saddo samantā dvādasahatthamattameva gaṇhāti.
atk-s0301a0:1291_6: Dhammaṃ desentassa sacepi cakkavāḷapariyantaṃ katvā parisā nisīdati,
atk-s0301a0:1291_10: Tatrāyaṃ yakkhinī bahiparisāya ṭhitā saddaṃ na suṇāti,
atk-s0301a0:1291_11: dvārakoṭṭhake ṭhitāya panassā mahatiyā buddhavīthiyā abhimukhe ṭhitā gandhakuṭi paññāyi.
atk-s0301a0:1291_12: Sā nivāte dīpasikhā viya buddhagāravena hatthakukkuccādirahitaṃ niccalaṃ parisaṃ disvā –
atk-s0301a0:1291_14: yato ahaṃ sappitelamadhuphāṇitādīsu kiñcideva pattato vā hatthato vā paggharantaṃ bhūmiyaṃ vā pana patitaṃ labhissāmī”ti antovihāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0301a0:1291_15: Dvārakoṭṭhake avaruddhakānaṃ nivāraṇatthāya ṭhitā ārakkhadevatā yakkhiniyā upanissayaṃ disvā na nivāresi.
atk-s0301a0:1291_16: Tassā saha parisāya ekībhāvagamanena madhurassaro chaviādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1291_17: Taṃ dhammassavanatthāya niccalaṃ ṭhitaṃ purimanayeneva puttakā codayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1291_18: Sā “dhammassavanassa me antarāyaṃ karontī”ti puttake tuṇhī uttarike hohīti evaṃ tosesi.
atk-s0301a0:1292_2: Sabbaganthappamocananti nibbānaṃ āgamma sabbe ganthā pamuccanti,
atk-s0301a0:1292_6: Tato piyataranti yā ayaṃ assa dhammassa magganā patthanā,
atk-s0301a0:1292_15: ayaṃ me bhaginī uttarāpi tuṇhībhūtāti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1292_17: mayaṃ pubbepi imaṃ saddhammameva ajānitvā idāni idaṃ khuppipāsādidukkhaṃ anubhavantā dukkhaṃ carāma viharāma.
atk-s0301a0:1293_1: Dhammaṃ desentoyeva bhagavā parisaṃ sallakkhayamāno tassā yakkhiniyā ceva yakkhadārakassa ca sotāpattiphalassa
atk-s0301a0:1293_2: upanissayaṃ disvā desanaṃ vinivaṭṭetvā catusaccakathaṃ dīpeti,
atk-s0301a0:1293_3: taṃ sutvā tasmiṃyeva dese ṭhitā yakkhinī saddhiṃ puttena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitā.
atk-s0301a0:1294_0: Idāni sā yakkhinī puttassa anumodanaṃ karontī sādhu kho paṇḍito nāmātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1294_1: Ajjāhamhi samuggatāti ahamhi ajja vaṭṭato uggatā samuggatā sāsane vā uggatā samuggatā,
atk-s0301a0:1294_3: Diṭṭhānīti mayā ca tayā ca diṭṭhāni.
atk-s0301a0:1294_8: Saha saccapaṭivedheneva sāpi sūcilomo viya sabbaṃ setakaṇḍukacchuādibhāvaṃ pahāya dibbasampattiṃ paṭilabhati saddhiṃ puttena.
atk-s0301a0:1294_9: Dhītā panassā yathā nāma loke mātāpitūhi issariye laddhe puttānampi taṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1294_12: Tato paṭṭhāya ca sā saddhiṃ puttakehi gandhakuṭisamīparukkheyeva nivāsarukkhaṃ labhitvā sāyaṃ pātaṃ buddhadassanaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1294_13: labhamānā dhammaṃ suṇamānā dīgharattaṃ tattheva vasi. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1296_2: Anāthapiṇḍiko ca rājagahaseṭṭhi ca aññamaññaṃ bhaginipatikā honti.
atk-s0301a0:1296_4: tadā rājagahaseṭṭhi taṃ gahetvā pañcasakaṭasatehi sāvatthiṃ gantvā yojanamatte ṭhito attano āgatabhāvaṃ jānāpeti.
atk-s0301a0:1296_5: Anāthapiṇḍiko paccuggantvā tassa mahāsakkāraṃ katvā ekayānaṃ āropetvā sāvatthiṃ pavisati.
atk-s0301a0:1297_0: Taṃ divasaṃ pana rājagahaseṭṭhi yojanamatte ṭhitena anāthapiṇḍikena āgatabhāvajānanatthaṃ pesitaṃ paṇṇaṃ na suṇi,
atk-s0301a0:1297_2: So dhammakathaṃ sutvā svātanāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā attano ghare uddhanakhaṇāpanadāruphālanādīni kāresi.
atk-s0301a0:1297_4: idāni karissatī”ti gharadvārepi paccuggamanaṃ alabhitvā antogharaṃ paviṭṭho paṭisanthārampi na bahuṃ alattha. “Kiṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1297_12: Khandhake āgatanayeneva kathaṃ pavattetvā tassa mukhato buddhasaddaṃ sutvā pañcavaṇṇaṃ pītiṃ paṭilabhi.
atk-s0301a0:1297_13: Sā tassa sīsena uṭṭhāya yāva pādapiṭṭhiyā,
atk-s0301a0:1297_21: “ghosopi kho eso dullabho lokasmiṃ yadidaṃ buddho”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1297_22: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “assosi kho anāthapiṇḍiko, gahapati,
atk-s0301a0:1298_0: Etadahosi akālo kho ajjāti so kira taṃ seṭṭhiṃ pucchi,
atk-s0301a0:1298_5: na sakkā tattha tumhādisehi imāya velāya gantu”nti ācikkhi.
atk-s0301a0:1298_7: Buddhagatāya satiyā nipajjīti taṃdivasaṃ kirassa bhaṇḍasakaṭesu vā upaṭṭhākesu vā cittampi na uppajji,
atk-s0301a0:1298_9: sattabhūmikaṃ pana pāsādaṃ āruyha supaññattālaṅkatavarasayane “buddho buddho”ti sajjhāyaṃ karontova nipajjitvā niddaṃ okkami.
atk-s0301a0:1299_0: Rattiyā sudaṃ tikkhattuṃ uṭṭhāsi pabhātanti maññamānoti paṭhamayāme tāva vītivatte uṭṭhāya buddhaṃ anussari,
atk-s0301a0:1299_4: dīpasahassujjalaṃ viya canduṭṭhānaṃ sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya ca jātaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1299_6: sūriyo uggato”ti uṭṭhāya ākāsatale ṭhitaṃ candaṃ ulloketvā “ekova yāmo gato,
atk-s0301a0:1299_7: aññe dve atthī”ti puna pavisitvā nipajji.
atk-s0301a0:1299_9: Pacchimayāmāvasāne pana balavapaccūseyeva uṭṭhāya ākāsatalaṃ āgantvā mahādvārābhimukhova ahosi,
atk-s0301a0:1300_1: paṭhamadassaneneva sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ aggupaṭṭhāko hutvā asadisaṃ saṅghārāmaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1300_3: na yuttamassa dvāraṃ pidahitu”nti cintetvā vivariṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1300_4: Antaradhāyīti rājagahaṃ kira ākiṇṇamanussaṃ antonagare nava koṭiyo,
atk-s0301a0:1300_5: bahinagare navāti taṃ upanissāya aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo vasanti.
atk-s0301a0:1300_6: Avelāya matamanusse bahi nīharituṃ asakkontā aṭṭālake ṭhatvā bahidvāre khipanti.
atk-s0301a0:1300_7: Mahāseṭṭhi nagarato bahinikkhantamattova allasarīraṃ pādena akkami,
atk-s0301a0:1300_14: Saddamanussāvesīti “seṭṭhissa ussāhaṃ janessāmī”ti suvaṇṇakiṅkiṇikaṃ ghaṭṭento viya madhurassarena saddaṃ anussāvesi.
atk-s0301a0:1301_0: Sataṃ kaññāsahassānīti purimapadānipi imināva sahassapadena saddhiṃ sambandhanīyāni.
atk-s0301a0:1301_6: Padavītihārassāti padavītihāro nāma samagamane dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1301_7: Kalaṃ nāgghanti soḷasinti taṃ ekaṃ padavītihāraṃ soḷasabhāge katvā tato eko koṭṭhāso puna soḷasadhā,
atk-s0301a0:1301_8: tato eko soḷasadhāti evaṃ soḷasa vāre soḷasadhā bhinnassa eko koṭṭhāso soḷasikalā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1301_9: taṃ soḷasikalaṃ etāni cattāri satasahassāni na agghanti.
atk-s0301a0:1301_11: sataṃ hatthisahassāni sataṃ assasahassāni sataṃ rathasahassāni sataṃ kaññāsahassāni,
atk-s0301a0:1301_12: tā ca kho āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalā sakalajambudīparājadhītaro vāti imasmā ettakā lābhā vihāraṃ gacchantassa
atk-s0301a0:1301_14: Idaṃ pana vihāragamanaṃ kassa vasena gahitanti?
atk-s0301a0:1301_21: sikkhāpadesu vā saraṇesu vā patiṭṭhahissāmī”ti gacchatopi vasena vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1302_7: Apica purato purato gacchanto bhiṃsanake susānamagge aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikasamaṃsalohitantiādīni anekavidhāni kuṇapāni addasa.
atk-s0301a0:1302_9: Taṃ sabbaṃ parissayaṃ punappunaṃ buddhagataṃ pasādaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maddanto agamāsiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1303_0: Ehi sudattāti so kira seṭṭhi gacchamānova cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1303_1: “imasmiṃ loke bahū pūraṇakassapādayo titthiyā ‘mayaṃ buddhā mayaṃ buddhā’ti vadanti,
atk-s0301a0:1303_2: kathaṃ nu kho ahaṃ satthu buddhabhāvaṃ jāneyya”nti?
atk-s0301a0:1303_5: kuladattiyaṃ pana me nāmaṃ aññatra mayā na koci jānāti.
atk-s0301a0:1304_4: Idañca pana vatvā satthā tassa anupubbikathaṃ kathetvā matthake cattāri saccāni pakāsesi.
atk-s0301a0:1304_5: Seṭṭhi dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāya buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ nimantetvā punadivasato paṭṭhāya mahādānaṃ dātuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0301a0:1304_10: So “alaṃ tumhe bahukiccā”ti sabbe paṭikkhipitvā pañcahi sakaṭasatehi ānītavibhavena sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1304_11: Dānapariyosāne ca bhagavantaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ vassāvāsaṃ paṭijānāpetvā rājagahassa ca sāvatthiyā ca antare
atk-s0301a0:1304_12: yojane yojane satasahassaṃ datvā pañcacattālīsa vihāre kārento sāvatthiṃ gantvā jetavanamahāvihāraṃ kāretvā
atk-s0301a0:1306_1: Navame rathikāya rathikanti ekaṃ rathikaṃ gahetvā tato aparaṃ gacchanto rathikāya rathikaṃ upasaṅkamanto nāma hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1306_5: Kiṃ me katāti kiṃ ime katā?
atk-s0301a0:1306_7: Madhupītāva seyareti gandhamadhupānaṃ pītā viya sayanti.
atk-s0301a0:1306_8: Gandhamadhupānaṃ pīto kira sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:1307_0: Tañca pana appaṭivānīyanti tañca pana dhammaṃ appaṭivānīyaṃ deseti.
atk-s0301a0:1307_1: Bāhirakañhi sumadhurampi bhojanaṃ punappunaṃ bhuñjantassa na ruccati,
atk-s0301a0:1307_6: Imaṃ hi dhammaṃ paṇḍitā vassasatampi vassasahassampi suṇantā tittiṃ na gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1307_9: Yathā hi bāhirāni asambhinnapāyāsādīnipi sappimadhusakkharāhi āsittāni yojitāneva madhurāni ojavantāni honti,
atk-s0301a0:1307_11: Ayaṃ hi attano dhammatāya madhuro ceva ojavā ca,
atk-s0301a0:1307_14: Pivanti maññe sappaññāti paṇḍitapurisā pivanti viya.
atk-s0301a0:1307_15: Valāhakameva panthagūti valāhakantarato nikkhantaudakaṃ ghammābhitattā pathikā viya. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1309_0: 244. Dasame puññaṃ vata pasavi bahunti bahuṃ vata puññaṃ pasavatīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1312_1: Dvādasame āḷaviyanti āḷavīti taṃ raṭṭhampi nagarampi.
atk-s0301a0:1312_2: Tañca bhavanaṃ nagarassa avidūre gāvutamatte ṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1312_3: Bhagavā tattha viharanto taṃ nagaraṃ upanissāya āḷaviyaṃ viharatīti vutto.
atk-s0301a0:1312_4: Āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavaneti ettha pana ayamanupubbikathā –
atk-s0301a0:1312_5: āḷavako kira rājā vividhanāṭakūpabhogaṃ chaḍḍetvā corapaṭibāhanatthaṃ paṭirājanisedhanatthaṃ byāyāmakaraṇatthañca
atk-s0301a0:1312_6: sattame sattame divase migavaṃ gacchanto ekadivasaṃ balakāyena saddhiṃ katikaṃ akāsi –
atk-s0301a0:1312_10: javasampanno rājā dhanuṃ gahetvā pattikova tiyojanaṃ taṃ migaṃ anubandhi.
atk-s0301a0:1312_12: Atha parikkhīṇajavaṃ taṃ udakaṃ viya pavisitvā ṭhitaṃ vadhitvā dvidhā chetvā anatthikopi maṃsena “nāsakkhi
atk-s0301a0:1312_13: migaṃ gahetu”nti apavādamocanatthaṃ kājenādāya āgacchanto nagarassāvidūre bahalapattapalāsaṃ mahānigrodhaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1312_15: Tasmiñca nigrodhe āḷavako yakkho mahārājasantikā bhavanaṃ labhitvā majjhanhikasamaye tassa rukkhassa
atk-s0301a0:1312_16: chāyāya phuṭṭhokāsaṃ paviṭṭhe pāṇino khādanto paṭivasati.
atk-s0301a0:1312_20: ahaṃ te divase divase manussañca thālipākañca pesessāmī”ti. Yakkho –
atk-s0301a0:1312_22: ahaṃ pana bhavanaṃ anupagatañca ananuññātañca khādituṃ na labhāmi,
atk-s0301a0:1312_25: taṃ divasaṃ maṃ gahetvā khādā”ti attānaṃ anujānitvā tena mutto nagarābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1313_0: Balakāyo magge khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā ṭhito rājānaṃ disvā, “kiṃ, mahārāja,
atk-s0301a0:1313_3: Rājā taṃ pavattiṃ anārocetvā nagaraṃ gantvā katapātarāso nagaraguttikaṃ āmantetvā etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
atk-s0301a0:1313_14: So kālasseva vuṭṭhāya bandhanāgāradvāre ṭhatvā ye ye vajjhā honti,
atk-s0301a0:1313_18: taṃ gehaṃ netvā nhāpetvā bhojetvā ca “imaṃ thālipākaṃ yakkhassa dehī”ti peseti.
atk-s0301a0:1313_19: Taṃ rukkhamūlaṃ paviṭṭhamattaṃyeva yakkho bheravaṃ attabhāvaṃ nimminitvā mūlakandaṃ viya khādi.
atk-s0301a0:1313_20: Yakkhānubhāvena kira manussānaṃ kesādīni upādāya sakalasarīraṃ navanītapiṇḍaṃ viya hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1313_21: yakkhassa bhattaṃ gāhāpetuṃ gatapurisā taṃ disvā bhītā yathāmittaṃ ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1313_22: Tato pabhuti “rājā core gahetvā yakkhassa detī”ti manussā corakammato paṭiviratā.
atk-s0301a0:1313_23: Tato aparena samayena navacorānaṃ abhāvena purāṇacorānañca parikkhayena bandhanāgārāni suññāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1314_1: Rājā attano dhanaṃ nagararacchāsu chaḍḍāpesi “appeva nāma koci lobhena gaṇheyyā”ti.
