atk-s0301a0:1314_6: Rājā “amhākaṃ pitaraṃ amhākaṃ pitāmahaṃ pesetīti manussā khobhaṃ karissanti,
atk-s0301a0:1314_7: mā vo etaṃ ruccī”ti vāresi. “Tena hi, deva,
atk-s0301a0:1314_9: tathāvidhassa hi ‘mātā me’ti ‘pitā me’ti sineho natthī”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1314_12: Nagare dārakamātaro ca dārake gahetvā gabbhiniyo ca palāyitvā parajanapade dārake saṃvaḍḍhetvā ānenti.
atk-s0301a0:1315_0: Tato ekadivasaṃ sakalanagaraṃ vicinitvā ekampi dārakaṃ alabhitvā amaccā rañño ārocesuṃ – “natthi, deva,
atk-s0301a0:1315_1: nagare dārako ṭhapetvā antepure tava puttaṃ āḷavakakumāra”nti.
atk-s0301a0:1315_5: gacchatha tampi datvā mama jīvitaṃ rakkhathā”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1315_6: Tena ca samayena āḷavakassa mātā puttaṃ nhāpetvā maṇḍetvā dukūlacumbaṭake katvā aṅke sayāpetvā nisinnā hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1315_7: Rājapurisā rañño āṇāya tattha gantvā vippalapantiyā tassā soḷasannañca devisahassānaṃ saddhiṃ dhātiyā taṃ ādāya pakkamiṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:1315_9: Taṃdivasañca bhagavā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya jetavanavihāre gandhakuṭiyaṃ mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā
atk-s0301a0:1315_10: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ olokento addasa āḷavakassa kumārassa anāgāmiphaluppattiyā upanissayaṃ yakkhassa
atk-s0301a0:1315_13: So vibhātāya rattiyā purimabhattakiccaṃ katvā suniṭṭhitapacchābhattakicco kāḷapakkhūposathadivase vattamāne
atk-s0301a0:1315_14: oggate sūriye eko adutiyo pattacīvaramādāya pādamaggeneva sāvatthito tiṃsa yojanāni gantvā tassa yakkhassa
atk-s0301a0:1316_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā yasmiṃ nigrodhe āḷavakassa bhavanaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1316_4: Yatheva hi yakkhā attano bhavanaṃ passanti,
atk-s0301a0:1316_7: Tadā āḷavako himavante yakkhasamāgamaṃ gato hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1316_8: Tato āḷavakassa dvārapālo gadrabho nāma yakkho bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā, “kiṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1316_9: bhagavā vikāle āgato”ti āha. Āma, gadrabha, āgatomhi,
atk-s0301a0:1316_11: vihareyyāmekarattaṃ āḷavakassa bhavaneti. Na me, bhante, garu,
atk-s0301a0:1316_12: apica kho so yakkho kakkhaḷo pharuso,
atk-s0301a0:1316_14: mā rucci bhagavato idha vāsoti. Jānāmi, gadrabha,
atk-s0301a0:1317_2: mātāpitaroti vā samaṇabrāhmaṇāti vā dhammoti vā na jānāti,
atk-s0301a0:1317_5: pādepi gahetvā parasamuddaṃ vā paracakkavāḷaṃ vā khipatī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1317_9: apica kho so yakkho attano anārocetvā anujānantaṃ maṃ jīvitāpi voropeyya, ārocemi, bhante, tassāti.
atk-s0301a0:1317_12: tvameva jānāhī”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā himavantābhimukho pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1317_14: Bhagavā antobhavanaṃ pavisitvā yattha abhilakkhitesu maṅgaladivasādīsu nisīditvā āḷavako siriṃ anubhoti,
atk-s0301a0:1317_15: tasmiṃyeva dibbaratanamaye pallaṅke nisīditvā suvaṇṇābhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0301a0:1317_16: Taṃ disvā yakkhassa itthiyo āgantvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā samparivāretvā nisīdiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1317_17: Bhagavā “pubbe tumhe dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā pūjaneyyaṃ pūjetvā imaṃ sampattiṃ pattā,
atk-s0301a0:1317_19: mā aññamaññaṃ issāmacchariyābhibhūtā viharathā”tiādinā nayena tāsaṃ pakiṇṇakadhammakathaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0301a0:1317_20: Tā bhagavato madhuranigghosaṃ sutvā sādhukārasahassāni datvā bhagavantaṃ samparivāretvā nisīdiṃsuyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1318_0: Tadā sātāgirahemavatā bhagavantaṃ jetavaneyeva vanditvā “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gamissāmā”ti saparivārā nānāyānehi ākāsena gacchanti.
atk-s0301a0:1318_1: Ākāse ca yakkhānaṃ sabbattha maggo natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1318_2: ākāsaṭṭhāni vimānāni pariharitvā maggaṭṭhāneneva maggo hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1318_3: Āḷavakassa pana vimānaṃ bhūmaṭṭhaṃ suguttaṃ pākāraparikkhittaṃ susaṃvihitadvāraaṭṭālakagopuraṃ upari
atk-s0301a0:1318_7: Buddhānaṃ hi nisinnokāsassa uparibhāgena yāva bhavaggā koci gantuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:1318_9: Āvajjetvā bhagavantaṃ disvā ākāse khittaleḍḍu viya oruyha vanditvā dhammaṃ sutvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:1318_10: “yakkhasamāgamaṃ gacchāma bhagavā”ti tīṇi vatthūni pasaṃsantā yakkhasamāgamaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1318_22: “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1319_6: ayaṃ hi yasmā assaddhassa saddhākathā dukkathā hoti dussīlādīnaṃ sīlādikathā viya,
atk-s0301a0:1319_7: tasmā tesaṃ yakkhānaṃ santikā bhagavato pasaṃsaṃ sutvāyeva aggimhi pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya abbhantare
atk-s0301a0:1319_8: kopena taṭataṭāyamānahadayo hutvā “ko so bhagavā nāma,
atk-s0301a0:1319_12: yo tusitabhavane ṭhito pañcamahāvilokitaṃ viloketvā”tiādinā nayena yāva dhammacakkapavattanā kathentā paṭisandhiādīsu dvattiṃsa pubbanimittāni vatvā,
atk-s0301a0:1319_18: ko tayā attho passatā vā apassatā vā?
atk-s0301a0:1319_27: Evaṃ vutte duṭṭho āḷavako uṭṭhahitvā manosilātale vāmapādena ṭhatvā –
atk-s0301a0:1319_29: ahaṃ vā”ti dakkhiṇapādena saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ kelāsapabbatakūṭaṃ akkami.
atk-s0301a0:1319_30: Taṃ ayokūṭapahaṭo viya niddhantaayopiṇḍo papaṭikāyo muñci,
atk-s0301a0:1320_1: yañca puṇṇako yakkhasenāpati dhanañjayakorabyarājānaṃ jūtaṃ jinitvā apphoṭetvā “ahaṃ jini”nti ugghosesi;
atk-s0301a0:1320_2: yañca sakko devānamindo kassapabhagavato sāsane osakkante vissakammadevaputtaṃ sunakhaṃ karitvā –
atk-s0301a0:1320_3: “ahaṃ pāpabhikkhū ca pāpabhikkhuniyo ca upāsake ca upāsikāyo ca sabbeva ca adhammavādino khādāmī”ti ugghosāpesi;
atk-s0301a0:1320_4: yañca kusajātake pabhāvatihetu sattahi rājūhi nagare uparuddhe pabhāvatiṃ attanā saha hatthikkhandhe āropetvā nagarā nikkhamma –
atk-s0301a0:1320_7: Tadā hi sakalajambudīpe dvāre ṭhatvā ugghositasadisaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1321_2: Te puratthimādibhedā vātā samuṭṭhahitvā aḍḍhayojanayojanadviyojanatiyojanappamāṇāni pabbatakūṭāni padāletvā vanagaccharukkhādīni ummūlaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:1321_3: āḷavinagaraṃ pakkhantā jiṇṇahatthisālādīni cuṇṇentā chadaniṭṭhakā ākāse vidhamentā.
atk-s0301a0:1321_5: Te vātā dasabalaṃ patvā cīvarakaṇṇamattampi cāletuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1321_8: Tassānubhāvena uparūpari satapaṭalasahassapaṭalādibhedā valāhakā uṭṭhahitvā pavassiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1321_10: Vanarukkhādīnaṃ upari mahogho āgantvā dasabalassa cīvare ussāvabindumattampi temetuṃ nāsakkhi.
atk-s0301a0:1321_12: Mahantāni mahantāni pabbatakūṭāni dhūmāyantāni pajjalantāni ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbamālāguḷāni sampajjiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1321_14: Ekatodhārāubhatodhārāasisattikhurappādayo dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalaṃ patvā dibbapupphāni ahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1321_16: Kiṃsuka vaṇṇā aṅgārā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā vikīrayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1321_18: Accuṇhā kukkulā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle candanacuṇṇaṃ hutvā nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1321_20: Atisukhumavālikā dhūmāyantā pajjalantā ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbapupphāni hutvā nipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1321_22: Taṃ kalalavassaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ ākāsenāgantvā dasabalassa pādamūle dibbagandhaṃ hutvā nipati.
atk-s0301a0:1321_24: Taṃ caturaṅgasamannāgataṃ andhakārasadisaṃ hutvā dasabalaṃ patvā sūriyappabhāvihatamiva andhakāraṃ antaradhāyi.
atk-s0301a0:1322_1: palāpetuṃ asakkonto nānāvidhapaharaṇahatthāya anekappakārarūpabhūtagaṇasamākulāya caturaṅginiyā senāya
atk-s0301a0:1322_3: Te bhūtagaṇā anekappakāre vikāre katvā “gaṇhatha hanathā”ti bhagavato upari āgacchantā viya honti.
atk-s0301a0:1322_6: Evaṃ santepi yathā bodhimaṇḍe māro āgatavelāyameva nivatto,
atk-s0301a0:1322_8: Evaṃ upaḍḍharattimattaṃ anekappakāravibhiṃsanakadassanenapi bhagavantaṃ cāletuṃ asakkonto āḷavako cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1323_5: Yadi hi sakko duṭṭho vajirāvudhaṃ sinerumatthake pahareyya,
atk-s0301a0:1323_7: Vessavaṇena kujjhanakāle vissajjitaṃ gadāvudhaṃ bahūnaṃ yakkhasahassānaṃ sīsaṃ pātetvā puna hatthapāsaṃ āgantvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0301a0:1323_8: Yamena duṭṭhena nayanāvudhena olokitamatte anekāni kumbhaṇḍasahassāni tattakapāle tilā viya pharantāni vinassanti.
atk-s0301a0:1323_9: Āḷavako duṭṭho sace ākāse dussāvudhaṃ muñceyya,
atk-s0301a0:1323_12: Sabbarukkhatiṇādīni sussitvā dvādasavassantare na puna viruheyyuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1323_17: So evaṃ mahānubhāvaṃ dussāvudhaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ muñcitvā aggahesi.
atk-s0301a0:1323_18: Yebhuyyena dasasahassīlokadhātudevatā vegena sannipatiṃsu “ajja bhagavā āḷavakaṃ damessati,
atk-s0301a0:1323_19: tattha dhammaṃ sossāmā”ti yuddhadassanakāmāpi devatā sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1324_0: Atha āḷavako bhagavato samīpe uparūpari vicaritvā vatthāvudhaṃ muñci.
atk-s0301a0:1324_1: Taṃ asanivicakkaṃ viya ākāse bheravasaddaṃ karontaṃ dhūmāyantaṃ pajjalantaṃ bhagavantaṃ patvā yakkhamānamaddanatthaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1324_3: Āḷavako taṃ disvā chinnavisāṇo viya usabho uddhatadāṭho viya sappo nittejo nimmado nipatitamānaddhajo hutvā cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1324_8: handa naṃ rosetvā mettāya viyojemī”ti iminā sambandhenetaṃ vuttaṃ –
atk-s0301a0:1324_9: atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā…pe…
atk-s0301a0:1324_12: kasmā mayā ananuññāto mama bhavanaṃ pavisitvā gharasāmiko viya itthāgārassa majjhe nisinnosi?
atk-s0301a0:1324_13: Ananuyuttametaṃ samaṇassa yadidaṃ adinnaparibhogo itthisaṃsaggo ca?
atk-s0301a0:1324_17: “etāni aññāni ca pharusavacanāni vatvā evāyaṃ etadavocā”ti bhaṇanti.
atk-s0301a0:1325_3: seyyathāpi caṇḍassa kukkurassa nāsāya pittaṃ bhindeyya,
atk-s0301a0:1325_6: mudunā pana so sakkā vinetu”nti ñatvā,
atk-s0301a0:1325_7: sādhāvusoti piyavacanena tassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchitvā nikkhami.
atk-s0301a0:1326_2: evaṃ nāma nikkhametuṃ sukhaṃ samaṇaṃ akāraṇenevāhaṃ sakalarattiṃ yuddhena abbhuyyāsi”nti muducitto hutvā puna cintesi –
atk-s0301a0:1326_4: kiṃ nu kho subbacatāya nikkhanto udāhu kodhano.
atk-s0301a0:1326_8: Atha subbacoti mudubhūtacittavavatthānakaraṇatthaṃ puna piyavacanaṃ vadanto sādhāvusoti bhagavā pāvisi.
atk-s0301a0:1326_9: Āḷavako punappunaṃ tameva subbacabhāvaṃ vīmaṃsanto dutiyampi tatiyampi nikkhama pavisāti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1326_12: pakatiyāpi thaddhayakkhassa cittaṃ thaddhataraṃ hutvā dhammakathāya bhājanaṃ na bhaveyya.
atk-s0301a0:1326_13: Tasmā yathā nāma mātā rodantaṃ puttakaṃ yaṃ so icchati,
atk-s0301a0:1326_14: taṃ datvā vā katvā vā saññāpesi tathā bhagavā kilesarodanena rodantaṃ yakkhaṃ saññāpetuṃ yaṃ so bhaṇati,
atk-s0301a0:1326_16: Yathā ca dhātī thaññaṃ apivantaṃ dārakaṃ kiñci datvā upalāḷetvā pāyeti,
atk-s0301a0:1326_17: tathā bhagavā yakkhaṃ lokuttaradhammakhīraṃ pāyetuṃ tassa patthitavacanakaraṇena upalāḷento evamakāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1326_18: Yathā ca puriso lābumhi catumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassabbhantaraṃ sodheti,
atk-s0301a0:1326_19: evaṃ bhagavā yakkhassa citte lokuttaracatumadhuraṃ pūretukāmo tassabbhantare kodhamalaṃ sodhetuṃ yāva tatiyaṃ nikkhamanapavisanaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1327_0: Atha āḷavako “subbaco ayaṃ samaṇo ‘nikkhamā’ti vutto nikkhamati,
atk-s0301a0:1327_2: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ evameva sakalarattiṃ kilametvā pāde gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya”nti?
atk-s0301a0:1327_3: Pāpakaṃ cittaṃ uppādetvā catutthavāraṃ āha nikkhama, samaṇāti.
atk-s0301a0:1327_4: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā na khvāhaṃ tanti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1327_5: Evaṃ vā vutte taduttarikaraṇīyaṃ pariyesamāno pañhaṃ pucchitabbaṃ maññissati.
atk-s0301a0:1328_0: Tato āḷavako yasmā pubbepi ākāsena gamanavelāya –
atk-s0301a0:1328_3: handa naṃ passāmā”ti evaṃ attano vimānaṃ āgate iddhimante tāpasaparibbājake pañhaṃ pucchitvā vissajjetuṃ asakkonte cittakkhepādīhi viheṭheti,
atk-s0301a0:1328_4: tasmā bhagavantampi tathā viheṭhessāmīti maññamāno pañhaṃ tantiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1329_1: Tassa kira mātāpitaro kassapaṃ bhagavantaṃ payirupāsitvā aṭṭha pañhe saha vissajjanena uggahesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1329_4: Tato “ime pañhāpi mā vinassantū”ti suvaṇṇapaṭṭhe jātihiṅgulakena lekhāpetvā vimāne nikkhipi.
atk-s0301a0:1329_6: Bhagavā taṃ sutvā yasmā buddhānaṃ pariccattalābhantarāyo vā jīvitantarāyo vā sabbaññutaññāṇabyāmappabhādipaṭighāto vā na sakkā kenaci kātuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1329_7: tasmā naṃ loke asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānubhāvaṃ dassento na khvāhaṃ taṃ, āvuso,
atk-s0301a0:1330_0: Evaṃ bhagavā tassa bādhanacittaṃ paṭisedhetvā pañhāpucchane ussāhaṃ janento āha apica tvaṃ, āvuso, puccha,
atk-s0301a0:1330_7: Sabbaṃ te vissajjessāmīti sabbaññupavāraṇaṃ pavāresi asādhāraṇaṃ paccekabuddhaaggasāvakamahāsāvakehi.
atk-s0301a0:1330_8: Evaṃ bhagavato sabbaññupavāraṇāya pavāritāya atha kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1331_7: Āvahātīti āvahati āneti deti appeti. Have-
atk-s0301a0:1331_17: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya “kiṃ su idha loke purisassa vittaṃ seṭṭhaṃ?
atk-s0301a0:1332_0: Athassa bhagavā kassapadasabalena vissajjitanayeneva vissajjento imaṃ gāthamāha saddhīdha vittanti.
atk-s0301a0:1332_1: Tattha yathā hiraññasuvaṇṇādi vittaṃ upabhogasukhaṃ āvahati,
atk-s0301a0:1332_6: evaṃ lokiyalokuttarā saddhāpi yathāsambhavaṃ lokiyalokuttaraṃ vipākaṃ sukhamāvahati,
atk-s0301a0:1334_0: Yaṃ yaṃ padesaṃ bhajati, tattha tattheva pūjito”ti. –
atk-s0301a0:1335_1: Yasmā pana tesaṃ saddhāvittaṃ anugāmikaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ sabbasampattihetu,
atk-s0301a0:1335_3: Saddhoyeva hi dānādīni puññāni katvā vittaṃ adhigacchati,
atk-s0301a0:1335_4: assaddhassa pana vittaṃ yāvadeva anatthāya hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1337_0: Saccanti ayaṃ saccasaddo anekesu atthesu dissati.
atk-s0301a0:1337_11: Idha pana paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ viratisaccañca abbhantaraṃ katvā vācāsaccaṃ adhippetaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1346_1: Rasānanti ye ime “mūlaraso khandharaso”tiādinā nayena sāyanīyadhammā,
atk-s0301a0:1346_5: arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo, ye te, brāhmaṇa,
atk-s0301a0:1346_9: bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassā”tiādinā nayena rūpācārarasupavajjā avasesā byañjanādayo “dhammarasā”ti vuccanti.
atk-s0301a0:1346_10: Tesaṃ rasānaṃ saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ saccameva sādutaraṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1346_19: attharasadhammarasā ca tadadhigamūpāyabhūtaṃ atthañca dhammañca nissāya pavattitoti.
atk-s0301a0:1347_0: Paññājīviṃjīvitanti ettha pana yvāyaṃ andhekacakkhudvicakkhukesu dvicakkhupuggalo gahaṭṭho vā kammantānuṭṭhāna-
atk-s0301a0:1347_4: pabbajito vā avippaṭisārakarasīlasaṅkhātaṃ taduttaricittavisuddhiādibhedampi pabbajitapaṭipadaṃ paññāya ārādhetvā jīvati,
atk-s0301a0:1347_6: taṃ vā paññājīvitaṃ seṭṭhamāhūti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0301a0:1348_0: Evaṃ bhagavatā vissajjite cattāropi pañhe sutvā attamano yakkho avasesepi cattāro pañhe pucchanto kathaṃsu tarati oghanti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1348_1: Athassa bhagavā purimanayeneva vissajjento saddhāya taratīti gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1348_6: evaṃ santepi pana yasmā assaddho oghataraṇaṃ asaddahanto na pakkhandati,
atk-s0301a0:1348_7: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu cittavossaggena pamatto tattheva visattattā saṃsāraṇṇavaṃ na tarati,
atk-s0301a0:1348_8: kusīto dukkhaṃ viharati vokiṇṇo akusalehi dhammehi,
atk-s0301a0:1348_10: tasmā tappaṭipakkhaṃ dassentena bhagavatā ayaṃ gāthā vuttā.
atk-s0301a0:1349_0: Evaṃ vuttāya cetāya yasmā sotāpattiyaṅgapadaṭṭhānaṃ saddhindriyaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1349_1: tasmā saddhāya tarati oghanti iminā padena diṭṭhoghataraṇaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ sotāpannañca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a0:1349_2: Yasmā pana sotāpanno kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvanāya sātaccakiriyasaṅkhatena appamādena samannāgato dutiyamaggaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1349_3: ārādhetvā ṭhapetvā sakidevimaṃ lokaṃ āgamanamaggaṃ avasesaṃ sotāpattimaggena atiṇṇaṃ bhavoghavatthuṃ
atk-s0301a0:1349_5: tasmā appamādena aṇṇavanti iminā padena bhavoghataraṇaṃ sakadāgāmimaggaṃ sakadāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a0:1349_6: Yasmā ca sakadāgāmī vīriyena tatiyamaggaṃ ārādhetvā sakadāgāmimaggena anatītaṃ kāmoghavatthuṃ kāmoghasaññitañca kāmadukkhamacceti,
atk-s0301a0:1349_7: tasmā vīriyena dukkhamaccetīti iminā padena kāmoghataraṇaṃ anāgāmimaggaṃ anāgāmiñca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a0:1349_8: Yasmā pana anāgāmī vigatakāmasaññāya parisuddhāya paññāya ekantaparisuddhaṃ catutthamaggapaññaṃ ārādhetvā
atk-s0301a0:1349_11: iminā padena avijjoghataraṇaṃ arahattamaggañca arahattañca pakāseti.
atk-s0301a0:1349_12: Imāya ca arahattanikūṭena kathitāya gāthāya pariyosāne yakkho sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1350_0: Idāni tameva “paññāya parisujjhatī”ti ettha vuttaṃ paññāpadaṃ gahetvā attano paṭibhānena lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1350_1: pañhaṃ pucchanto kathaṃsu labhate paññanti imaṃ chappadaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1350_3: Ayaṃ hi paññādiatthaṃ ñatvā tassa yuttiṃ pucchati – “kathaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1351_0: Athassa bhagavā catūhi kāraṇehi paññālābhaṃ dassento saddahānotiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1351_2: yena pubbabhāge kāyasucaritādibhedena aparabhāge ca sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyabhedena dhammena arahanto buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakā nibbānaṃ pattā,
atk-s0301a0:1351_3: taṃ saddahāno arahataṃ dhammaṃ nibbānapattiyā lokiyalokuttarapaññaṃ labhati,
atk-s0301a0:1351_9: tasmā upasaṅkamanato pabhuti yāva dhammassavanena sussūsaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a0:1351_11: taṃ dhammaṃ saddahitvāpi ācariyupajjhāye kālena upasaṅkamitvā vattakaraṇena payirupāsitvā yadā payirupāsanāya ārādhitacittā kiñci vattukāmā honti.
atk-s0301a0:1351_12: Atha adhigatāya sotukāmatāya sotaṃ odahitvā suṇanto labhatīti.
atk-s0301a0:1351_13: Evaṃ sussūsampi ca satiavippavāsena appamatto subhāsitadubbhāsitaññutāya vicakkhaṇo eva labhati, na itaro.
atk-s0301a0:1352_0: Evaṃ yasmā saddhāya paññalābhasaṃvattanikaṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipajjati,
atk-s0301a0:1352_3: Vicakkhaṇatāya anūnādhikaṃ aviparītañca gahetvā vitthārikaṃ karoti.
atk-s0301a0:1352_4: Sussūsāya vā ohitasoto paññāpaṭilābhahetuṃ dhammaṃ suṇāti,
atk-s0301a0:1352_8: tasmāssa bhagavā “kathaṃsu labhate pañña”nti puṭṭho imāni cattāri kāraṇāni dassento imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1353_0: Idāni tato pare tayo pañhe vissajjento patirūpakārīti imaṃ gāthamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1353_1: Tattha desakālādīni ahāpetvā lokiyassa lokuttarassa vā dhanassa patirūpaṃ adhigamūpāyaṃ karotīti patirūpakārī.
atk-s0301a0:1353_5: tiṇā bhiyyo na maññatī”tiādinā nayena kāyikavīrīyavasena uṭṭhānasampanno asithilaparakkamo.
atk-s0301a0:1353_6: Vindate dhananti ekamūsikāya nacirasseva catusatasahassasaṅkhaṃ cūḷantevāsī viya lokiyadhanañca,
atk-s0301a0:1353_8: So “tīhiyeva iriyāpathehi viharissāmī”ti vattaṃ katvā thinamiddhāgamanavelāya palālacumbaṭakaṃ temetvā
atk-s0301a0:1353_9: sīse katvā galappamāṇaṃ udakaṃ pavisitvā thinamiddhaṃ paṭibāhanto dasahi vassehi arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
atk-s0301a0:1353_11: paramatthasaccenāpi “buddho paccekabuddho ariyasāvako”ti evaṃ kittiṃ pappoti.
atk-s0301a0:1353_12: Dadanti yaṃkiñci icchitapatthitaṃ dadanto mittāni ganthati,
atk-s0301a0:1353_15: Dānamukhena vā cattāripi saṅgahavatthūni gahitānīti veditabbāni,
atk-s0301a0:1354_0: Evaṃ gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇena lokiyalokuttaramissakena nayena cattāro pañhe vissajjetvā idāni
atk-s0301a0:1354_1: “kathaṃ pecca na socatī”ti imaṃ pañcamaṃ pañhaṃ gahaṭṭhavasena vissajjento yassetetiādīmāha.
atk-s0301a0:1354_3: yassa “saddahāno arahata”nti ettha vuttāya sabbakalyāṇadhammuppādikāya saddhāya samannāgatattā saddhassa,
atk-s0301a0:1354_4: gharamesinoti gharāvāsaṃ pañca vā kāmaguṇe esantassa gavesantassa kāmabhogino gahaṭṭhassa “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakāraṃ saccaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1354_5: “Sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsapaññānāmena vuttova damo.
atk-s0301a0:1354_6: “Dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttā dhiti.
atk-s0301a0:1354_7: “Dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakāro cāgo cāti ete caturo dhammā santi.
atk-s0301a0:1354_8: Sa ve pecca na socatīti idhalokā paralokaṃ gantvā sa ve na socatīti.
atk-s0301a0:1355_0: Evaṃ bhagavā pañcamampi pañhaṃ vissajjetvā taṃ yakkhaṃ codento iṅgha aññepītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1355_2: Aññepīti aññepi dhamme puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu.
atk-s0301a0:1355_3: Aññepi vā pūraṇādayo sabbaññupaṭiññe puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchassu.
atk-s0301a0:1355_4: Yadi amhehi “saccena kittiṃ pappotī”ti ettha vuttappakārā saccā bhiyyo kittippattikāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a0:1355_5: “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”nti ettha sussūsāti paññāpadesena vuttā dammā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttarapaññāpaṭilābhakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a0:1355_6: “dadaṃ mittāni ganthatī”ti ettha vuttappakārā cāgā bhiyyo mittaganthanakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a0:1355_7: “dhuravā uṭṭhātā”ti ettha taṃ taṃ atthavasaṃ paṭicca dhuranāmena uṭṭhānanāmena ca vuttāya mahābhārasahanatthena
atk-s0301a0:1355_8: ussoḷhibhāvappattāya vīriyasaṅkhātāya khantyā bhiyyo lokiyalokuttaradhanavindanakāraṇaṃ vā,
atk-s0301a0:1355_9: “saccaṃ dammo dhiti cāgo”ti evaṃ vuttehi imeheva catūhi dhammehi bhiyyo asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ pecca asocanakāraṇaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1355_10: vā idha vijjatīti ayamettha saddhiṃ saṅkhepayojanāya atthavaṇṇanā.
atk-s0301a0:1355_11: Vitthārato pana ekamekaṃ padaṃ atthuddhārapaduddhārapadavaṇṇanānayehi vibhajitvā veditabbā.
atk-s0301a0:1356_0: Evaṃ vutte yakkho yena saṃsayena aññe puccheyya,
atk-s0301a0:1356_1: tassa pahīnattā kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1356_2: puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti vatvā yepissa apucchanakāraṇaṃ na jānanti,
atk-s0301a0:1356_7: Yo atthoti ettāvatā “sussūsaṃ labhate pañña”ntiādinā nayena vuttaṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0301a0:1356_8: Samparāyikoti iminā “yassete caturo dhammā”ti vuttaṃ pecca sokābhāvakāraṇaṃ samparāyikaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1356_10: Ayaṃ hi atthasaddo “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti evamādīsu pāṭhatthe vattati.
atk-s0301a0:1356_20: taṃ yohaṃ ajja bhagavatā vuttanayena sāmaṃyeva pajānāmi,
atk-s0301a0:1356_21: so kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇeti evamettha saṅkhepato attho veditabbo.
atk-s0301a0:1357_0: Evaṃ yakkho “pajānāmi yo attho samparāyiko”ti vatvā tassa ñāṇassa bhagavaṃmūlakattaṃ dassento atthāya vata me buddhoti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1357_2: Yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalanti “yassete caturo dhammā”ti ettha vuttacāgena yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1358_0: Evaṃ imāya gāthāya attano hitādhigamaṃ dassetvā idāni sahitapaṭipattiṃ dīpento so ahaṃ vicarissāmītiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1358_5: svākkhāto vata bhagavato dhammo”tiādinā nayena buddhasubodhitañca dhammasudhammatañca ca-
atk-s0301a0:1358_6: saddena “suppaṭipanno vata bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho”tiādinā saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca abhitthavitvā namassamāno
atk-s0301a0:1359_0: Evamimāya gāthāya pariyosānañca rattivibhāvanañca sādhukārasadduṭṭhānañca āḷavakakumārassa yakkhabhavanaṃ ānayanañca ekakkhaṇeyeva ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1359_2: “evarūpo sādhukārasaddo ṭhapetvā buddhe na aññesaṃ abbhuggacchati,
atk-s0301a0:1359_3: āgato nu kho bhagavā”ti āvajjentā bhagavato sarīrappabhaṃ disvā pubbe viya bahi aṭṭhatvā nibbisaṅkā antoyeva
atk-s0301a0:1359_4: pavisitvā addasaṃsu bhagavantaṃ yakkhassa bhavane nisinnaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1359_9: handa naṃ khāda vā bhuñja vā,
atk-s0301a0:1359_11: So sotāpannattā lajjito visesena ca bhagavato purato evaṃ vuccamāno atha taṃ kumāraṃ ubhohi hatthehi paṭiggahetvā bhagavato upanāmesi “ayaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1359_16: bhagavā imaṃ dārakaṃ imassa hitatthāya sukhatthāyā”ti imañca gāthamāha –
atk-s0301a0:1364_1: Paṭiggaṇhanto ca yakkhassa ca kumārassa ca maṅgalakaraṇatthaṃ pādūnagāthaṃ abhāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1364_2: Taṃ yakkho kumāraṃ saraṇaṃ gamento tikkhattuṃ catutthapādena pūresi.
atk-s0301a0:1371_2: Evaṃ so kumāro rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1371_4: bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato “hatthako āḷavako”ti jāto.
atk-s0301a0:1371_5: Taṃ ādāya paṭinivatte rājapurise disvā kassakavanakammikādayo “kiṃ yakkho kumāraṃ atidaharattā na icchī”ti?
atk-s0301a0:1371_9: Tato “sādhu sādhū”ti sakalaṃ āḷavinagaraṃ ekakolāhalena yakkhābhimukhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1371_10: Yakkhopi bhagavato bhikkhācārakāle anuppatte pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā upaḍḍhamaggaṃ anugantvā nivatti.
atk-s0301a0:1372_0: Atha bhagavā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakicco nagaradvāre aññatarasmiṃ vivitte rukkhamūle paññattabuddhāsane nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:1372_1: Tato mahājanakāyena saddhiṃ rājā ca nāgarā ca ekato sampiṇḍitvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamma vanditvā parivāretvā nisinnā – “kathaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1372_3: Tesaṃ bhagavā yuddhamādiṃ katvā “evaṃ navavidhaṃ vassaṃ vassetvā evaṃ vibhiṃsanakaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0301a0:1372_7: Tato rājā ceva nāgarā ca vessavaṇamahārājassa bhavanasamīpe yakkhassa bhavanaṃ katvā pupphagandhādisakkārupetaṃ niccabaliṃ pavattesuṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1372_8: Tañca kumāraṃ viññutaṃ pattaṃ “tvaṃ bhagavantaṃ nissāya jīvitaṃ labhi,
atk-s0301a0:1372_10: So bhagavantañca bhikkhusaṅghañca payirupāsamāno nacirasseva anāgāmiphale patiṭṭhāya sabbaṃ buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā pañcasataupāsakaparivāro ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1372_14: mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi parisaṃ saṅgaṇhantānaṃ yadidaṃ hatthako āḷavako”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1377_4: sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto
atk-s0301a0:1377_5: satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:1377_6: Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1377_11: Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1377_12: Sakko “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi.
atk-s0301a0:1377_13: Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1377_18: Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:1377_19: Sakko tesaṃ nivattetvā anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi,
atk-s0301a0:1382_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca asuranagarañca.
atk-s0301a0:1382_2: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:1382_4: athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0301a0:1382_5: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
atk-s0301a0:1382_6: Nesaṃ antarā etesu udakādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
atk-s0301a0:1382_20: Caturo ca mahantāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā.
atk-s0301a0:1382_22: Tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yuddhesū,
atk-s0301a0:1382_24: taṃ uragā paṭibāhanti evaṃ sesesu sesā.
atk-s0301a0:1383_1: Tasmā antarā attānaṃ ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya,
atk-s0301a0:1383_7: gacchāma tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni gahetvā,
atk-s0301a0:1383_9: asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0301a0:1383_10: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ abhiruhitu ārabhanti.
atk-s0301a0:1383_11: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1383_12: Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati,
atk-s0301a0:1383_14: kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ santāsanamattameva hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1383_15: Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā te asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti.
atk-s0301a0:1384_1: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekatova hutvā yujjhanti.
atk-s0301a0:1384_3: Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti,
atk-s0301a0:1384_4: tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi pañca balāni osakkanti.
atk-s0301a0:1384_5: Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ ārocenti.
atk-s0301a0:1384_6: Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati,
atk-s0301a0:1385_0: Evaṃ bhaddantavāti khoti evaṃ hotu bhaddaṃ tava iti kho.
atk-s0301a0:1385_2: Accharāsaṅghaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanaṃ vitthārena suvaṇṇamahāvīthiṃ otaritvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanto nandanavanādīsu vicaratīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1386_3: Na ca kiccāni kārayeti kiñci kiccaṃ nāma na kareyya.
atk-s0301a0:1386_4: Sabbakāmasamiddhassāti sabbakāmehi samiddho assa. Taṃ me, sakka,
atk-s0301a0:1386_7: taṃ me varaṃ uttamaṃ ṭhānaṃ okāsaṃ disaṃ ācikkha kathehīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1386_8: Nibbānassa hi so maggoti kammaṃ akatvā jīvitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma nibbānassa maggo. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1388_0: 248. Dutiye susīmanti attano puttasahassassa antare evaṃnāmakaṃ ekaṃ puttameva. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1390_2: Dhajaggaṃ ullokeyyathāti sakkassa kira diyaḍḍhayojanasatāyāmo ratho.
atk-s0301a0:1390_6: Tadeva pamāṇaṃ diguṇaṃ katvā tiyojanasatāyāmotipi vadantiyeva.
atk-s0301a0:1390_14: Taṃ passantānañhi rājā no āgantvā parisapariyante nikhātathambho viya ṭhito,
atk-s0301a0:1390_15: kassa mayaṃ bhāyāmāti bhayaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1390_16: Pajāpatissāti so kira sakkena samānavaṇṇo samānāyuko dutiyaṃ āsanaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a0:1390_20: Palāyīti asurehi parājito tasmiṃ rathe ṭhito appamattakampi rajadhajaṃ disvā palāyanadhammo.
atk-s0301a0:1391_1: Idamavocāti idaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ nāma bhagavā avoca,
atk-s0301a0:1391_3: Idaṃ āvajjetvā hi yakkhabhayacorabhayādīhi dukkhehi muttānaṃ anto natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1391_5: idaṃ āvajjamāno hi pasannacitto ākāsepi patiṭṭhaṃ labhati.
atk-s0301a0:1392_1: dīghavāpicetiyamhi kira sudhākamme kayiramāne eko daharo muddhavedikāpādato patitvā cetiyakucchiyā bhassati.
atk-s0301a0:1392_4: So maraṇabhayena tajjito “dhajaggaparittaṃ maṃ rakkhatū”ti āha.
atk-s0301a0:1392_5: Tāvadevassa cetiyakucchito dve iṭṭhakā nikkhamitvā sopānaṃ hutvā aṭṭhaṃsu,
atk-s0301a0:1392_7: Tasmiṃ nisseṇiyaṃ ṭhite iṭṭhakā yathāṭṭhāneyeva aṭṭhaṃsu. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1394_1: Catutthe vepacittīti so kira asurānaṃ sabbajeṭṭhako.
atk-s0301a0:1394_3: Kaṇṭhapañcamehīti dvīsu hatthesu pādesu kaṇṭhe cāti evaṃ pañcahi bandhanehi.
atk-s0301a0:1394_4: Tāni pana naḷinasuttaṃ viya makkaṭakasuttaṃ viya ca cakkhussāpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0301a0:1394_8: Akkosatīti corosi bālosi mūḷhosi thenosi oṭṭhosi goṇosi gadrabhosi nerayikosi tiracchānagatosi,
atk-s0301a0:1394_10: duggatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhāti imehi dasahi akkosavatthūhi akkosati.
atk-s0301a0:1394_15: tadā tampi evaṃ bandhitvā asurabhavanassa dvāre nipajjāpetvā pothāpessāmīti ādīni vatvā tajjeti.
atk-s0301a0:1394_16: Sakko vijitavijayo na taṃ manasi karoti,
atk-s0301a0:1394_17: mahāpaṭiggahaṇaṃ panassa matthake vidhunanto sudhammadevasabhaṃ pavisati ceva nikkhamati ca.
atk-s0301a0:1394_18: Ajjhabhāsīti “kiṃ nu kho esa sakko imāni pharusavacanāni bhayena titikkhati,
atk-s0301a0:1395_5: Yo sato upasammatīti yo satimā hutvā upasammati,
atk-s0301a0:1395_6: tassa upasamaṃyevāhaṃ bālassa paṭisedhanaṃ maññeti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1395_7: Yadā naṃ maññatīti yasmā taṃ maññati.
atk-s0301a0:1395_9: Gova bhiyyo palāyinanti yathā goyuddhe tāvadeva dve gāvo yujjhante gogaṇo olokento tiṭṭhati,
atk-s0301a0:1395_11: atha naṃ palāyantaṃ sabbo gogaṇo bhiyyo ajjhottharati.
atk-s0301a0:1395_12: Evaṃ dummedho khamantaṃ bhiyyo ajjhottharatīti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1396_1: Khantyā bhiyyo na vijjatīti tesu sakaatthaparamesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro añño attho na vijjati.
atk-s0301a0:1396_2: Tamāhu paramaṃ khantinti yo balavā titikkhati,
atk-s0301a0:1396_6: abalameva taṃ balanti āhu kathentīti dīpeti.
atk-s0301a0:1396_11: dhammaṭṭhaṃ pana cāletuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1396_12: Tasseva tena pāpiyoti tena kodhena tasseva puggalassa pāpaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1396_17: Janā maññantīti evarūpaṃ attano ca parassa cāti ubhinnaṃ atthaṃ tikicchantaṃ nipphādentaṃ puggalaṃ “andhabālo
atk-s0301a0:1398_1: Pañcame asurindaṃ etadavocāti chekatāya etaṃ avoca.
atk-s0301a0:1398_2: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “parassa nāma gāhaṃ mocetvā paṭhamaṃ vattuṃ garu.
atk-s0301a0:1398_3: Parassa vacanaṃ anugantvā pana pacchā sukhaṃ vattu”nti.
atk-s0301a0:1398_7: daṇḍaṃ vā satthaṃ vā gahetabbanti evamettha natthīti attho. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1400_1: Chaṭṭhe ajjhabhāsīti tassa kira simbalivanābhimukhassa jātassa rathasaddo ca ājānīyasaddo dhajasaddo ca samantā asanipātasaddo viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1400_3: jarājiṇṇā ceva rogadubbalā ca asañjātapakkhapotakā ca palāyituṃ asakkontā,
atk-s0301a0:1400_13: So hi ratho puññapaccayanibbatto cakkavāḷapabbatepi sinerumhipi sammukhībhūte vinivijjhitvāva gacchati na sajjati,
atk-s0301a0:1400_16: yathā mahāsakaṭe kadalivanamajjhena vā eraṇḍavanamajjhena vā gacchante sabbavanaṃ vibhaggaṃ nimmathitaṃ hoti,
atk-s0301a0:1402_1: Sattame upasaṅkamīti “ayaṃ sakko ‘yopi me assa supaccatthiko,
atk-s0301a0:1402_5: kiṃ nu kho maṃ passitvā dubbhati,
atk-s0301a0:1402_10: Saha vacanenevassa so kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi baddhova ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1402_11: Sapassu ca meti mayi adubbhatthāya sapathaṃ karohīti vadati.
atk-s0301a0:1402_12: Yaṃ musābhaṇato pāpanti imasmiṃ kappe paṭhamakappikesu cetiyarañño pāpaṃ sandhāyāha.
atk-s0301a0:1402_14: Mittadduno ca yaṃ pāpanti mahākapijātake mahāsatte duṭṭhacittassa pāpaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1402_16: Imāni kira imasmiṃ kappe cattāri mahāpāpāni. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1404_6: Tattha khantyā bhiyyoti nipphannasobhanesu atthesu khantito uttaritaro attho nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1404_8: Soṇasiṅgālādayopi hi upādāya akiccajāto satto nāma natthi.
atk-s0301a0:1404_11: sambhogā sabbapāṇinanti pārivāsikaodanādīni hi asambhogārahāni honti,
atk-s0301a0:1404_12: tāni puna uṇhāpetvā bhajjitvā sappimadhuphāṇitādīhi saṃyojitāni sambhogārahāni honti.
atk-s0301a0:1404_15: Nipphannasobhano atthoti ime atthā nāma nipphannāva sobhanti.
atk-s0301a0:1406_1: Navame paṇṇakuṭīsu sammantīti himavantapadese ramaṇīye araññāyatane rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīhi sampannāsu paṇṇasālāsu vasanti.
atk-s0301a0:1406_2: Sakko ca devānamindo vepacitti cāti ime dve janā jāmātikasasurā kālena kalahaṃ karonti,
atk-s0301a0:1406_12: Na hettha devāti etasmiṃ sīlavantānaṃ gandhe devā na paṭikkūlasaññino,
atk-s0301a0:1408_1: Dasame samuddatīre paṇṇakuṭīsūti cakkavāḷamahāsamuddapiṭṭhiyaṃ rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇe vālukapuḷine vuttappakārāsu paṇṇasālāsu vasanti.
atk-s0301a0:1408_7: Te devehi parājitā palāyantā isīnaṃ assamapadena gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti,
atk-s0301a0:1408_8: gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanasālādīni viddhaṃsenti.
atk-s0301a0:1408_9: Isayo araññato phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā naṃ disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti.
atk-s0301a0:1408_11: Tasmā “idāni tesaṃ saṅgāmo paccupaṭṭhito”ti sutvā evaṃ cintayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1409_1: Bhayassa abhayassa vāti bhayaṃ vā abhayaṃ vā.
atk-s0301a0:1410_0: Tikkhattuṃ ubbijjīti sāyamāsabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā sayanaṃ abhiruyha nipanno niddāya okkantamattāya samantā
atk-s0301a0:1410_1: ṭhatvā sattisatena pahaṭo viya viravanto uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0301a0:1410_8: Evamassa tato paṭṭhāya gelaññajātaṃ cittaṃ vepati.
atk-s0301a0:1410_9: Teneva cassa “vepacittī”ti aparaṃ nāmaṃ udapādīti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1414_4: Kule jeṭṭhāpacāyīti kulajeṭṭhakānaṃ mahāpitā mahāmātā cūḷapitā cūḷamātā mātulo mātulānītiādīnaṃ apacitikārako.
atk-s0301a0:1414_11: Dānasaṃvibhāgaratoti dāne ca saṃvibhāge ca rato. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1416_2: Āvasathaṃ adāsīti catumahāpathe mahājanassa āvasathaṃ kāretvā adāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1416_4: janasahassena vā vacanasahassena vā osārite “ayaṃ imassa attho,
atk-s0301a0:1416_5: ayaṃ imassa attho”ti ekapade ṭhitova vinicchinati. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1418_3: yena so diṭṭhapubboti imamatthaṃ dasabalaṃ pucchissāmī”ti upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:1418_6: Sakko kira anantare attabhāve magadharaṭṭhe macalagāme magho nāma māṇavo ahosi paṇḍito byatto,
atk-s0301a0:1418_7: bodhisattacariyā viya ca tassa cariyā ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1418_9: Ekadivasaṃ attanova paññāya upaparikkhitvā gāmamajjhe mahājanassa sannipatitaṭṭhāne kacavaraṃ ubhatopassesu apabyūhitvā taṃ ṭhānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1418_12: Gāmato ca nikkhamitvā gāvutampi aḍḍhayojanampi tigāvutampi yojanampi vicaritvā tehi sahāyehi saddhiṃ visamaṃ samaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0301a0:1418_13: Te sabbeva ekacchandā tattha tattha setuyuttaṭṭhāne setuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1418_15: Magho satta vatapadāni pūretvā kāyassa bhedā saddhiṃ sahāyehi tāvatiṃsabhavane nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:1418_17: yesaṃ dhammānaṃ samādinnattā sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagā,
atk-s0301a0:1418_20: vitthāro pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sakkapaṇhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1420_10: so kira anuppanne buddhe kāsiraṭṭhe bārāṇasirājā hutvā samussitaddhajapaṭākanānālaṅkārena suṭṭhu alaṅkataṃ
atk-s0301a0:1420_11: nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ akāsi attano sirisampattiyā samākaḍḍhitanettena janakāyena samullokiyamāno.
atk-s0301a0:1420_12: Tasmiñca samaye eko paccekabuddho gandhamādanapabbatā āgamma tasmiṃ nagare piṇḍāya carati,
atk-s0301a0:1420_14: Mahājanopi rājagataṃ cittīkāraṃ pahāya paccekabuddhameva olokesi. Rājā –
atk-s0301a0:1420_15: “idāni imasmiṃ janakāye ekopi maṃ na oloketi.
atk-s0301a0:1420_18: Sopi paccekabuddho mahallako hoti pacchimavaye ṭhito.
atk-s0301a0:1420_21: Rañño satasahassādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramiṃ paccekabuddhaṃ disvā cittapasādamattaṃ vā hatthaṃ pasāretvā vandanamattaṃ vā nāhosi.
atk-s0301a0:1420_22: So rājā “pabbajito maññe esa usūyāya maṃ na oloketī”ti kujjhitvā “kvāyaṃ kuṭṭhicīvarāni pāruto”ti niṭṭhubhitvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1420_23: Tassa kammassa vipākena mahāniraye nibbattitvā vipākāvasesena manussalokaṃ āgacchanto rājagahe paramakapaṇāya itthiyā kucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0301a0:1420_24: Gahitakālato paṭṭhāya sā itthī kañjikamattampi udarapūraṃ nālattha.
atk-s0301a0:1420_28: tenassa mātā yāva kapālaṃ gahetvā carituṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0301a0:1420_30: Bhikkhāya carituṃ samatthakāle panassa kapālaṃ hatthe datvā “paññāyissasi sakena kammenā”ti pakkāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1421_0: Athassa tato paṭṭhāya sakalasarīrato maṃsāni chijjitvā chijjitvā patanti,
atk-s0301a0:1421_5: Tassa kāruññaparidevitasaddena sakalavīthiyaṃ manussā sabbarattiṃ niddaṃ na labhanti.
atk-s0301a0:1421_6: Tassa tato paṭṭhāya sukhasayite pabodhetīti suppabuddhotveva nāmaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0301a0:1421_7: Athāparena samayena bhagavati rājagahaṃ sampatte nāgarā satthāraṃ nimantetvā nagaramajjhe mahāmaṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1421_8: Suppabuddhopi kuṭṭhī gantvā dānaggamaṇḍapassa avidūre nisīdi.
atk-s0301a0:1421_9: Nāgarā buddhappamukhaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena parivisantā tassāpi yāgubhattaṃ adaṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1421_10: Tassa paṇītabhojanaṃ bhuttassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1421_11: Satthā bhattakiccāvasāne anumodanaṃ katvā saccāni dīpesi,
atk-s0301a0:1421_12: suppabuddho nisinnaṭṭhāne nisinnova desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0301a0:1421_14: Sopi cumbaṭaṃ āruyha kapālamādāya daṇḍamolubbha attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanto vibbhantāya gāviyā jīvitā
atk-s0301a0:1421_15: voropito mattikapātiṃ bhinditvā suvaṇṇapātiṃ paṭilabhanto viya dutiyacittavāre devaloke nibbatto attano
atk-s0301a0:1421_16: puññaṃ nissāya aññe deve atikkamma virocittha.
atk-s0301a0:1421_17: Taṃ kāraṇaṃ dassento sakko devānamindo eso kho mārisātiādimāha.
atk-s0301a0:1422_1: Sīlañca yassa kalyāṇanti kalyāṇasīlaṃ nāma ariyasāvakassa ariyakantasīlaṃ vuccati.
atk-s0301a0:1422_2: Tattha kiñcāpi ariyasāvakassa ekasīlampi akantaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0301a0:1422_3: imasmiṃ panatthe bhavantarepi appahīnaṃ pañcasīlaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1424_5: Idāni manussaramaṇīyakavasena bhūmiramaṇīyakaṃ dassento gāme vātiādimāha. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1426_2: Tadā kira aṅgamagadhavāsikā manussā anusaṃvaccharaṃ sappimadhuphāṇitādīsu aggaṃ gahetvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0301a0:1426_3: dārūnaṃ saṭṭhimatte sakaṭabhāre rāsiṃ katvā aggiṃ datvā pajjalitakāle “mahābrahmuno yajāmā”ti taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0301a0:1426_6: Sakko devarājā “sabbepime sabbaaggāni gahetvā ‘mahābrahmuno yajāmā’ti aggimhi jhāpenti.
atk-s0301a0:1426_9: yathā buddhassa ceva saṅghassa ca datvā bahuṃ puññaṃ pasavanti,
atk-s0301a0:1426_10: evaṃ karissāmī”ti dārurāsiṃ jalāpetvā olokentesu manussesu puṇṇamadivase brahmattabhāvaṃ māpetvā mahājanassa
atk-s0301a0:1426_11: passantasseva candamaṇḍalaṃ bhinditvā nikkhanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0301a0:1426_12: Mahājano disvā “imaṃ yaññaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ mahābrahmā āgacchatī”ti jaṇṇukehi bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāya,
atk-s0301a0:1426_16: ayaṃ vo brahmā sahatthā yaññaṃ paṭiggahetuṃ āgacchatī”ti.
atk-s0301a0:1426_17: Sakko āgantvā dārucitakamatthake ākāse ṭhatvā “kassāyaṃ sakkāro”ti pucchi? Tumhākaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0301a0:1426_23: Ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino gahetvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0301a0:1427_2: Saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalanti ariyasaṅghe dinnaṃ vipphāravantaṃ hoti.
atk-s0301a0:1427_4: Tato paṭṭhāya manussā sabbāni aggadānāni bhikkhusaṅghassa adaṃsu. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1429_2: Vijitasaṅgāmāti rāgādīnañceva dvādasayojanikassa ca mārabalassa jitattā bhagavantaṃ evaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0301a0:1429_4: Pannarasāya rattinti pannarasāya puṇṇamāya rattiṃ. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1431_1: Aṭṭhame puthuddisāti catasso disā catasso anudisā ca.
atk-s0301a0:1431_6: saṭṭhipi vassāni āpāṇakoṭikaṃ ekaseyyaṃ ekabhattantiādikaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ brahmacariyaṃ caramāneti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1431_8: Sīlavantoti upāsakatte patiṭṭhāya pañcahipi dasahipi sīlehi samannāgatā.
atk-s0301a0:1431_9: Dhammena dāraṃ posentīti umaṅgabhindanādīni akatvā dhammikehi kasigorakkhavaṇijjādīhi puttadāraṃ posenti.
atk-s0301a0:1431_10: Pamukho rathamāruhīti devānaṃ pamukho seṭṭho rathaṃ āruhi. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1433_1: Navame bhagavantaṃ namassatīti ekaṃsaṃ uttariyaṃ dukulaṃ katvā,
atk-s0301a0:1433_2: brahmajāṇuko hutvā sirasi añjaliṃ ṭhapetvā namassati.
atk-s0301a0:1433_4: Anomanāmanti sabbaguṇehi omakabhāvassa natthitāya sabbaguṇanemittakehi nāmehi anomanāmaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1435_1: Dasame ajjhabhāsīti kasmā esa punappunaṃ evaṃ bhāsatīti?
atk-s0301a0:1435_7: attanoyeva vā sarīraṃ avattharitvā sayanato pūtidehasayā.
atk-s0301a0:1435_8: Nimuggā kuṇapamheteti dasamāse mātukucchisaṅkhāte kuṇapasmiṃ ete nimuggā.
atk-s0301a0:1435_9: Etaṃ tesaṃ pihayāmīti etesaṃ etaṃ pihayāmi patthayāmi.
atk-s0301a0:1435_10: Na te saṃ koṭṭhe opentīti na te saṃ santakaṃ dhaññaṃ koṭṭhe pakkhipanti.
atk-s0301a0:1435_14: Paraniṭṭhitamesānāti paresaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ paraghare pakkaṃ bhikkhācāravattena esamānā gavesamānā.
atk-s0301a0:1436_4: Tuṇhībhūtā samañcarāti tiyāmarattiṃ asanighosena ghositā viya dhammaṃ kathentāpi tuṇhībhūtā samaṃ carantiyeva nāma. Kasmā?
atk-s0301a0:1436_6: Puthumaccā cāti bahusattā ca aññamaññaṃ viruddhā.
atk-s0301a0:1436_7: Attadaṇḍesu nibbutāti paraviheṭhanatthaṃ gahitadaṇḍesu sattesu nibbutā vissaṭṭhadaṇḍā.
atk-s0301a0:1436_8: Sādānesu anādānāti sagahaṇesu sattesu ca bhavayoniādīnaṃ ekakoṭṭhāsassāpi agahitattā agahaṇā. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1442_6: “sakko kira khantibalena samannāgato”ti sutvā vīmaṃsanatthaṃ āgato.
atk-s0301a0:1442_7: Avaruddhakayakkhā pana evarūpaṃ saṃvihitārakkhaṃ ṭhānaṃ pavisituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0301a0:1442_8: Upasaṅkamīti devānaṃ sutvā “na sakkā esa pharusena cāletuṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1442_9: nīcavuttinā pana khantiyaṃ ṭhitena sakkā palāpetu”nti tathā palāpetukāmo upasaṅkami.
atk-s0301a0:1442_10: Antaradhāyīti khantiyaṃ ṭhatvā balavacittīkāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā nīcavuttiyā dassiyamānāya sakkāsane ṭhātuṃ asakkonto antaradhāyi.
atk-s0301a0:1442_16: ahaṃ ciraṃ na kujjhāmīti vadati. Dutiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1444_1: Tatiye ābādhikoti isigaṇena abhisapakāle uppannābādhena ābādhiko.
atk-s0301a0:1444_2: Vācehi manti sace maṃ sambarimāyaṃ vācesi,
atk-s0301a0:1444_5: vācesīti vināpi tāva sambarimāyaṃ sakko amhe bādhati,
atk-s0301a0:1444_8: mā attano ekassa atthāya amhe nāsehīti vatvā nivārayiṃsu.
atk-s0301a0:1444_9: Sambarova sataṃ samanti yathā sambaro asurindo māyāvī māyaṃ payojetvā vassasataṃ niraye pakko,
atk-s0301a0:1444_13: Kiṃ pana sakko tassa kodhaṃ tikicchituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti?
atk-s0301a0:1444_16: tasmā naṃ isīnaṃ santikaṃ netvā khamāpeyya,
atk-s0301a0:1444_18: Tena pana vañcitattā tathā akatvā pakkantova. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0301a0:1446_3: eko bhikkhu ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ atikkamma vacanaṃ avocāti attho.
atk-s0301a0:1446_5: Kodho vo vasamāyātūti kodho tumhākaṃ vasaṃ āgacchatu,
atk-s0301a0:1446_7: Mā ca mitte hi vo jarāti ettha hīti nipātamattaṃ,
atk-s0301a0:1446_8: tumhākaṃ mittadhamme jarā nāma mā nibbatti.
atk-s0301a0:1446_12: Agarahiyaṃ mā garahitthāti agārayhaṃ khīṇāsavapuggalaṃ mā garahittha.
atk-s0301a0:1448_1: Pañcame mā vo kodho ajjhabhavīti kodho tumhe mā abhibhavi,
atk-s0301a0:1448_3: Mā ca kujjhittha kujjhitanti kujjhantānaṃ mā paṭikujjhittha.
atk-s0301a0:1448_7: pabbatovābhimaddatīti lāmakajanaṃ pabbato viya kodho abhimaddatīti. Pañcamaṃ.
